item.text: [©g]@#// rgya gar skadad/ Ar+yamahAyAno pa de sha nA ma ma
hAyA na sU tra/ bod skad du// 'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man
ngag ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i dmado// sangs rgyas dang/ byang
klu sgrubla// chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdug
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod
yul/ rin po tsho bkodapa'i 'khor gyi khyams de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ bsod nams
chen po'argyan gyi tshogs bsags pa/ spyod pa chen po'irgyu mthun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
cad kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas bstan ba mtha' yas ba/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i rnam par sprul bas byin gyis brlabs pa/ chags pa mod pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ dga' brgya chen po skyed pa/ dran pa
dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pas 'khrug pa kun nas ma smad la/ yi shes kyi rnam par dpyad pa/ de lamachag par rtog pas 'jug ba/
bskal pa mu med par mngon par bstod pa yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dbag tu med pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
ni mnyam ba nyid du ma ngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor len shin tu bskor/ slobam shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs
thu@#// namanga'/ chos thams cad la mnga' dbangan ba des/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa bslab pa ni legs par mkhyen/bang
bo dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ba res/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs ba'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la ni mkhas/
sas rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad ba lhun gyis grub ba ni rgyun ma bcad cing/ dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig
ste thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pamed pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyurab/ sams shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu
rnam par grol ba/ cang shes ba/ glang bo chen bo/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gis don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu
sbyor ba yongs su zad pa// yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/
nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyis rgyal po'i srasachos zab mo la gnas par makhas pa// mi/
dmigs ba'i chos las byung ba/ spyod lomamadzes ba phun sum tshogs pa sbyin gnas chen por gyur pa// de bzhinagshegs pa'i bka' 'ashin tu zhugs pa shastag go/ byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med/ grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pamed/ gzhal du mad/ dpag tumad/
brjod du med pa dang yang thabs gcig ste// thamasacad kyang sems kyis skad cig gcig lasangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa la
mchod pa dang/ rimagro byed pas nges par 'byung ba chos manyan cing yang dag par gnod pas ngomasam shes pa// rtag tu rgyunami chad par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa
la mngon par brtson pa// thabs dang shes rab dmapa'i pha rol tu sonang// sgrib pa med pa 'a rnam par thar pa larab tu gnas pa// rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/
spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la nye bar gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po glog lha zhes bya ba dang/
[？]/ @#/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba dang/ rnam bur snang mdzad snying po dang/ rnamapar gnon par dpa' ba dang/ yid gnyis kun tu 'joms pa dang/ rnam/
ba bsgrags ldan dang/ rnam par ltaba'i tshig dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po mun pa'i bung po dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med/ grangs mad/ bsam gyisamAkhyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du mad/ dpag tu med/ brjod du med pa dag dang thabs gacig
tsha sta denas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par nges par 'byung ba/ sgrib pa med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sams dpa'i lam bkod pa la dmig
ba sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa yongs su 'grub pa/ ye shes kyis 'byung gnas/ chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i sgo la 'jug
[ ]ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa la rnam par nges pa'i sgo la 'jug pa// mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes la 'jug pa khong du chud pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ma skye ba'achos ston pa//
thag pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba/ chos kyi dbyings tshul gcig ste/ 'dres pa med pa la 'jug pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam ba dang/ dbang po la 'jug pa ston pa//
snying po dang ldan pa// chos rnam par gdon mi za ba/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa// tshul bzhin gyi chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa khong du chudapa/ nyon mongs pa//
dang lta bar song ba thams cad 'dul ba/ shes rab dang ye shes thogs pa med pa'i rjes su 'jug pamadachung mnyam pamatha' yas pa'i yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i thabs kyi ye shes ston pa/
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad manyam pa nyid du shes pa'i rjes su 'jug pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa byin gyis brlabs thogs pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa// chos
thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par nges ba ston pa mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pa// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab mo khong dachud babasod nams dang ye shes kyi
tshogs thams cad sogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyun dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang/ mos pa dang/ rtogs pa dang/
shes rab mi zad pa mngon par sgrub pa// nyan thos kyi theg pas 'dul ba'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshul la 'jug pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pas 'dul ba'i phyir lus dang/
sems rab tudaban par shes pa/ theg pa chen pos 'dul ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sar dbang bskur ba 'thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir
chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i tshul la 'jug pa brjod do// ston to// rab tu ston to// 'dzin du 'jug go/ mos par mdzad do// len du 'jug go/
shes pa mdzad do// rnam par shes par mdzad do// rab tu shes bar mdzad do// rab tu 'jog go/ rnam par 'gral to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yang dag
bar rab tu ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shin tu rnam par nges pa'i don gyi chos kyi rnam grungs 'di lta bur rgya cher yang dag par radatu ston dan/ 'khor de nyid du bumo
rin chen zhes bya ba zhig 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa de stan las langs te/ lag pagayas par mu tig gi samo do thogasanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das bdag bden pa dang/ bdenapa'i tshig gang gis sems can chen po 'di dag gis bstan pa'i chos kyi rnamagrangs 'dus pa'i le'u 'di bas par chub par 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/
phyogs bcu rnams su yang rgyas par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams blunamadapa'i chos dkon mchog gsa mthar gyis blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub la dgod par 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang/ bden pa'i tshig des bdag gis mu tig gis mo de 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul ba lags te/ de de bzhin gshags pa dang///
phyong chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams su mu tig gi sa mo de'i khang pa brtsegs ba kun tu gnas shing bkod pa ci 'dra bas skyes bu dam pa de dag byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang/ de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba 'gyur ba'i di 'drab bdag khang pa bags pa de dag las kun tu gda' zhing 'khor thams cad kyis
bkod pa 'di mthong nas/ mi rangs par gyur cing/ de nas bu mo rin chen gyis mu tig gi semo do dra bcom ldan 'dras ga la ba de logs su bor ro// mu tig gis mo de da
bong ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ bu mo rin chen gyi bden pa'ibyin gyi rlabasakyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi mtshams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
kyi spyi gtsug ga mtshams su khang pa brtsegs pa chen po shan du yangs pa rgya che ba rnam par bkra ba/ bltan sdug pa/ ngos mnyam pa// shin tu rnam par phye ba/ legs par grub pa
gnas par gyur pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dedag sngon bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di 'dra bar gyur cig/ byang chub kyi snying po 'di'adra bar gyur cig cesasmon lam
btab pa'i khyad par ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bkod pa dag kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis khang pa 'dzugs pade dgalas mthong ngo// mthong nasakyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di/
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'ad ltar ji tsam du bdag cag gis bsal pa grangasamamachis par smon la mngon par 'dus bgyis pa de thams cad bu mo ni chen gyis
skadacig gcig la bskyon pa ni/ bu mo na chana'adi bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs cagalags te ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhino/ skyes bu dam pa dag

ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ bumo rin chen n bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs las nges par byung ba'o// skyes bu dam pa dag bu mo rin chen gyis sangs rgyas bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug
las dge ba'artsa ba bskyed nas bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di yongs su blangs te/ de nas bu mo rin chen 'das/ ji skad smras pa de ltar kun tu gnas so// gal te bumo rin chen gyis thams
cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni tog gsarab tu gang bar kun du gyur cigaces smras n yang/ do de bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du spos dang phreng ba
dang byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ gos kyis rab tu gang bar kun tu gnas par gyur cigacen yang/ de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// galatre bar snang 'di thams cad gadugs dang rgyal mtshan/
dang [0f10 ]ba dan gyis brgyan par kun tu gnas par gyur cig can yang de de bzhin du 'gyur/ chus 'jig pa 'byung ba laa'a'ijig par gyucig can mad de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// gal tams
'jig pa 'byung ba la/ chu'i 'jig par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur// thams cad dang ldan pa 'khora'ada 'khor los sgyur ba'i kha dog dang/ gzugs su gyur cigacan yang de da
bzhin du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog dang/ gzugs dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ dbang phyug chen po' ba dog dang/ gzugs dang/ dgeslongad/
dag slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma'i kha dog dang/ gzugs su gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur 'o/ gal tabadud rer yang lag na mtshon thogs nga 'a bdud kyi sde bya ba
phrag brgya lhag pa la bdud dang bdud kyi ris thams cad kyi ral gri dang/ mdung thung dang/ mda' bo che dang/ mtshon sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag thams cad rin pomasnatshogs kyis smras
pa'i mu tig ga somo dora kun tu gnas pa dang/ snama'iyi tog dang/ ut+pal dang/ par pishaka dang tsam ba ka'alnga ldir kun tu gnas par gyur cig ce na yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro/ gal te
'brog dgon par bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ kha zasamadapa dag tu khyan bye ba phrag bco brgyud pa'i grong khyer chen po kun tu gnas shing bza' ba dang/ btung ba dang/ kha zas mang po byung
bar gyur cig can yang de bzhin du 'gyur go/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenagyi khamasan/ gang gzugs su snab de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su kun tu gnas par gyur cig
cen yang de de bzhin du 'gyur ro// 'khor 'di thams cad nam mkha' la gnas par gyur cig can yang de de bzhin du 'gyur go/ rigs kyi bu dag gal te bu mo chen gyis
phyogs bcu'a'ajig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos ston par 'jug ba ji snyad bde bar snang 'di las lhag chadamed cing mtha' dag rdzogs par rnam pa
thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par byung bar gyuracigacen yang de de bzhin du 'byung sta/ gang bumoren chen gyi 'a sa de cung zad kyang don med pa ma yin no/ de nas bumo rin chen gyis bden ba'i
byin gyis brlabs dang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang/ rnam par 'phrul ba dang/ cho 'phrul gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kun tu bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/
'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rin chen 'byung gnas ye shes rin chen ma'// rin chen mchog ston yon tanamatha' yas pa// rgyal po'i rgyal po dgra dang shar gnyeragacod// byang
[%/ ]chub yan lag rin chen nor bdun sbyin// rin chen 'od kyi 'od namatha' yas pa// nor bu rin chen rnam pasnyatshogs 'od// nachen dam pa rgyal ba'i ronachen tog/ bde gshegs khyod la rin chen rnam

kyis mchod// rdo yi snying po sasnying nor bu gang// snang 'od dra tshad snying bo nor bu dang// rin po che dang nyim zla ba'a'od// khyod kyi sku yi 'od kyis zil du rlog/ thub pa khyod kyi sku tshad brtags pa na// sa
bcu'i bar la gnas par ma dmigs so// 'jig rten gtso khyodas la bzhugs kyang go/ rdzu 'phrul yon tan srid pa'i rtser gnasa mthong// rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams thams cad re res kyang// rgyal ba rang
rang mdunan bzhugs par shes// thams cad phyogs nas mngon sum mngon par yang// kun nas sgonas mtshungs pa med par mthong// la lasabazhugs dang mnal dang 'chag pa dang// 'khor/
rnams la las bde gshegs gsung bdang// ma gsung bzhugs shing bsam gtan dgyes pa dang// mtshungs med khyod kyi spyod lam mtha' yas mthong// khyod kyi ba spu renas 'od zer mchog/
gtang ma thag tu phyogs bcu thams cad rgyas// rgyal ba'i skun pad+ma'i 'byung gnas 'dra// bsam pa ci bzhin yid kyang dga' bar mdzad// bden la gnas shing rtag tu bden la dgyes// bden
pa lhura mdzad cigasung de bzhin mdzad// chos kyi 'byung gnas don dang 'dul la mkhas// yon tan kun mthar phyin la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bu mo rin chen gyis bcom ldan
'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'atshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnangan/ bdag 'dus pa'i le'u'achis kyi rnam grangs las/ bka' mchid kyi rgyud 'ga' zhagabartsams te/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu mo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa las dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang/ ngas dris pa de dang de la lung bstan pas khyod kyisamasar dus/
bar bya'o/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pas skabs phye ba dang/ bumo rin chen gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltan bya chub sem
dpa' bden pa smra ba rnams lags/ de bzhinagshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bden par gsus pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dba'achos
smra ba rnams lags/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams lachos su gsungs pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' don smra ba rnams
legs/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don du gsungs pan gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dbang 'dul ba smra ba rnamase gang lags/
de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpo'a rnams la 'dul bar gsungs ngan gang lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bumo nichen la legs so zhes bya ba byin te//
bumo legs so legs so// khyod kyi rtog pa bzang ngo// dri ba tshul bzhinano// spobs pa dge'o/ bu mo de bas legs par rab tu nyon la yid l zung shig dang/ sa khyodal khashadabo du
za0 tshanichen gyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis 'di skad cesabaka' stsal to// bu mo gsum po 'dadag//
na byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ste// gsum gang zhen/ gang sangs rgyas lami sla ba dang/ bdag la mi slu bdang/ sems can thams cad la slu ba'o// bum byang chub sems dpa'
sas rgyus dang/ bdag dang sramasacan thams cud la spu ba ji lta bu zhin/ bu mo gal te byang chub sems dba'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos
kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dod par byed cing smonati/ mngon par dga' ba de ltabun bumo byung chub sems dpalasangs rgyas dang/ bdag dang sems can thams cad lasu ba'o//
bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyus dang bdag dang/ sems can thams cad la mi slu btsilabu zhin/ bu mo gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tusems bskyod nas/ bdud dang
dmigs pa can thams cad kyis jitsam du tshegs chung zhing jatsamadu gnod par byas pa dang/ phas kyis rgol ba thams cad kyis tho brtsams shing co dris te 'bral bar byed cing/ ral gri dang//
mdung thung dang/ mda'o ches phug pa dang/ mthob pa dang/ ma grags pa dang/ snyad pa dang/ sdug bsngal bsakyang ma g.yo// mi 'khrul/ rnam par ma 'khrul/ ma zhum/ skyid
lug par ma 'gyur/ ma smag/ mdudang/ dngang par mi 'gyur/ yi mug par mi 'gyur/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar thog ma'i lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang ma gtong zhing/
brtan po yang dag par 'dzin la/ byang chub kyisams rin po che bskyod pa dang/ 'jig rtan gasum bo thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i sum sa bskyod ba dang/ samasacan thams cad kyi
skyabs dang mgon dang/ dpung gnyen gyi son sa bskyed pa dang/ mtshungs pa med cing 'dra ba med pa'i sems bskyed pa de las kyang ma nyamasamanur te/ thegab gzhan la 'dod pa'i sams lan
'ga' yang mi bskyod par sangs rgyas dran/ chos kyi 'khor lo la rten/ sems can thams cad mngon du byed/ stobs nye bar ston/ mthu bskyed par byed/ rtsal gyis rnam par gnon/
brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ pha rol gyi tshigags gnod par mnus pa de lta bu ni/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thamasacad la mi slu ba'o/ byang chub sems/
dpa' sangs rgyas dang/ bdag dang/ sems can thams cad lam sla ba gang yin pa 'don/ byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa'i mchog go/ de rnam pa bzhis sas rgyas lam su sku/ brtan pa/
dang mthu dang/ stobs dang/ brtson 'grus brtul bgo/ de rnam pa bzhis bdag la ma spu ste/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ g.yomad pa dang/ sgyu med pa// de rnam pa/
0 bzhes sems can thams cad lam sla ste/ sbyor ba dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ sdud pa// bumo grang 'di byang chub kyi sams yongs su ma gtong zhing sngonadam bcas pa lasam nyams
pa'i ngani byang chub sems dpa' bden pa la 'jug ba dang pogo/ bumo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' padan bani/ gang 'di dag bsdams pa dang/ gu bsungs pa dang/ ngag 'khrul ba
med pa dang/ tshig bden pa ste/ de gcig bu yarung/ skye bo mang po'anang du gnas akyang rung/ tshig bden paar smaste/ dergyal srid kyi phyir yang brdzun gyi tshig mo s+sa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po chos rab tu bkang bas khrid kyang brdzun gyi tshig ma smra ba'o// bumod labyang chub sems dpa'i bdenang na/ rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su dag pa ste/ rnam
ba sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe nA/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tshashes pa'i rnam pa dang/ yon tan gyi rnam ba dang/ khral yod pa'i rnam pa dang/ nges pa'i rnam badrang/ bcosamam yin pa'i nan pa dang/
ma smad pa'i rnam pa dang/ mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa dang/ lhas rnam par rig pa'i rnam pa dang/ 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam pa dang/ na 'grogacodapa'i rnam pa dang/ de 'gro 'byed pa'i rnam pa dang/
'phags pa'i skye bo mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang/ mkhas pas mchod par 'os ba'i rnam pa dang/ nangadag pa'i rnam pa dang/ phyi rol legs par byas pa'i rnam pa dang/ gzung bar 'os pa'i
tshig gi rnam pa dang/ blang ba'os pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang/ tshigami blang ba'i rnam pa dang/ 'jam pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang/ khyad bcan gyi tshig gam ba dang/ khyod la
tsanang chag ga rnam pa dang/ kha dri rab tu zhim pa'i tshig gi rnam pa dang/ bka' blo bde ba'i rnam pa dang/ slu bamed pa'i rnam pa dang/ gdung ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/ dga' zhing mchog tu dga'/
ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag la nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang/ gzhan langes par sems dpa' rnam ba dang/ 'khrul pamed ba'i rnam pa dang/ khan ma tho ba med pa'i rnam pa dang/ sbyin pa'i gnas kyi
sa'i rnam pa dang/ sas rgyas mnyes par byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i ngag rab tu 'thob pa'i rnam pasu/ bumo 'dri dag ni bdenapa'i rnam pa yongs su dag pa sum cu rtsa gnyis so//
bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa ni gang/ dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// deca'aphyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa lamos ba dag gi yin gyi/ ser sna
can dgag ma yin te/ 'din de'i dam bcas pa'o// gu bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar kun tu snang ba 'din de'i bden pa'o/ byang chub na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims yosasudag
bdag gi yin gyi/ tshul khrims 'chal ba dag gi ma yin te/ 'din ngam bcas pa'o// gang tshul khrims yongs su dag par kun snang ba 'din de'i bden pa'o// byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa'
gzod pa 'astobs rab tu thob pa dag ga yin gyi/ gnod sems can dag gam yin te/ 'di ni de'i dum bcas pa'o// gang bzodapa dang/ nges par kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bdenang 'o// byang chun
byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa dgagi yan gyi/ le lo can dag gi ma yin te/ 'di ni de'i dam bcas pa'o/ gangadage ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtsom par kun tu snang ba 'din de'abaden pa'o/
byang chub n byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan la rab tu gnas pa dgag yin gyi/ sems g.yeng ba dag gi ma yin te/ 'din da'i dam bcas pa'o// gung bsam gtan gyi yan lag yang dag par
sgrub par kun tu sna nga ba 'di nade'abaden pa'o// byang chub n byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang ldan pa dag ga yin gyi/ shes rab 'chal pa dag gi ma yin te/ 'danadAmabacas pa'o// gangashes
rapo dang shes la kun tu snang ba 'din de'i bden pa'o// gong bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos bo dang/ tshas pa'i gnas pa dang/ mngon shes
pa dang/ rig pa dang zha gnas dang/ lhag mthong la yang de bzhinano/ byang chub nabyang chub sems dpa' dgeba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa dgagayin gyi/ dge ba'i chos rnam par spangs pa dgagi
ma yin te/ 'di na 'dam bcas pa'o// gang dag pa'i chos thamasacad la kun tu snang ba 'di ni de'i bden pa'o// bumo gzhan yaba'aphags pa'i rnam pa'i bden de byang chub sems
dpas brtson par byas/ gang 'di sdug bsngal shes pa dang kun 'byung ba sbyong ba dang/ 'gog pa shes pa dang/ lam bsgom pa'o// de lasdug bsngal shes pa gang//

phung po rnamA la rang bzhin gyisamaskyabar shes pa'o// kun 'byung ba sbyong ba nasridapa gang gis phung po rnams yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba'i srid pa de shin tu mi 'byung zhing chag pa dang bral ba man/
par dga' bamed pa ste// ganga mngon par dga' ba yod pa de ni gdodamanas 'ong ba med pago/ gang gdodamanas 'ong ba med pa de ni/ chos nyid ma spangs pa'o/ gang chos nyid ma spang pa de nakun
'byung ba slong ba'o// de la 'gog pa shes ban gang mtshan ma dang/ dmigs pa shin tu zad cing 'gag pa ste/ gang 'gag pa de'i tsho/ dngos po 'jigs par 'gyur ba mang mod la dngos po yod pa
dang / dwangos po mad pa mtshungs shang mnyam par gyur pa'i chos thams cad la/ gangamanyam par mthong ban 'gog pa'i bden pa zhes byab// de la laman gang mnyam par lta zhing mnyam par
spyor pa ma rtog pa mi mnyam pa'i mtshan nyidam yin pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad mi tshol ba bdag ga med pa yongs su 'dzan pa med pa/ lenapa med pa// ma byas pa// rnam
par ma byas pa// 'dan lam zhes bya'o// 'di la gang bden pa shes pa'i mi shes dang/ sems can rnams yang dag par thob par byed kyang/ bdag mngon sum du ma byed pa 'di
[z]/yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/ bden pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khris bden bshes ba yongs su bsgoms pa'i bzod pa thob bo// bumo de
laji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos skya ba yin zhen/ gang gi tshe chos la rte na par 'gyur ba dang/ chos ts+tsha ba dang/ chos sams pa dang/ chos bsam pa dang/ chos spyod yul ba dang/
chos spyod pa dang/ chos don du gnyer ba dang/ chos 'dod pa dang/ chos la dga' bsamos pa dang/ chos kyi dbung dang/ chos kyi tog dang/ chos kyi mtshonachadang/ chos kyi go cha
bgos pa dang/ chos kyiya lad bgos pa dang/ chos kyi snangab dang/ chos kyi mar me dang/ chos kyi dran pa dang/ chos kyi blo gros dang/ chos rtog pa dang/ chos kyidabyod pa dang/ chos l
sbyor ba dang/ chos spyod par gyur ba dang/ chos kyis nyal ba dang/ chos kyi spyod lam dang/ chos srung ba dang/ chos kyi nor dang/ chos kyi ma zad pa dang/ chos rgyuche ba dang/ chos kyi
ba byed pa dang/ chos kyi lus dang/ chos kyi ga dang/ chos yid la byed pa migatong nga// chos spyod pa rnam pa 'ad lta bu dang ldan bde na chos skya ba man te/ chos ma yin paskya ba ma yin no//
de la chos skya ba gang zhen/ bden pa gang yin pa de bden par slob dang/ sas rgyas la bsngags par sgrub dang/ chos la srung bar skabadang/ dge 'dun la bla ma dang sri zhu bya bar
slu ba dang/ byang chub kyisams 'chos par bya babasnyad par ba dang/ bsam pa ma 'dor bar skya ba dang/ lcag pa'i bsam pa ladamigs pa smra ba dang/ sbyor
ba mi nyams pa smra ba dang/ 'phags pa rnams kyi lta ba skya ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyena rnams la bstan ba smra ba dang/ nga rgyal med pas gus pa dang/ rio bya bas bdang/ rtagatu
bsngags pa smra ba dang/ chos manyan pan gus par byas te mnyan pa smra ba dang/ chos kun tu tshol bras mi ngoms pasla ba dang/ chos ston ng la snyoms lasamad pa sna ba dang/ slob dpon
chos kyis dpe mkhyud med pa skye ba dang/ byas pa gzo ba dang/ byas pa shes ba dang/ byas pachudam gzon pa smra ba dang/ lan la mar ba smra ba dang/ dragon pa la skrag pa med pa skya ba dang//
'phags pa'i rigs ma nyams pa smra ba dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan ma gtong bsab dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'jug pa smra ba dang/ sbyin pa'i bsngags po sa ba dang/ byang chub
tu yongs su bsngo ba skya bdwang/ tshul khrims kyi dbye ba skya bdang/ bzod pa'i stobs smra ba dang/ brtson 'grus kyi zhum pamed pa smra ba dang/ bsam gtan rnams kyi rab tu zha ba
sma ba dang/ shes rab kyi khong du chud pa sla ba dang/ thebs kyi yongs su gsal bar byed pa smra ba dang/ byams pa'i skyabs sla ba dang/ snying la 'jug pasmra ba dang/ dag pa'i mchog
tu dga' ba smra ba dang/ btang snyoms kyi gnyis dang bral ba skya ba dang/ bden pa rnams rjes su mthun ba smra ba dang/ so so yang dag par rag pa bsad pa sgrub dang/ mngon par shes pa rnamA
kyi bskyod pa skya ba dang/ ston pa rnams chos sna ba dang/ chos kyi mdo rnams kyi bod du chud pa sgrub dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhagab rnams kyi dran pa brjed pa med pa skya ba dang/ mang dag

pa'i spong ba rnams kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa smra ba dang/ rdzu 'phrulargyu rkang pa rnams kyi mngon du bskyod pa sna pa dang/ dbang po rnams nobasma ba dang/ stobs kyis rdzi ba med pa skya ba dang//
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rjes su rtogs pa smra ba dang/ lam gyi sgrol ma sma ba dang/ zhi gnas kyi 'jug bskya ba dang/ lhag mthong 'og da kho na shes pa smra ba dang/ rig pa dang rnam
bar grol ba yongs su gsalabar byed pa sa ba dang/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'is ji lte ba snab dang/ rangasangs rgyas kyi thig pa ston pa sa bdang/ theg pa chen po'i yin tan thams cad yongs
su bsgrags pa smra ba dang/ rtenacing 'bral bar 'byungaba'i lugs dang mthun pa smra ba dang/ stongapa nyid la skrag pa med pa smra ba dang/ mtshan ma med pa bsad pa smra ba dang/ smonapa
mad pa la so sor rtog pa sla ba dang/ phung po rnams sgyumar bstan bas ba dang/ khams rnams nam mkha' khams dang/ mtshungs pa nyid smra ba dang/ skyo mchod rnams rang
spya// bzhin gyis stong pa nyid smra ba dang/ nor bdun smra ba dang/ rjes su dran pa drug skye ba dang/ gus pa dang bcas pa smra ba dang/ yang dag par dga' bar bya ba drug skya
ba dang/ mngon par shes pa drug sgrub dang/ ba rol tu phyin pa drug sma ba dang/ migalnga smra ba dang/ don dam pa smra ba dang/ kun rdzob la 'jug pa sgrub dang/ legs par byas pa'i las
snab dang/ sonas can thams cad la sems snyoms par sla ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi yon tan bsregasapatshad med paskya ba'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chubs mas dpa'
chos sma bani/ bdag tu skyabs yin/ sems can du sla ba ma yin/ srog tu smra ba ma yin/ gang zag tu smra ba ma yin/ chad par smra ba ma yin/ skyug par smra ba ma yin/ 'byung
bar lta ba snabam yin/ 'jigs par lta ba snapa ma yin/ mtha' khas len ba me yin/ dbus la mngon paro zhan pa ma yin/ mimathun par smra ba ma yin/ 'gal bar sna ba ma yin//
rtsod pa sa bam yan/ phyogs yongs su 'dzin pa sma ba ma yin/ dmigs pa smra ba ma yin/ lta ba kun nas dkris pa dang/ thatsom dang/ sgrib pa dang/ chod pa dang/ bag la nyal dang/
khong khro bsgrub ma yani/ chos dang 'gal ba smra bam yan/ chos 'jig pa sgrub ma yin/ chos spong ba smra bam yin/ chos la mngon par rlomasams su byed pa smra ba ma yin/
zab chos la log par 'jug par smra ba ma yin te/ chos smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshos kyi rjes sumathunapa'i tshis sgrub pa smra ba dang/ yang dag pa skya bdang/ chos skya ba dang/ phas
kyi rgol ba thamasacad kyisamatshugs par s+sa'o// byangechub sems dbu'achos saban chos thams cad snang ba dang 'brel bas// byis bskyar bor dka' ba yin/ byang chub sems
dpa' chos pa ban dmigasapamed pa'i spyod yul bas stong pa nyid skya ba yin/ mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can basamtshan mamadab sla ba yin/ khams gsum dung ma 'dres pas smon pa med/
ba smra ba yin/ 'dus byas kyi skyon mthongobasa mngon par 'dumakhyadebasma ba yin no// byang chub sems dba'achos s banichos kyi don rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir/ skya ba med pa dang//
'byung ba mdang smra ba yin no// bumozhes bya ban brjod du med pa/ yi gamadab/ bsnyad du med pa/ slar yodapa/ gzugs yod pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med ba/
rnam par rig pa yin pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ soms dang yid dang/ rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ rdulamad pa dang rdul dang bral ba/ 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mun
bamed nga/ snang ba med nga// bdag gir med ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ 'dzin pa ma yin ba/ 'dzin pa dang bral ba/ yul med pa// yul ma yin pa// yul
thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ zhi ba grol ba/ blta dka' ba/ khod du chud par dka' ba/ rtog ge kham yin pa// rtog gas mchud pa// 'bags pa
mkhas pas shes shing rtogs patshor ba med pa// tshor ba thams cad kyi rgyun bcad pa// ji lta ba bzhin du dus gsum du skyong// 'chi'abomadapa/ 'bo bar 'gyur ba ma yin pa/
'bo ba med pa/ skyo ba med pa/ phun sum tshogs bam yin pa// rgud pa ma yin pa// 'byung ba med pa// 'jigs bamed pa/ ma srid pa/ 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba/
tho 'jig bar ma 'gyur ba/ bskyed pa ma yin pa// gzhig pa ma yin pa/ ma rtogs pa/ kun tu mi rtogs pa// rnam par mi rtogs pa// mtshan nyid du snang ba ma yin pa/
mtshan nyidamad par snangabam yin pa// mtshan nyid gcig ba/ mtshan nyid med pa// kun gzhamed pa/ kun gzhi dang bral ba/ 'dre ba med pa/ chags pa med pa/
bcings pa med pa/ grol ba med bu/ bdag gir ba mad pa// yongs su 'dzin pa med pa// sbyor ba med pa/ zag bamed pa/ 'drab med pa/ mtshus pa med// mimanyam
pa dang mnyam pa/ mi bden pa dang ni brdzun nga/ bde bamed pa// sdug bsngal med pa// 'dubamod pa/ 'bral ba med pa// ldan pa mdang/ mildan pa med pa/
a mi med pa// gzugs med la/ sbyor ba med pa/ gsal ba med pa// snying po med pa/ snying po'i da ba yin pa// dbyer med pa// dbyer med pa ma yin pa/ rdo rjes yin/
ba 'bags pa'i mtshan nyidAm yan pa/ de khon de bzhin nyid gzhan m yin pa nyid/ ring bam yin pa/ zhwa bam yin pa/ khadogamadab// rtags med pa/ dbyibs mar
ba mtshan ma med pa/ 'dinAm yin pa/ pha gan ma yin b/ de lasan man nga/ gzhan las ma mnar/ nang ma yin pa/ phyi ma yin pa// gnyi ga ma yin pa/
gzhan ma yin pa/ gzhan m yin pa yang m yanang/ gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa yang ma yin pa// mthong ba med pa// thos ba med nga/ dran pa med pa brjed pa med
pa shes pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa med pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba/ rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ grangs med pa/ grusamad pa ma yin pa/ gsar ma
cad dang bral ste/ bu mo 'dInachos zhes bya'o// gang 'da'adrab 'ichos skad dang brda' sna tshog sakyis 'chad cing yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba zhes
bya'o// gzhan yachos smra ban/ smra ba thams cad las rnam par log pa mgo/ chos smra ba nasudang yang martsodado// chos sa ngan gzhan la shin tu rloms samasamad do// chos ts+tshakha/
nam bslabs pa la ma bar s so// chos skya ban bslabs pa rnams lam 'dud pa ma yin no// bdag bstod pa ma yin no// chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do//
zang zing gu ma sbags pa'i rgyud kyis chos ston to// gzhan dag la 'gyod pa ma skyed do// gzhan gyi ltung ba gleng bar ma byed do// chos la khyad du gsod pas byed do// chos kyi bar chad ma byed/
do chos ba na byang chub kyi phyir mi 'dra ba'i chos gang yang mthong ngo// stong pa nyid las grol ba'i chos m ston to// mtshan mamad pa dang smon pa ni dpa las rnam par grol ba'i chos mi/
ston to// chos kyi dbyis tha dad du ma byed do// de bzhin nyid las mi g.yo'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' las shin tum 'dra'o// tshig 'bru la ston pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la
ston pa mayin no// drang ba laste na pa ma yin no// gang zag la ston pa ma yin no// don dang 'gal ba ma yin no// tshig 'bru dang 'gal ba ma yino// yoshes dang 'gal ba ma yin
no// rnam par shes pa dang 'gal bam yin no// nges pa'i don dang 'gal ba ma yin no// drang ba'i don dang 'gal bam yin no// chos nyid dang 'ga' bam yin no// gang zagadang
'gal bam yin no// phyogs yongs su 'dzin par ma byed do// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'gal bar mi byed do// chos ban 'jig rtan gyi chos gang gis kyang rnam par dag par mi
ba0 shesaso// ser sna'i nyon mongs bas bsgribs pa ma yin// tshul khrims las nyams pa ma yin no/ tshul khrims 'chal ba bsems can 'dor ba 'am yin no// khro ba dang//
gnod sems dang/ tha da nam yano le'a'adris dang lhan cig gnas pa ma yan no// chos skyaban byung chub kyi sems brjed pa ma yin no// shes rab kyi rtsa ba nyan pa chudagakhron/
pa ma yin no/ gzhan la smod pa ma yin no// gang zag la sdang ba dang/ chos la sdangabar ma byadado// mdo sde dang/ mdo sde las 'gal bar mi byed do// 'dul ba la 'dul ba ma yin
bar ma byed do// chos nyid dang 'gal bar ma byed do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba'i chos gang la yang chos ma yin par ma mthong ngo// nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal 'phel bar ma byed do// chos las
nyams par ma yin no// byas pachud gzon pa ma yin no// bag la nyalami 'dzin to// bsdusangal rjesasu chags pam yin no// bsi stangamed pa la khong khro ba ma yin no// mtshal
ba dang mamadza' ba la gnyis su 'du shesam byad do// rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi gzonato// chos s ban las kyi rnam par sman pa la mi mos pa ma yin no// skya ba'i lanam ster ba ma yin
no/ chos skyab ni dgramed pa'o// 'khrul pa ma tshol lo// lce gnyis mad do// lus dang ngag dang/ sams latshul 'chos pa med do// chos la tshul 'chos pa med do/
chos smra ba ni gzhan la nye bar bstan pa'i phyir dgon par gnas pa ma yin no// 'thob pa 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa chung ba ltar ston pas mnan// 'dod zhenache bas/
sdig pa 'dod pa ma yin no// chos smra banas nigs rgyas kyi byang chub gzhan gyis byas par ma ston to// ma mnyam par len par mi rtsomamo// nor bdunam rung bar m byed do/ sha za bam yazhigo
ba'irigs gcod bam yin no// gzhan rgyu yon tanam rung bar byed pa ma yin no// bdag gi yon tan brjod pa ma yin no// sasargyas kyi chos tshad yod par ston pa ma yin no/ chos smra ba
na thag pachan po'i bsngags pa brjod pa sam ngoms te/ de'i phyirenachos skya ba zhes bya// bumo de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' don smra ba yin zhin/ don ces bya ba ni/
bsam pas bcos ma ma yin pani don to// sbyor bas dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pan donato// lhag pa'i bsam pas khyed par na don to// gzhan byung/
la chub kyi sems yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pan don to// sbyin pa'i rnam par sminu pa lama'i ban don to// sems can rnams bde ba myong bar byed pan don to// tshul khrims las
nyams pa med pa ni don to// bzod pas ma smad ngan don to// brtson 'grus kyis dgos pa thams cad mthar 'byin pa'i don to// bsam gtan gyis nye bar zhi ba ni don to// shes
03 rab kyis thatsom med pan don to// byams pas sems can thams cad la sems snyomasaban don to// snying rjes sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa ni don to// dga' bas chos la
dga' zhing mos pan don to// btang snyoms kyis bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad mi 'byed pan donato// sbyin pas 'gyod pamed pan don to// snyan par smra bas khong khro ba med pa
na don to// don byed pas chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yongasasu rdzogs par byed pan don to// donamathun pasasems can rnams theg pachen bo yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug nga na don to//
bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pan don to// 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa// sdug bsngal ban don to// chos thams cad bdag med pan don to//
nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi ban don to// tshig 'bru las don la ston pan don to// rnam par shes pa las ye shes la rton pa ni don to// mdo sde thams cad las nges pa'i don/
gyis mdo sde la rton pa ni don to// srog dang gang zag gisgra las chos nyid la ston pa ni donAto// donasoso yang dwag par rig pas bstan pa ma zad ban don to// chos so so yang dag par
rag pas chos kyi dbyings 'dres pamed pa ni don to// nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas gung pom lus pa'i ya shes kyi rjes su 'jug pan don to// spobs pa so so yang dag
yug/ par rig pas ci rigs bar chos ston ban don to// sbyin pa'i tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa ni don to// tshul khrims kyi tshogs las smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed/
pan don to// thos pa 'tshogs lasanan tan snying por byed ban don to// bsod nams kyi tshogs las mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed pan donato/ yashes kyi tshogs las
sams thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchogam yin pa shes ngan don to// zhi gnas kyi tshogs las sems las su rung ban don to// lhag mthong gatshogs las rig pa dang rnam
bar grol ban donato// dran pa nye bar bzhag ba rnams kyis dran pa nye bar gnas pa ni don to// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis/ dge ba'i chos thams cad skyed pa ni don to/ ju'athu'agyi
rkang pa rnams kyis phyogs bcur bgrod pan don to// dbang po rnams kyisatshagasarab tu 'byed pan don to// stobs rnams kyis nyon mongs pa thamasacad 'dul ban don to// byang chub kyi
yan lag rnams kyis chos thamasacad khong du chud ban don to// lam gyis chos thams cad m 'khrugs pan donato// mngon par shes pa rnams las shin tu nyams pa med panadonato//
da lta ran gang chos rnam ba 'di lta bu las don rab tu myong ba de ni 'di ltar donasla ba yin te/ don ma yin pa sgrub ma yin no// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa 'don smra ba yin no/ dbu mogazhanayang

dmigs par lta ba thams cad rab tu zhu bar bya ba'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi donan don to// byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid du sprub na don skyab yin no// rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad slong ba'i/
phyir/ mtshan ma med pa'i don ni don to// byang nubasams dpa' mtshan ma mad par s+yA ban donaskya ba yin no// khams gsum pa thams cad kyi smon lam dang bral ba'i phyir smon pa med pa'i don
ni donate/ byang chub sems dpa' smon pa med pa sna ban don sgrub yin no// de bzhin du bsdus// 'du byed thams cad kyi rgyun bcad pa'i phyir mngon par 'dum byed nga 'donan don to//
skyab thams cad nyo bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir skya ba medapo'i donanadon to// skye ba nyobar len pa'i skyi ba thams cad ma ma 'byung ba'i don ni don to// byang chub sams dpa' mi skyo ba skya ban don
smra ba yin no// sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byung ba dang/ lam dang/ 'gog pa'i donan don to// 'gog pa skya ba dang/ chos thams cad la gang zagamang ba'i don ni don te/
gang zagamed pa skya ba dang/ skad dang tshog thams cad brjod du med pa'i don ni don to// brjod du med pa skya ba dang/ brtul zhugase thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir bden pa'i don/
don to// bdenapaskya ba dang/ byang chub kyi phyogasakyi chos thams cad la bag yod pa'i donan donato/ bag yod pa smra ba dang/ thos pa'i donathams cad lanan tan byed pa'i donanadon to// nan tan
byed pa sbyab dang/ theg bathams cad theg pa chen po 'i donan don to// byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po s mkhan don skya pa yin no// bu mo gzhan yang dbyer med pa 'don/
te sems can madang 'i don ni don to// ro gcig pa'i donani don to// thu dad pa med pa'i don ni don to// tshul gcig pa'i nanAdon to// tshigamed pa'i donan donato// mi zad pa'i don don to//
zla ma srid pa'i don ni donate// ma bam 'byung ba'idonan donato// 'ong ba med pa dang/ 'gro ba med pa'i donanadonato// mi skye mi 'gag pa'i dzinani don to// rjes su 'gro ba'i don ni don to// gdug
ba medaci gzhag pa mad pa'i donan don to// mngon par 'dum byed pa'i donan don to// 'dus na byas kyi don ni don to// sgro btags pamed pa'i donan don to// rnam par rig pa med pa'i don ni/
don to// 'khoragasum yongs su sbyong ba'i donan donato// dus gsum mnyam pa nyidakyi don ni don to// 'khor gsum dri ma med pa'i don ni don to// 'gro bsad pa'i din na don to// 'jig
pa las dam pa mad pa'i don nadon to// thun mongs ma yin pa'i donan don to// yongs su gdung ba med pa'i donanadon to// nye bar zhi ba'i don ni don to// 'dri ba med pa'i donan don to// grub med
ba'i don ni don to// gzung ba med pa'i don nadon to// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su mchad pa'i don ni don to// ma 'khrugs pa'i donanadon to/ chos dang chos ma yin pa la rnam
param rtogapa'i donan don to// mtha' dang/ mtha'amed pa dang/ chad pa dang/ rtag pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la 'jug pa'i don ni donato// yi ge dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang/ sgradang/
tshig gi lam thams cad ji lta ba bzhin dunan tan du byed ba dang/ khong du chud par bya ba'aphyir donan don to// sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang/ spros pa lam rgyu ba'i don ni donato// 'dod
chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gtimugagi nyon mongs pa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i donan don to// chos thamasacudamanyam panyid de tham dad cing smatshogs med pa'i don ni don to// stong pa nyid dang/
mtshan ma mad pa dang/ smon pa med pa drang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa' donan don to// don dam pa'i bden pa'i don ni don to// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i don ni don to// rnam par rig pa

mad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi donani don to// shin tu brtags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi donan donato// sdug bsngal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi donan don to// dban pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// gnas nid pa'i mtshan

nyid kyi donan don to// don bya ba ma rung bar mi byed pa'i donan don to// dbyer med pa 'amtshan nyid kyi donani don to// de khon dang de bzhin nyid dang gzhan m yin pa de khona'i mtshan nyid kyi donan don

to shin tu dul ba nges pa'i don gyi mtshan nyid kyi donanadon to// phung po spyama'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi donan donato// khams chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid kyi donanadon to// skye mched
dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyi donan don to// nang nye bar zhi ba'i tshan nyid kyi don ni don to// phyi rol du rgyu ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi donanadinato/ sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/

tabar zhu ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// bde ba yang dag bslu ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi donan don to// nyon mongs pa thams cad ci yang ma yin pa'i donan denate// rdo rje lta sra bam phyed pa'i
mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi donani donAto// legs par byas pa'i shin tu mthar gtugs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don don to// thamasazhi

kyi rjes su song pa khong du chud pa'i mtshan nyid kyi donan don to// rnam par thar pa sgrib pamed pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// 'gro ba thamasacad du yang dag par zhugs shing/ sangs rgyas chos
thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi denan don to// mnyam pa dang/ ma mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par ston pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don don to// ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab las nges par
byang ba'i mtshan nyid kyi donani don to// nges pa'i tshig dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ rnam par grol ba'i yi shes mthong ba'i mtshan nyid kyi donan don to// ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan
nyid kyi donan don to// btags pa rnam par 'gapa'i mtshan nyidakyi donan don to// yang dag pa'i shes pas lan 'debs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don ni don to// don thams cad yang dag par
'du ba'i mtshan nyid kyi donan don to// byang chub sems dpa' gang don 'di lta bu dang ldan pas/ don gang bstan pa de ga thums cad n don bstan pa// de'i phyir donaskya ba zhes bya'o/
bu mo de la ji ltar n byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba smra ba yin zhen/ 'dul ban de bzhin gshegs pas gnyis su gzus te/ gnyis gan gzhon/ ltung ba 'dul ba dang/ nyon mongs
ba 'dul bko/ de la ltung ba 'dul ba gang zhen/ ltung ba zhes bya ba ni yongs su rtog pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ tshul bzhin ma yan pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba marig pa'i ba las byung ba/
phyin ci log gi rtsa ba las byung ba/ yang dag pam yin pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ yod pa ma yin pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ 'jigs tshogs kyi rtsa ba las byung ba/ sems can du mngon
par zhen pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ 'gyod pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ 'byong ba ma yin pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ btsan gyi rtsa ba las byung ba/ zhacing rmongs pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ sa
rab nyamachung ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba/ 'din ltung ba zhes bya'o// de la ltung ba 'dul bag zhan/ phyitsom mdA pa lar tu gnas pas 'byung ba ste/ ltung ba ni yulan mi gnas pa//
phyogs na mi gnas pa// phung bo'i ma gyur pa// gzung bamed pa/ snang ba med pa'o// sems gang gis lta kha 'gyur pa de yang/ zad pa dawol ba/ rnam par gyur pa/
09/ yulanam gnas ba/ phyogasanam gnas pa// phung por mgyurd// gzung bamed pa// snang ba med pa go/ sems ji lta bar ltung ba yang de bzhin no// ltung ba ji
lta ba chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ rtsa ba med pa'o// mi gnas pa'o/ gangasams la soms nyi mad pa dang/ rnyog pa mad pa dang/ yang ba dang zhi ba dang yongs su gdung ba med pa dang/
bsal ba dang/ shin tu byang ba dang blama'i tshig 'gos pa dang/ gcig tu nges nga ra bcoma med cing gcig tu yid ches pa 'din ltung ba 'dul ba zhes byago/ de latonamongs pan gang
nyon mongs pa 'dul ba ni gang zhen/ nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ ma rig pa dang/ srid pa dang/ len pa dang/ srid ba'amAn yag
bcu gnyis dang/ gang dag la 'dus byas 'jug pa 'din nyin mongs pa zhes bya'o// de la nyon mongs pa 'dul ba gang zhen/ 'dilta ste/ chos thamasacad na shin tu dul bgo/ dertsi'i
phyir zhin/chos thams cad na stong ba nyid kyis dul ba sa/ de la 'dod chags kun tu rgyub med do// zhesdamadado// gtilugamed do// chos thams cad tshanama med pas dul ba ste/de la
mongs pa thams cad kun tu bamed do// chos thams cad nasmon pa med pas dul ba// dilan tu rgyu ba thams cad kun tu sgyubamed do// chos thams cad na mngon par 'du bya ba med pas dal ba ste/
a/de la mngon par 'du byed ba thams cad gnatu rgyu ba med do// chos thams cad na rkyen gyi ban las pa ste/ de la lta bar song ba thams cad kun tu ba medado// gang nyan cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i/
chos thams cad la nges pa dang/ yang dag pa bonadang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad nyon mongs pam yin pa dang/ shin tu zhi ba dang/ stong nyid gong gsakhyang chub skyod pa'i stong pa nyid des nyon
mongs pa thams cad stong par gang de ltar stong pa nyid khong du chud pa 'di ni nyin mongs pa 'dul ba zhes bya// gang 'di skadas ba ni/ 'dul bats+tsha ba yin no// bdag 'dul ba'i phyir 'dul
zhing/ gang bdag 'dul ba shes pa de ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba shes pa'o// de la bdag 'dul ba gangazhin/ gang bdagalabadag med par shes pa dang/ bdag lo ngo nyidashis pa/
dang/ bdag dban par shes pa dang/ bdag ji lta ba bzhinadang/ bdagam 'khrugs pa dang/ bdag stong pa nyid dang/ bdag dngos pomed pa nyid dang/ bdagade bzhin
nyid dang/ bdag gam dmigs pa dang/ bdag rgod pa mad pa dang/ bdag sgro btags pa med pa dang/ bdag rtag tu skye ba med par shes pa skyo/ gang de ltar bdag shes pa na nyon
mos pa rnam pa thamasacad du shes pa'o// ji ltar ba dag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes phyin ci log pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa med pa la/ nyon mongs par 'du shes kyi logago/ ji ltar rang
bzhin gyis bdagamed pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pamed pa ste// gang de ltar lhag mthong gis shes bden/ nyon mongs pa 'dul gzhis
bya'o// de la 'das pa'i nyon mongs ba 'dul ba ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang m yan no// de ci'i phyir zhun/ kun tu rgyung mdacing yid la byed pamed pan/nyonamos
ba 'dul bgo/ gang kun tu rgyu ba med cing yid la byed pan dpa de na 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pam yin/ da lta byung ba ma yin no// ji ltar soms gzugs can ma yin te/nangan ma lag
phyi lan ma yin/ gnyis ka med pa la ya'i rigupad bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa yang gzugs can m yin// nang na ma yin/ phyi rolan ma yin/ gnyig med pa la yang mi dmigasaso// mi
dmags pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad naganod pa med pa'o// zhi bamed pa'o// bya ba med pa'o// rnam par bya bsad do// byed pa med pa'o// rnam par byed pamed pa'o// gang
ltar nyon mongs pa rnams 'byung ba dang/ 'jig pa mdang rashes pa 'di yang nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'o// bden pa dang/ chos dang/ don dang/ 'dul babastan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang
chub sems dpa' khrom skya ba'i chos la bzod pa skyasaso// bu mo rin chen ni tshim zhingamagu sko/ yid rangs ngashang rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang/ yid bde bskyes te/ bcom ldan
wa/'od s la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nyitsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bdenapa dang/ chos dang/ don dang/ 'dul ba bstan pa 'di legs par gsungs ran mtshan/
te bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dultar sla bar 'gyur ba de dag ni rtsodapamamachis pa lhur len pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rtsod pa spang ba'i sladang chos ston pa 'gyuyo/ bum byang
chub sems dba' gang 'di ltar nyon mongs pa shin tu btuleb/ dogazhanadag gi nyon mongs pa yang 'dul ba'i phyir chos ston bas/ de'i phyir 'dul ba sgrub zhes bya'o// bden pa'i bstan pa'i
le'u'o/ de nas tshodang ldan pa shA 'bus/ bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces smras so// bumo khyodacibaden pa dang/ chos dang don drang 'dul ba skye ba yin nam/
bumo rin chen gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa shAri'ibu bdon pa nibasAd dumed pa'o// chos n 'dod chags dang bralakhago/ donanAbarjod dumad pa'o// 'dul ba na lus dang/ sems daban ba ste//
dan lanagadab par menus so// btsunapashAri'i bu gzhan yabaden pa na 'gog pa'i bden pa'o// chos n bdenapa'imtshan nyid do// don tshig 'budang bral ba'o// 'dul ba ni rnam par
grol ba'i mtshan nyid do/ den brjod pas lan gdab par mnus so// btsun pa shA ri'i gzhan yang bden pa ni de bzhin nyid do// chos gzhan m yin pa de bzhin nyid do// donazhiganyis
kug/ su me da pa'i don to// 'dul ba ni bya ba med pa'i don to// den pa rjod du med pa bstan du med pa'o// tshodang ldan pa shAri'i bus/ yang bumo'i chen la 'di skad ces smras so//
bu mo khyed kyis rin po chaci 'drub zhig blangasan des khyod nachen zhes bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ bu mo rin chen byas tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu la 'daskad ces smras so/ na

khatsun pa shAri'i bu sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon sum du sems bskyed pa rin po che sta/ ganganyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med pa'o/ sum cu rtsa
gnyis gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskya pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'isims bskyed pa rin po chodang 1/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung sob pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang/
sakyi rigs kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang 3/ dge 'dun gyi rigs yongs su bsgrub pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i sems bskyed pa ni po che dang 9/ sems can thams cad 'phags pa 'a 'don pa la
dgodapa'i phyir/ byams pa chen po'i sems bskyod pa ni po tshe dang 5/ soms can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba/ snying rjechen po'i sems bskyed pa 'an

po che dang pa/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang zhing sems can ser sna can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ nang dang phyi'i dngos po la mi lta ba'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang la/ bdag kyang/

ma/ tshul khrims la gnas la/ tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang 8 bzod pa'i stobs dang des pa dang bde ba dang/ dul ba dang zhi ba dang sdom pa

ldan zhing/ sems can gnod sems dang/ tha ba dang khro ba dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyugs pa dang/ 'chab pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi gtsobo dang/ mthu dang ldan pa gyur kyang lan ma byed cing bzodapa nyidargyad la
byang chub kyi sams sems can la lta ba'i bzod pa'i stobs kyis sems bskyed pan po tshe dang9/ zhum pa med cing zhan pa medalalal med de/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing theg pa chen po las phyir mi ldog pa/
tshogs la yongs su ma skyo zhing/ sa mas can le lo can yongs su smin par byaba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus chen po'i sems bskyed pa ni po che dang 'ab/ zhwapa dang/ blo gros dang/ rtogs pa dang/ byams pa
dang/ bsam gtan gyi mchog dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i khyad par khong dutshad la sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i khams la yang
dmigs shing thadas kyis bsam gtan las phyir mi ldog pa'isags bskyed pa'i n bo tshe dang 11/ shes rab rab tu dbye ba chos thams cad la rab 'ab mo datsang/ ji lta ba bzhin du gnyis su medal/ tshul
gcig pa la 'jug pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i sems bskyed pa ni po che dang 12/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa zhe'agras pa med pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ tha dad pa med tsang ro/
gcig pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su snyan par byed pa 'i sems bskyed pa 'an po che dang 13/ rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba dang bral zhing blta ltang byas pa dang bsta ltang ma/
byas pa mtshungs par gyur cing/ ma kheng sa pa ma 'dud par legs par ba gnas pa yid ga yo ba med pa/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis ma g.yos pa// sems can rjes su srung ba'i sems baspyod pa rin po

che dang 19/ 'jigs gang dngang pa dang/ sgrug pa dang bral la/ rten cing brel bar ba byung ba zab mo la 'jug pa la mkhasaM pa/ mthob dang mtha' med par lta ba dang bral ba'i sems bskyed pa rin po chadang 15
bsod nams kyi tshogs sogs pas ngoms mi shes shing/ mtshan dang/ dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang 16/ sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod cing/ sangs rgyas

ba mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'i sems bskyed pa 'an po che dang 17/ tshos mnyan pa yongs su tshol la thos pa la dpyad cing don la yongs su 'jal ba'i sems bskyed pa 'an po chadang 18/ jaltar thos pa'i chos ston cing

brang zung med pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang 1tsho/ zin pa med pa'i chos la slob dpon 'achab pa med pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po chadang 20 ]log par zhugs shing gnas kyi chos dang tshul khrims las
nyams pa rtag tu rjes su 'dzin pa'i sems bskyed pa ni po che dang 'a1/ ma bslabs pa las dang po la bsnyas pa med pa'i sems bskyod pa rin po che dang 22/ nga rgyal dang/ mngon pa'i de rgyal dang/
log pa'i nga rgyal dang bral zhing nga rgyal med ra bka' blo bde ba/ mthun par 'dzin pa/ sems can thams cad la 'dudang 'i sems bskyed pa ni bo chadang 2/ babasarom bsams dbang po rnab/
theg pa ngan pa/ dman pa dang bral zhing theg pa chen po la chos pa/ gangs rgyas kyis dgos pa'i sems bskyed ba cin po che dang 29 bdud kyi las dang bral zhing nye ba'i nyimongs pa dag ste/ gtsang
dri ma med la rnyog pa med kyang 'dod chags kyi rdul dang/ nyonamos pa dang ldan pa'i 'dus byas l dga' zhing/ yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa rin po che dang 28( rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pas dben
par spyod cing dgon pa'i yon tan mthong ste/ lus dang/ sems dben pa la dbon par spyod kyang/ 'khor ba'i 'du 'dzad ng 'dre bal mdar/ snying rje chen bod las bskyod par potshe dang ba
lha dang mo'i bde ba dang / bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang/ rang gabadeb thams cad 'dor zhing/ sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ sdug bsngal myong bas mos mgyob/
sems bskyed pa rin po che dang 'a/ zag pa med pa'i chos thob pa byinus pa dung skal ba dang/ dbang ba dang/ brjod pa dang ldan yang lag mthil du'ongs pa'i rnam par lab tsha'adodatsang/ 'dus byas

mi spong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sems bskyed pa ni po che dang bar/ chos rnams la mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang bdag med par yang so sor rtog la skyob yang yod//
chags par 'gyur ba yang med par dga' zhing/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yang par sgrub pa' sems bskyed pa ni po che dang/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa

dang smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med par so sor rtog cing/ sems can la lta yang chos de mngon sum du yang mi byed la/ sems can la lta ba'i sems bskyed par n po tshe dang 27[） ]'gro ba thams
cad kyis skrag cing/ mgo bam/ gos la me 'bar ba lta bu 'abartson 'grus dang ldan zhing/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyir bskal pa grangs med par 'khor bas yongs su ma skyo ba 'dan/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems bskyed pa ni bo che'o30/ ji lta ji lta bur byang chub la nye bar 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur de lus dang/ longs spyod dang/ ye shes shin tu rgya cher 'gyur yang/ dache ba nyid kyi chos de yang 'dor/

zhing snying rjes dbul po'i rjes su 'jug ste/ smon pa med cing skyo ba med pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sams bskyed pa rin po cha'o'/ gang sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de dag thog ma kho nar bdag

byang chub par mi 'dod la lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i sems bskyed pa rin po che sta32/ btsun pa shAri'i bu sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa rin po cha ste/ des
nabyang chub sems dpa' rani bo che 'byung gnas zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo rin chen la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bu mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' dag gi
kha sems bskyed pa ni po cha 'jug pa 'di legs pas sas pa legs so legs so// bumo gang dag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag ni skyes bu dam pa yin te/ yon
tan bstan pa mtha' yas so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ nyan thos ni po chadang/ rang sangs rgyas rin po che las/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung go sangs rgyas dkona mchogalas nyan thos dang rang sangs
rgyas rin po che 'byung ngo// byang chub kyi sems rin po che las/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang/ dge 'dun dkon mchog 'byung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa la'i dwa ti'i bus
'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bu mo 'anichen gyi shes rab dang/ sobs pa bstan pa dang/ ji ltar 'disos yang dag par rig pa thob la bstan pa ngomatshar to// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'a dil ji snyam du sums/ bumo ni men gyis so so yang dag par ragi lam thob bo snyam na deltar tshabalta ste/ bu mo rin chen gyis so so yang dag par rig pa
dang spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa thob go/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shAr dwa ti'i bus/ butsho rin chen la 'di skad ces smras so// bumo khyod ni soso yang dag par rig pa bstan pa las
brtsam ste/ stodas par gyis shig bu mo rin chen gyis smras pa/ btsun pa shar nA ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pan/ thams cad du chos la dpyad pa dang/ ston pa 'i las byed de/
btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ba de ni/ so so yang dag par 'ag pa bstan pa'i tshig go/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ don thams cad kyis yang dag par bsdus
pa'i sems bskyed pa 'di ni/ don so so yang dag par rig pa'o// chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba'i sems bskyed pa 'di ni/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de las byung ba'i dpyadang
thams cad dang/ ngesar 'i tshig thams cad po 'dan nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o// sems bskyed pa de thogs pa med par ston cing spobs pa rgyun ma 'chadapa 'di na/ spobs pa so so yang
la'i dag par rig pa'o// rgyu ba med cing gnagapa med pa den ni don taM/ 'di ni don so so yang dag par rig pa'o// sgyu ma'i sems kyi chos nyidi na tshig so so yang dag par rig pa'o// rnam par rig pa'i
sgo nas nges pa'i tshagi na/ sa pa'i tshig so sa yang dag par rig pa'o// yul drug la sems mi chags shing skyebs pa thogs pa med pa ni/ sbyobs pa soso yang dag par rig pa'o// da
nges pa'i don te/ chos na dben pa la lta ba'o// nges pa'i tshig ni sgra tsam mo// spobs pa ni sgra rnam par rig pa'o// sangs rgyas zhes bya ban khong du chud pa'i don gyi tshig go/ de/
las des par byung ba na tshig so// chos de na ris pa'i tshog gis rab tu phye ba'o// spobs pas bstan pa ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// chos kyi donon don to// 'dod chags dang
[p ]/bral ba'i chos nyide na chos so// chos la byed pa ni nges pa'i tshag go/ chos la spobs pa ni spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'o// dge 'dun gyi don dang/ 'dus ma byas pa'i don/
don so so yang dag par rig pa'o// dge 'dun dang/ don ro pa/cug pan chos so// dge 'dun la dpyad pa ni nges pa'i tshig go/ gang rab tu ston pa de ni spobs pa so so yang dag par
rig pa'o// btsun pa shAr dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ chos thums cad kyi tshig bstan pa na so so yang dag par rig par blta// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa shi/
bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bu mo rin chen gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu sems bskyed nas ni ji srid cig lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang gi
gsung rab lags/daskad ces gsol pa dang// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la'adi skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na
bskal pa graa med pa ba yang ches grangs med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su
ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jabag rten du byung ngo//
Aradwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jig rten gyi khams shan tu rnam par dag pa
zhes bya bar gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par dag pa longs spyod na dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang 'dra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa'i
dge 'dunani/ byang chub sems dpa' dag la shastag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bdun du rtsa drug thams cad kyang phyir ma ldog ba/ gzungs dang spyobs pa las nges par byung ba sha stag go
shAr dwa ti'i bu de de'i dus na/ de bzhin gsheg sa pa rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug po tsho
mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa la/ btsun mo'i

'khor gyi bud med stong phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de/ de dag thams cad kyang yul gyibazang mo sha stag go/ de la bu po khri yod de thams cad kyang tshan po che chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa sha stag go/
shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par sman pa yongs su dag pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa dol[7]
yid du 'ong ba'i na bza' dang/ zhal zas dang/ gzims chadang/ stun kha sos kyi spyanasmanadang/ yo byad dpag bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis 'byob phrug sum cu rtsa drug tu bsnyen ra byas so/
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs pa'i skub
tshad ci tsam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gakhrags de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bcu thub go/ sha'adA ti'i
du de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su drag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de la mchod pa dpag tu med pa byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ bu dang
bcas/ g.yog dang bcas te srog chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ mdun du bdar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song sta phyan pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bye ba brgya stong gis shin tu smras pa'i mu tig gi si mo de sku la gsol nas thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod pa bgyis na/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la/ mchod ba ma bgyis
pa'i mchod pa khyad par du'aphags pa gzhan la ma mchis sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ gde bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis/ rgyal po bsod nams/

[A/ ]kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po gang khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par byas pa'i mchod pa dam pa khyad par can/ gyam pa khyod kyis mchod
ba 'dis de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod pa gzhan yod do// de yang gang zhen/ de nas de nga zhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs des/ rgyal po
klo 'khor dang bcas pa de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// zhing rnams bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma gta'i khyim snyed// grang gis rin chen bkang ste bskal pa bye ba
brgyar rtag rgyun byin pa'i// bsod nams des ni gang zhig sems can don phyir snying brtse snying rje bskyed// byang chub zhugs pa'i bso danams de yi grangs cha gang du'ang 'gyur ma yin// sangs rgyas

bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma g.ya' bye snyed la// bskal pa bye ba khrag khruge mang por me tog spos kyis mchod pa ngas byang chub rtan pa na byed gang zhig gom pa bdunan rab por bas// rgyal ba mchod
ba 'di na dam pa gtso bo gya nomi mchog gis phul// gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur bar smon btab pa// de nasbyin pa de bzhin tshul khrims gzhal yas bzod pa'i stobs
kyis mchog/ den brtson 'grus brtan pa dang 'dzani gzhal yas shes rab ma g.yos pa// de namanyan yas bsags pa'i bsod nams lam ste zad par 'gyur ma yin/ gabazhig bsam pas
yid rab dga' zhing thams cad mkhyen la rab 'jug pa// bsngags dang brjod dang grags dang gzugs dang g.yog na shin tu mdzes pa thob// des na longs spyod dbang phyug stebs rnams rtag tu kho
sems dang dran pa 'phags// de ni 'khor los sgyur rgyal stobs ldan de ltar brgya byin tshangs par 'gyur// ma gang la la byang chub rdul dang bral ba bla med zhi'ajug pa// de nangen song ngan 'gro lam
dngam khem brgya re thams cad gcod// de ni lho dngami yi lamams rab tu 'byed cing rnam par sbyangs// leng ba mi 'gyur 'on par ma man dang nga rodzums cad tshang bar 'gyur/ gang zhig
byang chub 'jug cing blo gros ldan pa sems can skyabs gnyer ba// sangs rgyas ma thong zhing de dag la longamatshodamakhas pa tshos kyang nyan// shes rab ye shes ldan zhing blo shin tu rlabs chachen/
por 'gyur// the tsom nem nur med cing nga rgyal bral bar rtag tu drang por 'gyur// gang zhig byang chub sems bskyod 'di 'dra'i dpal gyi byang chub 'jug pa de/ 'dod pa'i dga' l dga' ba rnyed par
mi 'gyur chos la dga' ba red// de ni 'jig rten drims gos par mi 'gyur chulas pad+ma bzhin// shes rab ye shes yon tan rnams kyis mi ngoms phyir zhing tshol bar byed// byang
[y]// chub zhugs nas snang rdzomatha' yas gang zhig zad par mi nus la/ skyabs dang gling dang dpung gnyen dag dang sems can rnams kyi pham 'gyur// de 'gro'a'i snyan
pa slob dpon bla ma ded dpon chen por 'gyur/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten 'das pa'i sman smin nad rnams zhi bar byed// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de nas rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa
yongs su dag pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de las byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan dang/ phan yon dang/ bsedanams tshad med pa 'dathosanas tshim zhing ma la yi rangs
u rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bad ba skyes nas bsam pa thag pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bumed kyi 'khor de dang/ bu dubo dang/ blon pa
dang mkhar gyi rgyal po dang/ skye bo'itshogs chen po de la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sems can dag la snying rje byams bskyedanas// nga na byang chub dmar mchog la zhugs//
gang zhig gang la dga' ba yid 'ong 'dod// des na byang chub sems nga rtan yang dag bskyed// ma'ags sbyor ba sdug bsngal gyur pa yis// sngon chad 'khor ba bye ba ma shes kyis// byatshub
mchog gi lam du zhug gnashig dang/ sems can don brtson sdug bsngal bde bar 'gyur/ gang dag rdzu 'phrul spobs pa ye shes dang/ shes rab 'khor dang de bzhin mchod pa dang// sangs
rgyas rnam gzigs yon tan dpag med da// 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems las byung// lha mi'i 'jig rtan bde ba gang dag dang// brgya byin tshangs pa 'khor los bsgyur ba dang
gang dag zag bcas zag pa med pa 'i bde// 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems las byung// bsdu dang bsam gtan de ltar tshad med dang// de bzhin gang dgar rol phyin 'tsho dang// mno
shes rig dang so so yang dag rig/ 'di dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems las byung// stobs bcu sangs rgyas kha dog bsam yas dang// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs
dang/ gang dag sangs rgyas chos yangs dpag med pa// de kun ma dag sems las nges par byung// gang zhig zhing mas bye ba bskyod pa dang// thams cad dbyangs kyis go bar byed pa
dang/ 'od dang bkod pas dri med rgyas 'dod pa// mkhas pa des na byang chub sems bskyed cing/ mkhas pa gang zhig byang chub sems bskyed pa// phyogs rnams kun du mchod pa'i 'os su
'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur// gsol bam btab 'gro ba'i bshis su 'gyur// gal te sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pa yis// bskal mang
par bsngags pa brjod kyang go/ byang chub sems las bsod nams gang byung ba/ brjod pa sa zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// rgyal po bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pasagis
[r/ ]/su bcad r de dag smras ma thag tu// n gnas srog chags khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang/ rgyal bo'i btsun mo'i 'khos ka la bu phra

dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de yang rnam pa drug turab tu g.yos so// lta bye ba phrag bzhi bcus kyang
rjes su yi rang ngo zhes sgra phyung nas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po sa phyis kyang 'bya ba phrag bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
bar gzigs de la ba dbar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas so// bla mar byas so// ra mar byas so// mchod do// tshangs par spyad pa bslab pa'i gnas lnga yongs su blangs so/
rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos nyan pa'i phyir// g.yog dang bcas te dong nas chos nyan to// des phyi zhig na bu thu bo rgyal por bcug nas sgra dang ba spu byug gas te/
gos ngur smrig bgos nas yang dag par dad pas sa nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo// de de ltar rab tu byung nas 'di lta ste/ bden pa'i tshig dang/ chos kyi tshig dang don gyi tshig dang/
'dul ba'i tshig dang/ tshig mi zad pa bzhi po 'di dag gi yo ga'i mtshams sbyar ba las yongs su 'dzal lo// de la bye ba tshad bar dpyod pa la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ngo// rgyal po rab tu byung ba//
des rjes su bslabs nas/ de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs da'i gsung rab la
rab tu byung ngo// shA ra dwa ti'i du de'i tshade'i dus na/ rgyal po bsod nams kyizhim par sman pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya bar gyur ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar ma Alta ste//
bu mo rin chen 'di nyid do// des de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs de las bu mo rin chen 'das byang chub tu sems bskyod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das las kyi sgrib pa ji lta bu zhig gis bu mo 'dis bud med kyi dngos po yongs su bzung/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i dgan las kyi sgrib pas du
med kyi dngos po yongs su mi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dag ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i khyi'i mngon par shes pa dang/ rig pa dang/ yo shes/
dang/ thabs dang/ shes rab kyi stobs kyis bud med kyi dngos po yongs su 'dzin to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems ]bu mo rin chen 'ad bud med do snyam n yang de ltar cha lta'i// shA
ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni mngon par shes pa'i stobs can gyi byang chub sems dpar blta ste/ de la ni bud med kyi chos dang skyes pa'i chos med do// bu mo 'di ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan no//
ba medado// 'gro ba med do// shAr dwa ti'i bu/ bu mo rin chen 'dis ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bu mo gzhon nu dgu khri bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
yongs su smin par byas so// de nas bu mo rin chen gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bud med kyi lus kyis sems can rnamA
la chos ston m spyod dam/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ba dag ni skyes pa'i lus 'di nyid kyang mi 'dod na/ bud med kyi lus yongs su bzung ba lta ci smos/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa sha
tshig ra dwa ti'i bu lus la snod dam/ smas pa/ bu mo skyed de// smras pa// de bas na btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad las khyadapar du 'phags so// de
ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar gang nyan thos kyis smad pa de la ni byang chub sems dpa' mi snyed do// nyan thos kyis smad kyis byang chub sems dpas ma yin pa gang zhan/ phung po dang/ khams dang/
skye mched la nyan thos kyis snod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nam yin no// lus yongs su bzung ba la nyan thos smod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nam yin no// 'khor ba yongs su
bzung ba la nyan thos smod kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' ni ma yin no// skye ba'i gnas la nyan thos smod kyi/ bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su gzung ba la byang chub sems dpa' nam yin no//
[d/ ]bsod namasa mngon par 'du bya ba la nyan thos snyed kyi/ bsod nams kyi tshogs gsogs pas mi ngom pa'i byang chub sems dang ba ni ma yin no// sems can dang 'dra ba la nyan thos snyed kyi//

sems can thams cad yongs su smanapar bya ba'i phyir 'du 'dzan la byang chub sems dang 'a na ma yin no// grong dang grong khyer du 'jug pa la nyan thos smodakyi/ grong dang grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/
yul 'khor dang pho brang 'khor du 'jug nga la byang chub sems dad 'a na ma yin no// rang ga nyin mengs pa la nyan thos spyod kyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa 'khyad chub sems dpa' nam
yin te/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na gang dang gang la nyan thos dang de dang de la byang chub sems dpa' n ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus sbas pa/ bu mo stobs gang gis smad par mi 'gyur
ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs gang yin/ bu mos smras pa// btsunang shA ra dwa ta'i bu/ brgyad pa 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa'i stobs te/ des de snyed par ma 'gyur// brgyad
gang zhen/ khong khro ba med pa'i sa mas kyis byams pa'i stongos dang/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sa snying rje'i stobs dang// bcos ma ma yin pas lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang lha
nyon mongs pa dang bral bas shes rab kyi stobs dang// yongs su mi skyo bas thabs kyi stobs dang 8/ zhum pa med pas bsod nams kyi stobs dang pa/ gti mug dang bral bas ye shesakyi stobs
dang 7 sngon dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pas brtson 'grus kyi stobs te ra/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti' brgyad pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' stobs te/
stobs de dag gis de ma snyidad// gnas brtan gyis smras pa// ci bu mo khyed stobs 'di lta bu dang ldan nam/ bu mos sa pa/ btsun pa bar dwa ti'i bu ldan te gang mnyam pa nyid kyis ldan//
gang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par gnas so// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang mnyam pa nyid 'ad ni stobs ma yin/ nyamachung ba ma yin te/ de nimanyam pa nyid do// gung mnyam pa nyid de la/
ni tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do// ma nyam pa zhes bya ba nam mkha' ste/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam mgo/ ji ltar nam mkha' snang ba med cing bla gab med pa de bzhin du//
chos thams cad kyang nam mkha' ltar snang ba med cing bla gab med pa'o// gang de ltar mnyam pa dananyam chung ba yang ma yin/ stobs dang ldan pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang btsun pa shar nA/
ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' gang nyam chung ba de ni stobs dang ldan pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ gang nyon mongs pa nyam chung ba de niye shes kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang ser sna nyam chung
ba de ni/ sbyin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang dang tshul ngan panyamachung ba de ni tshul khrims kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang gnod sems nyam chung ba de na bzod ra'i stobs dang ldan pa'o/
gang le lo mchung ba de ni brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang g.yeng ba nyam chung ba de ni bsam gtan gyi stobs dang ldan pa'o// gang 'amal pa'i shes rab nyam chung ba de ni/
rab kyi stengs dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin du chos thams cad de gang dang gang las byang chub sems dpa' ma dag ba nyam chung ba de dang de las de dag pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu ma rin chen la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ bu mo legs so legasaso// ci ste bstan pa ltan de ltar bstan par bya'o// bstanab 'di bshad pa byang chub
sams dpa' lnga brgya khazod pa skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bcu bo de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rinachen la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal to// bu mo byang chub sems dar 'i gang gi phyi'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ theg pa dman pa 'dod cing bya ba ma yin pa byed par 'gyur ba 'din gnas ma yin te skabs med do//
de yi dam la brtan pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub kyi snyapa mchog dam pa'i seng nas gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs thob ste/ gnas la yang gnas dang/ gnas malaMn/
pa la yang gnas ma yin pa ra yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'dini/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po ste/ stobs de thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa
'khor gyi nang du sang ga'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ khyu mchog ga gnas su dam 'cha' zhing/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lhabam/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'i m/ gang gis kyang
'jig rten du chos dngamathun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lorab tu bskor ro// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dang 'i spyad pa spyod pan/ rang gi las las gyur pa//
lhalas kyi rnam par smin pa las rten pa yin te/ de las kyi rnam par sman pa 'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i las dang las yang
dag par blangs pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa gnas dang rgyus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang tu shes pa 'don de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gnyis pa ste stabs de shod pas de bzhin
gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge 'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ khyu mchog ga gnas su dam 'cha' zhing/ dag sbyong ngam bram ze 'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gang gis kyang
'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor la rob tu bskor ro// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad ba spyod pan/ sems can rnams kyi
dbang po la brtags nas chos ston te/ dadag shes nas dngang pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug cing/ dbang po rnams ji lta ba dang ldan te de dbang po 'i rim pa mkhyenanga'i stobs 'didang ldan pas
byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang/ gang zag gzhan dag gi dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pas
gang sems can gzhan rnams dang/ gang zag gzhan dag gi dbang pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'din/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum
pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ sems can rnams kyi khams la 'jug ste/ zhugs nas ser ga can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba dang
khams ji lta ba bzhin du gnas so// da khams la 'jug pa'i stobs 'dod ng ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ khams du ma dang/ khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta/
ba bzhin du ra shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bzhi pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can mos pa tha dad pa
rnams kyi mos pa dang/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kun tu tshol te/ de ltar ms pa la mi smod do// de mes pa'i stabs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang
de gang zag gzhan dag gi mos pa du ma dang/ mas pa sna tshogs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stabs lnga pa'o// bumo gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas dang/ nyan thos kyi thig pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang/ theg pa chen po thams cad
duye shes gtong ngo// de kun tu 'gro bamkhyen pa'i stobs 'ad dang ldan pas byang chub thob pan kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pajalta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
wA stobs drug pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin lhur len pa yin te/ sems nges par rtog cing/
nyonamangos pa dang bral tedul zhing cang shes so// de cang shes kyi stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gzhan rnams dang gang zag gzhan dag gis bsam gtan dang
rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ kun s nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byung ba dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs ya nga dag pa dzalta ba bzhin du
rab tu shes pa'i dind bzhin gshags pa'i stobs bdun pa'o// bu mo gzhan yadabyang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod ngan/ sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dgaba'i rtsa ba
chud ma gzon te/ bag yod pa yin/ sngon dam bcas pa las ma nyams pa yin no// de sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud ma ga zon ra ba stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub
thob pa na/ bdag dang sems can gzhan rnams dang/ gang zag gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes la
'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i steng sa brgyadapa'o// bu mo gzhan yod byang chub sems dang 'a byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang yang sa klong bar mi byed la//
ma bslabs pa la dbang mi za zhing/ sems can thams cad la snang bar gyur pa yin no// desnang ba'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ lha'i mig gi shes pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
tu rab tu shes pa 'din de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ sems can gangagazag pa'i phel ba'i phyir
yang gnas pa ma yin gyi/ zag pa zad par bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston te/ zag pa 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin gyi/ zag pa med pa'i lam gyis sems can rnams l lam bar
ston to/ de mes pa zag pa med pa'i stobs 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ zag pa thams cad zad pa mkhyen pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa 'di ni/ de bzhin
[r/ g], , ]/gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa'o// bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ byang chub sems dpas de dag rdzogs par byas nas/ stobs bcu dang
ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/ bum lta bsan byung chub sems dar sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rab tu dbye ba 'di dag thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
bcu pa 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyi'i/ can s kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la 'jug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la bu mo rin chen gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
