'das gang ma 'jigs pa bzhidang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po 'di dag dge ba gang dag dang ji ltar ldan na byang chub sems dar 'am 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyus kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rab tu thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bu mo 'di la byang chung sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ gzhan gyis shes par
mi bya'o snyam nas/ slob dpon nam yang chos kyi dpe mkhyud med de/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing chos mnyam pa nyid du
mthong ba yin/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba yin te/ de byang chub thob pa na seng ge 'i sgra yang dag par sgrogs te/ nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas pa la/
sa 'di lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs pa ra ba ngas ma rgyas go zhes/ 'darang la dag sbyang ngam bram ze'am/ lha 'am bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang mthun pas
rgo' bar 'gyur ba'i chu tshanam yang dag par rjes su ma na thong ngo// mtshan ma de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de bzhin gshags pa bde ba brnyes/ 'jigs pa med pa brnyes pa dang/
mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa yin te/ 'khel gyi nang du seng ge 'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing/ khya mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'chi ste/ dug sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dal/
tshangs pa 'am/ gang gis kyang 'jig rtan du tshes dang mthunapar ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i ' 'o 'ong tu bskor ba 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi'ajigs pa dang po'o/ bu mgazhan
yang byang chubs mas dang ra byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ bar du gcod pa la bar du gcod pa'i chos su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te da bar du gcodapa 'a tshos lam ston to/
ma 'jug go/ ma skyed do// gzhan dag la yang mi 'chad do// mi ston te// bar du gcod nga 'i chos su shes nas sbyong ngo// de byang chub thob pa na/ seng ga'i sgra sgrogs te/
gang ngas bar du gcod po'i chos su gsungs pa de dag la stenapa la ni/ bar du gcod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnas med de/ 'dir nga la gang yang rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin te//
'di nas 'jigs pa gnyis pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ rtag tu rgyun ma chad par dag pa'i sa la mos
yid 5 rnam par byang ba'i lam du zhugs shing/ sems can thams cad la rnam par dag pa'i chos ston te/ yon tan gyi chos nyid mngon sum du gyur pa yin no// yan lag gi tshogs gang dag
gas rnam par byang ba/ rnam par dag pa'i lam gnon par 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi tshogs de dag la bdag kyang spyod/ sems can gzhan la yang ston to/ dbyang chub thob pa na/ seng gos/
smra sgrogs te/ gangangs rnam par byung ba/ rnam par dag pa'i chos su gsungs pa de dag la bsten pa la ni rnam par dag pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i gnas medado// 'di'i nga la su'angarung rgol
bar 'gyur zhes bya ni/ snga ma bzhin te/ 'din ma 'jags pa gsum pa'o// bu ma gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ bdag gis shes
a shing mthong ga/ gzhan gyis ma ngeshes ma mthong ngo// zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal du nam yang maltung ste/ rtag tu rgyun ma chad par mngon pa'i nga rgyalamed cing 2 sdig pa 'byed pa blo sbyangs ra
yin no// de chos kyi sbyin pa 'di dang ston pas byang chub thob pan/ seng ge 'i sgra sgrogs te nga zagapa zad do zhes dam bcas pa la/ zag pa 'di lta bu zhig yongs su ma zad do zhes bya ba de lta bu'i
gnas med de 'dir nga la su yang rgol bar 'gyur ba zhes byab na snga ma bzhin te/ 'din mi 'jigs pa bzhi pago/ bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/
rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lam stor nga 'i sems can rnams la/ lam 'tshol bar byed de lam gyi gam yo nas/ mtho dman mi mnyam ba mnyam par byed do// zam pa dang rdo stogasakyang 'dogs so//
mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gnangan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'imachod rten la mar me yang 'bul// sems can ltung ba'i 'gyod pa la gnas pa rnams kyi ltung ba'i 'gyod pa'i sel to// kun nas da
ba med par byed do// gzhan gyi 'gyod pa mi skyed do/ gzhan gyi ltung ba byung ba gleng bar tshabyed do// sa la dogs pa skyes pa'i sems can rnams la dogs pa thams cad bcod pa'iphyi
oM ston to// the tsom dang yid gnyis dang/ ma nur med par byed do// chos kyi snang ba sgrub po// shes rab kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par skyed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dang 'a dang/ chos smra ba thams cad la chos bstan par gsol ba 'debs te/ chos yang dag bar 'dzin cing rgyu med par legs sa zhes bya ba brjod do/ sems can gang la yang
ma 'phya'o// mthadi slad mi byed do// chos la shed mi 'byed pa dang/ sdang ba dang/ mgo myas pa dang/ rmos par ma byed do// skye bo'i nges pa'i tshig la rna Ta ka bar sa ra/
do tshig thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ba khung du mos so// yi ge gsog dang/ yi ga stong pa nyid kyi tshig tu brjod pa thams cad la skyon du lta ba ma yin no//
'khrul pa 'i skabs tshol ba ma yin no// dachos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ 'khrul pa med pa zhes bya ste/ dris pa thams cad lung bstan pa ston pa/
dag la del demed cing/ kun tu snang bting nge 'dzin shin tu sgoms pa'i phyir/ sgra skad thams cad du 'jug pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ rtag tu rgyunam 'chad par bazhin gshegs
ba'akhrul pa med pa'i tshig gas chos ston pa yin te/ thams cad du khyadang ra lung ston pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o// bu mo gzhan
yadabyang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ gag sbyin thams cad spangs pa yin te/ bdanapa / ]chos sna/ don sna/ 'dul ba na zhing/ mu com sna
byung rgyal du mi sna ste/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i gtam thamago cad spangs nas/ 'phags pa'i ma skye ba thob cing/ dag sbyang gi chos kyi bya ba rtsod pa med pa la zhugs te/ chos gang nyan cing
yongs su tshol ba dang/ gzhan la yang ston pa de dag thams cad bdag dang/ gzhan dga' ba dang/ 'bar zhi bar bya ba'i bsam pas yongs su tshol la// rtsodapa med pa lhur len pa'i
de su dang yang ma 'thab ma rtsod de/ dgar ma tshil le// dgra med pa'i chos la mes pa yan no// brjod du med da'i chos rnams la 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes lhun gyis
grub pa la mngon par dad de/ sems can gzhan yang chos nyid 'di yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ sArtsomed
pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// de yi ga 'bru gcig kyang ma brjod cing ma smra la/ sgra skad thams cad kyang/ nges pa'i tshig gis bstan pa dag la yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du legs
par bshad pas/ 'kher tshim par byed do// rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs lamakhas pas de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gnas thams cad dang/ mtshan thams cad dang/ dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang/ spu'i khung du thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgra dbyangs bsam gyis ma khyab
pa 'byung ste/ than sgra gcig gis kyang 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par byed pa'i chos kyi sgo dang ga tu med pa bstan pa 'byung zhing/ sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyis brlabs dang/ ye shes
kyi stobs kyis de na/ dngazhin gshegs pa rnam par mi rtog cing btang snyoms te/ lhun gyis grub pa 'di ni/ ru ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o//
bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyang m spyod ngan 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ mos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun
rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa'i rjes su dran pa drug po dang mi 'bul ba yin no// sems can gzhan yang rjes su
dran pa 'di dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyel ba med pa zhes bya ste/ dol
de med pa yin no// chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ sakyi sgron ma'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa
la bsnyel ba med pa'i chos can yin no// gal te sems can thams cad kyis bskal par bsams te snga phyi med par the ma dri ba tha dad pa de bzhin gshags pa la yongasasu dris kyang/ de
'di bshad do// 'dab stan te snyam du ma sems ma rtog la/ rtag tum rmongs shing dran pa'i dbang pos/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la legs par bshad pas/ sems can
thams cad tshim par byed pa 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yod dachub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyunama'achad par ba rel gyi sems srung ba yin te/gzhan gyi sems 'khrug bar med/ sems gdung bar mkhyad/sams dmigs par khyod/ dag pa'i rtsa ba'i bar du gcod par mi byed/
ga la dmigs par mi byed tsang/ chos thams cad ma lta bur mes te/ g.yo ba med/ rlom sems med cing sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa yin/ chos mnyam
pa nyid du mthong ste/ chos kyi dbyas 'abrel pa med cing rogacig pa la zhugs pa yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'didang ldan pas byang chub thob lan/ sems bskyed pa gcig/
tsam yang mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa yin te/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa med pa'i ting nge 'di shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ kun nas 'khyil ba'i sgo'i
gzungs la mkhas pas// mnyam par bzhag cing lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa 'dun/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o// bum gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ phyin ci log gi 'du shes med pa yin te/ sems phyin ci log
med/ lta ba phyin ci log med/ med pa la sgra'adogs pa'i phyin ca leg med pa yin/ bdag tu 'du shes pa ma yin/ sems can du 'du shes pa ma yin/ srog tu 'du shes pa ma yin/
gso bar 'du shes pa ma yin/ gang zag tu 'du shes pa ma yin/ shad 'a sa skyes bar 'du shes ba ma yin/ shad bur 'du shes ba ma yin/ chad par 'du shes pa
ma yin/ rtog par 'du shes pa ma yin/ 'byung ba 'du shes pa ma yin/ 'jig pa 'du shesapa ma yin/ dag ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ kha ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang/ kha nas
bro ba med pa dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten lasa'adas pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byung ba dang/
'khor ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa la gnyis su 'du shes pa ma yin l/ 'du shes la chags shing zhen pa'i sems can rnams 'du shes phyin tsa yig stong bar ston kyang che ba dang/
thadad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba ma yin/ mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par sbyangs te/ dbu ma'i lam la zhugs pa yin/ chos ma nyam pa nyid mthong ba yin no// des yang
dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thobapan/ de bzhin gshags pa la tha dad pa'i 'dushasamed pa zhes bya ste/ de la dmed pa yin no// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nga 'gaM
shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ mi zad pa'i za ma tog gzungs la mkhasalas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan med pa'i gnasal gnas kyang/ mtshan ma thams cad la 'du shes kyis
'dzin pa dang/ rnamakhar rtog pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams l stong rdzochen pos ldog ste/ sems can 'dul ba'i dus la yang rub cing/ chos ston pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod pa 'di/
ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chung sems dpa'i spyad pa spyodor na/ rtag par rgyun tu btang
snyoms pa yin// 'go ba na byed pa'i nyon mes shang/ sdug bsngal ba'i chos thams cad la de btang snyoms pas bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi gnas kyi o la rjes su chag
pa yang med// sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba'i gnas kyi chos thams cad la khong khro ba yang med de/ da rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba dang bral bas don thams cad rnyed pa'i
'byor kyang/ khasaM par mi 'gyur/ don thams cad yongs su nyams kyang gdung bar ma'agyur gyi/ 'dubyed thams cad mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal bar sog ra ma rtog cing bdag med
ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes mes pa btang snyoms pa yin no// sems can gzhan yang btang snyoms kyi chos nyid de lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ dachos yang
dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob ban/ de bzhin gshegs pa la se sa ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa zhes bya ba ste/ de la btang snyoms de med pa yin no//
[@] ]/gnyis la chags pa las rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin du 'jug go/ da chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
la so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyams med pa zhes bya ba/ de labatang sems de med pa yin no// gnyis la chags pa las rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ rgya
mtsho'i phyag rgya'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs palha dang klu dang/ gnodasbyin dang/ dri za dang lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto'aphye
chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ ma dang/ mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bstod cing bsti stang du byas te/ mchod cingar mor byas kyang rjes su chags
pa med/ bdud dang gzhan mu stags can dang/ pas kyis rgol ba dang/ 'tshar can gyisems can thams cad kyis dkrugs shing/ gnod par byas kyang/ khong khro ba med la/ sems
mtshungs shing mnyam pa yin te/ phan 'dogs pa dang/ gnodapar byas pa las dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang/ chu dang mtshungs pa'isems dang/ me dang mtshungs pa'i sems dang/
rlung dang mtshungs pa'isimasakyis khengs par mi 'gyur/ gdung bar mi 'gyurazhing ma 'khrugs te/ ma mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis mnyam pa nyid du sbyor zhing sems can thams cad
la btang snyoms par gnas pa yin no// de chos nges par sems da' btang stems 'dadung ldan pas/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po mi ldog ste/ sems can 'dul ba'i dus
la yang 'batsadze rigs par chos ston pa 'i rgyun yang mi gcod pa 'di// bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas drug pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i
byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi'achadapar 'dun pa drag pa yin// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su tshol bal/ 'dum rlabs po chadang/ 'dun pa chen
po dang/ 'dun pa zab mos dag ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bskyed par 'dun to// nyan thos dang/ rangasas rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong bar 'dun to// theg pa chen palas phyi'i tsho ldog par
'dun to// sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po btang g.yade'abyed pam 'dor bar 'dun to// rang gis rtog cing sgrub kyi/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par/ sas rgyas kyi chos
mngadag par sgrub par 'dun te/ bdud dang/ gzhan mu stegs can dmigs can lta ba la mngon par zhan pa thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad kyis de 'dun pa de las 'dun pa dang
dbral bar ma nus so// de chos yang dag par byas pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub bo pan/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'dun pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no/
('dunapa'i ting nga'adzin dang/ 'dubyed kyiting nge 'dzin shin tur sgoms pa dang/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyi gzungs la mkhas pas/ dbang bsgyur ba'aphyir chos thams
cad kyin ng nas/ gang dastanapar bya ba de ston to// gang du skad cig thang cig yud tsam gyis dus gang dang/ 1tshod gang dang/ tshulagazhan gang dang/ sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud gang
dang/ gang la snyed ji ltab bzhin du ci rigs par chos ston kyang mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang ma 'dor ba 'di ni/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma'adres pa bdun pa'o/
bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin te/ rtag tu brtson pa ma 'do'o/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
yang dag par bsgrub cing/ spyir ngas dems ma myong/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtsom pa la rtulatsang bla ma dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang/ chos smra ba dang/ sangs rgyas dang/
lcabyung chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gan du 'gro la yongs su 'drib dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ mchod pa'i las dang/ bskal pa dmad par 'khor ba yongasasu gzung bar bya ba dang
sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par byab dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su sbyang ba dang/ sangs rgyas tshad med pa la mchod cing rnam gro bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad
med pa yang dag par gzung ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyis tshad med pa mngon khar rdzogs par byang chub po' byab dang/ sems can gyi spyod tshad med pa la 'jug par bya ba dang/ sangs zla
rgyas kyi satshad med pa bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'akhyi'i/ sa brtson 'grus de tshad med par byas pa yin no// de chos yang dgopar blangs pa dadang ldan pas byang chub thob bzha/
de bzhin gshegs pa la brtson 'grus nyams pa med ra zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// btsu'agrus kyi ting nge 'dzazhi dang/ 'du byed kyi ting 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas
sems can tshadamed pa gzud tsang/ gdul ba'i phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho'aphrul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho'i phrul rnam par 'phrulakha/ khyu mchog tu gyur pa//
tshadamed pa ston kyang de'i rdzu 'phrul de/ chags pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ thogos ba med par sangs rgyus kyi zhing thams cad du'agro ste/ mngon bar phyogs kyang mngon par
'du byed pa medacing/ mas cad du rgyu ba nam mkhas klus pa 'di na bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'isangs rgyas kyis ma 'dres pa brgyadang/ bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pa na/ rtag rgyun mi 'chad par dran pa phun sum tshogs shing dran pa dang/ shes bzhin mchog dang ldan ba yin te/ 'i dran pa der rjod pa med pa yi/
'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa chos thams cad la dran pa 'ba'agazhag pa bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa yin no// denang gi lus la lus kyi
rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ ma rtagapa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ mi sdugar ba rnam pa yid la byed cing spyir ro// phyi'i lus dang/ nang gyi lus la
lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mi rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ ma sngag pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing spyi'o// nang gi tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i
rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing spyir ro// de bzhin du phyi'i tshor ba dang/ phyin ng tshor pa rnams la/ tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ stong pa'i/
rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing ba/sa te/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid ' byed ng sbyor ro// phyi'i sems dang/ phyi nang gi
sems la gsems kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor// nang gachos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par
yid la byed tsang sbyar ro// phyi'i chos dang/ phyin ng gi chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas te/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor ro// lus la zhugs pa'i dren
pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste/ ma rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ misdug pa'i rnam par yid la byed tsang sbyor yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i sku yongs su
bsgrub pa'i phyir/ lus kyi lasalegs par sbyor ba'i rgyun yang mi gcod do// tshor ba la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bas ma ste/ stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed tsang sbyor yang/
ngan song thams cad du skyes ba'i sems can rnams la lta bas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rgyun gcod pa'i phyi'i/ sems can de dag la snying rjechen pa'i rgyun yang mi gcod do// sems la

zhum pa'idren pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom ste/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed cing sbyar yong byang chub kyi sems kyang ma brjod la theg pa chen pa'i tshigs yang dag par sgrub pa'i rgyun yang ma gcod
do/ chos la zhugs pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom ste/ smon pa med pa rnam par yid la byed cing sbyor yang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'as nyid kyang mngon sum du ma byed la//
sangs rgyas kyi tshig dang yang mtshams pa yin te/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbusamed pa la yang dag par 'jug go/ de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'ad dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob
ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dran pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa kun rjod pa 'tsho'aphrul gyis/ sems can thams kyi mngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi tshis tha' dang/ daltar byung ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang/
dbang po dang khams dang/ chos la gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang/ nyon mongs pa skyed pa bag chags dang/ bsam pa dang ( bag la nyal dang/ kun nas dkris pa dang/
dge ba dang/ mi dgaba'alas kyi rnam par smin pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang/ tsho dang 'chi 'pho dang/ skye ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang/ bskal pa dang/
sgyu zhing dus sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang/ nyan thos 'dus pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lung bstan pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa dang/ pha ma dang/
nyin du dang/ snag gi gnyena mtshams gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa bstan pa la dran nga 'i dbang pa thogs pa med cing/ rmongs pa med ba yin te/ thams cad du khyad par lung ston pa
'di ni/ bumo de bzhin gshegs pa 'i sangs rgyas kyis ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ rtag tu rgyunam
'chad par shes rab dpa yin te/ shes rab 'od dang/ shes rab kyi snang ba dang/ shes rab kyi spyod pa dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po dang/ no ba'i shes rab dang/
bab pa'i shes rab dang/ sa par rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi/ ma thul ba'i shes rab dang/ za'i gyis mi non pa'i shes rab dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams//
cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba'i shes pa dang/ yangs shing rgya chalasems snyems pa'i shes rab dang/ lhag pa'i shes rab dang/ bdag tshul bzhin yid la byed kyi gzhan
gyis ma bstan pa'i shes rab dang/ thos pa tshol bas ngomasamatshungaba'i shes rab can te/ thos nas kyang shes rab kyi sa khongs su chud cing rtogs te/ ma'am thodapa la me
'bar ba bzhin du blta stang du byed cing shes pa tshol ba thos pa snying por byed pa yin/ thos pa bsags pa yin/ sa 'dod cing chos kyi nadas/la la dga' ba zhes pa yin/ dam pa'i
g.yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin te/ de chos 'dod pa des phyi nang gi dngos po gang yang yongs sum gtong ba med do// nga blam la rim gro bya ba ma byed pa gang yang med do// de sdug
bsngal gyi phung po ma bzod pa gang yang med do// de bde ba'i yo byadama'i dor ba gangayang med do// de tshos 'dod pa des tshigabazhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa ga yig nyan pa la shin tu dga' ba yin
te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'o jig rten gyi khams rin po ches yongs su bkang ba la nam yin no// chos kyi tshogi gcig la shan tu dga' ba yin te/ 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po thob
[©]// nga la ni ma yin no// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lamanyan pa la shun tu dga' ba yin te/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa thob pa la nam yin no// tshig bzhi la tshigs/
su bcad pa gcig gzhan dag la ston par byed pa la shin tu dga' ba yin te/ g.yA'i klung ga bye ma snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa la na ma yin no// gzhan 'byung chub kyi ses sa yang
dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa 'a na shin tu dga' ba yin te/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gapa'i klung gi bye ma snyed thob pa lan ma yin no// gzhan dag la pha rol tu phyin pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i
chos kyi gtam rab tu ston pa la dga' ba yin te/ brgya byin dang/ tshongs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag thob pa la ni ma yin no// de lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu la zhugs pas bsti stang du
byed cing chos nyan to/ bsti stang du byed cing gzhan dag la ston to// de de ltar mngon par brtson pas/ tshigs chung du lha thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba yin/ sangs rgyas thas na kyis
dgongs pa yin no// de lag yongs su bzung zhing/ sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pas 'jig rtan pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos thams cad bdag nyid la mngon sum du
'gyur ba yin no// te shes rab kyi snang ba'i sgo zad mi shes pas snang ba yin no// de chos snang ba'i sgo 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab nyams
ba med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa dang/ dge ba dang mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma bstan pa dang/ kha na ma tho ba dang/
bcas pa dang/ kha na ma thob med pa dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ ma par khyad pa dang/
'khor ba dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ chos kyi sgo thams cad khong du chud cing rtogs pa bstan pa shes pa dang/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab thams cad dang/ mnyam ra'i bskal
pa bstan pa shes pa dag la/ de'i shes rab de thogs pa med cing sgrib pa me dpa yin no// de'i shes rab de sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi ma'i mtha'adang/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa
med cing sgrib pa med de/ thams cad du thogs pa med do// phyi ma'a mthar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bstan kyang thogs pa med do// dpyadar 'a'adu byed kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu
ba mas ngag/ rjes subastan pa'i 'phrul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgo gcig las/ chos kyi sgo thams cad snang zhing/ chos kyi sgo thams cad chos kyi sgo gcig gis yang dag par
sgrub pa 'dini/ bu me dobazhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres bcu pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na// rtag tu rgyunam
'chad par khyim gyi gnas don du mganyer ba yin/ 'dod pa don du ma gtor ba yin te/ de mngon pa byung bar dga' zhing rab tu 'byung ba nad pa yin/ dben pa la
gzholaM/ dben pa la 'bab/ dben pa la bab cing chos zab mo ba skem pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson te/ de stong pa nyid dang// mtshan med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ rnam
par thar pa'i sgo gsum pa de dag bsgom// gang las kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis lu lam yan zhing mi rtogs pa dang/ dmigs par blta ba mtshan ma la mngon par dga' ba thams cad kyig/
rtogs par mi 'gyur ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po de dag bsgoms pas/ sgrib ba med pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar pa kun tu skye'o// chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba yang rab tu la
po bdud kyi yul las kyang shin tu bda'o// ye shes kyi yul yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sgrib pa dang/ chodapa dang/ kun nas dkris pa dang lta ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs
pa dang/ mtshan ma thams cad lam spyod do// dasgrib pa med pa'i rnam pa ra shar gsum thob cing/ rnam par thar pa'i sge gsum la rnam par rtsen pas// chos zab mo ston pa yin no//
don la ston pa yan gyi/ ga 'bru la ston ra ma 3nano// ye shes la ston pa yan gyi/ rnam par shes pa la ston pa ma yin no// nges pa'i don la ston pa yan gyi/ drang ba'i don la rten
pa ma yin go/ chos nyidi la ston pa yagyi/ gang zab la rten pa ma yin no// sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa yin te/ yi ga dang/ rnam par rtog pa la gag/ zhen
bal don la rton pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la chags/ zhen pa la ye shes la rton pa bsta gnas / yongs su thar bar byed//
brang par sgra ba tags pa la chags/ zhan pa la nges pa'i don la rton pa bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// gang zaga' mngon par zhen cing chags/ zhib 'tshos nyid la ston
la bstanas yongs su 'bar byed do// lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis la chags/ non pa la stong pa nyid pa sta gnas / yongs su thar bar byed do// rnam par rtog pa'i sgrib pa
thams cad la tshabs/ zhen pa lamtshan ma med pa la bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do khams gsum pa lachags/ zhanam la snyon med rab stan nas yongs su thar bar byed
do 'dod chags kyis chags/ zhin pa la mi sdu ga nga 'a rnam par bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed ngo// zhe sdang spyod pa la chags zhen pa la byams pa bstan na yongs su
bar byed do// gtaM ga spyod ba la chags/ zhenang la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ba snyan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// ser sna la chags/ zhen pa la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la chags/ zhen pal tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstanas/ yongs su thar bar
byed do// gnod sems la chags/ zhen pa la gzod pa'i pha rol tu phyan pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed de// le lal chags/ zhan pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
tuphyin pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// g.yeng ba la chags/ zhen pa la bsam gtan gyi pha 'o tu phyin pabastananas/ yongs su thar bar byed de// 'chal
pa'i shes rab la chags/ zhen pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pang stan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed de// so so'i skye ba rnams la chags/ zhen pa la 'phags pa'i ba dan
pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar byed do// phyin ci log la chags/ zhan nga la ma rtag pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med ra dang/ zhi ba bstan nas yongs su thar
bar byed do// sgrub pa dang chod pa dang/ kun nas dkris pa dang/ ldan pa thams cad la chags// zhen de yasgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa bstan nas/ yongs su thar bar
byad do// nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags/ zhen pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bstan nas yongs su thar bar byed do// nga tshos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byung ba
0 thob ba na/ deb zhin gshegs pa rnam par grel ba nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yin no// de'i rnam par grol ba de ma 'khrugs shing/ shin tu mthar thug ste//
dba' rlabasamed la shan tungasal ba'i dngos par gyur cing zab ste/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam ra
nyid kyi rjes su song ba yin/ dram med cing drin dang bral te/ rtog pa med la shin tu yongs su dag pa yin/ zhi gnas dang/ lhag mthong ga sa rnams la shin tu yongs su sbyang ba byas
pas zad m shes pa yin/ bstan pa mtha' yas mu me dpa yin/ gas pa med cing sgrib pa med pa yin/ nam mkha'i dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin ti/ dri ma med pa'i snying sel/
ting nge 'dzin shin tubasgoms pa dang/ chos thams cad snang ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bstan pa dang rgyu mthun
pa yin te/ thams cad las byung zhing/ chos thams cad kyi snang ba dang ldan pa yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol ba yin/ mya ngan las 'dus nga' bab pa yin/ mya ngan las
'das pa la 'bab pa yin te/ shin tu mthar thug cing/ shin tu mthar phyin pa 'dan/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o// bumo gzhan/
yang byang chub sems ra' byang chub sems dang ba spyad pa spyod na/ ye shesalharalanar yan te/ ye shes kyi stobs dang/ ye shes kyi mtshon cha dang/
shes kyi byin dang ldan pa yin no// de'i ye shes de ni nyams pa medar la 'gro ba'i mngon pa shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa las/ nges bar byung ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
kyis rnam par dpyad pa'i blo dang ldan pa yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dpyadaba'i blo dang ldan pa// 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la yang/ 'dod chags
dang bcas pa'i g.yas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dung tu ngashas so// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la yong 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba zhan du 'ang tu/
shes so// de bzhin du zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang/ zhe sdang med pa dang/ gti mug dang bcas pa dang/ gtamug med pa dang/ nyonames pa dang bcasapa dang/ nyon mongs
pa med pa dang/ 'khor byed dang bcas pa dang/ 'khor byed med pa dang/ zang zing dang bcas pa dang/ zang zing med pa dang/ mchog tu 'dzin pa dang/ mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang/ bla ma dang
bcas pa dang/ blama med pa dang/ sgrib pa dang bcas pa dang/ sgrub pa medar dang/ lung du bstan pa dang/ khung du ma bstan pa dang/ dge ba dang/ mi dag bdang/ kha na ma thob dang bcas ba dang/ lan
ma tho ba med pa dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa can
ma yin pa dang/ rnam par dag pa dang/ rnam par ma dag pa dang/ chung du dang/ chen pa 'gyur bo dang/ mtha' dang bcas pa dang/ mtha' yas pa dang/ ser sna
dang ldan pa dang/ gtong ba dang ldan pa dang/ tshul khrims 'chal ba'i sems dang/ tshul khrims la sbyor ba'i sems dang/ gnodasems kyi bag la nyal dang/ gnod sems/
med pa dang/ la la dang/ brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang/ g.yeng ba dang/ mnyam da ra bzhag pa dang/ 'chal ba'i shes rab dang/ shes rab dang ldan pa dang/
so so'i spyi bo'i sems dang/ log pa nyid du nges pa dang/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa dang/ nyan thos kyi theg par nges pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thig par nges pa dang/ ga
pa chen ng ra nges pa dang/ yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'di'i sdug bsngal 'aphags pa'i bden pa'o zhes yang dgar dzalta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'din
sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba/ 'di'i sdug bsngal 'agog pa/ 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lamam zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de ma skye ba shes pas/
sdug bsngal 'phags pa'ibaden pa rab tu shes so// shin tu kun tu m rgyabashes pas/ kun 'byungar rab tu shes so// chad pa'i ng cing rtog pa tshadapahi/
tus datsag pa/ 'gogal shis bas/ 'gog pa rab tu shes sa// mas cad kyi rjes su song ba/ nam mkhar yang dag par 'du ba/ bdag gi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin/
med pa/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i shes pasalam ra tushos so/ de 'thab dpa pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di dag de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes kyang/ sems can yongs
klu su sman par bya ba'i phyi'i mngon sum du yang ma byed la/ bdun pa yongs su shes pa/ lcangang dung/ bsgom pa dang/ mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to//
pa'i chos bstan pa de bden pa'i rjes su mthun pa yan/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ 'gal ba med pa yin/ mthar ltab thams cad yongs su sbyangs pa yin/ dbu ma'i la la/
zhugs pa yin/ ston pa'i chos mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ de chos thams cad rgyudang bcas shing/ rkyen dang bcas pa'i kha na las kyi bdag gi kha na las pa ma yin/ sems
can gyi kha na las pam yin/ srog gi u0f7a khan las pam yin/ gas pa'i kha na las po ma yin/ skyes bu'akhan laa pa ma yan/ gang zag gi kha na las pa ma yin par rab tu
shes so// de ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams su rab tu shes se// 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis/ mang dang gzugs dang/
mang dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis/ skye mched drug dang/ skye mched drug gi rkyenagyis/ rig pa dang/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis/ tshor ba dang/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa dang/ srid
pa'i rkyen gyis len pa dang/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa dang/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba dang/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang/ mya ngan dang/ ste sngags 'don pa dang/ stag
bsngal ba dang/ yid ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung pa chen po 'ba'ashagapa 'di'abyung bar 'gyur ba rab tu shis so// de ma rig pa
'gag pa nas/ rga shi 'gag pa'i bar dang/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen pos 'dres pa 'di 'gag par gyur par rab tu shes so// de'adi la yang dag par slob ra na/ gangs
rig pa'i rkyen las byung ba de ni/ bdag gi rkyen las byung ba ma yin/ sems can gyi rkyen las byung ba ma yAn/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ gang zug ga rkyen las byung bum yin
no// gang bdag ga rkyen las byung pa ma yin pa naso/ gang zag garkyen las byung pa ma yin pa'i bar de na stong pa'o// stong pa gang yin pa de na ched pa ma yin/ rtag nga i yin no//
[']yin/ rtag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de na gdod ma nyid nas ma skyes ma byung ba'o// gdod ma nyid nas ma skyes/ ma byang ba la/nga yin pa de na/ dus
gsum du brjod du med do// dus gsum du brjod du med pa gang yin pa dan dnges pa ni da nga 'i ngo bo de do// dngos po med pa'i ngo botod gang yin pa de ni bgrang ba med tsang/ bgrang
ba las shin tu 'das pa'o// bgrang ba med cing/ bgrang ba las shAn 'das pa gang yin pa de nang+gen pa'o// don dam pa gang yin pa dan/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang dag
pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'thab pa med cing brtse ba med pa'o// 'thab pa med cing/ rtsod pa med pa gang yin pa de ni dag sbyang g chos so// dag
sbyong gi sa gang yin pa de// nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i rang bzhin du des de ltar shes shing gnas te/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa kun 'byung bas/ marig pa kun 'byung bar rab tu shes
sa mar pa 'gag panas/ rgashi 'gag pa'i bar du rab tu shes te/ klu dang/ rkyen tshogs pa'i shes pas/ chad par lta bar sbyor ba ma yin gyi/ bdag med pa dang//
sems can med pa dang/ sreg med pa dang/ gang zag med pa'i chos kyi rjes shu tu/ mtha'akhas mi len/ nye bar mi 'dzan/ mi dmigs so// mtha' mi dmigs
0/ ngas dbus mdamags/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo// chos gangal mtha' ma dmigs pa la dbus med pa ra ga la 'gyur te/ de'i mtha' ca'i ba zhig snyam nas/ de
mtha' dang/ dbung med nga 'i chos rnams la 'jug go/ chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang/ dbung dang bralabs/ mtha' dang dbung med pa'i tshos ston pa yin no// de chos yang dag/
par blangs pa lang dang ldan pas// byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam par grol ba'i yi sa mthong ba nyams pa med pa zhes bya ste/ de la de med pa yanano// stobs
bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ mtha' yas 'khyil ba'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bade/ chos kyi dbyangs mtha' dang/ dbung/
med par yang dag par 'du ba yin/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa rnams la/ nam mkha'i dbyangs ltar rgya che zhing rnam par ma rtogal/ lhun gyis grubal yan/ 'das pa dang/
ma 'os pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa shes pa bstanapa rnams la// rnam par snyan ng chud mi za bar ston pa yin/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang pa dang/
brtson 'grus kyirim pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la mngon sum du gyur pa yin/ khams du ma pa dang/ khams sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten bstan pa rnams la/ shin tu rnam par nges/
par stanab yin/ mes pa du ma dang/ mas pa sna tshogs shes pa bstan pa rnams la ma zad par ston cing 'jug pa yin kun tu 'grob lam shes pa bstan pa/
rnams le'ugs kyi drib thams cad rnam par dbye ba rgyas par byed cing/ khyadapa lung ston pa yin/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyems pa'i
'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mas pa dang/ rnam par byang ba dang// ldan pa shes pa bstan rnams la/ chos kyi sgo bsam gyis ma khyab pa rnam par gzhag pa ston pa yan/ sngon gyi gnas
gang dums su du ba ga bam dmigyi ba bstan pa rnams la/ sems can thams cad kyi 'chi'aphe dang/ tshodang/ skya ba rab 'bring tha mthog ma'i mthar chags pa med cing/ sgrib pa med pa/
yi gos ston pa yin/ thogs pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i lha'i mig sha sapa bstan pa rnams la/ kun tu rnam par lta ba thams cad du shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i lung bstan pa ston pa yan
zag bathams cad zad pa shes pa bstanapa rnams la/ bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor bar ma lus par snang ba shes pa ston pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa shes pa bstan pa rnams la zil gyis
mnon pa ston pa yin/ snying rjechen pa'i stobs shes pa bstan pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad du tha dad du bya ba med cingasbyo'o bamatshungasashing manyam pa/ rgyun mi gcod/
pa sten pa yin/ so so ci rigs pa chos bstan pa rnams la/ lhun gyis grub pa'i yi shes kyis rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa yin/ sems can thams cad yongs su sman bar byed pa'i
'dul pa'i phyir/ ma zad ng 'i chos kyi 'khoral rab tu bskor ba'i ye shes kyi yul bstan pa rnams la zab mo dang/ sna tshogs dang 'phrugs pa dang sbrel zhi'i rgyu ba dang/ shes rab dang/
thabs dang/ stobs dang/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i ye shes ston pa yin/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ thun mongs ma yin pa yin te/ bum 'di ni de bzhin
gshegs pa'i sangs rgyus kyi chos ma 'dres ba bcu gnyis pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams
byed kyi/ da rgyal gyis byas pa rnams ma byad de/ de yi shes kyis lus kyi las byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ 'khu ba dang/ g.yo dang/ gya gyu dang/ tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do/
snang bamed cing chags pa medar yan/ rtag tu tshangs par spyad tsang/ de lus kyi las kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pas byang chub dang 'thun te/ bdag dang gzhan la gnodapa 'i byed
pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyumathun pa'i snying rje chen po la sbyor zhing/ rtag tu sems can gyi don la brtson te/ lus kyi las de lta bu dang ldan pa yano// de chos yang dag pa
blos pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes ston du 'gro zhing/ yo shes kyi rjes su 'brang bzhes bya ste/
del de yod do// gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ kun nas snang ba'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshags pa'i kha dog du
ma dang/ kha dag snatshogs dang/ gzugs dang dbyi sa dang/ chu zhang ston pa 'a lus kyis rtswa dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha'
lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto'aphye chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyongang dang/ bram ze dang/ rgyal rigs dang/ rje'u rigs dang/ dmas
rigs dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang/ dge snyen ma dang/ srog chags brgya stong du ma lhags pa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad du spyod lam tshang med
dang/ kha dog dang/ rtags dang/ dbyangs gnas pa/ mchog dam pa gtsobo gya nom pa'i lus bstan nas/ thams cad dang ldan ng 'a 'khor la chos kyi gtam yang dag par ston to//
yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ yang dag par gzengs bstod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed d// yang dag pa ra bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par
gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar byas nas/ ma snang ba'i byed do// ma snang bar gyur kyang song bar shes pa yang med do// 'khor 'dus pa de dag tu 'dus shing 'dug ste/
sna 'am cangam sga ba yang rung/ 'od par shes pa yang med do// de la lta bas kyang mos ma myong ngo// des bstan pa la dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba rab tu rgya chen po yang
rnyed do// 'dod pa la dga' zhing rtsa ba dang/ yul dang/ las spyod thams cad la ma ltab ya dal byed tsang sbyor ro// ma snang bar gyur na lta ba dang/ mnyan pa'i phyi'i skam par
'gyur ro// de la lta bas skem pa dang/ lta 'dod pa dang/ chos nyan pas skem pa dang/ chos nyan par 'dod pa de yang/ zag pa med pa'i lus kyi las dang/ ga ga las
dang yid kyi las thob pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/ bu mo 'din de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ yi shos kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ nga rgyal gyis byas pa rnams ma byed de/ de ye shes kyi ngag gi las byed pa ni/ 'khu ba dang/ g.yo dang/
gya gyu dang/ tshul 'chos pa thams cad ma byed de/ bden par smra zhing phra ma dang/ ngag rtsub po dang/ tshig 'khyal pa ma ba yin/ phan pa'i tshig dang/ ranar 'tshig dang/
chos kyi tshig dang/ de'i tshig de dag sa tatshagi des bdag dang/ gzhan la gdung bar ma 'gyur ro// tshig gang sangs rgyas kyis rjes su snang ba rten dang ldan pa'i
tshag sgra ste/ tshig des sems can thams cad tshim par byed do// de ma shi ma 'tshag ste/ ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa'i tshig dang ldan pa yan gyi/ nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa ma yin
no da chos yang dag pa blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs ba ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes
bya ste de la de yod do// rin po che'i 'byung gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ 'khor gsum gyi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pangag gi las tsayang
ma brjod kyang de skad thams cad las sgra snyan dang/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa'i sgra byung ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi gsung sgra dang/
dbyang sanadin dang ldan pa/ chos dang ldan// bden pa dang mthun pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ma'agal ba/ yid 'byung ba dang// 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/
mthun pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba 'bras bu yodapa nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi rgyur gyur pa yin te/ bu mo 'dand bzhin gshags pa'i sang rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba bcu bzhi 'o//
bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dang ba byang chusems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ rtag tu rgyun ma'achad par ye shes kyis byas pa'i las rnams byed kyi/ ngargyal gyis dug las rnam byed de/
de yi shes kyis yid kyi las byed pa ni/ 'khu ba dang/ g.yo dang/ rgya rgyu dang/ tshul 'chos pa thams cad mi byed do// brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta
ba dang bral zhing yang dag par lta ba yin/ byams pa dang/ snying rdzala gnas te/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms shing/ byang chub kyi sems brjod pa med pa yin no// de
ye shes dang rab tu ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal dang rab tu ldan pam yin no// de chos yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas byang chub thob pa na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ del du yod do// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhus/sa ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin/
tu bsgoms pa dang/ brnag pa rnyog pa med pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshags pa'i sems gcig gis// sems can thams cad kyi sems rab tu shes so// sems
can thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang/ sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyis mas mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud
za khyu// pa yanano/ sems can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis rang gi sems mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa yin no// lus thams cad gzugs bstan lta bur phyir//
rang gi chos nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi chos nyid khong duchud pa yin no// sems can thamasacad kyi lus chos nyid kyis/ rang galus kyi chos nyid khong du chud pa yi//
rang gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi rjes su 'jug cing yang dag par 'dub yin no// sems can thams cad kyi lus rang lus kyi rjes su 'jugatsang yang dag pa 'du ba yin no//
sems can thams cad kyi lus/ sangs rgyas kyi skur byin gyis brlab po// de'i phyir gyis brlabs de ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ bdud dang bcas pa dang/ tshangs pas
zabs pa dang/ dag sbyong dang/ bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gang gis kyang/ g.yos pa la// bskyod par ma
nus te/ bu mo'anod bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco lnga pa'o// bu mogazhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'das pa'i da
bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yishes chags pa med pa thos na/ mos shing yid ches te/ tsom ma za/ ma nur med cing ma skal 'a kun tu mo skag cang/ mi dngangal/ kun tu dab
00 bar ma 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis ma khyabar la yang mos pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus kyi las dang/
lus kyi spyodalam yongs su dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa medang// 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mesas// 'das pa'i de ngan gshegs pa de dag gi
ngag gi las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa chags pa medatsang sgrib pa med pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang/ dbyangs dang/
chos kyi sgo tshod med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// 'das pa'idabazhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las dus thams cad dang/ zhing thams cad dang/ sangs
rgyas thams cad dang/ chos thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas 23mas cad dang/ 'gro
ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam bar snyapa shin tu rnam par phye ba/ rnam par 'byed pa la mes so// 'das pa'i di bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dab bkod pa' gas pa med cing/
sgrib pa med pa la yang mos shing yid ches te/ thatsam ma za nemanur med cing masgrig la/ kun tu m skrag cing/ ma dngad la kun tu dbang bar ma 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam
sa ma khyab pa la yang zhes so// sems can gzhan dag kyang/ mos pa'i tshos 'di nam pa 'di lta bu yang dag pa'i dzin du 'jug go nga tshos yang dag par gdA
ba'adi dang ldan pas byang chub thob ban/ 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba/ chags pa medatsang thogs pamed pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do//
dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin shin tung sems pa dang/ gabribarjid dang ldan pa'i gzus la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan tha
dadapa dang/ tsha'i tshadatha dad pa go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha' na ma rtogs so// de bzhin du 'das pa'i byang chub sems dang 'tshams dang/ nyan thos rnams dang/ rang
sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sems can rnams dang/ sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang/ sems can gyi spyod pa byed r 'i las kyi rnam par smin ba so sor myong ba rnams dang/ dba'i
du 'das pa'i bskal ba thams cad de/ bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang/ bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas med pa dag dang/ bskal pa gang la de bzhinagshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyedabyung ba'i bskal pa de dag go rims bzhin dubarjod pa'i mtha'an ma rtogs so// de bzhin du 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyikhams
00/ thams cad kyi mang tha dad pa dang/ gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang/ gang dag rnam par dag pa dag dang/ gang dge chung ba dag dang/ gang dag chen por 'gyur de dag dang/
gang dag phra ba dag dang/ gang dag 'gas pa dag dang/ gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang/ gang dag spyi'atshugs dag dang/ gang dang mthun pa dang/ dang/ gang
dag phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang/ mkheg 'phrul rnam par dbye bal 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa la 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go ni mes bzhin
dub rjod pa'i matha'an mi rtogs so// dal de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pamed de/ lag ma'idang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes
kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sa nas dar 'byang chub sems dpa'i sbyangs dpan/
ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ye shes chags pa med pa thosanas/ mos shing yid ches te/ the tsom mawa/ namanur med cing ma skrag/ ma dngang/ dang ba tshwa'agyur/
te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis ma khyab pa la yang nas pa yin no// ma 'ongs pa 'dapazhin gshegs pa dgra bam pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi lus dang/ lus kyi
[r]@#/ khas dang/ lus kyi spyod lam yongs su dag pa chags pa medatsang sgrib pa med pa// 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi tshig u eng ba 'a sa so//
ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag ga las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod l/ chags pa med cing sgrib pa medam la bsam gyis ma khyab pa mA
cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra skad dang/ dbyangs dang/ chos kyi sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su sengapa la mas sa// ma 'ongs pa'i di bzhin gsheg ba de dag gi/
sems kyi las dus thams cad dang zhing thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ tshos thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/

rgyu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi las rnam par sman pa shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa khams go//ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag 'od
@# zer gyi dra ba bkod pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa la yang dag par mos shing yid ches te/ btsom ma za nem nur med cing/ ma sgrig/ mdangang/ dngang bsam myur nye/ sangs
rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// sems can gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa'i ng lta bu yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/ de chos yang dag par blangs
pa 'ad dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin la/shes gas pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing ]thogs pa med pa 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do//
stong drachen de 'o stobs dang/ smon lam yang dag nga 'phags pa'i tang de bzhi shin tu bsems pa dang/ sengag rnam par bskyangs pa'i gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin skab/sa pa ma
'os pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa dang tshe'i tshad tha dad pa dang/ go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha'anam rtogasaso// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pasdebangachu sam/
dpa' rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ sems can rnams dang/ sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang/ sems can gyi las rnams dang/
sems can gyi rnam par sminapa so sor myong ba rnams dang/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa thams cad de/ bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang/ gang dag sangs rgyus
med pa dag dang/ bsal pa gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bskal pa dedag go ramisabazhin du brjod pa'i mtha' 'am
rtogs so// de bzhin du ma 'ongs nga 'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mang tha dad pa dang/ gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang/ gang dag rnam par ngagapa dang dang//
gang dge chung ba dag dang/ gang dag chen por gyur pa dag dang/ gang dag phra ba dag dang/ gang dag rags pa dag dang/ gang dag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i/
rjes su zhugs pa dag dang/ gang dag 'u tshugs pa dag dang/ gang dgamathun pa dag dang/ gang dag phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang/ mge 'phrul
rnam par dbyebal 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad go ramisabazhin du brjod pa'i mtha'anaso rtogasaso/ del de bzhin gshags
b.lung bstan pa thams cad la rmongs pa med/ dalag mthil dang sor mo lnga mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshags pa'i yongashes kyis thams cad shes te/ bum 'dand bzhin gshegs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o// bu mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye
shes chags pa med pa thos na/ mes shing yid ches te/ the tshom ma zla/ mnur ma byed cing/ ma sgrag dem dongang/ dngangabar ma'agyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
bas mgyis mi khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dedag gi lus kyi las dang/ lus kyis spyod lam
[p ]gongs su dag pa chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mes a// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ngag gi las 'jig/
rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i dbyangs sgra brjod pa// chas ba med cing sgrib pa medal/ bsamatshus ma khyab pa thams cad dang/ sas rgyas kyi sgra skad dang/ dbyangs dang/ chos kyi
sgo tshad med pa bstan pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba la mos so// dalta byung ba'idabazhin gshegs pa de dag gi sems kyi las/ dus thams cad dang/ zhing thams cad dang/ chos
thams cad dang/ sems can rnams cad dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi las kyi rnam
par sman pa shin tu rnam par phyeng rnam par 'byed pa la mosas// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'od zer gyi dri ba bkod pa/ chags pa medacing sgrib pa med pa la yang mos shing
yid ches te/ thamam zanem nur med cing ma skrag/ ma dngang/ dngang bar mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyisam khyab pa la yang mos pa yin no// sems can
gzhan dag kyang mos pa'i chos nyid rnam pa 'di lta bu yeng dag pa ra 'dzin du 'jug go/ de tsho yang dag par blangs pa 'di dang ldan pas/ byang chub thob pa na/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la
de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthong ba chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ de la de yod do// shin tu dkar ba dris med pa'i phyag/
rgya'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms pa dang/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs la mkhas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa daltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan tha dad pa
dang 6 tshe'i tshad tha dad pa go romis bzhin du brda sprod nga ba mtha'an ma rtogs so// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dang ba rnams dang nyan thos rnams dang/ rang sangs/
a rgyas rnams dang/ sems can rnams dang/ sems can gyi spyod pa rnams dang/ las rnams dang/ las kyi rnam par smin pa sosar myong ba rnams gori'i sa bzhin du brjod/
pa'i matha' ni ma rtogs so// de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i bskal pa thams cad de bskal pa gang dag sangs rgyas dang bcas pa dag dang/ gang dag sangs rgyas med pa dag dang/ bskal
ba pa gang la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed byung ba'i bskal pa de dag go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i matha'am rtogs so// de bzhin du dal
byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyisonge tha dad pa dang/ gang dag kun nas nyon mongs pa can dag dang/ gang dga rnam par dag pa dag dang/ gangadagachung ba dag dang
gang dag chen por gyur pa dag dang/ gang dag phra ba dag dang/ gang dag 'gas ba dag dang/ gangadag rdul phra rab la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dag dang/ gang dag gi spyir
tshugs pa dag dang gang dag mthun pa dag dang/ gang dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnam par gzhag pa dang/ miga'aphrul rnam par dpyob la 'jug pa'i rjes su zhugs pa
daltar byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag thams cad go rims bzhin du brjod pa'i mtha'an ma rtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa thams cad la rmos pa med de/
lag mthil dang/ sor mo lta mthong ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad shes te/ bu mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcobargyud
pa'o 2bco brgyad po 'di dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad thob ste/ thams cad gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ lus tshadamed pa dang/ thams cad zil
gyis gnon tsang thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir/ spyi gtsug ngaltar ma mthong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang/ lus rtsi sman dang 'dra ba'i/
phyir mthong m thag tu sems can rnams kyi skyomozhi bar byed pa dang/ u0f7c thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med pas 'khor thams cad las mngon par 'a rags pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa rab tu thob/
pas bag tsha ba med pa dang/ yang dag par sbyor ngas slobam bsam pa can dang/ gdam ngag can dang/ rjes su bstan pa dang mthunapas slob ma ma redapa dang/
sems can thams cad la mtshungs par gnas pas/ slob ma shin tudul ba dang/ chos bstan pa la the a med pas/ sdebs la myur ba dang/ gleng ba med pas sems can
thams cad tshims par byed pa dang/ den yod pa'i chos ston pa dang/ gdul bya rnams kyi dbang po yongs su smin pas/ 'khor thams cad rtsa gcig tu sems l las/ sangs
rgyas kyi sgra skad 'byin pa dang/ cho 'phrul bsam gyis ma khyab pas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyise mngon du blta ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa nabaso danams tshad med
pag brtan pa'i phyir/ blta bas mi ngoms pa dang/ yang dag par khong du chud pas 'bras bu yodapa'i chos ston pa dang/ spyod lam ma 'khrugs pas/ glang patsho'i la ltas
kyis lta ba dang/ spro ba che bas/ seng ge ltar rnam par bsgyings pa dang/ lus kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas don yod par rnam par 'gro ba dang/ ngag gi las kha shas na
du 'gro bas ngag la dbang ba dang/ yid kyi las ye shes sngon du 'gro bas/ kun nas ma dang ldan pa dang/ spobs pa myur bas bzung bar 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa dang/
bla na med pa'i sbyin gnas su gyur pas// rnyed pa'i mchog dang/ grags pa 'a mchog dang ldan pa dang/ chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas shing mthas gtugs pas so da nams zad ma shas
pa dang srog med kyi bu chen po'i lus dang/ stobs bcu dang/ ma'ajigs pa'i mchog thob pas rdzi ba med pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang/
mchog ma yin pa shes pas/ sems can la bde ba skyed pa las mi ldog cung 'khrul pa med la/ brel 'phongs med pa dang/ 'ag rten thams cad kyi ston pa gyur pas// chos dang
bstan bcos mang po shis ra dang/ chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas tshodapag tu med ra dang [！ ]shin tu mur thug cing mthas klas pas/ mthong ba dang/ rig pa dang/ bsan bkur
byas pa dang/ dran pa dang thos pa don yodapa dang/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du khong du chudangs/ shes rab mi 'khrugs pa dang/ chos sna zhing nyes bar sma ba med pas
gtam rgyun chags pa dang/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad ma lus par spangs pas/ bag chags thams cad yang dag par bcom pa dang/ sangs rgyusakyi chos rang byung bas// slob
dpon med pa dang sa ngas rgyas kyi chos ma lus par khong du chud nga sa/ rnam pa thams cad shesapa ste/ sas rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa 'di dag thams cad rab tu 'thob ba/
[© ]/denas bam ldan 'das la/ bu merin chen byas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas gang de bzhin gshags pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sumacu rtsa gnyi
pa'i di dag sngon dge ba'i tshogs gang dag la zhugs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub/ daskad ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs tshad med grangs med pa dag la zhugs pas/ dang
gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par grub ste/ de dag las cung zad tsam zhig bstan par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
zhabs shin tu gnas pa 'din snon dam bcas pa la brtan pas mngon par grub bo/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'amtshan zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa 'din/
[% sngon sprin pa sna tshogs bsags pas mngon par grub bo// zhabs kyi rtong pa yangs shang/ zhabs byin gyis mthong ba na/ sngonasems can gzhan dag khyad du ma bsad pas grub po3
sor mo ring ban sngon sems can rnams chos kyi bsrungs zhing bskyabs te/ lhas ra byas pas grub boT/ phyag dang zhabs bra bas 'brel ba na/ sngon gzhan gyi g.yog 'khor ma phyibs grub po//
phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa/ sngon bsgo ba sna tshogs byan nga sa gru ba de6 ]/bdunamatho ban/ sngon bza' ba dang/ datung ba rgya chen po byade nga na grub de/
byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i lta bu ni/ sngon sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bzungabs grung bo/ /mdams kyi grwa ba sgrubs su nub pa ni/ sngon ga nga ba'i ga bsrungs zhing/ 'jig
pa 'i chos spangs pas grub bo ro stod seng ga'i 'dra ba ni/ sngon dag ba'i las rgya chen de mthar gyis sprad pas grub bo10// thal gong rgyas pa ni/ sden dag nga 'i chos sna nga dag par
spyad ngas grub bo/ 11/ dpung mgo shin tu zlum pa ni/ sngon ma 'jigs pas gzhan dbugs phyung bas grub do12/ ma btud par phyag ring ba ni/ sngonagazhan gyi ci bya'o cog byang pa
sngo bas grub ba[”]3/ sku rnam par dag pa ni/ sngon dag ba bcu'i las kyi 'o ma la ngoms ma myong bar yang dag par sdud pa/sa grub bo/4/ mgur dung lta bu ni/ sngonand pa rnams la sman sna
tshogs byon pas grub ngo 15// 'gram pa seng ge 'i lta bu ni/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba yongs su rdzogs pa ra byas pas grub po17// tshems bzhi bcur tshang pa naM/ sngonasems can 'a
bsam pa mnyam par sbyong bas grubabe/10/ tshems thags bzang ba ni/ sngonasen sa can ma 'dus pa rnams kyi sdums byas pas grub bo/18/ tshems mnyam pa ni/ sngon yid du 'ong ba'i nor
du byin bas grub bo la/tshanas mche ba dkar ba ni/ sngon lus dang/ ngas dang/ yid kyis shin tu bsrungs dag sgrub bo20// lnga gas shig tu yang d ni//
bdenang 'i tshig kun tu bsungs pas grub bo21// robro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nA/ sngonabasod nams tshad med pa sa ngartan tsang yid du 'ong ba'i bro bdunang sa grub bo zha// tshangs pa'i dbyangs
dang/ ka la bdi'i sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa ni/ sngon sems can la 'jam pa'i tshig smras pa dang/ tshig bsams pa dang kun dga' ba'i tshagi bsgrags pas grub bo23// stunamathona mthong/
lta bu ni/ sngon byams pa dang ldan zhing thams cad bsrungs pas grub bo29// spyan gyi rdzi ma ba'i lta bu ni// sngon bsam pa bcos ma ma yin pas grub bo'am// pal ba'i smin mtshan du ni/
tu dkar ba// sngon bsngags par 'os pa rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod pas grub bo pa// dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ni/ sngon bla ma la gus shing 'dud pas grub bo24/ pags pa srab pa ni/
sngon tshes yang dag par sdud pa'i sems can las su rung bas grub bo28// pags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba no/ sngonA yad du 'ong ba'i go sa dang/ mal stan byin pas grub bar tshe/ 'i
khung bunas baspu re re skyes pa ni/ sngon 'du 'dza yongs su spangs pas grub bo 3// spu'i rtsa mo g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba ni sngon mkhan po dang/ slob dpon dang/ dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyi gdams ngag ma thun nga ra'adzan pas grub bo31// dbu skra in da lta'i lta bu ni/ sngon srog chags thams cad la/ snying brtse zhing rdodabyig dang/ mtshon cha bor bas grub bo/
shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa ni/ sngon bdag dang/ sems can gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzin la sbyor bas grubapo3 3// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen ngomtshan sridamed kyi
bu chen po'i lus ltar kun nas mdzes pa 'dan 1 sngon de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang/ mchod rten zhig pa bcos pa dang/ gzhan 'ajigs pa dag dbugs phyung ba dang//
sems can ma 'dus pa 'i sdums byas pas grub ste/ bu mo sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos tshad med grangs med ra 'di dag sdud pas/ dngazhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i tshon sum cu rtsa
gnyis mngon par grub bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ bu mo rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshan du de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyi rgyu las
byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bka' stsalar 'dzin ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom lamadangs kyi seng khu ma yin
chon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bum de de bzhin te/ bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa 'di las bstan to/ dbu ma dang nga 2pa na/ shigs
pa'i sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las brtsams te/ sas rgyas kyis thams cad bstan pa'i ng thos la thos nas kyang/ de bzhin nyidadu sgrub pa de dag nas
cad l sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rnam pa 'a mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa de dag la ltos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
dang ma 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang/ mtshan rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pan/ phyogs bcu'i 'jigs rten gyi
khams thams cad rad tu g.yos te/ snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa ni blonamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub

sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong nam skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// steng gi bar snang las kyang lha brgya stong gis me tog gi chararab tu phab ste/ sil snyan yang dkrol nas gang dag de bzhin gshegs/
pa'i stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'as pa dang/ mtshan rab tu dbye ba bstan pa'i tshos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos la thos nas kyang ms shing yid ches te/ 'dzin pa'i
de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa'i sems can dedag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba na ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur te/ de dag ji ltar da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
bzhin du lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyin dun du seng ge 'i sgra sgrogs pa ra 'gyur// de ci'i slad du zhen/ partsoldan 'das chos 'di sems can dmanapa la mos shing/ nan tan la mi
gnas pa rnams kyi sug par mchib ma 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'aa skyed pa yongs su dag pa/4mas kyi shug par mchi bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su dag par rtsod pa dang//
chos spyod nga'i sems can rnams ni/ chos 'di la dga' bar 'gyur te/ yid la 'bab cing/ mnga' ba la dgag bar yang 'gyur ro zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do//
de nas do com ldan 'das la bu me rin chen gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshapa/sa pas sngon gyi rgyu las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
bka' stsal pa ni ngo tshar to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang ba chos spyod par gyur pa'i chos spyod pa ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
chos spyod pa legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo bsam pa/
rnam par dag pa'i chos spyod pa'o/ mdza' ba brtan pa dang/ byas pa bzo ba dang/ byas pa shes pa dang/ snying brtse ba dang bcas pa dang/ skyabs su song ba yongs su
ma gtong ba dang/ nyam chung ba la bzodacing dang du len pa dang/ btang bar bkal ba yongs su la/tong ba dang/ phan pa'i dngos po dang/ phan 'dogs pa'i/
a blodang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i rjes su srung ba dang/ chos nges par sems pa dang/ chos kun tu srung ba dang/ chos 'dod pa dang/ dam pa'i chos srung ba dang/ dben pa dang/
gcig pur dga' ba dang/ dgon pa'i gnas la yos su ma skye ba dang/ dgon pa'i yon tan la yongs su 'jal ba dang/ 'du 'dziyongs su spong ba dang/ sems na rjes su srung
ba dang/ 'khrul pa la lta ba dang/ byams pa la sbyor ba dang/ sAng rje chen pa la 'jug pa dang/ dga' bas chos la dga' zhing/ mchog tudag kha dang/ btang snyoms lo
( bsam gtan 'cha' ba dang/ sems can gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems la sbyar ba dang/ theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa sba ba dang/ khur blangs pa khyer ba dang/ sems ma zhum/
pa pa dang rung ba'i tshod shes pa dang/ 'dod pa chung ba dang/ sdig pa ma 'dod pa dang/ phrag dog med pa dang/ 'dod pa'i spyod pa sbyong ba dang/ 'phags pa'i rigs chog shes
pa dang/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang/ yo byad bsnyungs pa dang/ 'thab pa med pa dang/ rtsod pa med pa dang/ gnod sems med pa dang/ khreb med pa dang/ bzod pa
dang/ des pa dang/ rgyu'i byed pa khong du chud pa dang/ las kyi rnam ra ra sman pa la yid ches pa dang/ dad pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ thos pa dang/ gtong ba dang/
khrel yod pa dang/ nga tshashes pa dang/ shes rab kyi nor gyi rjes su 'jug pa dang/ blam la gus pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rten pa dang/ bka' blo bde ba dang/
mthun pa 'dzan pa dang/ nga rgyal med pa dang/ 'dudapa dang/ sems dma' ba dang/ bdag la ma bstod pa dang/ gzhan la ma snyed pa dang/ rang gi yon tan mi brjod pa dang/
gzhan gyi yon tan lam smed pa dang/ 'dod chags kyi rdul 'phyug pa dang/ zhe sdang gi tha ba rnam par spong ba dang/ gti mug gi mun pa mun nag med pa dang/ nga rgyal bcom pa dang//
spyod lam dang 2 spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang/ tshes la rim gro byed pa dang/ dga' zhing dad la mchog tu dga' ba dang/ sangs rgyas lam byed pa dang/ chos la nges pa dang/
dge 'dun la ston par 'dzin par dang/ sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ yang dag par sdom pa dang/ mngon par 'byung ba dang/ tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/
ma rnyed pa dang/ grags pa dang/ ma grags pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ smad pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal gyis ma g.yos pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi chos la shin tu mda'
ba dang byams snang la mtshungs par blta ba dang/ 'dor te gsong por sa ba dang/ bzhin 'dzum bdang/ khro gnyer med pa dang/ tshul 'chos pa med pa dang//
kha gsag med pa dang/ g.yo med pa dang/ sgyu med pa dang/ bcos ma ma yin ra dang/ bsam pa shin tu dag pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ snyan par smra ba dung/ don byed pa dang
don mthun pa dang/ dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos nyid dang/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/ chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang/
tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa dang/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa mngon par grub pa dang/ dguba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par dag pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi lus dang/ ngag
dang/ sems rnam par dag par byed pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam srung ba dang/ ma rtag ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ sems can med pa dang/
srog med pa dang/ gso ba med pa dang/ gang zag med par mas pa dang/ stong pa nyid nges par sems pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang/ smon pa med pa shes pa
dang khams gsum la ma gnas pa dang/ dran pa nye pa ra gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang pa dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi
yan lag dang/ lam la 'jug pa dang/ zhi gnas dang/ lhag mthong gis so sor rtog pan/ chos kyi spyod pa'o// bu mo gzhan nang chos spyod pan/ gangan mig la mi spyod
pa dang/ gzugs la ma spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la ma spyod pa dang/ rnal ma spyod pa dang/ sgra la ma spyod pa dang/ sgra'i mtshan ma la mi spyod pa dang/ sna la
spyod pa dang/ dril cha spyod pa dang/ dri'i mtshan ma la mi spyod pa dang/ lce la mi spyod pa dang/ lam dpa dang/ ro'imtshan ma la mi spyod pa dang/ lus la ma spyod pa
dang/ rig pa lam spyod pa dang/ reg pa'imtshan ma la mi spyod pa dang/ yid la mi spyod pa dang/ chos lam spyod pa dang/ chos kyi mtshan ma la ma spyod pa nachos la spyod
pa'o// gzugs lam spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la ma spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi ma rtag pa la ma spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi sdug bsngal ba la mi spyod pa dang/
gzugs kyi bdag med pa la mi dpa dang/ gzugs kyi zhi ba la mi spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi steng nga la ma spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma med pa lam spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi
smon pa med pa la ma skyed pa dang/ gzugs kyi mngon par 'du bya ba la mi spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi dben pa la mi spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi rang bzhinal mi spyod pa//
dang gzugs kyi jo'i ba bzhin la mi phyed pa dang/ gzugs kyi sa skyes pa la mi spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi 'byung ba med pa la ma spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyi gzhamed pa la mi spyod ro dang/
gzugs kyi gnas med pa la ma spyod pa dang/ gzugs kyidi bzhinanyida' mi spyod pa nas skyed pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par
shes pa la ma spyod pa ni chos spyod pa'o// rnam par shes pa ma rtag pa la mi phyedapa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i sdug bsngal bal ma spyod pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i bdag med pa la ma
skyed pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i zhi bal ma spyod pa dang/ rnam pa bshes pa'i stong pa la ma spyod pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma med pa la mi spyod ba dang/ rnam par shes pa'i
smonapamed pa la mi spyod pa dang/ rnam par shog pa 'a mngon bar 'du bya ba med pa la ma spyod pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i dben pa la mi spyod pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin lam da
ba dang 6 rnam par shes pa'i ji lta ba bzhin la ma spyod dang/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa la mi spyod pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i 'byung ba med pa la mi spyod pa dang/ rnam par
shes pa'i gzhi med pa la ma skyed pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i gnas med pa lam spyod pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la ma spyod pa nas spyod pa'o// khamasal ma spyod pa dang/
skye mched la ma spyod pa dang/ 'dod pa dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa la ma spyod pa dang/ gang sbyod pa me dbang rab tu sbyod po 'dan chos spyod pa zhes bya'o// gang na skyed pa
med cing rnam par sbyod pa med pa dang/ 'gro bamed pa dang/ gnas pa med pa dang/ 'jug pa med pa dang/ gang na sems dang/ yid dang/ rnam par shes pa la mi
spyod pa dang/ mthong ba dang ( thos pa dang/ bye brag phyed pa dang/ rnam par shes pa la mi spyod pa dang/ gang na 'dod pa dang/ 'du byed la ma spyod pa dang/ gang na tshos la mi
spyodal/ chos ma yin pa la yang mi spyod pa dang/ gang na gnyis la mi spyod pa dang/ snatshogs la ma spyod pa dang/ gangan 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa la mi spyod pa dang/ da
ltar byung ba lnga ma spyod pa dang/ gang na phung po dang/ khams dung/ skyom chad la mi spyod nga 'danichos spyod pa'o// gang na kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang pa'i rloms
sems la ma skyed pa dang/ gang na ril po dang/ rdzas la ma spyod pa dang/ gang na bdag dang/ semos can dang srog dang gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ bshad lA
skyes pa dang/ shed du 'dzan pa dang/ sgo 'degs pa la ma skyod ba dang/ ngan skye ba dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ gnas bal ma spyod pa dang/ gang na/
par 'dzazhib dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa med pa la mi spyod pa dang/ gang nartog pa dang/ chad pa lam spyod pa dang/ mthura'adzazhib lta ba la sbyod pa dang/ dbus la mngon bar zhen/
bal mi spyod pa dang/ ba dag dang chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas dang gnas med pa'i gnas dang/ tshog kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang/ chos thams cad kyi nas dang/ stong pa dang/
ma stong pa'i gnas dang/ shin tu gnas pa'i gnas dang/ chos thams cad mi g.yo ba dang/ mi gnas pa dang/ gnas pa med pa dang/ ngo 'demed pa dang/ rgyu med pa dang/
sa pa med pa dang/ blang pa med pa dang/ dor ba med pa dang/ khas len pa med pa dang/ len pa med pa dang/ gang tshos 'a di shesal shes pas ma sems kyang
med pa 'di ni yang dag pa dang/ de khen dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ chos shes pa zhes bya'o// bum byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di lta bu'i chos thams cad khong du chud nas/
sems can gzhan dag 'dul ba'i phyir 'khor ba la yang spyod la/ mya nganalas 'das pa 'is nyid las kyang ma g.yo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang dag phul ba yin no//
[s/ ]chos skyed pa bstan pa 'a de bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong na bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// bu mo rin chen rgyas na mu tig ga se me de bya ba brgya stong ra ba/ bcom ldan
'das la phul nas/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang chos spyod pa 'di la brtson pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson pa lags
so de'i lung bstan pa ni 'di lags te/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas nas/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom ste/ phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab par blta'o/ brgyab rgyas btab par blta'o// de nas
tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bu mo rin chen la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir mi ldeg pa'i phyag rgyashes sam/ de nas du ma 'o de
chen gyis de'i tsho tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ 'di la chos dbyangs sems can khams// yang dag nyid kyis mnyam rtogs nas// gnyis med rtogA
pa gang yin pa/ ngan mi rtogs phyag rgya yin// gang dag 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang// da ltar byung dang ma byon pa// thams cad chos kyi dbyings mnyam par// rtogs pa de dag phyir mi
ldog gang yang 'dus byas khams rnams dang/ gang yang 'dus ma byas pa'i khams// dbenapa'i don gyi steng pa ni// khong du chud pa phyir mi ldog// sngon gyi mtha' na mtha' yas pa/
de yi tshad nas dmigs pa// sems kyi skad ci'i gcig ldan la// rtogs pa de dag phyir ma ldeg/ 'jig rten pa yi tshos gang dag/ spyod par btags pa'i spyod
gul rnams// shes rab kyis nid rtogs pa// gang yin de dag phyir mi ldog/ bdud kyi yul ni ji snyed pa// gang gis sangs rgyas yul rnams dang// ded gnyis shes pa ni/
phyag rgya bad yis btab pa yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang gtachug gang// nyon mongs gang dag mtha' yas pa// gang gis rtogs pa'i rtsa ba las// byung bar shes pa phyir ma ldag/
'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// byang chub zhib bstan pa yang// tha dad ma yin kun manyam par// khong du chud pa phyir ma ldog/ phung po ji bzhin byang chub ste// phung pa byang chub mi
gnyis shing// sgyuma'adrab r mnyam shes te// rnam rtog med nga ra de dag mkhas// gang yang mkhas rnams bzhi pa dag/ nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i khams yin te// gzung med
khong du chud pa na// yang dag phyag rgyas btab pa yin// ma gzhi byang chub byung chub man// sangs rgyas kyis ni stong par gsungs// ji ltar mgo bzhin byang chub ste// rtag tu
mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam// de ltar skye mched thams cad kyang// rtag tu stong ste byang chub mnyam// tshul 'dirab tu shes pa dag/ phyag rgya des ni btab pa yin// sems can rnams
kun gyi sems// sems gcig gas na'i bshes pa// de ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub las// phyir mi ldog par the tshom med// sems can kun gyi dbang po ni// rab dang 'khrang dad
tham gi/ pha rol phyin pa gang yin pa// de dag phyir mi ldog pa yin// thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa yis// rgyun mi 'chad par rgyun du yang// bskal pa bye bar brjod kyang go/
des bsngags pa dram zad// nam mkha'i khams ni zad 'gyur la/ rlung na zhags pas gzung 'gyur srid// de ya ljobs pa 'jig rten gyis// zad par bya bar yong mnus//
gang gi sems nam rmongs shing// thos pa'i ng chud zar mi 'gyur la// chos rnams thams cad 'azhi pa yi// gzungs ni de dag spyod yul yin/ phyogs bcu kun gyi 'dren pa yi//
dam pa'i chos ni gang bshad ng// gzungs thos pas nadi dag kun// dran pa dang ni shes pas 'dzin// gzungasanashin tu bslabs pas na// sngon gyi de skal pa bye bar na// skyob
pa rnams kyi chos thos pa// de dag dus nas ston par gyur// phyir mi ldog pa gang yin pa// dedag gzus na'adi 'dra ste// spobs pa dag kyang 'di 'dra zhing// de dag ye shes
'di' dra'o// chos rnams phyag rgya stong pa nyid// rnam smanamed cing bsal pa med// stong pa'i phyag rgyas gangang pa tab pa// de dag phyir mi ldog par bstan// nam mkha' phyag
rgyas btab pa'i chos// rang bzhin gyis 'byung med par// mtha'a'ad khong du rab chudal// phyag rgyas btab pa phyir maldog/ a nabarten nas 'byung ba ste/
rgyu med pa yachos med do// tshes gang rgyu las byung ba dag/ de ya mtshan nyidi 'gog pa'o// chos rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid na// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid de// mtshan nyid phyag
rgya de 'dra ba'i phyag rgyas gang btab phyir mi ldog/ phyir mi ldog pa gang yanapa// sems can kun gyi spyod pa dang// gzugs dang spyod lam dus rnams kyang// skadatsag gtsag la
rab tu ston// sbyin pa'i tshogs namatha' yas te// bsod nams rtag tu ma zad pa// gal te ro gcig 'gyuranani// nam mkha'i khams kyang gang bar 'gyur// de dag tshul khrims/
chab nyid// sangs rgyas tshul khrims 'byung gnas te// dpag tu med cing mtha' yang med// nam mkha' yon khams dang 'phrad// sems can kun dang nyan thos dang// rgyal ba
lar re'i tshul khrims ni// phyir mag pa'i tshul khrims kyi// bcu drugacha yarina mchog/ de dag bzod pa mi zad de// de dag skye ba med pas pa skyed// bzod pa ma zad phun sum tshogs/
phyir mi ldeg par 'gyur ba yin// de dag brtson 'grus cheb nyid// yang dag brtson pa dpag tumed// brtul ba'ang dpag tumed pa ste/ sems can thams cad ma par byed//
brtan bartagatumanyam par bzhag/ g.yeng ba med cing shin tu bsdam// bya ba rnams kun tu ston// mnyam par gzhag las g.yo ba med// shes rab kyas na chags med thob//
lta ba'ab chags rnam par sbyangs// sangs rgyas spyod yul rdzogs par theb// phun sumatshegs pa'i zhing yang sbyong/ sangs rgyas phyag rgyas btab pa ste// ye shes pha rol phyin pa
thobaDa phubs chen dag kyang shin tu bslabs// byang chub kyi na spyad pa spyod// sems can yongs su sman byed pa// dadag spyod yul mtha' yas te// spyod pa ci 'drab sam ra 'dra//
de dag spyod pa shes pa med// dgra dacom dag dang rang rgyal dang/ bdud dang mu stegs gzhan kun gyis// dedag spyod yul tshad med pa// shes par nus pa ma yin no// de dag bsam
gtan rdzu 'phrul dang// rnama'aphrul 'du byed bacasapa mni// dpa' bo lhun gyis grub pa ni// byab de dag kun la 'jug/ tshodang 'jug dba'achi'aphodang// byang chub kyin stong pa dang/
chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor dang// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs kyang ston/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngon// zhing rnams kun n snangab na// nyi zla ltabur bsal ba ste// de dag nam mkha'
mtshungs par ldan// theg pa mas par ji bzhin par// mya ngan 'das pa'i ng ste med kyi// ma ldog phyag rgya gang yin pa// phyag rgyu de ni 'do ma yin// nam mkhas ci tsam khyab
