gshegs pakha lta'o zhes smras pa/ mig gi rnam par shes ga nga gas de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bya/ misha'i mig gis blta bar bya 'am/ 'on kyang lha'i mig gis blta bar bya/ gal ti sha'i
mig gis bltamani/ sha'i mog na stong pa ste/ stong pas mthong bar mi nus// de de lta'i mig gis blta nani/ de la lha'i mig tu brtags na/ lca'i mig go snyam du 'du shes par
'gyur te/ brtags pa'i mig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma mthong ngo// sa pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni gang stong pa nyid kyis ston par byed na de la sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa blta
bar ma 'gyur/ mchod par ma 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhe'am/ sangs rgyas zhe 'am/ sems can zhe 'am bgro ba na 'aa/ mchod pa zhe 'ag/ lta ba zhes
gang cung zad sla ba smos pa brjod pa'i yag de thams cad na yi ge'i rang bzhin gyis stong ngo// de bas namanyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i tshig de ni de bzhin nyid 'khrugs par ma byed de/ de bzhin
'di ldog par mi byed kyis/ khyod las gang zod pa dag 'dong ngo// mi bzod pa dag ni ba khod cig/ bdag ni 'gro'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di lta
sto 2 chos kyis chog mi shes pa'i phyir gnyis su med de/ gcig pu song ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor de nas su yang ma song ngo// de nas 'am dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di lta ste/
skyes bu stobs po che'i dpung pa brkyang pa las bskus pa 'am/ bskum pa las brkyang pa tsamadu/ de'i thongacig skad cig yud tsam gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu/
gyur pa ma mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas ma snang bar rgyunas/ kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su'adug go/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams la lan bdun bskor nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ yang de'i tsho/ bcom ldan 'das

[W ]de bzhin gshegs pa'i jug sred kyi rgyal po'i g.yas phyogs na/ sring mo thatsom sel ba zhes bya ba skyil ma krung du bcas shing 'dug ste/ de kun du zla ba'i 'od dri ma med pa snang ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po 'di snyam du dgongs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa 'di ni/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la bstod do// bkur lo/ zab mo la bzod pa'o// stong pa la gnas pa'o zhes bshad dosnyam du sems te/ 'dinam mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams nas dmigs pa chen pos bskyed cing bdag tu 'dzin che ba dang ldan 'ange 'ongasakyis/ gang ngas na 'dir khor yug gi rtsi mo las 'ang ngas dang/ 'di las brtsams te/ chos zab
0 mo ston par 'gyur bas// skye bo phyi ma dag dung/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' yang snang bar byas par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ni
bsam gyis ma khyab/ de ltar zab pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lta bu stong pa la gnas pa'i mchog kyang ri khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod kyi donagang gis dbang ma mthong
nas 'dir 'ongs/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de mchis pa las/ 'di snyam du gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni dkon no// chos thos pa yang dkon da/ kun tu 'od sa bgyi ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yang phyogs bcunas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rang ga
tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag tshogs so// tshogs nas sangs rgyas bgro ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad kyis/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la blta ba/
dang/ chos bshad pa de dag mnyan du mchi'o snyam nas/ bam ldan 'das bdagan chos nyan pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
bsha da gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos de'i tshaji nas kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon ng ra'adu bya ba mngon par 'dus byas pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ri khor yug gi rtsa
mar 'phangs par gyural/ bdag gang du blangs shing khyer snyam du yang ma shes ba de 'drab myur du btegs ste/ 'phang ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dubya bas mngon par 'dus byas s// de
nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di khor yug gi rtsa mor 'phangs pa las sems shing 'disnyam du gyur to// skyugang dang rkyen gang gis na/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi 'khor chen po de ltabur
ba bstan bzang ba/ mdzes pa grung po chen po de 'dra ba dag gi nang nas/ ra khor yug gi rtsom 'dir 'phangs par gyur/ bdug kyi khor yug gi rtse mor sus 'phungs snyam du de ltar/
sams pa las 'di snyam du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po des/ bdag ra khor yug gi rtse mor 'phangs so snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag ni 'khor de nas 'phangs la/ sring ma thatsom sel ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i drud du skyel/
mo krung bcas shing 'dug pa las/ sring mo de ni ma 'dangs kyi/ bdag 'phangs na/ ci'i phyir zhig tun/ de ltar ma nam 'phangs la/ bdag 'phangs pa las na/ sring mo de
ningage ba'i rtsa ba shan tu 'bar ba/ zab mo shan tu bzod par gyur pa zhig gi/ bdag nidi lta bu ma yin pa zhig gam snyam m// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis ma du gyur te/
gang bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu bskyed de/ slar yang 'khor der 'gro'i snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'dus byas pas/
sems bskyed pa gcig gis/ shar phyogs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhingagats+tsha'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas nas/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing der chung ngun/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam du yang 'gro ma nus na/ 'khor der 'gro ba lta tsasmos te/ de lta bu'i gnas med do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nuragyur pa/
phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa kun tu song yang 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ byin gyis rlabs kyis 'khor der 'gro ma nus so// de nas 'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun tu song nas slar yang ri khor yug gi rtsa mo la 'dug nas 'di snyam du gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin
gyis rlabs namathu chos/ de la bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa sa gnon yang m nus/ de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nyes pa yang med do// ci'i phyir zhen/ de bzhin gshegs
pa rnams ni chos la slobadapon gyis 'chab pa med de/ bdag nyid cung zad gcig khoru chungabs/ de'i phyir bdag zhi ba'i chos ston pa der 'gro ma nus par gyur du zad de/
de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni chos la slob dar na gyis 'chab pa med kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag na/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa sa nagang bdag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pas/
khor yug gi rtse mo 'di nyid la gnas so snyam mo// de la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad dran pa med pa yi da la byed r
'a med pa chos thams cad mi gnas pa chos thams cad gnas pa med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir ma gnas she na/ 'grob med pa'i phyir te/ chos gang yang shin tu yod pa med do// de'i phyir de
dag ma'agro'o// gang ma 'gro ba de ni mi gnasaso// 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa ston pa dang/ dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa ni/ 'jam dpal gyi dran pa nye bar
'jog pa yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dran pa nye bar 'jog pa la gnas pa 'di la gnas pa las/ lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ga la ba der song
ste 5 phyi nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas 'khor der 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan zhes byaba'i lha'i bu 'ongs te
'dug nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'a'adi skad ces gsol to// 'jam dpal khyod gnas pa gang la gnas te/ nga ltar langs pa lags/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa//
lha'i bu gal te nga dag la gnas pa yod na ni bdag gnas pa sa gnas par byed na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir bdag la gnas pa med mod kyi/ lha'i bu khyada gnas pa gang la gnas
te da ltar langs pa yin zhes zer bdag nidran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pas gnas te/ daltar langs pa yin no// gsol pa// 'jam dpal dran pa'i bar gzhag pa la gnas pa ji
lta bu zhig lags/ snyas pa chos tham cad dran pa med pa de la byed pa med pa'o// gsol pa/ 'jam dpal gang na dran pa med yid la byed pa med pa der gnas te/ da ltar las pa lags
sam/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ gnas pa gang la gnas na/ byas pa lta bu'i sa so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang gtaMmug rgyu bar 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de la gnas te/
bdag nga ltar langs pa yin no// lca'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ 'jam dpal gang sangs rgyas kyis ma dmaches pa'i gnas pa de ji lta bu lags/ smras pa lha'i bu stong pa/
nyid la gnas pa na sangs rgyas kyis ma dmigs pa'o// mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa dang/ smon pa med pa la gnas pa ni sangs rgyas kyis ma dmigs pa'o// de bas na gnas pa de la gnas//
@#// te/ da ltar langs pa yin no// gsol pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa ji lta bu las/ smras pa lca'abu gang na dran pa med yid la byed pa med pa de na gnas
pa'i dam pa yin te/ gang gnas pa de la gnas pa de dag ni 'dod pa'i khams su ma gnas/ gzugs kyi khams sum gnas/ gzugs med pa'i khams su mi gnas so// gang
khams gsum la ma gnas pa de dag ni mnyam pa'i gnas pas gnas pa 'o// gang mnyam pa'i gnas pas gnas pa de dag la ni 'gro ba med do// gang la mam nyam pa med pa de dag ni
'gro ba med do// gang la 'gro ba med pa de dag la ni ma rig pa ma mthong ngo// gang la ma rig pa ma mthong ba de la ni ri'i ra ma skyes so// gang rig pa ma skyes pa de dag nam 'byung ngo// gang
ma 'byung ba de dag na 'byung bar ma'agyur ro// gang 'byung bar ma 'gyur ba de dag ni 'jigs pa med do// gang 'jig ra med pa dedag ni ma 'byung ngo// gang na byung ba de ngag ni dbye bar mi
nus so// gang dbye bar ma nus pa de dag ni/ lha'i bu shin tu dag pa yin te/ lha'i bu de na 'phags pa gnas pa rdul dang bral ba// gsolo pa/ 'jam dpal rdul ces bgyi ba lag
sbas pa lha'i bu chung ngu nas nigs rgyas su dmags pa'i rnam par shes ba 'byung ba de ni rdul lo// lha'i bu mtshan ma ni rdul to// 'du shes dang 'dzan pa dang chags pa dang/ rlom sems dang 'ad
pa dang khes dang/ phyag 'tshal ba dang/ chags sems dang/ khong khro ba dang/ dmigs pa dang/ 'gro ba dang/ smo nalam dang/ rtog pa dang/ rtog pa'i mtshan m
dang/ yongs su rtog pa dang/ rnamapar rtog pa dang/ kun tu rtog pa dang/ yid la byed pa dang/ nga slong bar byed pa dang/ chad par 'dzin pa dang/ rtag par 'dzin pa dang/ med par
'dzan pa dang/ lag par 'dzin pa dang/ yod par 'dzin pa dang/ med par 'dzin pa dang/ lha'i bu ja tsam du rnam par rtog cing skyes pa dang/ yid la byed pa dang/ sems dpa' dang/
bskrun pa dethams cad ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la rdul du bshad do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis legs sa zhes bya ba byin te/ 'dzam
dpal legs so legs so// yang 'jam dpal khyod kyis dran pa nye bar gzhug pa la gnas pa bshad pa 'di legasas lags so zhes sa so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lca'i bu chog/
gis ma rtog shig/ khyod nam skyes pa ma byung ba ma bstan pa'i tshes kyi legs par spyin par byed de/ lha'i bu gang dran pa tre bar gzhag pa bstan pa 'di ni bshad pa'i m brjod par mi nus so// de'i
phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i phyir te/ chos thams cad brjod du mad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni brjod pa gang ya nga med pas de'i phyir de dag ni ma brjod pa'o// lha'i bu 'od
zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ 'jam dpal gnas pa gang la gnas na/ sa pa lta bu'i so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnam
rgyung ra'agyur ba'i gnas pa de la gnas te langasas// zhes de skad bshad pa/ gang la gnas na/ byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams rgyu
bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byas pa lta bu'i so so'i skye bo thams cad dngos po med pa la gnas na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams rgyu bar 'gyur ro/
chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa// de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i byis pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams rgyu bar
'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhu na/ chos gang yang chos kyi dbyangs dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' las bral de bshad mi nus so// gsolar/ 'jam dpal yang
dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ smras ra/ lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mthalazhes bya ba ni sems can gyi mtha'i tshig bla dgas so// gsol pa/ 'jam dpal semA
can gyi mtha' zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ bdag gi ma tha'i tshig bla dgas so// gsol pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi mtha' zhes bgyi ba gang ga tshig bla dgas lags//
[s/ ]sus pa/ 'khor ba'i mtha'i tshig bla dgas so// gsol pa/ 'jam dang la 'khor ba'i mtha' zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshogs bla dgas lags/ smas pa/ nam mkha'i tshig
dgos yin no// lha'i bu 'dilta ste dper na/ nam mkha'i dbyangs la ni mtha' ma med tshad pa med rang ba med thung ba med zlum pa med gru bzhi med/ phre ba med spom pa med/ leb leb
po med/ dkar po med/ nag po med/ dmar po med de/ gzhan du na nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes mang tsam du grangs su 'gro ste/ ming de yang gsong yin no// lha'i bu de bzhin du/
chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtha'o/ nam mkha' 'gro nam mkha'i ming gi rangabazhin no// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' na mi skye ma gram 'chi/ ma 'byung/
nyonAm mongs rnam par ma dkar chags pa med/ zhe sdang ba med/ bkur ba med/ mi bkur ba'ang med de/ de'amathos na ma bgrang ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad bgrang bar bya'o//
lha'i bu gdags su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni 'du ba dang dral bar bstan cing gzhag mi nus so// lha'i bu sa thams cad nam brtags pa/ ma btul ba dam pa ma yin pa ste/
lha'i bu 'di ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid/ mi mnyam pa ma yin pa/ de bzhin nyid phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid do// bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu de dag thams
cad ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas/ chos la gus pas/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa la//
lha'i me tog mnar bas gtor ro// me tog de dag gtor ma thag tu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ steng gi bar snang la gnas med cing yongs su ma
bcud bzhin du 'dug par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras so/ lha'i bu de ji snyam du sems/
me tog 'di dag gang la gnas/ gsol pa// 'jam dpal me tog 'di dag ni gnas pa ma lags so// smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ma gnas pa ste/ mi gan
par nam mkha' la gnas shing/ nam mkha' las kyang ma 'phags/ ma ltung/ mi g.yo// rab tu mi g.yo// ma'abugs rab tu ma 'bugs so// ci'i phyir zhen/ chos da
dag thams cad ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas/ de'i phyir de dag mi g.yo rab tu mgayo// ma 'bugs rab tu ma 'bugs so// denus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ lha'i bu
'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jam dpal khyod kyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi cho 'phrul thob ste/ khyod sems bskyed ra gcig gas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par 'gro zhing 'ong ba domatshar to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu bdag ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mthucho 'phrul thob pa yang ma yin/ sa sa
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi na thos kyang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag nam togs shing zad pa med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bu byas palta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad ni//
rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu'acho 'phrul thob pa'o// de ci'i phyirazhin/ de ltar lha'i bu sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ nyan thos thams cad dang//
rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bskal pa grangs med par btsal kyang chos gang yang thob par ma gyur/ ma thob ma thob bo// byas pa lta bu so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis 'thob bo//
tsathob cen bdag thob po// sems can dang/ srog dang/ skye ba pa dang/ gso ba pa dang/ gang zag dang/ shed las skyes pa dang/ shed bu dang/ chad pa dang//
rtag pa dang/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug thob bo// gang sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos ma thos pa ma bskyed pa de bskyed par byed pa sa na/ lca'i bu de'i phyir byas pa
lta bu'i so so'i skye bo rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu thob pa yan gyi sangs rgyas rnams ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas rnams ma yin no// nyan thos
rnams ma/ de nas sangs rgyas bcob ldan 'das de dag/ sangs rgyas 'gro ba'ichos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher bshad nas/ bdag bdag gi sas
rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pa 'di snyam du dgongs te/ gang bdag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
'dir 'ong bar ltasashig bya'o sAmam// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ byin gyi rlabs snga ma de btang ste/ phyag g.yas pa'i mathol nas/ 'od zer gser gyi kha
dog lta bu phyung ste/ 'od de cinas kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lus la phog nas/ lan bdunabaskor te/ 'jam dpal gyi spyi bor nub par 'agyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so//
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te/ ci'i sgyuci'i rkyen gyis na/ 'di lta bu'i snang ba bsam gyis ma khyab pa bdag gi lus la phog nas/ spyi bor mi snang bar gyur snyam
klopalas/ yang de 'di snyam du gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po bdag gzigs par bzhed pa snyam mo// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu 'od zer
gyi rgyal mtshan la 'di skad ces smras go/ lha'i bu dag tshur shog/ bcob ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa de blta ba dang/
phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ kun du zhu ba'i phyir 'dong ngo/ zab ma zab pa'i phyir chos kyi sgo sgrub ba dag kyang de nas 'chad kyis/ de dag kyang manyan par bya'o//
denas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la/ lha'i bu 'od zer gyi rgyal mtshan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// 'jam dpal de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bzhud do// de nas 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sems bskyed pa gcig gis ri khor yug gi rtsa ma de nas lha'i bu de dag dang bcas te/ mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa
'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i spyan star 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabul/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mgo bos phyag 'tshal taM
lan gsum bskor nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// lha'i bu de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pachos ngs rgyas 'jug sred kyi rgyal pa'i
zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pal/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyurar sa 'di skad
ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mos legs par dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bgyi'o// zab mo la bzod pa yang de tsam ma mchis par bgyi'o// des
bdag kyang snod du gyur par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar glang po chen po dag gi nang nas/ bdag slad rol du byung bar gyur to// chos bshad
pa de 'dra ba las kyang slad rol du byung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das sring mo btsom sel ba 'di sa'i phyogs 'ad las gang du yang ma g.yos gang du'ang ma 'phangs par gyur to// bdag gis mngon par

'tsho 'tshal ba/ snga dro gcig gas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med par mchi zhing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ gang de [.]
dag gas tshos bshad pa de yang 'dzin cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yongs su zhu yongs su gsol bar bgyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang/ bdag la zhus pa'i lung
ston par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tshos bshad pa las gang du yang bskyad pa 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du yangs par ma 'tshal te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen nas bdag nyid la chos 'chad par bsgo// bcom ldan 'das bdag ra khor yug gi rtse me de la mchis pa'i tshe na/ chos la 'tshal ba dang/ chos
la skom pa dang/ chos la bkur sti bgyid pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang cher 'tshal bar gyur to// ya nga bdag 'di snyam du gyur te/ ci'i ci'i rkyen gyis na bdag 'khor de nas 'di lo
yug gi rtse mo 'di'i 'phangs shing/ sring mo tha tson sel ba 'dinam 'das par gyur snyam pa las/ bcom ldan 'das yang bdag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de nga zhin gshegs pa ni chos
rnams la slob dpon gyis 'tshab pa yang ma mdzad/ chagasar 'i sems kyang ma mchis na de la bdag nyid ngo ru chung du bas sam/ yang na chos bshad pa 'di la bdag snod du ma
gyur pa lta ste/ de'i slad du bdag der 'bangs sa snyam bgyid do// de ni bdag de bzhin gshags pa la zhun/ ci'i slad du bdag 'khor 'di nas ri khor yug gi rtse mo 'phangs la/ sring
mo 'di ma 'phangs par gyur ces de skad gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyirgyal pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bshad pa gang du khyod snod du ma gyur pa de ni 'ga' yang med mod kyi 'jam dang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams namanyes par dka' ste/
dus thams cad du pha rol gyis chos spyod pa la lan gdab par ma nus te/ 'jam dpal khyod thogs ma kho nar 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad nas 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam du gyur te/
de ring kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas bgro nga zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'chad kyis/ bdag ni der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bya ba dang/ chos bstan pa de dag mnyan pa'i phyir 'gro 'o snyam du gyur to// 'jam dpal khyod na sbos pa chen po dang/
dmigs pa chen po dang/ rtog pa chen pa dang/ yongs su rtog pa chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing denas song ste/ sangs rgyas rnams blta// chos kyang mnyan du 'gro'o snyam du sems
zla te 4 'jam dpal khyod ni chags pa gsum gyis chags shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sangs rgyus kyi zhing 'dar 'ongs so// gsum gang zhe na/ bdag tu dmigs pa dang/
sangs rgyas su da migs pa dang/ sa su dmiges pa'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' dmaras pa la spyod na/ ma chags pa thob par 'gyur ba med do// 'jam dpal de ji
ba snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa la su kyang shes pa 'am mthong ba 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa las gzhan pa 'a chos gang yang mthong bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol
nga bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi chos nyid de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yang blta bar mi bgyi/ sa ma lags/ sems can la ma lags so// bcom ldan
'das gal te sems can yongs su grub par gyur tam/ de bzhinagshegs pa 'byung bar gyur tam/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi skur blta bar bgyin/ de bzhin gshegs
0 pa yang blta bar nus/ de bzhin gshegs pas gzhan yang gzigs par 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du/ chos thams cad m skyes pas de'i sladadu/ gang de
bzhin gshegs par blta ba de ma mchis lags so// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang cung zad kyang gzigs pa ma mchis so// deci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams
cad ni mthong bar bgyidapa ma lags sa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal mig dang/ rna ba ga nga dang ldan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pas bstanang 'i chos 'dul ba thos par 'dod pa'i mig dang/ rnab cung zad kyang yod dam/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cang sla bar gyur
to// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a 'khor de na/ byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di no/ de bzhin gshegs pa smub smras
na cang mi zer bar gyur pas/ de bzhin gshags pas smras pa'i lan 'debs ma nus so snyam mo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i sems kyis/
byang chub sems dang 'a de dag gis sems kyi rtog pa yongs su mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de ltar ma sems shig/ khyed 'dzam
[z]ku@#// dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ bar s pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyurapa ni zab mo la bzodapa dang ldan/
ba yin te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pas sgrub smras pa de'ang/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pas lan thebs pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsal pa/
bcom ldan 'das rigs pa gang dang tshul gang gis na/ smras pa'i lan thebs pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'di la rigs kyi bu dag 'jam dpal na 'di snyam du sems te/ gal
te bdag gis bdag la mag mchis so// bdag la rnab mchis so zhes bshad na ni rtag par lta bar 'gyur/ gal te bdag la mgamam sa// rna ba ma mas se zhes bshad nan chad
par blta bar 'gyur te/ rtag pa dang chad par spyod pas chos nyid shes par ma 'gyur te/ chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni nang pa yang med rtag pa yang med do// gang na chad pa yang med rtag
pa yang med pa de ni ma skye ba'o// gang ma skye ba don brjod du med pa'o zhes de ltar sems shing/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa'i lan btab pa'i ng yin no// bstan pa 'di bstan
pa'i tsho/ byang chub sems dpa' drug brgyam skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes sa// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal rgyu 'di dang rkyen 'di yin te/ de'i phyir khyed ra khor yug girtsa ma 'das so// 'jam dpal gang yang ci'i slad du zhe na/ sring mo ba/
tshom sel ba 'di ma 'das par gyur ces khyod de skad zer ba ni/ 'jam dpal srung ma 'di zla ba'i 'od kun du dri ma med par snang bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ni sangs
rgyas dag 'dir gshegs sam ma gshegs zhi 'am/ chos 'chad dam ma 'chad ci snyam du mi sems te/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas su 'du shes med/ chos su 'du shes med/ dge 'dun
du 'du shes med/ bdag tu 'du shes med/ gzhan du 'du shes med de/ 'jam dpal grong ma do 'du shes dang yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// de ni ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
nas/ phyogs bcu'is ngas rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi chos nyan to// 'dzin to// thos nas kyang gzhan la ston par byed mod kyi/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'di
zhing la zhing du 'du shes pa med do// sangs rgyas la sangs rgyas su 'du shes med/ sa la chos su 'du shes pa med/ dge 'dun la dge 'dun du 'du shes pa med/ bdag la bdag tu
'du shes pa med/ gzhan la gzhan du 'du shes pa med de/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gzhal med khang las khang mi g.yo la kun du yang snang bar byed de/
0 @#// thums cad du yang ston med kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gang la yang 'bar ma byed/ 'di la 'ong snang bar bya'o// 'di la 'od mi snang bar bya'o zhes rtog pa yang med do//
'jam dpal de bzhin du sring mo de ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par/ sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la snang bar byed/ sangs rgyas kyi
tsha zhing dpag tu med par ston par byed pa// rnam par rtog par byed/ sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par byed cing/ sems can thams cad la chos ston te/ 'jam dpal
ngas na bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du srung ma 'di'i yon tan brjod kyang/ yon tan zad par ma 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal de ltar sring mo 'di ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
pa dang ldan no/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhinga'adin/ gang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag mchis na calags/ sas
rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag tshogs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bdag bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phangs par gyur ma/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de skad ma zer cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la ma rtogs cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa lo ma rtog cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
ba byan gyi rlangs la ma rtog cig/ deci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshogs pas 'di lta ste dper/
na bu ram shing gi 'tshul lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal lam/ sAg ma'i tshal bzhin du/ de 'dra bar mang ba'i di bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su khyab par gyur kyang/
gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'din/ byang chub sems dpa' dgu dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa gnas pa de dag
thams cad kyis// thams cad du thams cad de bzhin gshags pa gzhan gcig kyang ma mthong ste/ nga gcig pu gnyis su med par mthong ngo// de dag gis chos bshad pa yang ma
thos te nga gcig pu'athos so// 'jam dang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'grul pa dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phra bal stes/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su gangayang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lha'i
mag gas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ sems can gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de
dgu dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams 'din gnas shing/ rgyab dang/ 'chag pa dang/ 'gro ba dang/ 'bring ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba dag ji ltar sems pa bzhin du spyod pa de dag la/ de
ba bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de ltar mang ba sgrib par ma byed/ thogs par mi byed pa la ltos/ 'jam dpal rnam grangs 'dis kyang/ 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs
lhapa ni chos kyi sku yin gyi/ gzugs yongs su grub pa'i sku ma yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni zag pa med pa ste/ nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ma skyes pa ma byung ba ma mthong
ba ma thos pa/ rnam par ma shes pa'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni zag pa med pa gtogs pa med pa/ gzugs med pa bstan du medar/ thogs pa med/
pa rnam par mi dmags pa ste/ nam mkha' ni sus kyang blta ma nus so// yang ma mkha' ni spyan lngas mthong ba mi 'gyur ro// spyan lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i
stsanadang/ lha'i spyan dang/ shes rab kyi spyan dang/ chos kyi spun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan te/ gzhan du na nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes gras su 'gro bar zad do// 'jam
dbal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang zag pa med pa// gtogs pa med pa// gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa// thogs pa med pa/ dmags su med pa ste/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sus kyang mthong bar ma nus so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sus kyang ma mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nisha'i spyan nas sangs rgyas kyi spyanaM
gyi bar du/ spyan lnga la snang bar mi 'gyur gyi/ gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes mang tsam gyi krangs su 'gro ste/ ming de yang gsob bo// 'jam dpal
de bzhin gshegs po 'cho'aphrul la bltos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag na nam mkha' dang 'dra ste/ de dag gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su rdzogs pa yang ston to// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
sum cu rtsa gnyis dang yang ldan no// 'jam dpal gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag khyod kyi mig gis mthong bar ma 'gyurapa de dag thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang mthus
de ltar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ deltar 'jam dpal gzhon nukhyod yin te/ khyod las brtsams nas chos zab mo bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing don/
gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu ngo mtshar che ba'i sgra phyung nas ngo mtshar ro// ngo mtshar ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni de ltar rdza'aphrul che/ mthu che ste/
de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgamang yang bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong ste/ 'dir su zhige gshegs su zhig bzhud/ su zhag 'chad/
su 'chad ces mtshan ma tsam yang ma 'tshal te/ 'din de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pu 'chad par mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das gal te yo shes chen po 'di 'dra ba'i sladadu/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can re re'i phyir/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ sems can damya la brten par bsgral kyang/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
a[% ]dpa' chen pos bzod par bgyi'o// ye shes chen po de 'dra ba yongs su dogabanam bgyi'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pa la/ 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldam 'das srung ma 'dis jisId nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyedan/ sring mo de 'di 'dra bar zhib dam
pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa thob par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
nibaskal pa dpag tu med par bskyed pa ste/ rtog par skye ba tshad med par skyes pa sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/
shes rab las skyes pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus rnams kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin te/ 'jam dpal sring mo 'di ni yu'ang pa nas spyad pa/ sngon gyi
rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ste/ sring mo 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma la bsten bkur byas pa yin mdakyi/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis 'du de
nge 'dzin las slongal/ yunaji srid nas spyod ces dras shig dang/ srung ma 'di nyid kyi khyed la ston pa 'gyur ro/// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas srung ma de seng bar
'dod nas/ se gol gyi sgra thamal pa byas kyang/ sring mo de tang nge 'dzin de las ma langs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas se gol jalta bu s phyogs bcu' 'jig rten gyi khams
mtha' yas mu med pa'i sgra thos par 'gyur ba/ de'adrab 'i se gol gyi sgra byas kyang/ sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las ma las so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ rdzu 'phrul
mngon par 'du bya ba man par 'dus byas pa ji lta bu s stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mi'i sal stan thams cad ma dkrol bar/ sgro 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul

mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas te/ bdag nyid kyang saMl snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong sprul nas/ yid du 'ong ba chags par byed pa rna bar 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin to// yang de'i tshon sel
snyan gyi sgra gang gi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa kun tu grags par 'gyur ba'i sgashAn tu chen po byung bar gyur kyang/ srung ma de ting nge 'dzin de las/
ma langs te/ yang de'i tshigang phyogs bcunas nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing zhes pa de dag la bdag bdag gi g.yog gis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das tsa'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis
rgyan sil snyan gyi sgra dbyangs/ bam ldan 'das sngon ma thos pa'i sgra gda' ba 'di 'jig rten du byung bar gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gas bdag bdag ga
g.yog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs zhing 'tsho/
gzhes te/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi shing na/ sring ma the tsom sel ba zhes bya ba de de bzhin gshegs pa de'i g.yas phyogs na zlabab 'od kun tu dri ma med par snang nga zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'gi
la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba gotsa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bgos pa phyir mi ldog pa'i byung chub sems dpa' zhigayo dade/ sung
ma da ting nge 'dzani de las slong bar 'dod nas/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa des lha dang mi'i sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ste/ de'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sa'i snyan 'di dag ma dkrol
bar sgra 'byin cing 'di lta ste/ sring mo ting nge 'dzin de las bslangs pa'i phyir des sal stan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag sprul te/ rigs kyi bu de dag ma dkrol bar sgra 'byung mod kyi/ sring
mo de ting nge 'dzin de las bslangs bar ma nus so// rigs kyi bu rgyu de dang rkyen de'i phyir sil snyan gyi sgra chen po 'jig rten du byungango// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das de dag la g.yog de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sring mo de 'ad 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzan zhi ba thob cing 'di 'dra ba'i sil snyan gyi sgras kyang ma ldang ba ngo mtshar to/
bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ sring mo 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pa'o// de nas gtam 'di brjod pa'i tsho/ phyogs bcu nas sems
can grangs ni da tshad med pa dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te/ sring mo de ci lta ba bzhin du bdag cag kyang de dang 'dra ba'i tingange 'dzin zhib thob par gyur cig/ 'jam der la
gzhon nur gyur pa ci lta ba bzhin du bdag cag kyang de 'dra ba'i rnam par sprul pa thob pa gyur cig ces de skad kyis tshag smas sa// de nas yang 'dram dpal gzhonanur gyur pas rdzu
'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed pa ji lta bu s stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ ri rab lhun po'i ri'i rgyal po dang gsakyi'i dang ra btang bzung dang/ ra btang
'bazung chen pa dang/ ra khor yug dang/ khor yug chen pa dang/ gzhan yang ra rab 'bring tha ma de dag thams cad gcig la gcig 'dus shing gcig la gcig
thug pa dang/ gcig la gcig 'thab pa 'di lta ste// skyes bu stobs pa/ stobs po che'i zla bo la mthu'i shugs thams cad kyis thal mo rdob par byed pa de bzhin du ri chen po dang/
ga khor yug chen po de dag gcig la gcig 'dus nas/ ri rgyal pa dedag 'jig pa'i sgra'i dbyangs kyis ba spu zing zhes byed par gyur pa de 'dra ba'i sgras 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu
med par grags par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon pa ra 'dus byas kyang/ sringamo de ting nge 'dzin de las bslong ma nus so// de nas 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa// sring mo de lag pa gnyis kyis ma reg la/ byan gyis brlabs kyis lag pa gnyis bzung ste/ bslang par 'dod nas de de ltar bskyod pa dang/ 'og gis phyogs kyi

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos kyang sring ma de bsrung bar ma nus te/ chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo cha shas tsam yang g.yo bar ma nus so//
'gul bar ma nus/ dpe de'adzin de las bslang par yang mnus nas/ de yang shin tu shugs thams cad kyis 'deg go snyam nas shugs phyung ste/ bstag pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gapa'i
krung ga phyi ma dang mnyam pa rnams gyen du 'phags kyang ting nge 'dzin de las ma langs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sa gang gi phyogs na srang ma de mnyam par gzhog
sa de'i phyogs ra khor yug tu drangs te lag pa g.yas pa la gzhag go/ lag pa g.yas par bzhag nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du 'phangs kyang sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de
lag ma las so// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas slar yang sa la bzhag kyang ma langs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sring mo de lag pa g.yas par bzhag nas/ shar

phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+ka'i klung gi d+ye ma snyed du song zhing/ sale snyan gyi sgra de dag dang/ ri'i sgra dbyangs de dag 'byin cing/ me tog gi char 'bebs bzhin du sang yang srang ma de ting
nge 'dzin de las ma langs so// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun tu sring ma de khyer te song nas/ sa phyogs de nyid du
bzhag ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis spyod
pa ni ngo mtshar te/ sems can thams cad kyis kyang 'tshal ba 'am/ sems par sla ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis sems ma mchis pa'i dngos po dag ra/
stsal na'ang bar 'gyur na/ sring mo 'di la 'dra ba'i sgra rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul ba dang cho'aphrul gyis rgyas bslang bar ma nus te/ bcom ldan 'a das sring mo
'ad deng/ gang su'ang de 'a sa gzhan pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs pa dang/ gang 'jug pa dang/ gang de 'dra ba'i ye shes chen po sgrub par bgyid pa de la
phyag 'tshal lo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang bcom ldan 'adas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni 'dul ba chen pa'i spyod pa lags sa// sring mo de ting nge 'dzin de las bsrung ba'i phyir/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ phyogs bcu thams cad du slong bar bgyid pa'i tshe/ sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yongs su sman par byas sa// sems can dpag tu
med pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par gyur to// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ ba com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pas/ 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin no// 'jam dpal ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go chan bsam gyis ma khyab ste/ nyan thos
dang rang sas rgyas rnams kyis kyang bde bar shes par mi nus na/ sems can gzhan gyis lta ci smos te/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
xxx
ba'i rdzachen por gyur na/ de ni skyes bu de 'dra bar stobs chen ng/ de 'dra ba'i mthu tshab de lta bu la lus dang ldan pas/ stong gcig gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i dbyug gu thogs te/

sring mo de'i mdun du bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag ma lus kyi bar du rnga chen po dbardungs su zin kyang/ sgra de sring mo de'i rna bar grags par mi 'gyur na/ ting nge 'dzin las bslang ba lta ci smos
te/ den gnas med de/ sring mo de ni de 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzani zhi ba thob bo// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sring ma 'ad ting nge 'dzin 'di nas slong bar su zhig gas nus//
bka' stsal pa 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'am byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ma gtogs par gzhan sring ma'aditing nge 'dzin 'di las slang bar nus pa med do
de nas rigs kyi ba de'i mang brjod m thag tu/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'dzag rten gyi khams de rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i
g.yog byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i rgyuci'i rkyen gyis na/ 'jig rten nas chen pa 'di ga yo bar gyur/
bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel mang du ma thag tu/ nges par stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams g.yo
za bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dag 'gos khyabu de'i ming brjod par gyur pa de'i tsho brjod ma thag tu sa chen po rnam pa drug du g.yo'o// de
'tsho nas 'khor de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa mthong bar skom mo// 'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur yang byang chub sems dpa' de mthong
ba 'dod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su skom par yang shes/ bdag kyang mthong ba dang/ sring mo ting nge 'dzin de las bslang ba'i phyi'i
de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adas can s kyang/ bdag gis byang chub sems dang 'a sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba mthong bar
'gyur ba/ de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu legs par bstan par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag kyang rigs kyi bu de mthong bar 'tshol na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang skyes bu
dam pa de mthong bar 'tshal na/ nas kyang skyes bu dam pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mchi zhing rigs kyi bu de las brtsams nas/ chos zab mo bshad par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems
dong la 'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de mthong bar 'gyur zhing/ mthong nas kyang de'i rjes su slob pa dang/ sring ma de yang ting nge 'dzin de las ldang bar 'gyur ba de 'drab rdzu 'phrul rnam
par 'phrul pa bstanan legasas// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jug sred kyi rgyal pa del/ byang chub sems dpa' 'datu dga' ba'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsal do// bcom ldan 'das
phyogs gang dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gangs rigs kyi bu de da ltar gnas pa lags/ de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na de bzhin gshegs pa de'imtshan ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'og
gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya bzhig yod do// de na de bzhi
gshegs pa seng ge dang/ ngang pa dang/ ba glang gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs 'tsho gzhes shing chos kyang ston to// de na byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
sel ba zhes bya ba de da ltar gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos de'i tshe/ de ltar gdan la bzhugs bzhin du/ zhabs g.yas pa'i mthe bong las/ byang chub

sems dpa' 'askul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gaser gyi kha dog lta bu nga tang ngo// 'od dang tang ma thag tu 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gI klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa brtol nas//
byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'alus la phog ste/ rigs kyi bu de la lan gsum bskor nas su bor ma sAng bar song ngo// de nas byang
chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ ci'i sgyu ci'i rkyen gyis na/ gang gi phyi'i ngo ltar 'od dang ba/ bdag la lan gsum bskor nas/ rtsa bar mi snang bar song snyam du bsams
tshayaM pa las/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po bdag gzigs par bzhed do snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba seng
rgyu ge dang/ ngang pa dang/ ba glang gi phung pa 'i sgra bsgrags pa de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni steng gi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po blta bar 'tshal la// bka' stsal pa/ de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/
rgyu nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dang/ ngang pa dang/ ba glang gi lung po'i sgra bsgrags ba rib g.yog don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po mthong bar 'tshal lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge dang/ ngang pa dang/ ba glang gi phung pa'i sgra
bsgrags pas/ de'i tshe smina mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od byung ngo// 'dabyung ba des steng gi phyogs sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gis bye ma dang mnyam pa brtol nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
kun tu 'od ces bya bar snang bar gyur te/ de nyid du byung ba bzhin du srung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po// byang chub sems dpa' mang pos bskor zhing/ 'dzam bu chu ba'i gser
gyur bzhin ngu chos 'chad de/ 'di ltaste dper na/ 'dom gang tsam na/ skyes bu mig dang ldan pa gcig gag/ skyes bu gcig gis bzhin la rtogs pa de bzhin du 'khor de dag thams cad
kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug srid kyi rgyal pa// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa mthong ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ byang
chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum dang sems gcig bskyed pas/ sangs rgyas kyis zhing de nas ma snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya bar gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sbyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag
dang bcas te lus ma snang bar sang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i nangs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas/ steng gi bar snang la gnas shing/
lus thams cad sun 'byin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas ji lta du'i ltas spyi
stang ga bar snang las lha'i me tog gis char 'bab pa dang/ me tog de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po'i zhabs la 'bab cing/ me tog de dag/
kha las seng go dang/ ngang pa dang/ ba gling gi phung po'i sgra bsgrags pa de bzhin gshegs pa na bcom ldan 'das la skung ba ma mchis sam/ 'o ma rgyal lam bzhengs pa yang ngs//
so bzhinanam/ mthu mnga' 'og/ bde bar reg par gnas sam zhes gsung ngo zhes zer pa'i di 'dra ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ltas mdzad d// de nas 'khor
thams cad ngo mtshar thob par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das gangame tog 'di 'dra ba dag dang sgra 'di 'dra bar yod du ma chib bsgrags par bgyid pa su'i mthu lags shes de skad kyi tshig kyang smras so/
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang me tog 'di dag char 'bab pa dang/ tshe
tog de dag las 'di 'dra ba'i sgra yid du mtshib 'byung ba su'amathu lags/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de'i na byu yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de gang nams/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba den/ steng
gi bar snang la 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga'abum dang 'grogs nas nga'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi bar snang la lus thams cad sun 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
par bzhag go/ gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag mi gda'o// bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i ma thus mi snang//
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te/ bdag kyang lus thams cad sun 'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag go/ bdag gis kyang tang nge 'dzin de la mnyam par
bzhag ste/ skyes bu dam pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bde dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a de dag yongs su btsal bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a
sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ bar snang la lus mi snang bar byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu
gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ lus thams cad sun 'byin pa'i ting nge 'dzamanyes bya ba gcig pu'o// snyam du khyodadi ltar ma lta shig/ deci'iphyir non/
'jam dpal rgyatsho'i 'ching mA chen po na/ chu'i phung po ji tsam yod pa de'i chu'i thigs pa ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi lus thams cad sun 'byin pa'i dang nge 'dzin la nga mnyam
par gzhog par yang byed/ ldang bar yang byed de/ khyod ni de dag gi ming tsam yang ma shes so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di snyam du gyur te/ gal te bdag gis ting nge
'dzan de ma bsgrubs na/ bdag gis sngar sbyangs pa dag don med do snyam mo/// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i ji lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyis se gol/
gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i brtson 'grus brtsams so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa
rigs kyi bu dog ting nge 'dzin gang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu'ang 'grub par ma 'gyur ba de 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas se gol gcig gis bsgrubs/
kyis lcag pa'i bsams pa'i sbyangs pa'i khyadapar la ltos/// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol
to// bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di dag skyes bu dam pa de rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de mthong bar 'tshalan/ bstan par gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam/
par sel ba la bka' stsal pa/ 'khor 'di dag khyod mthong bar 'dod kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag gis lus ston cig// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgras pa thachu
cad rnam par sel bas/ bar snang de las babs te/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang 'grogs te/ lus mi snang
bar byas nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// nga mthong ma/ 'jam dar la gyis smas pa/ ngas ma mthong ngo// de nas de bzhin gsheg
pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu 'di dag dang/ 'khor 'di khyod kyi lus mthong bar 'dod kyis/
'ges kyi bu khyod kyis bdag gi lus ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum de dag dang 'grogs te/
gzugs kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pas bdag gis lus yongs su bstan to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad ma
nga ra sel ba la smras pa// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis srong ma 'di ting nge 'dzan 'di las slong shog/ smras pa 'jam dpal sring mo 'di teng nge 'dzin 'di las slong shig ces de skad smras pa/ ci
0// 'damang bslang bar bya bam/ 'on tegazugs dang tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa bsrung bcu/ 'jam dpal gzugs kyi
rang bzhin ni mnyam par ma gzhogago/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhinan mnyam bar mi gzhog/ snang ba'am byed do// 'jam dpal
tsa sa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni mnyam par yang ma gzhog/ ldang bar m bying na chos de gang zhig bslang bar bya/ 'jam dpal gal te srong ma 'di mnyam par gzhog par 'gyur na/
de'i phyir bslang bar bya na/ 'jam dpal srung 'das na cung zad kyang mnyam par gzhag pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni g.yo zhing byed pa med pa'i phyi'i ro/
ts+tso/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sring ma 'di ting nge 'dzin 'di/
las slongs shig/ gsol ra/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sngo brtol bgyid pa'i rngo mi thog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas khyod kyis dge ba ni bcab par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis srung ma 'di bslang bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni/ sring mo 'di ting nge 'dzin 'alas bslang ba'i mi thog bod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
sa thams cad shes pa dang/ ston pa la mkhas pa lags kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bslang bar gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug byed kyi rgyal pos
ting nge 'dzin gyi sems las ldang byed ces byaba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamag
de na lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhag pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad langs par gyur to// sring mo de yang ting nge 'dzand
las langs par gyur te/ langs nas sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byas te/ steng ga bar snang la 'dug go yang de'i tshe lha'i bu brgyad stong phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur to/
de nas sring mo de steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa des/ me tog u d+ha la dang ku mu dA dang/ dunari kas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gtogo/ de nas 'jam dpal
gzhon nur gyur pas sring ma thatsam sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so// sringam khyong de 'du ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhib thob pa ngo mtshar ro// smras pa/ 'jam dbal doskad ma gsung rnam par rtog pa'i m
spyod cig/ bdag nizhiba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa ma lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub n ma thob pas bskyed pa'o// 'jam dpal gang na thob pa/
@#// yod pa de nan dmags pa lang yod do// 'jam dpal chos thams cad ni zhi ba rab tu zhing nye bar zhi ba ste/ zhi ba nizhi bar tsha bya'o// zhi ba na mnyam par yang ma nges zhog/

ldang bar yang ma byed do// sas pa sring mo de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin mdakyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni ting nge 'dzin brgya chen po thob ste/ khyodan sa'i stan sgra chen po byung bas kyang l ngas par
ma/ ma gyur to// sang/ 'jam dang la ci chos kyi dbyings mnyam par gzhag pa'i m/ ldang ba mchis sam/ smas pa/ sringam da ma lags so// smras pa// 'jam dpal cing
mnyam par ma gzhag pa de bslang bar nus sam/ smras pa// de ma lags so// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag la kha dog dang/ mtshan ma dang/ dbudus dang/ mtshan ma ma
mchis pa thams cad de dag mnyam par gzhog gas/ gang la (kha dog ma mas/ mtshan ma ma mas/ dbyibs ma mchis/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa de dag gang du mnyam par gzhog
ste/ 'jam dpal de dgan rang bzhin gyis dus thams cad du mnyam par gzhog gas/ de dgan slar mnyam par ma gzhog ljang bar ma byed do// de bas na 'jam dpal gson cig/
'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ lha dang mi'i sol snyan dkrol na/ ca yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ma/ ang/ srang ma de bzhin no// 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams ni sil snyan
bad dag 'a sa yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ngo snyam du 'gyur ram/ smas pa srang mo de ma lags so// 'jam dpal de bas na 'di la chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs na 'dal su/
zhig sgra thos par 'gyur/ gangel rnam par shes pa yod pa des thos su zad do// smras pa/ sring mo gang gis sgra thos par gyur pa'i nab khyod la med dam/ de nas sring tsho de cang mi smras
par gyur nas/ sbas pa/ sringamo ci'i phyir cang sna bar gyur/ smras pa ma thos so// smras pa// ci'i phyir smas pa/ rna ba ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang sring mo thatsom sel
ba des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po zhig la ngas te// shing chen po dag g.yo
bar gyur kyang/ rlung ni sus kyang ltar minus la/ de yang rnam par ma rtog de dag kyang rnam par mi rtog ste/ rlung yang bdag gis shing dag bsgul bar bya'o// snyam du de ltar mi sems
so/ shang dag kyang bdag cag na rlung dag gis bsgul to snyam du ma sems so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la srid pa rnam par rtog pa
mas cad sngangs pa/ yang bdag namanyam par gzhag go/ ldang bar bya'osnyam du ma sems so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyi'iro// 'jam
dpal gyis sbas pa/ sring mo bar snang de las babs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dug la shod cig/ sring mo des snas pa/ 'jamadapal bdag gi yul du
mchis kyis/ bdag la gzhan gyi spyod yul na mi'atshal lo// smras pa sring mo khyed kyis bdag ga spyod yul gang yin/ smras pa 'jam dpal nam mkha'i dbyings ni sems can thams cad kyi spyod
mul lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad ni nam mkha' sa 'gro zhing 'ong ste/ sems can gyi spyod pa de ji tsam pa de thams cad ni nam mkha' la spyod do// de bas na nam mkha'an sogs
( can thams cad kyi spyod yul te/ 'di lta ste/ nam ma kha'i phyag rgyan/ sa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ de nas sring mo de steng gi bar snang las babs nas/ phyogs gcig tu pad+hel
'dug g/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag kyang mi'atshal/ tshig kyang mi lo/ de nas 'jam dar la gzhon nu gyur pas srung ma de la 'di skad ces smras so// sA
mo gang khyod/de bzhin gshegs pal phyag nA 'tshal khar 'dug ste gus pa ma yin no// snas pa 'jam dpal de bzhin te/ 'jam dbal bdag ni gus pa ma lags so// ci'i phying zhin/ deltar
nas kyang byed pa yang med/ mkhyed pa yang med pa de ltar bdag ma gus med kyi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la phyag bgyi bar nus sam/ sas ba de malags s// smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs
nga la'ang phyag 'tshal bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang de bzhin nyid de na gnyis su med de/ gnyis lta bur dbye ba med pa'i phyi'i// yang sbas pa/ 'am/
dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ smas pa mthong ng/ saa pa ji ltar mthong/ sbas pa/ ci rdul tsam yang ma mthong ba de ltar mthong ste/ de'abar mthong ngo// sas pa/
de ltar mthong na ci zhig mthong/ smras pa// de ltar mthong na cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo// smras pa// 'jam dpal gang khyod cung zad kyang ma mthong na/ ci khyodoma'i chul lam/ sa pa/ bdag
ni mig chul ba yang ma yin no// mig lnga dang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mig med pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo mige nam skyes pa yang dag par ma skyes pa sgyu ma lta bu sku sa thams/
cad dngos po med pa'i phyir/ de ni dngos pa 'am dngos pa med pa gang gis kyang bshad par ma bya'o// sa pa 'jam dpal ci chos thams cad dngos pa med pa 'am/ snas da das pa yod pa yang
ma yin/ dngos pa med pa yang ma yin no// sas pa 'jam dpal de bzhin du ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ sring mo de la 'di skad smras so//
ci'i phyir na srongam khyod bud med kyi lus las bsgyur bar ma byed/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de skadam sma/ rnam par ma rtog cig/ khyod kyis chos gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med du gyur pa de mthong ngam/
gsas pa de ma yin no// smras pa 'jam dpal risnyam dusems/ gzugs skyes pa 'am bud med yin nam/ lcas pa/ ma yin no// tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du
byed dang/ rnam par shes pa skyes pa 'am bud med yin nam/ sa pa/ ma yin no// 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ mig skyes pa 'am bud med yin na// smras pa ma yin no// rna ba
'a[ ]dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid skyes pa 'am/ bud med yin nam/ sas pa ma yin no// 'jam dar la de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams skyes pa 'am/ bud med yin nam/ snyas pa/
(ma yin no// chu'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ nam mkha'i khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams skyes pa 'am bud med yin nam/ snus pa/ ma yin no/
'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ yi ge gang dag gis bshad pa'i yag dag tu skyes pa 'am bud med du dmaMgs sam/ snas nga/ de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpala'o nad/ 'jam
dpal ji ltar na sring la khyed ci'i phyi'i bud med kyi lus las bsgyur bar med ces ces de skad sgra/ 'jam dang la gal te bdag bdamed du dumakha gas sam/ skyes par mthong na ni bud med kyi lus de
bod kyi skyes ba'i lus na/'jid la bdag ni bud med du'ang ma dmigs skyes par yang ma mthong na/ de dzaltar bud med kyi lus la sa bsgyur bar bgyi/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur/
'jigs par yang ma 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyang 'byung bar ma 'gyur/ 'jig par yang ma 'gyur na/ daji ltar/
na chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa la/ bud med kyi lus dor zhing skyes pa'i lus blang bar nus par 'gyur/ de ci'i phyogazhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni blang ba 'ag/ ma blang ba'i phyir
chos 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ yang 'jam dpal nag na skyes pa ma yin/ bud med ma yin/ de bzhin du rnab dang/ sna dang lce dang lus dang/ yid skyes pa ma yin/ bud medam yin no zhes de/
bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/ chos gang skyes pa ma yin/ bud med ma yin pa de ni 'byung ba yang med/ 'jig pa yang med do// smras pa/ sring mo khyod kyis/ ji srid nas bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ smras pa/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus ji sridi nas rnam par shes pa'o// smras pa sgyu ma'i skyes bu yod ngam/ slas pa// dri ma yin no/ Das pa/ 'o
na ci'i phyir khyo da ci bzod pa skyes sam/ smras pa/ de ma yin no// smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir na 'chad bar byed M/ sbos pa/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus ji sring nas/ byang chub tu sems

bskyed pa de srid nas bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro// yang ji srid nas khyed kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed ces de skad smras
'a/ pa'i'adri ba na tshul bzhin ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma skye ba ni bskyed par ma nus/ dgag par ma nus/ gdags par ma nus/ gang dgag tu med pa'i chos de ni skyed/
kyi ba 'am dgag par mnus sa// sas pa/ tshul bzhan du 'dri ba ni gang/ tshul de ni gang/ sbas pa/ ma skye ba nil te de 'drab r 'di 'dri ba ni tshul bzhin du 'dra ba'o// yang sring ma
khyod bzod pa skyes sam zhes de skad smra ba/ bdag ni bzod pa skyes pa yang ma lags/ bzod pa ma skyes pa yang ma lags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa ni mi dmigs pa'i phyir bskyed par sang
ma 'a gas/ 'dri ba yang ma lags so// de bas na bdag bzod pa skyes pa yang ma lags/ bzod pa ma skyes pa yang ma lags so// sring mo byang chub sems dpas don gang gi dbang mthong na/
rgyu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub la 'jug/ snyas pa/ 'jam dpal sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyir phyir go cha bgo bar byed de// da
ci'i phyi'i zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thog ma nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro// 'das pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan
@#las ma bzlas/ ma byon pa rnams kyang yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar ma 'gyur/ da ltar bzhugs pa rnams yongs su mya ngana' sa zlo bar ma mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa'i
phyir ro// sa pa/ sringam ci'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal ma byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ smras pa/ 'di la cung zad
kyang byar med do/ smras pa// sring mo tsa'i phyi'i nang ba tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong ga dngos por 'gyur/ sbas pa mtshams med pa lta yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro//
snyas pa srung ma de su zhaseg yid ches par gyur/ sus pa gang dag ye shes ma skyes pa ma 'jig pa'o// smras pa/ de la su zhig mas par 'gyur/ sbas pa gang ma mas pa'o// sring ma
mas pa la yon tan ci zhig yod/ sa pa/ 'jam dpal mas pa la ni rnam par grol ba'i yon tan mchis sa// snyas pa/ sring mo khyod thogs pa med de 'i yon tan dang ldan pa ngo mtshar to//
snyas pa// 'jam dpal dmigs pa la ma spyod cig/ 'jam dpal gang du'ang chags pa yod dam cin/ de'i phyir bdag la khyod na ma thogs pa'i spobs pa dang ldan no zhes s+sa/ sas pa/
de ma 5 na no// de bas na bdag ni thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa ma yin no// smras pa/ sring mo gang slebs pa zhes bya ba datsal bas pa zhes bya/ snyas pa// gang bdag
gis rtogs pa de dag la ni spobs pa yod do// sas pa// gang du rtogs smras pa gang du yang me rtogs pas/ de'i phyir rtogs pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dang/ de bzhin nyid dang/ yang dag
pa'i mtha' ma rtogs pas/ de phyir rtogs pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpa la yang dag gis ma rtogs pa/ bdag gis rtogs pa'o// smas pa/ gang du martogs//
snas pa/ khams gsum du ma rtogs pa ste/ gang dag gis khams gsum du ma rtogs pa de ni khong du ma chud pas rtogasas// sas pa/ sring ma khyodakyis jisridanas byang chub mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ smras pa/ gang ga tshon de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal po byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar de'i tshon/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon
par rdzo gas pa ra 'tshang rgyabar 'gyur med kyi/ 'jam dpal byang chub la mngon par 'tshang rgya ba lam/ thob par nus sam/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa cang mi smra bar gyur pa dang/
srang ma des 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dang la cang mi smra bar bya ba dus la ma bab kyis shodatsagi/ 'jam dang la gyis smyos pa/ sring ma byang chub ni bshad du med na/ de'i phyi'i tsa bshad ma
'tshal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzug sred kyi rgyal pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das sring mo 'di na ye shes bsam gyi
kyi ma khyab pa dang ldan zhing/ 'di 'dra ba'i bstan pa ston par bgyid/ brgyad pa ngo mtshar na/ bcom ldan 'das srung ma 'dis yunang srid nas/ bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

sems bskyed// de nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab 'gyur/'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bur 'gyur/ 'di'i ming ji'i 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa// sring mo 'dis byang chub kyi pur sbyangs
bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa dang/ de'i 'og tu khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskye dngo// 'jam dpal gyis gsal pa/ sAng ma 'daseng
gadrung du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci lags/ bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ 'dis

da bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung ba'i drung du byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par gyur pa de dag bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyedadu bshad kyang/ cha tsam
ya nga bshad par ma 'gyur te/ sring mo 'dis ni der byang chub tu sems bskyed do// gsol pa/ cibud med du gyur pa lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ de nam yin te/ 'di ni de'i tshe de'i dusan/

'khor lo'i sgyur ba'i rgyal po sgra dang bral ba zhes bya bar gyur te/ 'jam dang la sring mo 'di la na bud med ces kyang mi bya/ skyes pa zhes kyang mi bya'o// sring mo 'di nasgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa
ste de ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar bdag gis lus sprul par byed do// 'jam dpal srong ma 'don stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rdul dang yal ga dang 'dab ma ji snyed yod pa de snyed
kyi bskal pa grangs med pa brgya phrag stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ kun tu snang ba sbyin pa zhes bya
ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyis tshogs chen pas brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog
'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji'adra bar gyur ba 'di yang de bzhin te/ lcag pa medachad pa med do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pa la/ byang chub sems
dang 'a sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni bgyi ba mang ba brgyad pa mang ste/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i chos
rnams la yang rnam par rtogs dang ra bgyid do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no// de ltar bdag ni byed pa mang ba ste/ de dag
sa kyi dbyangs ma zad pa'i phyir bde ba zad par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal/
to/ 'jam dpal khyed byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang ma rtsod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni sdobs pa dang 'dri ba bsam rgyas m khyab pa dang ldan
yan te/ byang chub sems dar 'a sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pa mnyam par gzhag pa gang la mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldang bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ mnyam par gzhog pa de dag/
gi ming tsam yang khyod kyis mi shes so// de nas 'khor da na/ byang chub sems dpa' las thog ma pa dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems sems kyis mkhyen nas//
byang chub sems dpa' sems shin tu dul ba zhes bya ba la bkakha stsal pa/ rigs kyi ba stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'jam

dpal 'dra bar gyur du zin kyang/ sring mo 'di'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang rnam par 'phrul ba dang cho'aphrul dang yi shes kyi brgya phrag stong gi char yang mi phod do// ting nge 'dzin gang dag la sring mo 'di
mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldang bar byed pa'i mang yang 'jam dpal gyis mi shes so// jigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag
thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi mthu dang ye shes dang mnyam par gzhag pas the tsom sel ba dang/ 'dra bar gyur du zin kyang de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
(khru la ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang stongs dang/ rnam par 'phrul ba'i la rgya khrag stong gi char yang mibod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa thams cad rnam bar/
sel ba gang la mnyam par gzhag cing/ ldang bar byed pa'i nge 'dzan de dag gi ming tsam yang sringam 'das ma shes so// rigs kyi bu gal te sems can thams cad teng nge 'dzan dang ye shes/
dang Da mnyam bar gzhog pas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang 'dra bar gyur te/ ye shes de dang ldan du zin kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gom pa 'dor ba yang ma shes te/ rmos
par 'gyur zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs goms pa ci ltar 'dor/ ci ltar 'jogo nadishes bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas kyi yi shes ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sas
rgyas kyi yi shes bsam gyis ma khyab pa bstan pa 'di ston pa ba tsho/ srog chags brgya staphrag bdun cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bdag cag kyang ye shes
dedang ldan par gyur cig ces de skad ces tsag kyang sbas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems shani tu dul ba la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu sring mo 'di
ni'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa// byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji lta ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpal yar phyogs na gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyed yod/
pa de bzhin du lha phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ phyogs bcu na yod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bdagi/ spang ma 'dabyang
chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ sring mo 'di ji lte ba de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma snyed/ rigs kyi bu las nir phyogs su byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go/
phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du yang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu nga nyid da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing/ de bzhinagshegs pa chos kyi bgo
la bskor bar mthong ngam/ rabs kyi bu nga yang 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs ri rab rgyal mtshan gyi gsung rab las/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel pas/
byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ nga ji lta ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed phyogs bcu'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug ste/ de dag da ltar bzhugs sa 'tsho
bzhes go/ pag tu med pa dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das sa/ tshig de gsung ma thag tu// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i'ajig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu
g.yos so// sa rnam grangs 'di bshad pa tshe/ kun tu 'od kyi 'jig rten gyi khams der byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i yang sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams kyi rnaba'i dbang pa la chos kyi rnam gras grags par gyur to// byang chub nas
dpa' byams pas kyang m lhag ma chad par kun bazung ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ srog chags bye ba drug cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa 'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bdun cus ni ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// dge slong stong phrag bcu bzhis ni zagar las lhagam lus par
sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga stong dang/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu sems can khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dris dang bral ba rnam par dag go/
de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ ma pham pa khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad long shig/ gzhan la yang
rgyatshor shod cig/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blangs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal kha/ ma pham kha janas kyang chos rnam grangs
'di phyi ma'i dus ma'i tshe/ spyod par 'gyur bar khyed la gtad do// ma pham pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa 'tsho ba bzhes pa ji snyed pa dang/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na spyad pa spyod pa dang/ spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ yongs su rtag par bzungan sems
can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rje zags par sangs rgyas shing stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las
'das pa de dag kyang yongs su rtag par bzung nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang bcas te/ slar bzhugs par gyural/ de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mang po' ma'i mthar thug gi bar du bde
ba'i yodad thams cad kyis/ bkur sti byas/ rim gror byas/ bsti stang byas/ mchod pa byas shing/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang/ yun des d du mchod pa byas na byang chub sem
dpa' bsod nam mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/ mi pham pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dpe 'di thos nas/ sems kyang rmongs par 'gyur te/ de ltar bsod nams kyi phung po/
dpag tu mams par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ma pham pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di len par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gzhan
la rgya chen ston par byed cing/ chung dun thos nas mos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nade bas kyang shin cu bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur// ma pham pa nga da mya ngan las 'das nas
klu go nga bud med la la zhig gis sring me thatshom sel ba de 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba da 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jug sred kyi rgyal

bo da' mtshan thos gam/ chung ngu na chos kyi rnam grangs 'dithos nas/ de nyid de'i lus tha mar gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
tsha'adas nas kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur// ma khom pa brgyad kyang yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// tshor bas kyang dran par 'gyur ro// gzungasakyang thob par 'gyur go/
skyes bu chen po'imtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang thob ba'agyur ro// gzhan du yang mngal du ma gnas par 'gyur ro// datsa'i phyir zhen/ skyes bu dam pa de dag ni bud med gang dag bdag cag gis
mare thos pa de yon tan 'di dag dang ldan par gyur cig ces smanalam 'dangs ba'i phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing da skad bka' stsalapa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa
pham pa dang/ rtswa dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dra thar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o// sangs rgyas 'gro ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen
po'imadordzogs so// ka'o tsa ba bats+tsedapal dbyangs dang/ daral rtsegs kyis bsgyuratsanganus/ ] @#// rgya gar skadadu/ Ats+tsha
bros+sa bcu karaNananAm ma hAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya bathag pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag/
'tshal lo// 'di skad bdagagis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun mang
pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga drosham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas/ mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshegs/

so// yang deb tshomanyan yod kyi grong khyer gyi phyi la na/ byas pa phal po che dag sa rdulagyi khyim dang/ sa rdul ra ba dang/ sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsi gas pa dag gas rtse zhing 'khod pa las byas pa
phal ba tshe dag gis thag ring po zhage nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang lhag par dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba dang/ yid bde ba skyes te rtsa dga' zhing
khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das khye'u de dag la thugs rtse ba'aphyi'i/ gang na khye'u dedag rtse zhing 'khod pa'i sa phyogs der gshegs so// de nas byis pa de
dag gi nang nas khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig/ dam ldan 'das kyi zhabs laphyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen
[@]/ khazhin du byas pa de dag la'adaskad ces bka' stsal to// byis pa khyed 'dan ci byed/ daskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la khye'u de dag gis 'di skad cag/
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'don sa rdul gyi khyim dag dang/ sa rdul gyi re ba dag dang/ sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag gis rtse zhingam chis lags so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das la khye'u tshangs pa'i dar la rgyas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'di bzhes su gsal/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ dga' pa'i sems thugs su chud nas thugs brtse ba'i phyi'i sa rdul gyi khang pa brtse gas pa de bzhes so/
de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de/ yud tsam de la sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa de rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs ba zhig tu gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

snga na 'dug par gyur te/ de'i shar phyogs kyi ngos su na gser gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ lho phyogs kyi ngos su ni dngul gyi ka ba brgyad khri ba stong zug par gyur/ nub phyogs kyi ngos su

ni bzhurlu'i ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/ byang phyogasakyi ngos su nishel gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur to/ de nas de'i tshe khyer tshangs pa'i dpal gyis rdzu 'phrul cho
'phrul de mthong nas/ lhag par yang ches dga' ba dang/ mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po sa da gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis tshig
su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// kye mA'ajig rtenamagon po yis// rdzu 'phrul shin tu rgya chen bstan// bdag nyid la ni thugs brtse'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyis na rdzu 'phrul bstan/ drang srong che la bdag
gis ni// sa rdul khang brtsegs phul ba de// rin po che las grub par gyur// kye ma sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// kye kye zhing na 'od 'drab// sangs rgyas zhing ni bla med pa// chog med mig ni
nyams pa dang/ shes rab chung dus mi shes so// rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i zhing// 'di na bdag gis rnyed pa dang// dal ba rab dkon thob pas na// byang chub tun smon lam gdab/ bdag
kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis ni/ yon tan rjes su slob par 'tshal// bla med byang chub thob nas ni// rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra ba dag gis bgyis// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis
'dzum pa mdzad nas/ bam ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ sngon pa dang/ der po dang/ dmar pa dang/ dkar po dang/ btsod ka dang/ shel gyi
dog dang/ dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo// de dag byung nas tshangs rab 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das lanagasum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bosatshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ rgyala mchog 'dren pa 'gro ba'i
gtsobo rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa ma mdzad na// thugs rjeldan pa 'jig rten sman slad du// deng 'di'i ci phyir 'dzum mdzad bdag la gsungs// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis nga tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis khye'u tshangs pa 'dapal 'dimasgreng ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/
sgyu bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'didang/ sems kyis ston pa 'das na/ bskal pa sum stong nyis brgya'i bar du nams kyang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi
'gyur ro// des byang chub bsgrubs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshatshags su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ sangs rgyas la ni dad pa yi// bsod nams chung du skyem 'gyur// chos mchog thos dang dge 'dun la//

gus par byas pa'i ng de bzhin no// sangs rgyas la ni ded pa la// byang chub thob par dka' ba med// de phyir byang chub 'dod pas 'dir// 'jig rten 'dren rnams mchod par bya// kun dag 'a khye'u 'ding gnyis
kyi mchog ste dpal dang ldan pa/ mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ga/ 'jig rten gyi ni 'dren par 'gyur// de ltar sangs rgyas pas ma mkhyab// sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin te// bsam mi
khub la dad pa ya/ rnam par smin pa'i ng de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ khye'u tshangs pa'i dpa la bam ldan 'das kyis gsungs
pa la mda'angs te/ mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i tshad rdzogs so// (rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+hA sang ha dang/
