latsa la brtse dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po brtsi ka ra sing ha dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba bse de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa// ga(@#//
rgyagar skad/ Ar+yahIm ta ba h+phaNipa 'i khrid tshanAm ma hAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan ms zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal go/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das wa ra Na si drang srong lhung ba ri rtegs kyi nags na/ dge slong bdun brgya tsam gyi rig slong
ga dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dara' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dag dang thabs gtsamig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ chos gos dang
sham thabs bsnubs te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshodang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang thabs gcig tu/
grong khyer wA ra Nasar bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer wa ra NAsa'i mthar chags su bsod snyoms stod cing/ bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i
rgyu khyim ga la ba der gshegs te/ byon nas/ bsod snyoms kyi phyi'i phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang/ bram zemo dpal ldan mas/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dad bar bya ba/ dbang po zhi ba/
thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas kyi pha rol tu byon pa zhi gnas mchog gi pha rol tu byon pa/ zhi ba dul ba bsrungs pa/ sdig pa med pa// dbang po dul ba/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog
dang ldan pa/ mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la reg pa med pa/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/ mi bskyod pa// mi g.yo ba/ brnyes pa/ dpal gyis 'bar ba/ lcam me/ lhan
ni lhang nge zhing gshegs pa rgyang ring po nyid nas mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang de sems dang bar gyur te/ de sems dang bas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btudade/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs par byon no// bcom ldan 'das legs par byon no// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa 'di la bzhugs su gsol zhes cha sol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dar 'a chen po ma pham pa so sa tsa rigs par bzhugs so// de nas bram ze ma dpal ldan mas/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa bde bar bzhugs par 'ag nas/ bam ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das grong khyer wa ra Na si drang srong lhang ngar dgas kyi nags 'di'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to// zhes bdag gis thos na bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bskor ba'i chos de ji lta bu
zhigalags/ de ska daces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan m la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal ldan ma ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis
rnam par shes pa// rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ mang dang gzugs kyis rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi skyen gyis reg pa// reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i
rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis sdod ra/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis gsha dang/ mya ngan dang/ sbe sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang
yid ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shag po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa 'gags pas 'dubyed 'gag/ 'du
tshes byed 'gags pas/ rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gags pas/ ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas/ skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags
pas/ reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas/ tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas/ srid pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas/ len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/
srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga sha dang/ mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal
gyi phung po 'ba' shag pa 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba dpal ldan ma/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'i m/ sus kyang chos dang mthun par 'jig rten du ma
bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'di grong khyer wa ra Nas drang srong lhung ba ri dgas kyi nags su de bzhin gshegs pas bskor ro// de skad ces bka' sul pa dang/ bram ze mo dpal ldan
mas bam ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ma rig pa nang na mchis sam/ slad rol na mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ dpal ldan ma de ni ma yin
no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ ma rig pa nang dang slad rol na ma mchis pa lags na/ ma mchis pa de ji ltar 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen du 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang yang
'jig rten pha rol nas 'chi'am/ bka' stsal pa// dpal ldan m de nam yin no// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa'i rnam pa mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
dpal ldan ma de ni med de/ dpal ldan ma ma rig pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par 'byung gi/ yang dag pa'i rnam par ni mi 'byung ngo// dpal ldan ma ma rig pa ni phyin calag ga rnam par
'byung gi/ phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam par ni mi 'byung ngo// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa ma ma chis na 'du byed rnams ci las 'byung/ sdug bsngal yang ci 'aa 'byung/ bcom
ldan 'das 'di lta ste dpe ran/ zhugs shing n+ya gro da'i rtsa ba ma mchis na/ de'i yal ga dang lo ma dang/ yal ga phre'u ngaltar mngon par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ma rig pa ma byung
zhing achis pa ma lags na/ ma rig da 'du byed rnams kyi rkyen lags par ji ltar 'tshal bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin te dpal ldan ma rang gi mtshan nyid stong
pa nyid kyis chos thams cad stong na/ byis pa so so'i skye khos ra dang ma ldan pa ma shes pa ma rtogs pa/ dag las mngon par 'du byed de/ las rnams yod pas srid pa mngon par 'grub pa'i
byed do// srid pa yod pas sdug bsngal myong bar zad de/ 'di la las mngon par 'du byed pa yang su yang med cing/ srid pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa na nga med de/
da'atshos rnams kyi don dam pa'o// dpal ldan ma 'on kyang sems can rnams ji ltar don dam pa rtogs par 'gyur snyam nas/ tha snyad nye bar bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams sems can rnams la chos ston to// dpal ldan ma ba snyad ni yang dag pa ma yin te/ ci'i phyibazhin/ de la khong du chud par byed pa po yang med/ de la shes par byed pa
rgyu yang med pa'i phyir ro// dpal ldan m 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa sprul la/ de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa des kyang sprul pa gzhan sprul na/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas sprul

pa gang gsog ste/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// sprul pa sprul pa gang yin pa de yang gasog ste/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// dpal ldan m de bzhin du gong gas chos mngon par 'du bya ba mngon pa/
'dus byas pa de yang gsog ste/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// chos gang mngon par 'du bya ba de yang gsog ste/ brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can no// gsol pa 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa
nyid kyi 'khor lo dang/ nges par 'byin pa'i 'khor lo dang/ nges par 'byed pa'i 'khor lo dang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang/ bskor ba ma lags ba'i 'khor lo dang mtshungs pa ma mchis/
0 pa'i 'khor lo dang/ ji lta ba bzhin gyis 'khor lo dang/ skye ba ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang/ dngos bo ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo dang/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo 'di bskor ba na/ nam
ma kha'i 'khor lo 'di bskor la gas so// de nas bram ze mo dpal ldan ms tsan dan gyi phye ma sar gang blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi i zhabs la gtor nas tshesi 'di skad ces bcom

ldan 'das dag pa'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dusan/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi 'kher le nas mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i 'khor lo'i bar du chos kyis 'khor la de lta bu bskor bar gyur cig ces smras
so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'atsho'adzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang ga tsho'adzum pa mdzad pa de'i tsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta sta sngon po dang/ ser po dang/ dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ le brgan dang/ shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/ de dag/
gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas te/ tshangs pa'i 'jigarten gyi khar 'phags nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma ma pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshag
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni sgyu ma mchis rkyenam mchis par 'dzum par mi mdzad na/ 'dzum ra mdzad pa'i smyug nga lags/ rkyen gang lags//
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ma pham pa khyed kyis bram ze mo dpal ldan ma 'dis tsan dan gyi
phyem spar gang blangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtor ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis/

( ra bka' stsal pa// ma pham ba bram ze mo dpal ldan ma 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas drug khri bzhi stong la bsti stang
byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ de dag las ches kyang nyan par 'gyur/thos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par
'gyuro// de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa'i m/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la yang mchod pa chen po byed par 'gyur/ sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag kyang byang chub la 'god

par gyur ro// de phyi ma'i phyi ma'i dus na bdag snang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

(pa'i sangs rgyas chos snang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'atsho'i tshad ni skal pa stong tshang bar 'gyur// de sems can grangs med dang bag tu med pa dag 'donabyas nas/ phung po lhag
ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs sumya ngan las 'das pa 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma lam pas
'di skad ces gsol to// bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i sdon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan yang mchis lags sam/ bka' stsal pa/ mapham pa yod de/ bram ze mo dpal ldan ma bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod 'dod pas/ sngon bud med kyi lus nyid la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi sku la me tog gi 'phreng ba gsol to// de bzhin bshegs pa gtsug tor

can gyi sku la yang chos gos gsol to// de'i gsung rab la rab tu byung nas lo stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do// bcom ldan 'das de la zab mo 'i gnas rnams kyang zhus so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad skyob nyanathos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang zhal zas kyis tshim par byas so// bstabs pa yang byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig la yang a ti nug ta ka'i mi tog dag
gas gtor nas// bcom ldan 'das de las bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag blangs so// de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub la yang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang/ bshes dang/ gzims cha
dang snyun gyi gsos smanadang/ yo byad rnams kyis mgron du gnyer te/ bcom ldan 'das des zla ba gnyis bshos gsol to/ chams zung zhig kyang rul lo// bla na med pa

[% ]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung la gser gyi phreng bas gtor te/ 'di skad ces bdag klan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i m

'tsha gyur gyi bar du bud med kyi dngos pa las ma gyur cig ces smras te/ ma pham pa 'di yang bram ze mo dpal ldan ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
byang chub sems dar 'a sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa dang/ bram ze mo dpal ldan m dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lham yan dang/ dri zar bcas pa 'jig rten ya langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bram ze mo dpal ldan mas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ni mi tra dang/ zhum
gyi lo tsa ba brtse ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#// rgya gar skad du/ dIts+tshan kha pa 'bu dzaka pa ra prad tshanAm su tra/ bod skadadu/
kun du rgyu ba sen rings kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan
'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ril/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi dag/
la chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang bo// tshig 'bru ba po// ma 'dres pa// yongs su rdzogs pa// yongs su dag pa///
yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// de'i tshe kun tu rgyusenarangs/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ 'khar ba la o
tshugs bcas te/ cang mi smra bar 'dug nas/ bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye go'u ta ma'ajig rten ni la sa bdag ga'i bya bar/ las kyi bsgo skal spyod pa// las kyi 'chi
ba can/ las brtan par bya'o zhes de skad sa pa ni bdenan/ dge sbyong go'u ta mas stan las ci zhig byas shing bsagasan/ nges dge sbyong go'u ta ma rdo rje'i lus dang ldan par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma ze chen po 'don nges tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar srog gcod pa spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge

sbyong go'u ta ma sor mo rang zhing sor mo'i bar dra bas 'brel par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni satshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar m byin par len pa spangs pa'i las de'i
da/ 'brus bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas/ sngon las ci zhig byas shang bsagasan/ des dge sbyong go'u ta mas dbang po yongs su tshang shing lus rab tu rgyas par gyur//
btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs sngama'i skye bar 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ni
tsha zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma rtse gdong gis dkyil 'khor thams cad khebs/ bcom ldan 'dasakyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshorabs snga ma'i skye bar
brdzun du smra ba spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dag sbyang go'u ta mas sngon las cu zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma seng ge 'i stabs su 'gro bar gyur/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po'adon nges tshe rabs snga ma'i skye par 'bru'i chang dang/ sbyar ba'i chang myos pa bgamod pa'i gnas sngangs pa'i las de'a'abras bu yin no// dge
sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las cazhig byas shang bsagasan/ des dge spyang go'u ta ma so bzhi bcu dang ldan zhing so mnyam la so dkar bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram
za chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta
mas tshul khrims kyi spos kyis lus byugs par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' skul pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshor bas sngama'i skye bar phreng ba dang/ skyes dang/ byugs ba dang
kha dog 'chang ba dang/ sngas pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsagasan/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma lus mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar glu dang gar dang/ rgyan rnams sngangs pas las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyang go'u ta mas sngon las
ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u tam stan gsum la yongs su spyod/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'di ni ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar khri stan mthon po dang
khri stan chen pa sangs pa'i las de'i 'bras bu yin no// dge sbyong go'u ta mas sngon las ci zhig byas shing bsags na/ des dge sbyong go'u ta ma mgo'i gtsug ter 'phags par gyur/ bcom ldan 'dra
kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po 'din ngas tshe rabs snga ma'i skye bar/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ pha ma dang/ slob dpon dang/ mkhan po dang/ bla ma dang/ sbyin gan
rnams la yan lag lnga sa gtugs te mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// mchod pa'i sa de'i 'bras bu yin no// kun du rgyu sen rings kyis 'khar ba sa la bor nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo/
@#// bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ji srid 'tsho/
bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o// ji srid 'tsho'i bar du chos la skyabs su mchi'o// jisrid 'tsho'i bar du dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// ji srid mtsho'i bar du yan lag brgyad pa 'a bsnyen gnas

la nye bar gnas par bgyi'o// srog chags thams cad gsod dang gzhan nor rku dang ma tshangs spyod pa dang/ ngagag dbye ba brdzun dang skyes skyed dus mni za ba dang/ phreng ba kha dog glu dang gar dang rtse 'jo
mal stan mthon pa rnams dang nas bdag gis sbas te yon tan brgyad kyis dgra bcom tshul du bgyi/ de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum du'o// bdag gis gso sbyong gi tshul khrims gyi sdom pa yapa/
dag par 'dzani pa bad sems kyi rgyan dang/ sems kyi yo byad dang/ byang chub kyi tshogs su 'gyur ba dang/ don gyi dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba byin med pa
la gnas par gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po khyod de ltar byed pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag slong de dag dang/
lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri war bcas pa'i 'jig rtan yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// kun tu rgyu sen rings kyis zhus pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
bka' dang por gtogs so/// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya u ba bA lu ko pa ma nA ma ma hAyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa gser gyi phye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal la/ 'daskadabadag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan

'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' stong phragand de dag
dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa' sangs rgyas rnams
dpag tu ma mchis pa la gsasam/ bcom ldan 'das cade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu mams pa dang ldan logasasam/ de skad ces
gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams ni dpag tu medad// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag ra rardzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams na/ yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan/
no/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lan gnyis su bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
sa rnams dpag tu ma mchis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das cadi bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan
lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lanaganyis lan gsum du tshe dang ldan pa ku dga' bo la 'daskad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni dpag tu med de// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzo gab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams na yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no// kund pa/
bo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dpag tu med pa mnyan pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul shes pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan shes par 'dod dam/ de
skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bsa'adi skad ces gsol to// dge slong byaTams la bcom ldan 'dasakyis bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa
bstan du gsol/ dge slong rnams kyis mngon sum du thos na/ yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshodang ldan pa kun
dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pa rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu s phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu 'gro ba shes sam/ kun dam 'a
sa gsol pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu s phyogs dang phyogasa mtshams dag tu mchi ba btsam ldan 'adas kyis bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod la don 'di dpes bstan par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ kun dga' bo skyes bu mkhas pa gang dag dpes don rtogs par 'gyur ba yod
pa'itso// kun dga' bo dper na/ rdzing dpag tshad brgyad stong ba chus gang ba/ bya khrus btung du rung bar tshudang kha da bcad du 'dug pa/ rada' la mas khebs pa zhig yodal/ de nas mi
la la zhig gis/ rlung gi shugs las 'das pa'i rta mchog dag dang ldan pa'i lcags kyi shing rta la bzhon te/ de yang mu khyud kyi shing yang chu la mi reg/ to rnams kyi rmog pa yang chu la ma rig/
pada' la ma rnams kyang rta'i rmog pa dag gis ma pa rtol ba tsam gyi stobs dang shugs dang/ mgyogs pa de lta bu s rgyugs la/ kun dga' bo de nas rdzing de'i nang nas sbrul gdug pa zhig byung nas/
shing rta de tsho'i nang nas phyir ma log pa de'i bar skabs su/ shing rtade lan brgyad bskor na/ kun dga' bo sbrul gdug pas shing rta lan cig bskor ba'i yunaji tsam pa de'i/
bar skabs su/ kun dga' bo khyed tshos bstan pa rnam pa brgyad ston cing/ don kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo khyod tshig gcig sa ba'i yun tsam pa de'i bar skabs su mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos

tshe bstan pa rnam pa brgyad sten cing/ don kyang go bar byed do// kun dga' bo mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po tshegi gcig skya pa'i yun ji tsam ba de'i bar skabs su gnas brtan shA ri'i bu/ chos bstan pa rnam pa
brgyad ston cing/ don kyang go bar byed do// gnas brtan shar 'o'u/ tshig gcig smra ba'i yun tsam pa de'i bar skabs su/ rang sangs rgyas chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med pa bstan to// yang
sangs rgyas tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bstan pa rnam pa grangs med bsam gyis ma khyab brjod du med pa ston cing/ don kyang go bar
byed do// kun dga' bo bya nge chub sems dpa' tshig gcig skya ba'i yun tsa tsam pa de'i bar skabs su/ kun dga' bo gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'jig rten gyi khamasakhargyad khri 'da'o//
kun dga' bo rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyod pa de lta bu'i 'gros kyis/ nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du ngal ma bsakho ra shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khamasadzanyid du'agro ba dang/ de bzhin du lho phyogs/
dang/ nub phyog dang/ byed phyogs dang/ de bzhin dushar lho'i mtshams dang/ lho nub kyi mtshams dang/ byang shar gyi mtshams dang/ de bzhin du snyed dang/ 'og gi phyogs su'agan
bdun gyi bar du ngal mkhaso bar ga la/ de nas ma'il zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad ra bas bskor te/ ra bas bskor nas rdo dang/ gseg
ma dang/ gyom dang/ gyo dum med par byas te/ mthon dman med par byas nas/ grong khyer gcig tu byas la/ grong khyer gcig tu byas nas kyang yungs 'brus bkang ste/ byur bur byas na/
kun dga' bo grong khyer de'i nang gi yungs 'bru snyed yod pa de dag bas kyang ches mang ba 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sems can byang chub la zhugs pa dag ngas mthong ngo// de bas kyang skyes
mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi de bams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa dag ngas mthong ngo// debs kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dgan/ byang chub
sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'isi dag tu skye ba dag ngas mthong ngo// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ldan gyi lha'i sa dag
na la bod pa dag ngas mthong ngo// debs kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i risi dag na 'chi 'pho ba dag ngas mthong ngo// de
bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma'i mngal du 'jug pa dag ngas mthong ng// deb kyang chos mang ba'i 'jig rtan gyi
khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma 'amangal nas 'byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byas pa'i
a rtsed mo ston pa dag sa thong ngo// de bas kyang ches mang ba'ajig rten gyi khams dgon/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyal srid spangs nas/ rab tu 'byung ba dag ngas mthong ngo// de bas
kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ston pa dag nga mthong ngo// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams ngag na//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi snying par 'gro ba dag ngas mthong ngo// de ngas kyang ches mang ba'a'ajig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byang chub kyi snying po lta ba
pa dag ngas mthong ng// de bas kyang sa mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byang chub kyi snying po gas par byed pa'i mchog dang/ gus pa chen pos lan gsum
bskor ba byed pa dag ngas mthong ngo// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub l snying pal 'dug la dag ngas mthengang/ debs kyang ches mang ba'i
'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub shing drung na 'dug pa dag sa mthong ngo/ debs kyang ches mang ba'ajig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa dag ngas mthong ngo// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshes kyi
'khor lo bskor ba dag ngas mthong ngo// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen pa ston pa dag ngas mthod te/

de dag thams cad kyang mtshan mthun pa dang gdungamathun pa sha stag yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ byang chub sems dpachen po rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang/

byang chub kyi snying pol lta ba dang/ byang chub kyi snying pal skor ba byed pa dang/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa dang/ byang chub kyi shing drung na 'dug pa dang/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
sa kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po stanang/ mtshan tha dad pa dang gdung tha dad pa dag lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun
dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ma 'byung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub sems dar 'i
spyad pa ma spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed gcig mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams sa bstan pa gang dag tu//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa gang yin pa de dag naM/ kun dga' khodaper na/ rgya mtshon po'i khyim dang/

bsaM gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma zhang na/ gser gyi bye ma dkon pa dang 'dra ste/ kun dga' bo de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi ra mas gang dag tu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i

rnams kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni dkon te/ kun dag 'a bo ji ltar rgya mtsho nale'abyi ma dang/ gta'i klung gabye ma de dag las la la zhig gis bye ma 'khru

gcig blangs pa de bzhin du/ gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyung bo/
bcos ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri za' bcas
pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstadod// 'phags pa gser gyi phye ma lta bu zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'i mdo rdzogs so//
gyi mkhan po su ren drago de dang/ pAtsAbar ma dang/ nuchen gyi le tsa ba bcu yashes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzashA pa ri bodi tshanAm ma AyAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dar la gyis dris pa zhes khu batheg pa chen po'i ched// gabam po dang po
sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad l phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i kun nas mdzes pa'i bang
pa na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ dpag tumed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ 'dul ba brgyastong mang po dang/ snganar
gabrigs bang bol sogs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rin po cha'i seng ge 'i bral sku mi g.yo bar bzhugs pa dang/
denas byang chub sems dar nasems dang ba chen po 'jam dpal/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsod nams chen po gang gis/ 'dul ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i
bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung du 'gyur pa'i bsod nams chen po de ji snyed tshad jatsam lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal bsod nams chen po gang gis 'dul ba bye ba khrag
khrig brgya stong gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung du 'gyur ba'i ngeng sad nams chen po da ni/ shes rab las byung ba/ snya'i rjechen pos yongs su bsgos pa
min te/ bsam gyis mi khyab po// 'jam dpal 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ dge ba bcu'as kyi lam dang ldan par gyural/ gang sems can de dag thams cad

kyis pa go danams kyi phung par gyur pa 'i bsod nams kyi lung pa de/ brgya bsgyur ba'i gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che/
bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang/ glang po rin po che dang/ rta ni po che dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ bud med yin pa dang/ khyim bdagoni po che dang/ blon po rin po chadang/ 'di
bdun 'byung ngo// de la bu stong dpa' ba rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa// pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa rnams yod de/ 'jam dpal de ltar 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po de
[z] 'phral che zhing mthu che ba yin no// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor lo sbyar ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la///
gsems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya bsgyurabs/ brgya byin lha'i dbang por 'gyur te/ deltar lha'i dbang po na rdzu 'phrul zhing
mthu che'o// 'jam dpal gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung pa dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams
cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i basod nams kyi phung po de brgya stong du bsgyur bas/ gang 'dod pa'i khams su bstan pas/ go bar byed pa/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po bdud du gyur te/
de ltar 'dod pa khams kyi dbang po bdud ni rdzu 'phrul tshe nang mthu che// 'jam dpal gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyid pa de dag thams cad dud kyi bsod
chas kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsodonams kyi phung bo de brgya stong du bsgyur bas/ ga 'jig rten gyi khams stong byas
ldan par gyural/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi ngasod nams su gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya stong du bsgyur bas/ gang stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi/
khams byams pas khyab stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad stong gnyis kyi bdag po
tshas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la// gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de brgya stong du ba sbyarabs/ gang stong gsum
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab pa/ tshangs pa stengag sum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyibadag po dbang phyug chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal tshangs pa
dbang phyug chen po mchog la ltos/ nam bskal pa 'jig pa na/ bskal pa'i chu 'byung ba de'i tshe/ phyis par gyi bskal pa gcig tu char 'bab cing/ chuthog pa 'byung ba des/ stong gsum gyi stong

chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams chus gang bar byed de/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du chus gang bar 'gyur ba'i chu'i thigs pa de dag thams cad kyang tshangs pa dbang phyug chen po mchog des pa/sa so//

de ltar ye shes chen po dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul che mthu che ba yin te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chung dus na debang phyug chen por ma 'gyur go/ 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khamasan/
sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtan gyi bdag po// tshangs pa chen po 'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can de dgathams cad kyi

bsod nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas mthu chen po thob pa'i rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams ltarengashagazhog ste/ 'jam dang la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha'/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ rang sangs rgyas mthu chen po
thob pa 'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyu dal/ gang sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung pa dbye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ byang chub
sems dpa' srid pa'i tha mar gyur pa gcig tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can sgo nga las skyes pa dang/ mngal las skyes
pa dang/ drod gsher las skyes pa dang/ rdzus te skyes pa dang/ gzugs yod pa dang/ gzugs med pa dang/ 'a du shes yod pa dang/ 'du shes med pa dang/ 'du shes med 'du shes me dam/
gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sridi pa'i tha mar gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung pa dang ldan par gyur la/ gang sems can dadag thams can bsod nams kyi phung por
zhe lta/gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de bye ba khrag khrag brgyaskad du ma 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sbya'i khung bu gcig tu 'gyur ro// der zhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku

la/ sbya'i khung bu brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu re re nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bas danams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de/ byakha/

khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang pos cig tu 'gyur ro// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu re nas 'grub par 'gyur te/

'jam dpal dpa byad bzang po brgyad cur ba rtogs pa'i gang bsod nams kyi phung pa josnyed pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bye ba khrag khri'i brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gam/

zhabs gcig ra mi rje kyi mtshon du 'gyur ro// de ltar ri mo rjes kyi na tshan brgyad cu la/ 'di lta ste/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang/ dpa' be'u dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ skyo ba thang dang/ rtsod pa cha dang/
dbyog to dang/ bum pa dang/ glang po dang/ rtadang/ stag dang/ chu srin dang/ lta dang/ rus sbal dang/ rma bya dang/ kal bti dang/ shang shang te'u dang/ tsa sha dang/ dur pa dang/ natso dang/
ngang pa dang/ pho ba dang/ nas dang/ panachen po dang/ 'od ma dang/ ba men dang/ klu dang/ ra dang/ khyu mag dang/ ri dang/ bal ba dang/ shing dang/ ri degs nabs po dang/ nor bu rin po
[j]che dang/ ral gri mchog dang/ rdo rje dang/ gzhu dang/ mda' dang/ shag ti dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ gshol dang/ gtun dang/ lta gri dang/ zhags pa dang/ gru dang/ mu tig gi phargyan/
dad sman dang/ tshangs pa dang/ dbang po dang/ 'khor ba srungs lo dang/ chu'i lha dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ migam bzang dang/ nor sbyin dang/ drang srong chen pa dang/ dpal dang/

nyi ma dang/ zla ba dang/ me dang/ rlung dang/ pad+ma dang/ g.yung drung dang/ gru gsum dang/ dge ba'i stan dang/ me long dang/ rnga yab dang/ rtswa dur ba dang/ bu ro da sha dang/ khye'u rang/ bu mo dang/
rje dang dung dang/ sr-i tang ga dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ rnachadang/ sor gdub dang/ rnam byang phul can dang/ me tog bzang po dang/ dpag bsam shing dang/ 'khe lo'i dgung gi seng ge /
dang/ 'di rnams ni ri mo'i rjes kyi mtshan brgyad cu yin te/ 'di dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthal la 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal gangamtshan brgyad cu'i rimar gtogs pa'i bsod

nams kyi phung por gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de/ bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig tu 'gyur te/ de bzhin du skyes bu chen
po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis re rer 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ dbu'i gtsug tor dang/ dbu skra mthon mthang la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang/ dpral ba mnyam pa dang/ kha dog gis brgyan pa dang/
sman mtshams kyi mdzod spu dang/ snyan mathon mthang la ba'i rdzi ma 'dra ba dang/ so bzhi bcu thags bzang ba dang/ mche ba dkar ba dang/ 'gram pa sang ge'i 'dra ba dang/

lce che zhing srab pa dang/ ro stod seng ge 'dra ba dang/ shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar muzheng gab pa dang/ lnga khung bu re re nas skye ba dang/ pho mtshan ma snang bar nub pa dang/ brlu gang zhing zlum pa dang/ byin pa

dgas kyi rgyal pa e na ya 'dra ba dang/ zhangs kyi rtong pa che ba dang/ zhabs dang phyag gi mthil 'jam zhing marten nga dang/ zhabs dang phyag gi sor mo 'khor drabs 'brel ba dang/ zhabs dang drug ga ra
mo ring ba dang/ zhabs kyi steng mtho ba dang/ robri ba'i mchog dang/ dpung mgo zlum pa dang/ bdun mtho ba dang/ lag pa srab la gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba dang/ ma btud par phyag pus mo'i lhang
la reg pa dang/ nangs rab tu gnas pa dang/ zhabs dang phyag gi mtha' na 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa dang/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang/ 'di dagan skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yin ti/

pa[W ]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'byung ngo/ 'jam dpal skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis su gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung pa gang bar gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de grangs med par bar
ba dang/ bsam gyis khyab par bsgyur ba dang/ dpag tu med par bsgyur ba dang/ brjod du med par bsgyur bas/ de bzhin gshags pa'i tshes kyi dung du 'gyur// chos kyi dung nges 'dul ba'i bod
du de bzhin gshegs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med par dbyangs kyis rig par byed do// dbyangs kyis ji lta ba bzhin du 'od dang skus kyang de bzhin no// 'jam dang la de ltar shes rab/
chen po las byung ba/ snying chen pos yongs su bsgos pas/ thabs mkhas pa dang/ smon lam gyi bskyed pa/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bsgoms pa'i khyad par las yang dag par skyes pas
bsod nams chen po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis ma khyab go/ 'jam dpal rgyu gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/
rgyugs gang zhe na/ smon lam gyi dbang dang dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang ngo// 'jam dpal rgyu de gnyas in de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du
'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa ji lta ba/ de bzhin du chos bstan pa yang/ khyad par du'aphags pa yin no// 'jam dpal dbazhi'i
gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'od kyang khyad par du 'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal ngaltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od khyad par du 'phags pa de bzhin du spyod pa yang khyad par du
'phags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa na skus 'jig rten thams cad du khyab pa yin te/ 'jam dpal kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang spyod pa'i bye brag gang dang gang gis sems
can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba kha dog dang dbyibs dang spyod pa'i bye brag de dang de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo/ 'jam dpal mtshan
gyi bye brag gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba mtshan gyi bye brag dodang de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyis mthong/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang
ngagis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i tshes bstan pa de dang de lta bur de bzhinagshegs pa chos ston par sems can rnams kyis shes so// 'jam dpal spyod pa gong dang
gang gis sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pala'ajug pa dang 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnas par sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo//
'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigarten du 'byung ba 'gyurab yab skyeb mang po la can pa dang/ skye bo mang pal bde ba dang/
'jig rten la stang partsal dang/ lha dang mi rnams dang skye bo phal po che'i don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir skye'o// de nas byang chub sems dab 'a'ajam dpal stan las
langasate/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gas ston pa ma mnyam pa dang/ mnyam pa bgang zag
zla med pa/ khams gsum na mgon po'i mchog/ sems can thams cad la phan pa mdzad/ 'jag rten gyi tshosakya mo spyod pa/ nam mkha' ltar ma gos pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab kha/ /
bsam par 'os pa/ lta'adod pa/ blta na sdug pa/ 'di 'drab na/ bdag gse red pa rab tu rnyed do// bde bar gshegs pa rnyed pa rab turnyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa dga'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dapa'i chon po de dag dang dge slong de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par bstod do/
phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dris pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'amed rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ nan dbra b+ha dri zla tA/ bod skad du/ dga' bo
rab tu 'byung ba'i mdo// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal 'go/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dras ser skya'i khe nas kyi rgya gro dkun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
denasakham ldan 'das sngadrotshos gos dang/ sham thabs bsnubs te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas/ phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sgrung dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ sa skya'i
gnas su bsod snyoms la gshegs go/ de nas bco ldan 'das 'gis kyi bu dga' bo'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs pa dang/ rigs kyi bu dag 'bos/ bcom ldan 'das rgyang ra kho
nas gshegs pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang ranges pa ranges par bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du gdan bshams nasa'adaskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das tshu gshegs//
bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su gsal/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs so// de nas rigs kyi bu dga' bo bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gas kyi bu dag 'a bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo
ci'i phyi'i rab tu ma 'byung/ dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig don ci gas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su skong ba yin
no/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug rab tu sel ba yin no// 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang/ 'tshang 'dru ba dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyed pa dang/ sgyu dang/ g.yo'i mun pas bsdus pa'i

glu/ dri ma thams cad 'khru ba yin// la tog thams cad kyi sa gzhi lta bur yon tan thams cad kyi gzhi yin no/ rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas yin no// bde ba wams cad kyi yod bzhinagyi mi'i bu yin
no/ yon tan thams cad kyi go 'phang gi gnas yin no// sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa yin no// 'byung pa thams cad kyi yid brtan pa yin no// srog chags thams cad la ma 'jigs pa
sbyin da lanan sems na dbul bo thams cad kyi bum pa yin no skyabs med pa rnams kyi dbang gnayin no// kun tu tshol bas 'a'ongs pa dang/ sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa rnams kyi blta/
sa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'dres pa yin no/ sems can thams cad kyis mchod par bya ba yin no// mkhas pa rnams kyis ba sngags pa yin no// thar par 'gro ba rnams kyi lam
yin no// sems can dag pa rnams kyis bsnyen par bya ba yin no// snod du 'gyur ba rnams kyis bsten par byab yin no// ngan song gi sgo gcod pa yin no// mtho'is dang thar pa'i sgo 'byed pa yano//

lca'a'agro ba rnams kun tu bzhengs pa yin no// sdug bsngal thams cad kun tu gcod pa yin no// sengapa'i bcing bas bangs pa rnams rnam par grol bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bden rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o//

yang dag pa'i lte ba'i khyim yin no// thar par yang dag pa'i sdom pa yan no// mya ngan las 'das pa la bsten pa yin no// rgyun dbar gcod pa yin no// nyonamangos pa rnams sreg pa yin no// phra rgyas rnamA
'bazhi pano/ lta ba nama'i drab rnams 'jigs par byed pa yin// bdud kyi rgyal mtshan stsol ba yano/ bzod pa ga ba bsgreng ba yin no// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo ldeg par byed pa yin no// chos kyi
par lo bsko'o bar byed ba yin no/ nu zho rgya mtsho'iskyems bayin no// rus pa'i 'jigs par byed pa yin no// skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'ba'i mtha' yin no// phung pa'i khur
ga 'a jog sa pa yin// nyon mongs pa 'dam du byang ba rnams 'khyan ba yin no// khyim gzeb tu bcings pa rnams rnam ba'agrol bar byed pa yin// gnod pa'i tshor ba rnams zad
bar byed par yazhigo/ the tshom rnams dang/ nyon mongs pa 'dris brtan par gyur pa rnams gcod pa yin no// gaki'ajigs ba rnams dbugs 'byin pa yin no// sdug kha dang bral bar byed pa yin no/
'phro 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gtsas pa rnams kyi bde ba dang/ ma 'jigs pa'i 'gram yin no// 'dod pa'i khams 'a sa brgal bar byed pa yin no// gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par brgyal bar
byed pa yin no/ gzugs med pa'i khams la sa yang rnam par brgal bar byed pa yano/ don dam par mya nganalas 'das pa mtshog zlog par byed pa yin te/ dga' bo de'i ba tu byung bzhes khya'o
'gi rten thams cad kyi mig lta bu yin no// gti mug gi mun pa'i sgronam yin no// rgyud dag par byed pa yin no// nyon mongs ba'and thams cad rab tun bar byed pa yin no// lam stor ba rnams la
lam kun du ston pa yin no// sa thams cad kyi de kho na ston pa yin no// mdud pa thams cad rnam par ba grol bar byed pa yin no// ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa yin no/ gang gis

pa'i rab rib kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa rnams 'dral bar byed pa yin no// le lacan rnams brtson 'grus la rtsom par byed pa yin no// tshul khrims la ltung ba rnams skyo bar byed pa yin no// tshul khrazhig yun
sum tshogs pa rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa yin no// brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams mchog tu dga' ba yin no// nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba rnams rab tu dga' ba yin no//
rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mchog tu chog shes par byed pa yin no// nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'joms par byed pa rnams kyi mtshon chayanan// phyi ma 'ong ba rnams mchog tu rgyal bar byed pa yin no//
gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas sa// skyob pa med pa rnams kyi skyob pa yin no// 'jigs pas 'brel pa rnams kyi mi 'jigs par byed pa yin no// skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs yin no// sdug
bsngal rnams kyi bdeba'i yo byad yin no// 'khor ba'i bcing bas bcings pa rnams 'grol bar byed pa yin te/ dga' bo de na rib tu byung ba zhes bya'o// lha dang ma rnams kyis bkur lta byas pa yin
no mi'i da bang po rnams kyi mchod pa yin no// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa yin no// khyim gyi gnas yongs su gtong ba yin no// mya ngan las 'das pa 'a 'am 'dren pa yin no// sgra'i/
khur 'dreg pa yin no// gos ngur smug na 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags yin no// rigs pa la brtson 'grus kyi zhing yin no// 'di ni drang srong rnams kyi rgyal mtshan yanano// bdud sdig tocan
rnams kyi grags pa 'dzoms pa yin no// lha dang ma rnams rab tu dga' ba byed pa yin te/ dga' ba rab tu byung ba ni de lta bu yin na/ ci'i phyir rab tu cha 'byung/ dga' bo ba tu byung ban 'khor lo
bsgyur ba'i rgyal sridi pa de ba bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa bde ba yanan/ dga' bo ba/zhan yang dal pa tshogs pa ni bskal pa brgyar yang shin tu red par bka' ba yin//

sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni de bas kyang ches rnyed par dka' ba yanano// dga' bo thar pa 'dod pa rgyal po'i drang srong rnams dang/ gzhan yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa/
'gi rnams kyang btsunamo'i 'khor dang bcas te bar nas rab tu byung ngo// de bzhin du khyim bdag dang/ bram ze'i tshogs gzhan rnams kyang khyim rnams cing nas 'a ba tu byung ngo/
de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi bu dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni khyim par mchis la/ sbyin pa dag stsal/ bsod nams dag bgyi zhing/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yang bsnyen bkur ba gyi zhing chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ gzims chadang/ stun gyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyang bsgrubs par bgyi'o// bcom
'dasakyis bka' stsal pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam sa kyis khams gsum pa gang dag yin pa'i 'jig rten gang bar 'gyur la/ rig kyi bu 'am/
rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can l las la brgyar 'di lta ste/ chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal stan dang/ nad kyi gsos sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byed na/ dga' bo de ni byung
[j]por nges par byung ba'i sems kyi bcu drug gichar 'ang ma yod de// dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung// dal ba shane durnyed dka' ste/ dga' ba ston pa mngon gyur pa// nga la ma mnyes ma byed cig/

dga' bo dperan sa chen po 'dachu gcig pur rgya mtshor gyur la/ de na ru sbal zhar ba gcig kyang yod/ de na gta' shing bu ga gcig pa gcig kyang rgyu la/ ru sbal zhar ba de 'ad snyam du/ gnya' shing gi/
bu gder mgrin pa tshud par bya'o snyam du sems skye zhing/ gnya' shing bu ga can de yang rlung gis bskyod nas/ phyogs phyogs su rgyug par byed pa na/ dga' ba brgya la rkyenazhig gis ru sbal zhar ba
de'i mgrin pa ga'angashong ga bu ga der 'jug par 'gyur gyi/ dga' bo ma nyid thob pa ni ma yin no// dal ba phun ma tshogs pa de bzhin no// dga' bo khyod kyis ma nyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang
de bzhin du dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang ring na/ dga' bo khyod kyis rab byung/ dal ba shin turedadaka' red// dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa// nga lam mnyis ma byed cig ngaper na 'ga' zhig
gis khab kyi mige gnam du bstan te/ nyungs dkar gyi 'bru rnams 'thor bar byed/ dga' bo brgyal rkyen zhig gis der yungs kar gyi 'bru gang yAn pa gcig chud par 'gyur gyi/ dga' ba mi nyid rnyed pa
na ma yin no// dal ba phum sum tshogs pa yang de bzhinano// dga' bo mnyid shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang/ de bzhin du dal ba phun sua tshogs pa yang red na/ dga' ba khyed kyis rab tu byung//
@#/// dal ba shAn tu rnyed dka'ared// dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa// nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bskal pa bye ba stong dang ni// brgya dang khrag khrig dpag tu
yang/ sangs rgyas skrun ma thos na/ sangs rgyas ma thong ba ga la zhig u du wa ra'i me tog ni// shing las shin tu rnyed dka' ltar// da bzhin sangs rgyas rnyed dka' ste// khyod
kyis ngananyid 'gyur na// dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu byung// dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' ste// dga' bo ston pa mngon gyur pa// ngal mi mnyos ma byed cig/ de nas rigs kyi
bu dga' bo kha spu bregs te/ gos dur smrig bgos te/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa la yang dag par dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal pa dang/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang/ rigs kyi bu dga' bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo rdzogs so//
di bka' dang por gtogs sa @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsin+tarAdza nA tAnanAm ma hAyA tra bod skad du/ 'phags
pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyus dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gisashos
pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+han/ chos kyi dbye dgon pa// byang chub kyi snying po na seng ge 'i khri rdo rjadang/ ko bu ni po ches smras pa'i pa'i stong pa'i gdan la bzhug te/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen po'i dge 'dun phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi rdul phrarab snyed kyi byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po de dag la gas pa tshe rgyal ba'i sras dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa 'i sangs rgyas kyi mi mjed

kya'ajig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa gcige gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dang ga med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag medakyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig
rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa'i sas rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig
00/ @#// go/ kye rgyal ba'i gros dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rjer ba tu 'joms pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang gi bskal pa
gcig gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od ze sha tu stag po pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad+mar pa tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pagacig
gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcag gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
pa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtin zhag gcig sgo kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhAn gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas seng ge 'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gabaskal pa gci'i gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snanga mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin
zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang
yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku 'a sangs rgyas kyi nang gtan zhag gcig go/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga bskal pa gnyis gang yin pa de ni/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de bzhin gshegs
nga dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas yeshes 'od gzer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni/ da bananagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i blo gros kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi na zhag gcig go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ 'di bskal pa bgrang ba'i thabs 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis brtsis
pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa'i tha ma/ 'jig rten gyi khams pa Ta dang la zhes bya ba naM/ bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po'i dpal bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga nyin zhag gcig go/
kye rgyal ba'i nyes dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun/
ga tu bzang po'i spyod pa can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis thos par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan dag gis ni thos
par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rgyal pa dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khol/
de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de dag dang/ rtswa dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rgyal bas gsungs pa la mngon par bastad do// 'phags pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rgyal po'amado zhes bya ba/ theg pa chan
po'i mido rdzogs so// @#// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya u pA ya ko'angashal+yA nAm mahAyAn sU tra/ bod ska da du/ 'phags pa thabs mkhas pa zhes
[s.]]bya ba theg pa chen po'i med// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigen/
bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ ji ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong brgyud khri bzhi stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thangs gtsag tu n gzhugs so// byang chub sems
dpa' mngon par shes ra/ gzungs thob nga/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ khri drug stong dang yang thabs gcig gyu/ yang de'i tshe na/ bcom ldan 'dasanang du yang dag 'jog la sa bzhengs pa la
te 'a bor brgya stong du mas bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas chos 'chad do// yang de'i tshon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po yagos bu na zhes bya ba nag 'khor der 'ongs te 'dug
par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen nga yi gos bla mas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ dusam g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan
'das ga la ba logs su thal mo sbyar ba datud nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gal te zhus nas zhu b.lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bdag la skabs phyin/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la phyogs
'ga' zhig zhu'o zhes de skad gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chung sems dang 'a sa mas dang 'chen pa ye shes bla mal/ rig kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la ci
gdang tsa'adod pa dras shig dang/ dris b.lung bstan pa de dang detad gyis sa khyod kyi sems ras khar bya'ozhes deskad ces bka' stsalas/ bag ldan/
'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa// thabs mkhas pas/
bgyi ba'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshonapa yis sla la 'di skad ces bka9
stsal to/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa thabs mkhas pa ni zas kham gcig gis kyang sems can thams cad la khyab par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
gisakyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dar chen po thabs mkhas pa ni/byol song du gtogs pa la zas khams gcig sbyin par byed pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ldan ng
yin te/ dge ba'artsa ba de yang sems can thams cad la bsngago des rgyu gnyis kyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed do// gnyis po ganganan/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
dang bsngo bko rigakyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas kha parol gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la ya rangabar byed do// yi rang bar byas nas sems can thams
[s, ]cad l ba ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems des sbyin par byed pa dang/ sbyin pa'i bdag po de dag zil gyis gnon to// gang len par byed pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon to/ rigs kyi bu/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa na phyogs bcun shing las byung ba'i me tog gang du yod pa ma yongs su ma blangs pa rnams dang/ phyogs bcun gang spos kyi shing yod pa rlung gi
khyer ba yosu na bangs pa/ bdag po med pa de dag kyang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la 'bul zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' thabs makhas pa ni/ phyogs bcu na sems can gang ji snyid bde ba'itshor ba myong ba de thams cad la bsams te/ rjes su yi rang bar byed do// rjes su ya'ang nas thams cad mkhyen pa/
tud du bsngo bar byed do// gang yang phyogs bcu na sems can sdug bsngal nga 'a tshor ba myong ba de thams cad ni 'chags su 'jug ste/ gang sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal ni bdag la shog rug/ de dag
ni bde bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i go chagyon zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de byang chub tu bsngobar byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas panadi bzhin gshegs pa gcig la phyag
'tshalan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar de ltar 'dzin te/ don 'di ltar slob bo/ sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi dbyis gcig go/ tshul khrims gcig go/
ting nge 'dzin gcig go/ shegar ba gag go/ dgongs pa gcig go/ rnamakhar grol ba gcig go/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba gcig go/ zhes de ltar
slob cing/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs kha gcig la phyag 'tshalan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar 'dzin to// de thabs ma khas ba des sangs rgyas gcig la bkur sti
byas nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bkur sti byed de/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag la mchod par 'gyur ba de snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su len to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pan nam zhig shes rab rmongs pa can du re danayang/ de ni bdag la yi mi gsod kyi gzang bstod par byed do// chung ngu na rtsa ba tshigs bzhi pa tshogs su cad
ba gcig la don du 'donan yang/ rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gi don gang yin pa gsung rab tu gtogs pa thams cad kyi don yang de yin no zhes de de ltar slob cing/ das tshigs su
pa bcad pa de la don du byas nas/ sems can gang ji snyid kyis bdag gis rtsa ba bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos pa/ de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa thob par shog tsagi/ ces de ltar
ma zhum pa'i sems kyis smon lam 'debs te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad kyi thos ba mtha' med pa dpe med ba zil gyis gzhon sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa yang len par byed do//
ba gas kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a thabs m khas pa ni nam zhig gal te brgyal dbul por gyur na/ de'atshon de chung dun gzhan gyi las kyang byas nas/ zas gzar bu gang thogs te sems/
ma zhum bas dge 'dunanam gang zag la sbyin par byed do// khyim nas kyang 'di lta slob ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sa che ba'i phyi'i sbyin par che bar 'gyur zhes gsungs kyis/ bdag gi sbyin pa/
chung du zin kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sims ni dpag tu med pa'o snyam nas/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zas gzar bu gang pa snyan par byed cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can tham
cad 'di lta ste dper na da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa phyaga'anachen bzhin du shog shag ces/ zas ga zar bu gang po de nyid kyis sbyin pa'i rang bzhin dang/ tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang/ bsgom
pa'i rang bzhin gyis bsadanams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par byed do/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa// shAnapos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ lhan cig tu
gnas kyang de dag la 'dod par ma byed do// gal te yang nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dag la bkur stabyas ba mthong na/ de rgyu gnyis kyis bdag nyid khong du chud par byed do// de rgyag sa/
gong zhan// byang chub sems dpa' las ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung// sangs rgyas las/nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung bas de dag la bkur sti byas nas
bdag nyid la thog ma khonar bkur lta byas pa yin gyi/ de dag la ni ma yin pa dang/ de dag nibadag gi pha nor la spyod mod kyi/ de la bdag gis 'dod par ma bya/ phrag/
dog tu ma bye snyam du sems pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas ni/ spyan pa sbyin ba na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do// ji ltar na yongs su
rdzogs par byed ce na/ 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' gang gtso/ slong ba mthong na ( de ser sna'i sems tshar gcod par byed/ gtong ba chen pa 'phel bar byed de/ de na de'i spyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa'o// gang tshul khrais yang blar blangs nas/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa la sbyin par byed pa dang/ gang ngang tshul ngan pa can de dag tshul khrims la 'jog par byed cing/ sbyin pa yang
sbyin par byed pa de na de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang byams par sims pa dang/ sems ma 'khrugs pa dang/ phan par goms pa dang/ sems rtse gcig pa 'gyur nas/

sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa den di'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang bza' ba dang bca' ba dang myang bar bya ba de dag la lus dang ngag dang sems 'jog care/ 'gro ba dang 'ong bar byed pa de ni de'i
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// sbyin pa khyon nas gang tse gcig pa dang/ dbugs phyin par ma'adzin pa danadi'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gal te sbyin pa de byon nas chos nyid
la brten te/ 'di sus byin/ 'di lus zos/ su la rnam par sman par 'gyur/ zhes des de ltar brtags na/ gang gis byin pa dang/ gang la sbyin pa dang/ gang la rnam
bar sman par myong bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs ba dan de'ari shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ng 'o// gas kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa spyan pa sbyin par byed na/
b.rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de 'dra bar
thabs mkhas te/ sbyin pa gang gis sems can gzhan dag 'khor ba yongs su len par brgyad pa'i sbyin pa de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams len par brgyad pa ngomatshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu dzi skad smras pa bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas
bani sbyin pa nyung du yang mang por byed/ sbyin pa'i ng yang dpag tu med par byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dar 'asems dpa' chen po ye shes zla ma
la bka' stsal ra/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa ni/ ltung ba lca ba yang thabag pa'i srab ma byed do// ji ltar srab mar byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang/
chub sems dar la thabs mkhas pa na/ nam zhig la rgya la/ la la zhig tu sdug pa'i grogs pa'i deng nga gis ltung ba byung na/ de 'di ltar slob ste/ gal te bdag gis phung po
'di dag gis mya ngan las 'dab par byan/ de ltar bdag gis sems yongs su gdung ba dang ldan pa ra yang gyur na/ bdag gis sems can yongs su snyan par bya ba'i phyir/ byama'i mthar thug
par 'khor ba na gnas pa'i go chade lta bu bgos ra sa/ bdag gse sems gdung bar na mo bya'i/ byang chub ji lta ji ltar 'khor bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya'o// ltung
po 'di yang chos bzhin du bya'o// ltung ba gzhan yang ma byung bar bya'o snyam du sems so// rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung na/ gal te rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dang 'a ltung ba'i rtsa ba
bzhi po thams cad 'das par gyur kyang/ thabs mkhas pa 'dis sbyong bar byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' ltung bar ma 'gyur ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'dasaM la byang chub
sems dang ye shes blams 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba dang bcas pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ga
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yishos bu ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sa sor thar pa'i bslab pa slob pa na/ bskal pa brgya stong du yang rtsa ba dang
('bras du za par 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad kyi'i snyan pa'i snas pa dang/ ma snyan par smras pa yang bzod cing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'de la byed pa dang yang ldan por gnas par de ni/

byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba'i rtsa ba lci ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa ltung ba'i rtsa ba cung na/ phung po de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i

paskal ba med pa de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang ra yang ltung ba sa mthol zhing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byed ng ma btang na sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mya ngan las 'ad la/
ba'i skal ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsod snyoms kyi phur mjal gyis spyod pa na/ byang chubs

sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po khang pa zhig na/ bud med dang khro gcig la lhan cig mchis par mthongs ltung ba byaba mthong namabacabashag/tshos pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan dag la zlos shig ces
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalan/ de bzhin gshegs pa nasems can thams cad kyi ston pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i cung zad kyang ma mkhyenang 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ thugs
su ma chud pa ma mchis bas/ de'i slad du bdag bcom ldan 'das la gsol zhes tshodang ldan pa dag 'a bos de skad kyi tshogs sbas nas// ring po ma lon pa de nas de'i mod la sa g.yos par gyur
tong denas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyapAshing rtal gang tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la'adi skad ces smras/

sango 4tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ ltung ba byung ba'i chos can gyis bar snang la 'dug par nus sam/ yang tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba'i chos ji lta bu grags
zhes/ de bzhinagshegs ba mngonosum du bzhugs po 'dilo zhus shig/ donas tshodang ldan pa dga' bo yul yul par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bag
[à ]phyag 'tshal te/ ltung ba 'chags pa gang dag bdag gis skyes bu bal glang chen po lta bu la/ ltung ba btsal ba/ bcom ldan 'dasanongs te/ nongs pa 'chags so zhes de skad gsal nga
dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i skyes bu dam pa la nyes par 'du shes ma skyed cig/
u0fc4 dga' bo 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas pa gcig pu gnyis sumed pa ni zug pa zad par byab la bar chad med par 'dod pa bya'o/ dga' bo de bzhin du byang chub sems dba'athabs/
mkhas pa yang thams cad mkhyen pa la bar chad med par 'dod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gong dkona mchog gsum la gzhol bar mi
'gyur ba'i g.yog 'chang bar mkhyad do// dkon mchog gang zhen/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang/ chos dkon mchog dang/ dge 'dun dkon mchog go/ das 'a bo gang gatsho byang chub
sems dpa' sgrig pa la gnas pa'i 'igs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyisims dang ma bral bar 'dod pa lda'i yon tan gyis brtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod par mthongon/ dga' bo de'i tshe/
khyod kyise skyes bu dam pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po lnga dang ldan par shes par gyis shig/ dga' bo khyod yang ci'i phyi'i byang chub sems dpa' dmang ldan gyi rgyal ba bud med dang
smanagatsag tu khru gcig la 'dug pa de nyon gi/dga' bo sringam don/ 'das pa'i dus na/ tshor bas nyis brgya byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po'i chung mar gyur te/ de sngon gyi
bag la nyal de nyid kyis 'gos kyi bu byung chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po de'i dpal dang gzi brjid dang/ tshul khrims dang/ stabs bskyed pa mthong yong/ brjod nas
gnas ngan len gyi gi smras te/ de gcig pu lkog tu song nas/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal khadag dang lhan cig tu khro secig tu 'dug na// bdag gis bla na
med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do snyam du de ltar sems par 'gyur ro// dga' bo denas khyang chub sems dpa' 'odomang ldan rgyal pa'i sems kyis srang mdo'i
sems kyi yongs su rtog pa shes nas/ de nyid kyi ba mo 'das pa dang/ de'i khyim du 'ongs te/ gang nang gi sa'i khams dang/ gang phyi'i sa'i khams su/
gcig pa'i chos kyi sgo sa 'dra ba'i sems des/ sring mo de lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste/ khri gcig la 'dug go/ 'dug ma thag tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsago/ sangs rgyas
'dod pa bsngags m mdzad// de na byis pa'i spyod yul te// 'dod pa'i srid pa spangs na ni// sangs rgyas m yi mchog tu 'gyur// dgub rinas srid de dga' nang du tu/
mgu ba skyes nas/ khra di las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od mang ldan gyi rgyal po'i zhing pa la phyag 'tshal nas/ de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di rigs go/ sangs rgyas kyisan gang
smad pa/ 'dod pa slan chad bdag ma 'tshal// 'dod pa'i srid pa sbas nan// sangs rgyas malo mchog tu 'gyur// bdag ga sems kyis gang bsams pa'i// nongs pa de na khyed la
bshags// srog chags kun la bde ba'i phyir// byang chub tu nams bskyed do// dga' bo 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dang 'a 'od mang ldan gyi skyal po thabs mkhas pa des/
sring modi blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bstabasanas/ stan las langs te song ngo// dga' bo lhag pa'i bsam pa'i khyad par ltaso/ ngasasringamo de lung bstan to// 'ashis
shi 'phosanas bud med kyi lus brjes te/ bskal pa grangs med pa kha stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgun/ kun nas ldang ba dang srol zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par/
rdzog pas nags rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo khyod rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' n gang ltung ba'i chos can du 'gyur ba'i g.yogama'ichang bar rig par bya'o
denas byang chub sems dpa' 'od mngaldan gyi rgyal bo bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
bao ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pa dang/ snying rje chen pa la gnas par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sem

can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar 'gyur na/ ltung ba de 'dra bar 'byung nang ji lta bu'i ltung ba byung bas bskal pa brgya stong dusems can dmyal ba'i gtsor gyur kyang/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
dpa'i ltung ba 'byung ba dang/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro ba nyid dobagyi// sems can gcig po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su gtong ba dang yongs su 'bri ba mibagyi'o/
de nas M bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'damang ldan gyi rgyal bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ legs so legs so// skyes bu dam ba byang chub sems dpa' d gnas nying rje chen po 'di
lung ba thams cad spong ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i pha rol gyi yang shin tul rol na/ khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba zhig yod de/

nags kyi 'dab na la bzhi khri nyis stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ de la bzhi khri kros stong 'das pa dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'byor pa zhes bya bar phyin nas/ de grong khyer chen po dar sang ba/
dang/ chu chunam zhig gis khye'u bzang po de mthong naso/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis yongs su tsan nga 'i sems dang ldan pas/ khye'u de'i mdun du brgyugs te phyag 'tshal de/
denas rigs kyi bu khye'u skar mas bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so// sungs byed ci 'dod/ mos dela'ang skad ces smras// khye'u bdag khyod la 'go/ las de la 'daskad
ts+tshA ces sbas so// sring mo (khe ba na'adod pa dgos pa ma yin no// mas de la 'di skad ces smras s// gal te bdag khyod dang mjal bar ma 'gyur na bdag 'gum par 'gyur ro// de nas khye'u
skar mas 'di snyam du bsam so// gang bdag gis lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyang nas/ brtul shugs gzhag pa na be ga gas mcha'o sAmanas/ nan gyis then te bud/
med des btang nas/ gom pa bdun 'phags pa dang/ de gom pa bdun la gnas nas snying rje skyos te/ bdag gis brtul shugs 'di bshig nas/ sems can dmyal bar song bar gyur kyang/
sems can dmyal ba'i sde ga bsngal de myong bar bzod kyi/ bud med 'di shir 'ong gis bde bar gyur cig/ gi kyi bu khye'u skar ma de slar log ste/ budamed de la lag pa g.yas pas bdu
nas sAng ma bud ci 'dod pa longs shig/ ces sa so// de nas khye'u skam la bcu gnyis kyi bar du khyim na gnas nas slar yang mngon par byung ste/ tshongs pa'i
gnas bzhi bskyed nas/ shi 'phos pa dang/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rtenaduskyes so// rigs kyi bu khyod de 'tshade'i dusan/ khye'u skar ma zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam dum lta nagi/ deci'i
phyir zhe na/ de'itshade'i dus na ngan khyi'u sgrub mar gyur to// grags 'dzin ma'achun mar gyur to//rigs kyi bu nga 'dod pa ngan pa dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed pas kyang/ bskal
ba stong phrag bcu'i bar du 'khor ba sgrub kyis ltas shing spangs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu ltos gang sems can gzhan dag sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba de/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs
mkhas pa naM/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyelar 'gyur ro/ 'gas kyi bu gal te dge slong ma 'gal gyi bu dang/ shar 'i bu thabs mkhasab dang lhan du'ananan/ dge slong ko'aka dems/
can dmyal bar 'gro ba 'am 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ragis[©]du sa mngon par shes pa 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshogs kha leg par dad sel gyi gsung rab la dge slong dram med pa zhes
bya ba zhig byung te/ de dgon pa'i brag phug gcig na gnas panas/ rkyang ma'ong ba zhigi nadrang srong lnga gnas las/ tshadusal yin pa'i sman chen de byung/ a ma yin
ba'am pa yang cher bab pa dang/ da sazhud medaganyis char ba'i skyabs kyi phyi'i dge slong dri ma med pa 'khrag phug tu zhugs te/ slar byung ba dang drang srong rnams s mthongs/ e ma'o//
dge slongadzAmemed ba 'dusdig 'dod pa'o/ tshangs par spyod pa ma yin ba'o// zhes yode byung bar gyur to// de nas dge slong drim med pa'i sems kyis/ drang srong de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog
sgyu bshes nas/ de'i tshonam mkha' la shing rtal bdun tsam du 'phags sa// de nas drang srong de dag gis dge slong ma med pa bar snang gi nam mkha' kha'adug pa mthong nas/ bdag cag gi
gtsug lag las 'byung ba ltar na/ tshongs pa'i spyod pa ma yin par nam mkha' la 'phags ma nus so snyam dusems par gyur nas/ de'i yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te nyes kha bshags so//
rigs kyi bu gal te dgi slong drame med pa nam mkha' lam 'phags su zin na/ de'i tshodrang srong lnga'i lus sems can dmyal bar chen par ltung bar gyur/ ragis kyi bu dardzasnyam du sems/

de'i tshe de'i dus na/ dge slong dri ma med pa zhes bya ba de gzhan du gyur pa snyam du khyod de ltar m lta yig byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de botshadage slong dri ma med pa zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi
bu gal te dge slong gA'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu nam mkha' la 'phags su zin nani/ dge slong ke ka laka sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar ma'agyur ro// bgisakyi bu rnam grangs des na//
byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'iyi shes gang du 'jug pa dani nyanathos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul ma yin par 'ag par bya'o/ gas kyi bu 'di lta ste/ smad 'tshong
ma thabs drug cu rtsa bzhi dang ldan pa shin tu lobs pa nor 'dod pa ni/ skyes bu de las nor ma grub kyi bar du sems can de dag gi drungan/ ci nas kyang bdag gis lus gtong ba yang ston pa dang/
yo byad thams cad mya ngami sbed par de lta de ltar gnas so// de nas byas de latshalta lasems bar 'dor te/ de'i phyi de la 'gyod par yang ma 'gyur/ 'gis kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dang
ma khas pa yang thabs mkhas pa gang gis sems can 'di dag bdag gis yongs su smanapar byakha shesan/ sems can nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la dga' bas cung zad kyang m sbed cing bdagag lus
gtong bar byed pa ston babar du sems can dag gicungan de lta de ltar gnas te/ nam zhig sema'o sems can 'adi dag dgab rtsa ba skyed pa yin te/ zhi chad de las lhag par gzhag tu zhus rab shes
nas ni/de la ma lta zhing dga' kha dang rtse bathams cad kyang btang ste'agro'o/ de'a'agalus pa'i sems kyang me dado// ragisakyi bu'adi lta ste/byol song du gtogs pa'i srog chags kyi
rnam pa dung ba zhes bya ba de me tog thams cad kyi de la snom yang gang du yang rtag par srid pa ma sgom mo// dri dang la ma yang ma 'brog go/de ba'i du thabs mkhas cing chub ses dpa'

yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang/ rtse ba thams cad kyang spyod kyang gang du yang rtag par srid pa ma skye/ bdag dang gzhan nyams par yang ma byed do// rigs kyi bu'adalta ste/ dper nas bon yongs su gdungs pa'i

dag nyams pa med kyang ljang bu 'byung bar ma nus so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i shes rab yongs su bsgoms pa'i rten mangs pa na dega' ba dang/
rtse ba thams cad la spyod kyang de ltung bar 'gro la yongs su ma len/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan las kyang yongs su mnyems// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dpeng na nya pa shin tu bslabs pa ni/ skudapa
gcig la gzan ma btags pa'i mali ba sbyar nas mtsho chen par bcug ste/ de gang dang gang gatshon 'dod pa de dang de'i tshe/ skud pa de mtshochen po nas 'dren no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thabs mkhas/
ba'i byang chub sems pa 'ayang stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtan por 'brel nas/ 'as rdzab chen

por ltung zhing de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de bsrungs pas/ gang dang gang gi tsho 'dod pa de dang de'i tshe shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o// gas kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sngags/
kyi rigs 'dzin gyi skye sa bu rgyal pos bzung ste/ zhags pa lnga yis ba cing las b.ris su zan kyang/ de gang gi tshe 'gro bar 'dod pa de sngags kyi rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa gcig gis bcings pa thams
cad gtugs te 'gro'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' thabs m bas ba lang gang gi tsho/ 'dod pa 'i yon tan lngas dga' ba myong zhing de dag gas rgyas par gyur kyang/ gang gi 'dod pa 'a
gyur pa de'i tshe/ shes rab kyi rig pa'i stobs bskyed pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gcagi gas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad rab tu bcom ste/ shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du
skye'o 'gis kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mda' dang/ mtshon gyi slob dbon ral gri rnon pa gcig ga la ngon pa la thogs nas 'gron po mang po 'basel byed na/ de la
sems can gang ma shes pa de dag namada' dang/ mtshon gyi slob dpon de la ma'i ngag mda' gzhu yang med/ mtshonachagazhan yang medagayog kyang med de/ 'dan bdag gi skyabs kyang ma nus na/
