byed pa ma mchis pa'i phyagargyas btab pa/ gshes sgyu ma lasagon tu yongs su grub pa las rgya ma las shin tu rnam par bya ba/ gnas thams cad las shin tu lag pa/ 'jig
donasgyu ma las byung ba/ ngo bo nyid kyi chos dang 'brel ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' sul pa'i mchod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsti stang du
ngagyi'i/ btsunobar bgyi'o/ ri mor bgyi// mchod do// gsol la// rim gror 'gyig/ gong du yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsab par
'tshal kha/ sems can gyi rgyud yongs su snyan pa'i tshal ba/ zhing gi rgyud rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal lo/ las kyirgyud dang ma 'gal ba 'tshol ba/ chos kyi rgyud gtu rnam
khar 'byed bar 'tshal kha/ dus gsum gyi rgyud rtogs par 'tshal ba/ phyogs kyi rgyud la rab tu 'jug par 'tshal kha 'ododochagasam mchis pa'i rgyud la rab tu dgodarara'atshalab
mos ba'i rgyud rnam bar slong bar 'tshal ba/ dbang po'i rgyud la lta bar 'tshal ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo la rnam par 'phrul bar 'tshal ba/ 'gro ba'i 'khel thags/
bya// cad bsdu bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gis sangs rgyas kyi mkhyenab chags pa mi mnga' zhing/
[A ]sgrib pa ma mnga' bas mkhyen bcing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bu s/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag la mchod par bgyi ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu dga' bar bgyid pa// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sodapa rab 'byams las
ngos bar byungab/ byang chub sams dpa' ye shes bla ma gnas pa'i yul gyi rjes su zhugs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la
mched pa'i las kyi slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ rim gro bgyi ba gtsug gi bla ma zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du'ajug ste/
de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa 'di lta sta/ pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba/ ma skyes pa'i chos las byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs btsun bar sus ba'i gshes kyi
mig gis rig pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa ming gis khyab pa mang bo dgan
[o ]/chos kyi dbyangs rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams dong/ nam mkha'i khams kyi ma sbas btugs pa// chos kyi dbyings su gtogs kha ba jig rten gyi khams/
su 'jug go/ de bas gong du yang mchod pa yon tan dpag tu ma mchis pa dang ldan s dge ba'irtsa ba chen po bzhugs kyis bskyed pa/ rdo rje'i dbang po snang bar bgyid pa//
sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad du snang ba'i ma tog gi rgyal po'i yi shes las byung ba'i mchod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la bsti stang du bgyi'o// btsun par bgyi'o
ri mor bgyi'o mchod do// gsol lo// ramigror 'gyig/ ji ltar bdag gi don du mchod pa de bzhinatu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad na
sems can ji tsam sems can gyi rus na mchis pas mas can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod par bgyi'o// de ltar bdag gis de bzhin
gshegs ba la mchod pa'i stobs kyis bdun pa'i sams bskyed// byams pa chen bo dang/ snying rje chen pos nye bar brtan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyabs ba'i smon lam
dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi mdzod kyi rjes su zhugs par gyur/ sa rab dang/ thabs kyi stobasachen pos yongs su bzung bar gyur/
bdud kyi lam dang yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das par gyur nas/ sgrub par 'gyur ba'i las thams cad bshags par bgyi ste// gangasangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyis bka' stsal pa dang/ gang sems can dam pa rnams kyis rnam par spangs pa dang/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dpa dang/ gang byung
sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su sangs pa dang/ gda'athags ba rnams kyis bshung ba dang/ gang mkhas pa rnams dang ba 'gras pa dang/ gang 'ge ba rnams kyis kho'o kha/
'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis rab tu gzur ba'i dbang gis byung ba 'am/ nga rgyal dang/ 'chab pa dang/ khon du 'dzani ba'i dbang gis byung ba 'am/ phra dog dang/
sa sna dang mya ngan gyi dbang gis byung ba'am/sgyu dang g.yo'i dbang gis byung ba 'am/ mngon par zhen pa'i stobs kyis byung ba 'di lta ste/ las kyi sgrib pa 'am chos kyi sgrib pa 'am/
nyon mongs ba'i sgrib ba 'am/ lta ba'i sgrib pa 'a ma/ mi shes pa'i sgrib pa 'am/ rnam par smin pa'i sgrib po'am/ tshes kyis longs par 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa ram/ nyan thos
dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa 'am/ thag pa chen po'i bar chad du 'gyur ba'i sgrib pa 'am/ dgaba'i rtsa thams cad gsog pa laganod pa'i sgrib pa 'am/
sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'gro ba'i sgrib pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i sod pa'i son lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la sgrib pa dang chod pa yang rung sta/ sgrib/
pa'i las bgyis shing bsags pa sgrib pa'i kun nas ldang ba gang gas sems can dmyal bar 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ba dang/ yi dgas
kyi yul du 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang/ lha dbul por 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas la lta ba yongs su mi 'dzan ba dang/ chos mnyan pa yongs su ma len pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dang/ chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog mngon bar mi rig par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa mi 'thob par 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba'i
bshes gnyen yang dag pas yongs su bzung bar mi rnyed par 'gyur ba drang dge ba'i rtsa ba chag 'tshal ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur
ba dang/ ba rol tu phyin pa'i lam ma nyan par gyur ba dang/ bdud sdig can rnams kyis 'joms par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyis tshes thag ring du bgyid par 'gyur bdag
dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad brtsam pa'i sbyor ba las/ rnamakhar ldog bar 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen la 'khu bar 'gyur ba dang/ bsam ba yongs su dog pa mi
'thob pa dang/ dran pa brjod pa ma mchis pa mi 'thob pa dang/ chos la lta ba mi 'thob pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam bar sa la pa la mi mos pa dang/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos rnams la yid gnyis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo khong du mi chud pa dang/ sa nas sar gnas ba'am 'thob pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' dang
'a 'grogs pa mi 'thob pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs bar bgyi ba la byas pa ldan pa khong du mi chud pa dang/ smon lam chen po las nur bar 'gyur ba dang/ spyod pa
blo yongs su dag pa mi 'thob pa dang/ gzungs kyi rgyan gyi snang ba ma 'thob pa dang/ slobs pa'i rgyan sang ba khong du ma chud pa dang/ byang chub sems dpal kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i
smon lam la yongs su dris par bgyi ba khong du ma chud pa dang/ tshes mnyam pa nyid mi rtogs pa dang/ bsod nams mnyam pa nyid mi bskyod pa dang/ ya shes mnyam pa nying khong du
lamachud pa dang/ 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyis kun tu gzhom par 'gyurab 'i sgrib pa de lta bu la sogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ yon tan gyi chos thams
cad kun tu sgrub pa la mi phyogs par 'gyur ba'i sgrub pa'i 'gabs pa grangs ma mchis pa 'bum phrag bcu po de dag dus gsum du gtogs pa 'di bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
ba0 chos kyi dbyings su 'dus pa ye shes gzigs ba sgrub pa ma mnga' ba/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i mag gi yul brnyes pa// mnyam pa nyid kyis rjes su zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa/
chos kyi dbyangs mun pa ma mchis par zhugs pa'i ya shes kyispyanabs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de ngag thums cad kyi skya na sngar bdag mngon sum du gyur pas mos nas/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i yul tshang mar par brtags te/ sku'i rtsa mo'i cha shas gzhag pa'i khyen tsam re re la yang de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cang sod du lhag par mos so//
sku'i rtsa mo'i cha shas gcig bzhag pa'i khyon la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ chos kyi dbyang sazloms cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thums cad sAd du lhag par mos so/
de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang lus theb pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems snyad kyis zhabs kyi 'og tu gtugs te phyag 'tshal lo// lus thob par ra la yang mag ngagagi lam nges
pa'i tshig snyad du lhag par mos so// mgor re la yang kha'i skyo zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra raka tu dubya ba sId du lhag par mos so/ kha'i sgo re re la yang rtse'i rtswa mo zhing thams
cad du rdul phra rab tu dbye ba nyid du lhag par mos so// lce'i rtsa mo'i dkyil 'khor re la yang nges ba'i tshig gi sgar btags pa'i tha snyad yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/
bka' stsal pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig ga spyod ba dang mnyam bas/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i dkya'i 'khor dang mthun par grub nas/ lhag pa'i bsam
pa nyon mongs pa'i ri chen po rnam par mthor ba'i las byang bas sgrub par 'gyur ba'i las de dag 'chags so// mi 'chab bo// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'tshal bar 'gyur
ba'i bshags pas 'chags so// bsal lo// rnam par gzhag go rab tu gzhom mo// stong ngo// gdon to// las la dbang pas dbang bgyi'o// stobs bskyad pa
b.res pa rnams kyi bde ba nye bar bstan pa'i slad du yongs su bsngo'o// gang du yang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bgyidapar 'tshal ba/ byang chub sems/
dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su sbyong bar 'tshal ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'tshal ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i
smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'tshal ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i gter thams cad thob par 'tshal ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa/
yang dag par ra dzan par 'tshal ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par 'tshal ba/ sems can shums cad yongs su smin par bgyid par 'tshal ba/
'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa thams cad rtogasapar 'tshol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i srod pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba rtogs par 'tshal/
ba rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing/ sgrib bam mnga' bas mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bu s sgrub pa/
'gyur ba'i las bshags par bgyi ba de bzhinadu/ cinas kyang bdag gis bshags bas legs par bshags par 'gyur ba dang/ yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang/ 'do gas pa/
bar 'gyur ba dang/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang/ bsal bar 'gyur ba dang/ dugam mchis par 'gyur ba dang/ sgrib pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang/ bar du
gcod pa mamachis par 'gyur ba dang/ yon tan gyi chos thams cad sgrub bar 'gyur ba de lta bur sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las kyi shes ba thams cad 'chags so/ ji ltar bdag gis
ngon du bshags pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byamasam lus pa thams cad na/ sems can ji tsam sems can gyi ris na mchis ba/ sems can gyi khams de ngag thams
cad kyi ched du yang bsgrib par 'gyur ba'i las kyi nyes pa 'chags so// de ltar bdag gis las kyis ba sgribakhar 'gyur ba thams cad so sor bshags nas/ sgrib ba ma mchis pa
@# rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ 'grob thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes suyi rang ngo/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis ngan song
dbul po yi dgas kyi mi khom par mchi ba thams cad rnam bar zlog pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// sems can la gnod pa ma mchis shing 'od gsal ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs
kyis khyad par gang gis ngan song dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi mi khom par mche ba thams cad rnam par bzlog par de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang
gas sems can dmyal ba'i ma khom par mchi ba thams cad rnam par zlog pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// bzang po'i gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyis khyad par gang gis lha dang
mar skye ba thams cad yongs su 'dzan pa dre la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang mgu ba dang bdeb thams cad
myong ba de la rjes su yi rung ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gi 'khor ba la yid 'byung ba'i sems thub pa de la yang rjesasu yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par
gang gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag bas yongs su bzung ba thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dgakhab rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyadabar gang gis dge ba'i bshes gnyena rnams gus
ba'i sams kyi rnyed pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par bgyid de/ mnyes nas mi mnyas
par mi 'gyur ba'i de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las chos bstan pa mngon sum du nyan cing
thos nas som nyA dang yid gnyis zlog pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyis khyad par gong gas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad nas 'byung ba rtogs pa
da la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sems can thums cad kyis ston pa'i sams bskyed pa rang pa re la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge
ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mig thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// ngag ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis ngos
mnyam pa'i rjes su mchi ba'i smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyang bar gang gis lus mtshan dang
dpa byad bzang pos legs par brgyan pa thob ba de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis yon tan thams cad rnam par dag ba'i rgyan ngag
0// yongs su dag pa thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis stobs bcus brgyan pa'i sams rin po che thob pa de la
yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i du ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs las phyi'i milcog pa'i thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis gzungs kyi rigs khong du chud pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gangagis chos kyi dbyangs rnam par dag pa khong du chud
pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis rnam par smin pa ma zad m la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa thob pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// ngag

ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi khyad par gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bsgrub pa khong du chud pa de la ya nga rjes su yi rang go/ dge ba'i rtsa kha'atshogs kyi khyad par gang gis bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag
tshogs thams cad rab tu bcom nas khyu mchogatu gyur pa khong du chud pa di la yang rjes su yi rang ngo/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi nyan thos dang/ rangasangs rgyas thams cakyi
chos mnyam pa nyid las skyes pa'i rig pa dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang/ zagapa mamachis pa dang/ ldan ba gang lags pa de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ngo/

0 byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba thams cad dang ldan pas na/ bla na mo da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub khong du chung ba dang ldan pa'i bar/
gyi ngag ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ rimagar bgyi ba byang chub sems dang ba dbang
bskur ba rnams kyi khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du 'jug pa gang lags pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i
las kyi sladadu/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ rim gro bgyi ba khang chub sams dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na gnas kyi khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bgyi bas/ 'jig rten
gyikhams chab 'byams thams cad du 'jug pa gang lags pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/
rim gror bgyi ba byang chub sems dpa' mngal na gnas pa rnams kyi bsonganams kyi me tog rgyas pa'i snying po snang ba zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du 'jug pa gang
lags pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ ma gro bgyi ba byang chub kyi snying po mchog
dam pa na gnas la/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po gtsug bla ma zhes bgyi bas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du'ajug pa'i gang lags
pa de la yang rjes su yi rang ngo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dus gsum du gshegs b rnams kyi dge ba'i skabasamakhas pa bsam gyisami khyab pas rnam badza'abruya bo dang/
ldan ba gang lags pa de la yang rjes su yirang ngo/ gang du yang byang chub sems dbang 'dud kyitsodakha'i dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu btul bar ratshal ba/ bas kyis rgol ba'i tshogs
thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'tshal ba/ ma rig mun pa mun nag dang rab rib kyi lang tog mang bo sol bar 'tshalab/ ngan song dang mi khom pa dang/ ngan 'gro'i las thams cad gacod
! bar 'tshal ba/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal/ chos thams cad snang ba thob par 'tshalakha/ kun tu bzang po lus khyu mchog tu gyur pa thob par
'tshal kha/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshan khar 'gyur ba'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam babadag 'thob par 'tshalakha/ chos thams cad ji lto babazhin du rtogs bar bgyi
ba'i sladadu/ shes kyi mig rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal kha/ bakhor ba'i 'gal zlog par 'atshalakha/ chos kyi'akholachen po bskor kha 'tshalakha/ stobs cu'i la shes kyis
ba non par 'tshal ba rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gsi/ sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pachags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bsamkhyen tsang rag dum khyen ba de lta bu s//
dag pa'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo// gtso bodang dam pa dang/ khyad par du 'bag
pa dang/ rab dang phul dang/ gya nom pa dang/ bla ma dang/ blun ma mchis pa dang/ mahAm pa ma mchis pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang/
snang ba ma mchis pa dang/ bdag nyid chen bo dang/ tha'irgyas mnan pa dang/ yon tan gyis chos thams cad sdud pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal
pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo// ji ltar bdag gi den du rjes su yi rang ba de bzhinadu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad n sams na ji tsam semA
can gyi ris yis rnamachis te// sums can gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo// de lta bdag dag kha'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes
su yi ran gnas / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la skul lo// de lta na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams phyogasabcu'i mu thug yongs su rje bar 'jug pa// 'jig rten gyi
khams thams cad gzhi dal ba'i rjes su 'gro zhing 'jug pa/ stong 'og med pa'i rgyud kyi phyogs yongs su rje bar bshad pa la/ 'tsho ba'i rgyud kyi 'jig rten/
gyi bamasa mngon du khasgrub// rnam par dbye ba 'gag 'phrul lta bu/ chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa'i 'jig rtenagyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na/ sangs rgyaso bcom ldan
'das gang dag kha cig bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thams cad mngon par btul nas/ banamud pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub man par rdzogs par sangs rgyusate/ chos thos
cad lasgrib pa med pa nyid brnyes pa// byang chub kyi snying bo mchog dam bar gshegs pa/ chos kyi tshul g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin du gyur la// chos kyi sku rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa dag
'di lta ste/ chos bzung bar mdzad pa'i slad du/ 'jig rten thams cad na bskul ba'i sa la bzhes te/ chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis
bla ma la rimo gus par bgyi ba chen pos lus btud par bgyis nas/ chos kyi 'khor le chen po 'gatu bskor bar bskul s/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su grub par bgyi ba dang
'gro ba thams cad bskyab pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par byang bar bgyi ba dang/ som ni thams cad yong ngag pa gzhom pa dang/ thatsemathams cad kun tu gcad ba dang//
sangs rgyas dang chos dang/ dge 'dun thams cad rab tu bsgrags pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyis pha rol tu phune ba'i yan lag thams cad shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa/ phyir mi ldog pa stobs bcus sbelegyisam non pa 'khor ba'i 'khor rab tu 'joms pa/
lta bar gyur pa dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu 'jig pa// so so yang dag par rig ba bzhi rjes su bsgrags pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sgra dang ldan r// 'phags pa'i bden pa
bzhi pa tshul nges par brtags pa'i chos kyi 'khor letshan bo bskor bar gsol// snying rjechen po'i stobs la lhag bar ngagugs bar bgyi ba dang/ rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
rgyun mi gcad par bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam thams cad yongs su sbyang pa'i slad du/ byang chub samos dpa' thams cad la yang bdag bskul go/ snying rjemanabo'i
stobs la lhag par dmags bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la yang bdag bskul 'ako/ mi dge ba'achos thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang/
dge ba'i chos thams cad yongasasu rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems can thams cad l yang bdag bskul lo/ gongaduyang byang chub sems dpakhasalaba'i phung bo dang ldan
rnams kyis/ ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bsamkhyen tsangarab tu mkhyen pa de
lta bu s/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad la bskul bar bgyi
bde bzhinadu/ bdag kyang bskul ba'i mchog dang/ gtso bo dang dam pa dang/ khyad par du 'phags pa dang/ rab dang thul dang/ gya nom pa dang/ bla ma dang bla na kho mchis pa
dang gong na ma mchis pa dang/ mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang/ snang ba ma mchis ba dang/ bdag nyid chen po
ny+tsA dang zil gyis mi non pa dang/ yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa bskyal pas bskul lo// ji ltar bdag gi yon
dubaskul ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus ba thams cad na/ sems can ji tsamasems can gyi ris namachis pa/ samos can gyi khams de dag thams
cad kyi ched du yang bskul lo// gang du yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdag mngon par gsol pa/ da lta phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenagyi khams phyogs bcu'i u thug yongs su rje
bar 'jug ba/ 'a jig rten gyi khams thams ca da gzhi la pa'i rjes su 'grozhing 'jug ba/ stong 'og med pa 'i rgyud kyi phyogs yongs su rjed par bshad// chol pa'i rgyud kyi 'jib
rten gyi khams ma ngen par bsgrub pa// rnam par dbye ba'i mig 'phrul lta bu/ chos kyi dbyangs su gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams mas cad na/ sangs rgya sa bcom ldan
'das gang dag kha cig chos kyi 'khor loshin tu bskor khra/ gdul ba dag shin tu btul ba zam pa dag shin tu brtags pa/ bstan pa dag shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub
soms dba' dgashin tu lung bstan pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dag nitu mdzad/ bas kyi rgol ba'i phyogs thams cad shin tutshar gcad pa rdzas su bstan pa'i rnams shin tu
'bags ba/ zhing thams cad du bsgrags pa 'grob thams cad kyis bsams ba ji bzhin du rnam par dag pa'i gnas rnams zhing de dang de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab
'byams dredang de dag dang/ sems can gyi rigs de dang de dag na sems can rab 'byams ma gus par gyurang/ dbang po yongs su skyob/ snod du ma gyur pa// de bzhin gsheg
ba la lta ba'i rgyun ba gcad pa// rtag tu chags ba/ yul la mngon par dga' kha/ 'dus byas kyi sgra'i bsozan pa/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la srid pa'idabang du mchis pa de dang de dag
/bya@#// la yul thams cad la bdag med par yang dag par ston cing/ sems can 'khor ba la mngon bar dab 'ba rnams yid 'byung ba skyed pa'i ched dang/ 'du byed
thams cad m brtag par ba tu bstan pa la chedadu/ 'byor pa thams cad mthar rgud pa'i skor yang dung du'ang ston la/ sangs rgyas yongs su mtshon las 'das pa chen po zhi bar yang
dag par bstan pa'i ched du/ srog gi dbang po thams cad mthar 'chi bar yang dag par ston cing/ de bzhin bshegs pa 'anyos tashin tu bral nas/ 'jig rtenadu mi dga' brten
po ston la/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston te/ lha'i dbang po thams cad ngu ba dang/ klu'i dbang po thams
cad mya ngan bgyid pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thams cad skya sngags 'don pa dang/ 'gro ba'i dbang po thams cad rab tu ma dag ba'i yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po//
lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du ston pa na/ bdag gas bla ma la ri mo gus pachen pos lus btud pa bgyis nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
la sku tshe bsring ba dang/ ring du bzhugs par gsolagyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung bo las bzlog pa dang/ sems can thams
cad rab tu ba de ba la dgod pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dbul bo'i lam rnam par gcad pa dang/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa chen po las bsgral ba
dad 'gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul bsgrig pa ma mchis pa la dgodapa dang/ dbul po'i lam thams cad gnang pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad ches dkon mchog gis
tsham par bgyi ba dang/ 'jag rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang/ 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba glang gdug pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' thams cad yongs su
bzung ba'i slad du/ bskal pa chos kyi dbyangs kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyis mthas gtugs bar bzhugs su gsol/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag
mngon bar gsol ba'i mchog gsu mngon par gsol la// gtso bo dang/ dam ba dang/ khyad par du 'phags pa dang/ rab dang phul dang/ gya nom pa dang/ bla ma dang/ bla na
ma mchis pa dang/ gong na ma mchis pa dang/ mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang/ mi mnyam pa mnyam pa dang/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang/ snang ba ma mchis pa dang/ bdag nyid
chen po dang/ thal gyis mnan pa dang/ yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i mngon par gsol bas gsol la//
gang du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ka dag gas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing/ sgrib pa mi mnga' bsamkhyen tsangarab tu mkhyen/
pa de lta bu s/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gus ba de lta bu dang/ lus 'dud pa de lta bu dang/ ngag gis las 'byung ba de lta bu dang/ yid kyi las bsgrub pa de lta bu s//
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'da' bar phyogs par dgongs pa la phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par sku tsho yongos su bskyang bar mngon bar gsol bar bgyi ba de bzhin du/
bdag kyang gsol lo// ji ltar bdag gi don du gsol ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa thams cad nasems can gyi rjes na mchis pa/ sams
can gyi khams thams cad kyi ched du yang mngon par gsol 'a// bdag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gsol ba'i dge bcu ba'i stobs bskyed ba thob par gyur//
bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs kyis brtan par gyur/ dad pa dang mos pa'i stobs la shin tu gnas par gyur nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snodayongs par yang dag par
bskyed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rab 'byams thoms cad yang dag par bzung ngo// byang chub sams dpa'i dkyil 'khe'o thams cadon/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar
byang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrib pa ma mchis pa la brtson pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas rjes su dran pa// 'gro ba thams/
nyid yongs su skyob pa'i sems dang ldan pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chen po rtsol bas tshol ba/ go cha chen po bgos pa// smon lam chen po mngon par 'grub pa/ dge ba rtsom
ba rgya che bachen po la rab tu brtson pa// pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor du rab tu sbyor ba/ yon tan gyis thams cad rnam par sbyong bar 'tshol ba/ mkhri' dang dbung ma
mchis pa'i sa la gnas bar 'atshal ba/ 'grob thams cad kyis yongs su rdzogs par 'tshal ba sems kyi 'khri shing rnam par sbyong bar 'tshal ba/ chos kyi sgo na bar
stobs par 'tshal ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i shugs rnam par sa la gar ratshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad stobs
rnam par dag pa'i mthar gtugs pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang/ ma gro bgyi ba'i slad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyad cig
skyod pa dang/ skyod par 'gyur ba dang/ bskyod pa de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa la btang ba rnams dang/ yang dge ba'i rtsa ba/
gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sa nas sar 'bar ba'i mod pa las skyes pa rnams dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po 'i sod pa'i
smon lam yongs su rdzogs ba las byung ba rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'phrul ba dang ldan pa la zhugs pa// chos thams cad kyi don mthong ba rjes su thob pa//
chags pa ma mchis pa'i ya shes kyis sa'i snying bo rdo rje ltar srab ma shes ba'i sams bskyed pa rnams kyi dgaba'i rtsa kha'itshogs kun tu nas sgo/ de bzhin gshegs paThams cad mngon
sum du gyur pa/ las kyi shugs kun nas ngos le shes 'phags pa zhes dgyi bas bskyod pa/ sems kyi skad cig soms kyi skad cig la yang de bzhinagshegs pa la mchod pa dang/
mgro bgyid par 'jug sgo/ de dag 'jug pa dang/ dge ba rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pas/ thams cad m khyenapa'i ng kyi tshad med pa 'i skyon rnams si/ sams kyi skad cig sams kyi
skad cig lasems can gyi khams thams cad la mngon par 'gengs shing/ ci tsam du rlabs kyi tshul brjod pa la 'jug/ dpag tumamachis ba dag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyang yang dag par 'grubaste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad de dag thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs de dag thams cad rgyu mi 'chad par gtong ba de tsam du
ba ni/ bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa'i snod la mos pa'i lam shan tu rnam par dag pa yang dag par bskyod nas/ dge pa'i rtsa ba 'i shugs de dag h+phams cad yang dag par mnod do///
yang dag par gzung ngo// bdag gange bgyi'o// blong ngo// lhagapar mos so// kun gyi rjes su zhugs par bgyi'o// bdag ga'i bgyi ba mchog dang/ gtso bo dang/
dam pa dang/ khyad par du 'phags pa dang/ rab dang phul dang/ gya nom dang/ bla ma dang/ bla na ma mchis pa dang/ ma nyam pa ma mchis pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
pa dang/ mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang/ snang ba ma mchis pa dang/ bdag 1de chen po dang/ zal gyis mi non pa dang/ yon tan gyi chos thams cad sdud pa dang//
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i bdag garebagyi bas bdag gar bgyi'o// keng du yang byang chub sems dpa' bsonganams kyi tshogs yang dag par
len par 'tshal/ yon tan gyi tshogs sgrub par 'tshal ba/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i yul la 'jug par 'chel ba/ chags pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' la gnas par 'tshol
ba/ dus gsum thams cad du 'jug paro 'tshal ba rnams kyi ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mkhyenacing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bu s/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
bdag gire bgyi ba de bzhin du/ bdag gsad kyang bdag gir bgyi'o// bdag ga'i bgyi ba mchog dang dam pa deng khyad par du 'phags pa dang/ ngab ma mchis
pa dang/ snang ba ma mchis pa dang/ mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang 2 'dra ba ma mchis pa dang/ mi 'dra ba rnam par dag pa dang/ rtog pa pa dang/ tshig gi lam dang/ bsngags
ba bstan pa mtha' yas pa thams cad kyis bdag gi'i bgyi bas badrag gar bgyi'o/ jilta bu dag gi dond bdag kha'i bgyi ba de bzhunedu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byamasamalus la
tsha thamasacad na/ sems can ji tsam sems can gyings na mchis pa sam sacan gyi khams de dag thams cad kyi ched du ya nga bdag bgyi'o// bdag chos kha dang ldan pa'i dgaba'i/
rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa'i dgaba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhag par mchod pa dang ldan
sgyu ba'i dgaba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ mos pa'i stobs las nges bar 'byang ba'i mchodapa dang ldan pa'i dgakha'i rtsakha gangalags pa dang/ sgrib pa'i gyur ba thams cad bsal kha'i
dag ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dgaba'itso bgang lags pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul bdang ldan ba'i dgakha'i rtsa bgang lags l
sa ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mnopar gsol pa drang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ bdag gi'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab 'byams zimasacad sangs rgyas dang byang
rlabasams dang 'thams cad la shin tu phrul nas bdag ga'i bgyi ba dang ldan pa'i dgakha'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba blogam dang bo ma mchis pa tshar bas nas
bgyis la/ thams cad mkhyen par yongs su ma bsdos pa gang lags pa dang/ bdag gi dge ba'i lta ba 'dus byas kyis yo byada'atshal bas ma ngen par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang/
nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon pa ra khasgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba las kyi mngon par bslabs pa dus thams cad du
bsags pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi shes kyis mokhyenab gang lags pa de dag thams cad yongs su bsdus pa/ bskrumago/ bsdu bar bgyi'o// gong duyang byang chub
sems dpa' sangs rgyas thamasacad lamachod par 'tshal bo/ dekhazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyabastan pa yang dag par 'dzin par 'tshalab rnams kyis/ ji ltar sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das dag gis mkhyen cing rab tu mkhyen pa de lta bu s/ dgaba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsdu bar bgyib de bzhinedu/ bdag gis kyang yongs su bsdu'o/ bsdusanas
[f ]@#// 'di lta ste/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa'i las dang/ mtshan rgyas par bgyi ba dang/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyis byang chub sams dpa' kun tu bzang po 'ison lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang/ stobs bcu dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs myur du khong du mchudapar bgyi ba'i
slad du/ sems can thams cad la sul do// gtang ngo// yongs su gtang ngo// rnam par gtang ngo// nges par btang ngo// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad
la dbul lo// btang ngo// yongs su gtang ngo// rnam par gtang ngo// des par gtang ngo// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbul lo// btang ngo// yongs
su gtung ngo// rnam par gtang ngo// nges par gtang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa re re la mchod pa'i las kyis slad du/ da ltar 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
cad mkhyen pa byang chub kyi yan lag tu gyur pa rnams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chos kyis dbyings kyi tshad tsam rnams su mchodapa bkod pa thamasaMcud kyis rgyunagyi chos kyi dbyangs kun tu
gnas par 'gyur cig/ bani po che thams cad kyis khobs pa'i chos kyis dbyings kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ ma tog thams cad kyis bla res bres pa'i rgyan gyi chos kyis dbyings kun
tu gnas par gyur cig/ ni po che thams cad kyis rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i chos kyi dbyangs kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyis dra ba bres pi rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyangs/
kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyin bzas g.yogs pa'i rgyan gyi chos kyidabyings kun tu gnas par gyugacig/ gzhal du ma mchis pa'i dgos kyi sA na gyi char
dang rin po che thams cad kyisasangs rgyas la mchod pa bkod pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ snying po'i sos thams cad kyis gdugs pa'i rgyanagyi
chos kyi dbyangs kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ rgyan gyi dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa las grol pa/ sil snyan ' khrel ba dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyangs kun du
gnas par gyur cig/ rin po che thams cad kyi brlabakrams pa'i rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyangs kun tu gnas pa gyur cig/ thams cad kyis rjes su sgrub pa'i sprinagyi rgyan gyi chos kyi dbang
kun tu gnas par gyur cig/nangon mas cad kyi sprin snang ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyan gyi tshes kyi dbyanges kun tu gnas par gyur cig/ lha'ithams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ rin po
che'i cod pan sna tshogs kyi spranegyi rgyan gyi chos kyi dbyangs kun gnas par gyur cig/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams de bzhin
gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dumachod pa thams cad dang ldan pas 'jug pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad
kyi la khel gyi dkyil 'khor du/ de ltar dub ga dum mchis pa mchod ba phyi ma'i many+dza'i mur thug par byin gyis rlob ba la 'jug par gyur cig/ gongaduyang ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom
blo ldan 'das dag gis mkhyen cing rab tumkhyen pa de lta bu s/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang/ nyanathos dang/ rang sangs
'a rgyas thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad lagadon bar bgyi ba dang/ gsol bar bgyi ba dang/ dbul bar bgyi bde
pa/ bzhin du/ bdag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thums cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol lo// yongs su gtong ngo// gdon to// dbul go/ bdagags sems can thams cad dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas
thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phul nas/ bsod nams kyi phung bo yongs
su bsdus pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po dang gtum mchis shing bsam gyi mi khyab pa// de bzhinagshegs pa ye shes kyis mkhyen pa gang lags pa des bdag gtanapar gyur nas//
bdag blo named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o// ji ltacom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pamar ma mdzad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
gshegs pa zla 'od la mchodapa'i dam pas mchod nas/ dang po byang chub tu thugs bskyadar de bzhinatu 1 bdag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyod par bgyi'o/ ji ltar bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub ba tshong dpon gyi bu mngon dag gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'angs de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes tshon la brten ta dang go khyadachub tu thugs bskyed pa de
bzhin du/ bdag kyang byang chub tusams bskyed par bgyi'o/ 'ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagashegasapa tsho dpag mad dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa na/ bcom ldan
'das do bzhin gshegs pa'i jig rten dbang phyug rgyal bo la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mngon par bstod nas/ byang chub tu thugs skyod pa de bzha/ bdag kyang
byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi khrug pas/ sams theg pa ma mchis pa dang/ sems mi khug pa dang/
bathamasacad dubatu'abyung ba dang/ mnor 'byung ba'i sems kyis seng ge 'i sga mngon par bsgrags te/ de bzhin gshegs l sAnar tu dngab las//
byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdagongasams bskyed par bgyi'o/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang bos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i dpal la dgaba'i rtsa ba rnamakhamang bo brgyadanas/ byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ ji ltar byang chub sems
dpa' byams pa rgyal bogaser mdog lta bur gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa gsar gyi mchod sdong gi 'od la bkod pa du mas mchodapa dang/ ramigro bgyis nas/
byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang srims bskyed par bgyi'o/ ji ltar byung chub sa mas dpa' blo gros rgya mtshoyul shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i
rgyal po gyur ban/ de bzhani gshegs pa yon tan gyi 'od zer tshatha' yas la bkur bsti bgyisanas/ byang chub tu sems bskyod pa de bzhinedu/ bdag kyang sems bskyed par
bgyi'o/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod lhas dbang bskur te/ stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal bor gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam
thams cad las yang dag par byang ba// rin po che'i gzi brjida mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal bo 'gadugs gcig bzhin du/ na po che'i phung po la btsal bas mchod pa bgyis te/
bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcur mtshodapa dang/ rim gro bgyis nas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdagadasams bskyed pa lnga bgyi'o ji ltar 'jam dbala gzhon nur
gyur pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la mchod ba dang/ rim gro rnam pa du ma bgyis nas byang chutu sams
bskyod pa de bzhin du bdag kyang sams bskyadabar bgyi'o// jiltar khyadachub sems dpa' kun tu bazang pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa la shes rdo rje rgya mtsho rgyal po la ste stang bgyi
nas/byang chub tusems bskyod pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang sems bskyed par bgyi gro/ mchog dam pa nga rgyal zhing/ samasam lags pa 'asamang dang/ 'gro ba thams cad yod
su bskya babasams dang/ byang chub kyi soms des khyad par ma gyur ba'i chos kyis dbanges de gang yang m mchis so// byang chutu sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa kha'i tshogs des dus gsum
dum khyab pa cung zad kyang mamachis so// sangs rgyas thams cad manyes par 'gyod kha 'asims dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu dga' ba brgyade ba'i soms
dngakun thes dang rangasangs rgyas thams cad rjes su yi rang ba 'isamasu dang/ sams khaskyod pa des los su zan bar mgyur khasams de dag gang yang ma mchis
so mchodabang mgyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de gang yang ma bzhugs so/[” ]/gang du sems bskyed de/ bskyadam thogs pa bsod nams kyi phung boning btumang gi/ sems can khams
cad 'khor los sgyur ba drang/ 'jigarten skyong ba dang/ brgya byan dang/ tshangs pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas su gyur ba rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po nid tsam ma lags so//
bdag gi bsod namos kyi phung bo byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang/ sems can thams cad l stsal pa gang lags pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas
thams cad la phul ba gang lags pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' thams cad la phul ba gang lags pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phul ba'i bsod
nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung ba gang lags ba dang/ gang yashes dang/ mos pa mngon par bsgrubs pa rnams kyi mos pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gang lags pa dang/ sangs
rgyas thams cad la phyaga'atshal ba dang/ ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gangalags ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad l lhag par mchod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa
dang mos pa'i stobs las byung ba'i mchod pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ sgrib par 'gyur ba thams cad s la pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ rjes su ya/
rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang ldan pa'i dgaba'i rtsa bgang lags pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos te/
bdag ga'i bgyi ba dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang/ bdag ba dge ba rtsa ba'i thog ma dang po mamachis pa'i tshe rabs nas bgyis pa thams cad mkhyen par yongs su ma bsngos pas nga la gas pa
dang bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la dus byas kyi yo byad 'tshal bsa mngon par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa dang/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas kyi sa'i slad du mngon par
bsgrubs par gang lags pa dang/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba las kyis bsgrubs ba mngon gyi dus nas bsags pa de bzhanegshegs pa'i ya shes kyis mkhyen pa gang lags ba de dag kun
cad yongs su bsdu'o/ yongs su bsdus nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su khasdo'o khadag gi dgakha'i rtsa ba 'di dgags sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes
par bgyingacing dgyis bar bgyid pa'i gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyong bar gyur cig/ sems can thams cad yongs su smonapar bgyid par gyur cig/
'dage ba'i gshes gnyen thams cad dang chos smra ba thams cad magu bar bgyid cing dga' bar bgyud par gyuracig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan pa
a yang dag par 'dzin cing srung ba dang/ yongs su skyong gyur cig/ sgab pa'i lang tog thams cad rnam par sbyong bar gyur cig/ bdud kyi rtsod pa'i dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu
'dulakhar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par gyur cig/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang/ dbang thams cad thob pa dang/ mngon
brtsashes pa thams cad kyis rnam par brtsi ba dang/ rnam par thar pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul bar gyur cig/ ci nas kyang 'khor ba ni ma 'bral zhing/ tshor bas gzhan
dus pa na chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sums dpa' sod pa pha rol tupani pa bskyadapar mi 'gyur ba dang/ phyis pa so so'i skya bo dang 'dra bar 'grib ba'achadang
mthunapa rnamar gyur ba de ltar/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// ci nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dinas sangs rgyas mngon sum du
bzhugs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du sangs rgyas de dag la mchod pa bkod pa'i brgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyade dumachis pa dang/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa bkod ba'i rgyan de'i
ma'i sams bskyed pa thob pa yongs su rdzogs par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshon yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis phyag g.yas pa gsar/
gyi kha dog can brkyang sku/ bdag gi spyi bor 'dzeg par gyur cig/ mi nus bdag drangos po thams cad lam blta ba bkod pa rgyun thogs ma mchis pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
yongs su bsgos pa'isams dang/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun chad pa'i sems kyis 'chis pa'i dus brgyade bar gyur cig dad pa grangs ma mchis pa dung/ mi sogs bal
bgyi ba grangasam mchis pa dang/ dga' ba dang dad pa grangs ma mchis pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dengag lalta zhing rtogal/ kun tu skya bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus brgyad
bar gyur cig/ mchod pa yid du 'ong bas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod cung kA ma tog dang/ sos dang/ srungab dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma drang/ na bza' dang/
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ badran dpag tu ma mchis pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod cing lha la rtog bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus bgyid par gyur cig/
bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chadapagyuracig/ dud 'gro'i skyo gnas dang/ gshin rje 'jig rten thams
cad rgyunachad par gyur cig/ lha da lo thams cad dang/ mi dbul bo thams cad dang/ sar sna thams cad 'chal ba tshul khrims thams cad dang/ gnod sbyin
[A ]sems can thams cad dang/ le la thams cad dang/ rnam bar g.yeng ba thams cad dang/ 'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig/ byang chub tu sams dpa'
dang sangs rgyas la lta ba dang/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang/ dge ba'i gshes ma nyen dang 'grogs pa dang ma 'bral bar gyur cigro/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das bdag sangs rgyas bam
ldan 'das thams cad dang lus mnyam par gyur cig/ ngag mnyam pa dang/ sams mnyam ba dang/ ye shes mnyam par gyur cig/ ji ltar gong duyang sangs rgyas khracom ldan
'das bdag gi ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen cingarab tu mkhyen pa de ltabus/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dge ba'i
rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngobar bgyi ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang ngag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i mchog gsayongs su bsngos so/ gtso bo dang/ dam pa dang/ khyad par du 'phags pa dang/ rabo dang/ bul dang bla na mamachis pa/
dang gong nas ma mchis pa dang/ mnyam pa ma mchis pa dung mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang/ mtshungs pa mamaches pa dang snang bam mchis pa dang/ bdag nyid chen
bo dang/ bla ma dang zil gyis ma non ba dang/ yon tan gyi chos thams cad bsdud pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka'asul pa'i yongs su bsngo bas
yongs su khasdo'o// ji ltar bdag gis den du yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du 'jigartan gyi khams rab 'byams ma lus pa zams cadran/ sems can ji tsam sems can gyi risan
mchis pa sems can gyis khams de dag thams cad kyichad du yang yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dilas su bdag shas kyis 'dzan par 'dod pa de dag gis kyang rjes su yirang ngo//
zhes brjod pa/ra bya'o/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad l dam 'cha'abar gnas pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di skad
cas smasaso// 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa kha na ma tho ba mad pa yani/ rjes su yi rang ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang/ bskul ba kha na ma tho ba mdang
dang gsol ba 'debs pa kha na ma tho bam dpa dang/ yongs su bsngo ba kha na ma tho ba mad pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems
dpa' chos thams cad la 'char bar gnas pa la 'di skad ces sbas so// rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po dag 'dus pa dang///
ma khyen pa da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing/ des yan lag lnga sa la gtug par bya// des bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can thams cad gayas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par gyur cig/ cas brjod par bya'o/ des pus mo g.yon pa'i lha nga sa la 'dzugs pa
na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can gang su dag g.yon phyogs kyi lam la gnas pa de dag thams cad 'phags pa'i lam la gnas shing/ yang dag pa'i lam la gnas par gyur cig
ces brjod par bya'o// des lag pa g.yas pa sa la 'dzugs pa na/ tshig [“]'di skad ces ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam pa la bzhugs pa// dgaba'i
chos thams cad dang ldan pas/ dbu dang sku dang/ skyal mo dkrung la yongs su dbyugs te/ phyag g.yas pa sa la bsnun nas/ bdud dbung dang bcas pa btul te/ byang chub
brnyes pa de bzhin du/ sems can 'di dag gis kyang bdud phyi rgol ba tshom par gyur cig/ byang chub kyi sAng bo la 'dug cings chen po la bsnun nas/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shas thob
par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o// des lag pa g.yon pas la 'dzugs pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces sems can gdasu dag byas pa'i chos la gnas te/ g.yon phyogs su/
'dzin pa gdul dka' ba de dag thams cad basdud pa'i dngos po bzhis shanitu sdud par gyur cig ces brjod par bya'o/ des gdong dang da bral ba sa la gtug pa na/ tsheg 'doyod/
ces sems can thams cad nga rgyal ma mchis pa 'os bla nam da pa rnams la rim gro 'gyod pa snyadacing/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba dwang/ dge ba'i chos thams cad 'phags
bar gyur cig/ de ltar bdag yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal ba 'dis/ sam sa can thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga rnam par sal ba gyur cig/ dbang po lta yongs su rdzogs par/
gyur cig/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yongs su shes par gyur cig/ mngon par shes panyams pa med pa lnga thob par gyur cig/ mag lnga longs su dag par gyur cig/ sems
can 'gro ba ltar skyes pa rnams 'gro ba lnga las khyad par du 'phags par gyur cig/ tshulakhraches khyadapar du'aphags ba dang/ ting nge'adzani khyadabar du 'phags pa dang/
shes rab khyad par du 'phags pa dang/ rnam par grol ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang/ rnam bar grol ba'o shes mthong ba khyad par 'phags par gyur cig/ ces brjod par
'bya'odo 'das yan lag lnga yongs su dag pa dang/ sgribs pa lnga dang bral ba dang/ stobs lnga la gnas pa dang/ de bzhinagshegs pa yid la byed pa dung ma/
bral bas/ tshaga'adi skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku dad ldan pa/ skum lags pa/ gsung dag pa gsung mi mang ba/ soms dang sams mi mang ba/ se shes
chags pa ma mnga' ba dang ldan pa// mkhyen pa ma bzhud pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa// thams cad gazigs pa dang ldanupa rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag gis
'a7 'khor ba thog ma 'a mtha' mu nas bzung ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang/ bdag gis mtha'am 'tshal bas/ chos ma lags pa la chos su 'du shes bskyod pa dang/ 'dul ba
aM ma lags ba la 'dul bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang/ sbyin gnas ma lags pa la sbyin gnas su 'du shes bskyed pa dang/ mi dge ba la dge ba 'du shes bskyed pa dang/ phyin ci log gi
sams kyis bdag gsams kyis bdag gi lus su lta bas yongs su dkris pa dang/ dge ba'i chos gung sangs rgyas kyis bka' ma stsal ba mngon pa 'dus bgyis pa dang/
bgyid pa dang/ bgyid du stsal pa dang/ bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bas 'gyur pa gang ci mchis pa de bdag 'chagasaso// migos pa la gnas te/ bdag gis sems
nyanam mchis pa la sems can du 'du shes pa dang/ sems can sgyu ma lta bur ma 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod pa gang lags
pa de thams cad 'chags so// bdag gA mngon par 'dus bgyid po mams par ma 'tshal nas// lus dang ngag dang yid kyisatshos dgakha dang/ mi dgabaman bar
bgyadeb dang/ mngon par bgyis pa gang lags pa de rachags so// bdag gis sman pa dang tshul khrims dang/ bzod ba dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtanadang/
shes rab mnyam pa nyid du ma 'tshal nas/ dmigs par lhung bas sbyin du byin pa dang/ tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pas/ tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang bdag dang gzhan
du 'du shes pas bzod pa bsgoms pa dang/ lus dang sumos la gnas te/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang/ 'du shes dang/ dmigs pa la gnas te/ bsam
gtan skyod ba dang/ kun tu rtogapa dang/ rnam par rtog pa rab tu 'jug pa la man par dga' bas/ shes rab rnam par dpyad par gang lags pa de dag 'chags so//
bdag gis den dam pa'i mchod ba ma 'tshal nas/ gzugs dang rgyan mtshan la mngon par zhen pas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa bgyis pa gang lags pa de'achags so//
/ @#// bdag chos kyi dbyangs tha mi dad pa'i ye shes la ma zhugs kyi/ chos thadad pa la gnas te/ chos mnyam pa'i m bshad pa 'am rab tu bsam par gyur pa gang
lags pa de chags so// bdag gis chos 'dus ma byas su ma 'tshalanas dge 'dun la mang por 'du shes te/ dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa gang lags pa de bdag
! 'chags so// bdag gas dgon pa ma 'tshal nas dgon pa'i gnas bstan te/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa la mngon par zhen pa gang lags pade dag bdag 'chags so//
bdag gis chos nyid gnas par 'tshal nas 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan blang bar zhugs pa gangalags pa de dag bdag 'chags so// bdag gis
[% ]/chos kyi dbyings yongs su bzung ba ma mchis mo 'tshalam zhugs kyis/ sems can bsdu bar 'tshal ba'i bsdu bas sems can dag bsdus pa gang lags pa de 'chags so//
bdag gse byang chub kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin ma 'tshal nas/ lta ba yongs su zhen pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi tshes sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom po gang lags pa de 'chags so// bdag
gis dgeslong gi lam zhi khe ma 'tshal nas/ rab tu byung pa bstan par rdzogs te/ dge sbyogi dngos po brgyadapa gang lags pa do 'chags so// kun rdzob la 'jug pa'i dge ba'i
rtsa ba gzhan gang dag bsags pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gas 'dus byas kyi bde bar gyur te/ 'dus ma byas las shin tu ring du gyur pa gang lags pa de dag 'chags so zhes
kharjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar thog mar byang chub sems dpa' thag la nyal dang bcas pa dang/ mngon pa 'du byed pa dang/ mtshan ma dang bcas ba dang/ 'bad
pa dang bcas pa dang/ sa pa dang bcas pa dang/ len pa dang bcas pa dang/ gnas pa dang bcas pa dang/ rten pa dang bcas pa'i nye bar len pa u0f38chos thams cad bshags
par bya'o// de 'di lta bu'i sdu ba dang/ spros pa dang bcas pa kun tu mi 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni sdig pa bshags pa yongs su dag pa yin te/ 'dini bshags pa'i phung po'o//
rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang nubasems dapa' de bzhinadu 'dug ste/ tshigs 'di skadacas 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da lta khyung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi dang po thugasakhaskyod pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang ldan pa rnams kyi rab de'i dge ba'i
tsa kha gang ci yang rung/ sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa rtsa ba mchis shing rten ma mchis pas gtong ba rnam par dag pa dang/ rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims m zad min+d+hAskyod pa dang//
sems can ma mchis pa'i bzod pa dang/ dmags pa las dben pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ sems kyi ngo bo nyidel dres bar sems pa'i bsam gtan dang/ tshur/
ral dang/ pha rol gyi mthar lta ba rnam par sbyangs pa 'dis rab rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo la 'jug pa dang/ stong ba nyid kyi rnamakha'i byams pa dang/ rnamakha'i rnam pa ma
ts+tsA mchis pa'i snying rje dang/ chos la kun tu ma 'byung bu'i dga'akha dang/ yal bar 'dor ba ma lags pa'i btungasnyoms gang lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo
khyim gyi dngos po thams cad bzung ba ma mchis shing yongs su ma bzung ba/ rtsa ba ma mchis shing rten ma mchis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba medran par gyur ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/
ma 'gags pa dang/ ma skyes pa'i yang dag bar song ba rnams dang/ lus dang/ sams dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ 'dun pa dang ldan pa'i rje ba phrul gyi rkang ba rnams dang/
dbang polnga po mtshonanyidemachis pa'i dbang po rnams dang/ nam mkha' ltar mi thul ba'i stobs rnams dang/ don dam pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub kyiyan laga rnams dang/
ma gnyis pa'i lam dang ldan pa'i lam dang/ zhi ba'i zhi gnas thob pa dang/ rig pa dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ mthun pa'i lhag pa'i mthong/ mngon par shes pa ye shes sngon
bza/ du 'gro ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo// thog ma'i mthar nas lus kyi ngo bo nyid yongs su dag pa dang/ brjod du mamachis pa'i ngag rnam par dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas larimagro/
bgyi ba bsnyen bkur bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang/ chos la mi go bgyi bachos thams cad yongs su bzung ba ma mchis pa dang/ dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi'atshog ma ma mchis shing yon tan
ma mchis pa dang/ spyod lam thams cad rnam par ma brtags pa'i sdom pa sdod pa dang/ 'das pa dang 2 ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa de dag
gis chos sod pa yang dag pa'i sdom pa bdud thams cad kyis mi gus pa 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma nges pa/ byang chub
sems dpa'i lam dang mthunang/ ]duge ba'i rtsa ba bzangapo lasadakar bom lags pa 'gags par 'gyur khogazhan gang mchis pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bzang po 'od gsal ba'ilan
gang gas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gas/ sangs rgyas kyis shes thob pa dang/ mthob pa dang/ 'thob bar gyur pa de dag thams cad la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo// 'das pa
dang/ ma byin pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub bsnyonapa de dag gi tshul khrims dang/ teng nge 'dzin dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/
@#/// ma ba'agrel ba'ang shes mashong ba zag pa ma mchis pa dang/ stobs shulab rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa phyir mi ldog ba rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyis chag
pa ma mchis pa rnams dang/ kun tu mi 'byung ba'i byams pa chen po drang/ snying rje chen po gzhan gyi dring la ma 'jogapa dang/ sa gtsug bltar m mthong nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa
gang lags pa dang/ gnyisom ma chos pa'i bsod nams rnam par sAne ba'i mtshan nyedudang/ lus dang ngag dang/ soms kyi rgyun bcosamam lags pa/ nam mkha' ltar yongs
su dag pa dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa thams cad kyis bskul ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo dang/ brjod pa ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa dang/ sems can thams cad shes
ba snang ba rnam bshos pa las gzhan m lags pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo// sems can thams cad l phan gdag pa'i slad du/ thabs mkhas pa'i gnas laga'
dug 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa 'am/ yongasasu mya ngan las 'das pa yang rung ste/ dam pa'i chos nub kyi bar du
de dag la mchod pa bgyis pa dang/ bgyidapa dang/ bgyis par 'gyur kha gang lags pa de dag thams cad l rjes su yirang ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs sumya ngan
las 'das pa de dag gtan shog 'dus pa/ sems can thams cad las yang dag par 'ag pa rnams dang/ dadabs rjes su 'brangab rnams dang/ chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pa//
rnams dang/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dwang/ log pa brgyad las yang dag par 'dus pa'i brgyad pa rnams dang/ chagasab med pa' rigs la gnas pa'i rdzogs kyi sa lu
rnams dang/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rgyun las bzlog ste/ zhugs pa rnams dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba gang du yang ma 'aglob rnams dang/ phyi'i mi 'ong ba 'di nas shes bos nas der
gnas bgyur ba rnams dang/ dgra bcom pa grangs ma mchis shange skyo bam mchisa'og tu ru ba rnams dang/ phyi ma 'ongakharang sangs rgyas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo
khong du chud pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yashes mngon sum du rtogs pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems sa dang mtshungs pa'isams dang po bskyod pa rnamA
dang byang chub sems dpa' snyed pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams dang/ byang chub sams dpa' 'khor ba'i chos las 'das shing/
sangs rgyas kyi chos thob pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba thams cad las shani tu 'das pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis//
@#/// thogs pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rten pa mamachis pa gang lags pa de dag dang/ 'dus byas las yongs su rgyal kha de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo//
'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i dus kyisems can rnams kyi snyan pa bsod nams bgyiba'i dngos bo dang/ tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos bo dang/
bsgom pa dngos po ma mchis pa'i dngos por gyur pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po sangs rgyas kyi sanagyis mkhyen pa dag la gso ba de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo//
rjes su yi rang ba mchog dang ]ma chad pa dang/ ma lhag pa dang/ nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang/ shes rab dang/ ye shes kyi rtogs pa dang/ gzhan yang nges pa'i
don gyi chos drang/ ldan pa dang/ bla na mchis bo dang/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ mnyam pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang/ mnyam pa nyid
kyi kyi rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ngo// ji ltar 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i sungs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung chub sems dpa' gyur pa// shes rab
kyi ya'a'o tu phyin pa dang/ thabs la mkhas pas zung du 'brel par mchags par spyod pa shin tuspyad pa spyod pa rab tu mkhyen nas/ mkhyen ba de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
d mngon sum du mdzad nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ rjesasu yi rang bar mdzad pa dang/ rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba'i mnyam pa nyid de dang chos nyid des rjes/
su slob de bzhinadu/ bdag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo// rjes su yi rang ba mchog dang/ ma chad pa dang/ ma lhag ba dang/ nam mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang shes rab dang/
bshes kyi rtogs pa dang/ gzhan yang nges ba'i don gyi tshes dang ldan pa dang/ bla na ma mchis pa dang 2 nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rjes su yi rang bas rjes su la rang
ngo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i phung po kha na ma khro bamed pa'o// rigs kyi bu
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshagi 'di skad ces/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan ' dus gang dag kha cig 'jig rten gyi khams dbag tu mamachis shang/
grangs ma mchis pa rnams su bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos thams cad ma dmigs nas bdudabazhi 'i lamalas/
yang dag par 'das pa brjod du med pa'i chos skyon ma mchis pa nges pa/ yi ge dang/ brjod pa dang/ skad ba thams cad dang bral ba/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du brnyas//
wa0/ @#// zabasamakhas pas chos bzung bar mdzad pa'i slad du/ ji tsam du brtags bsems can yongs su snyan bar ma dzad pa 'i slad du/ thugs rje chen pos chud/
mgazanapa/ bskul ba'i sa la bzhes pa rung ma gsung ba la dgyes pa// byang chub kyi shang lag zags pa lha dang/ gludang/ gnodasbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/
nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'brachen po thams cad kyis mngon par bstod do// dgyes shing bzhugs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo rab
tu bskor bar bskul gyis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/ ('di lta ste/ chos kyi 'khor la mi 'jug pa'i
chos kyi 'khor lo dang/ mngon par mi 'grub pa'i 'khor lo dang/ tshu rol dang/ pha la yongs su gcod pa'i 'khor lo dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zab mo'i 'khor lo dang/
rgyu bdud phyir rgolakhachoms pa 'khor lo bskor du gsol/ brjod du ma mchis pa'iju bzung du gsol/ sgram mchis pa'i dung budadu gsol/ chos shes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang
rtog bzong du gsol/ shes rab dang/ yo shes dang/ rnam par grol ba'i sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/ thugs rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar gsol/ chos chen po'i
mchu'i char ba'i rgyan gyis sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i tshul 'a la rtogasa rnam par sel du gsol/ 'phags pa'i shes rab dang/ ye shes kyinor gyis sems can thams cad/
tshim pa a dzad du gsol zhes barjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpalasoms dpa' chen po'i bskul khakhung bo kha nas ma klob mad pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dga phyogs khacu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dpag tu mamachis
pa dag na/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dgashAn tu mdzad ba/ legs par bgyis pa'i chos kyi rgyunami mchod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin du lung bstan ba/ dge 'dun
'bags bya rab tu gnas pa/ gdulakha'i sems can dug gshin batul kha/ mya ngan las 'dus pa'ibadebashin tu 'tshol ba/ chos bzung ba 'dzin bar mdzadupa'i slad du
yongs sum skyo ba/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bzhed pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag chos kyi dbyings gnas pa'i tshul gyis/ ji ltar de dag mi skya ba
ma skyes pa de bzhin du/ ma'agagasam 'gag 'gag bar mi 'gyur bar bzhugs su gsol lo zhes brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'dini byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyigasol
ma/// kha 'debs kha yodapa ma yanipa// lenab mdab/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin du 'dug ste/ tshig 'di
skad ces ma mchis bzhin du'adag gis ma gos lug khagyis pa dang/ bshags pa dang/ rjes su yirang ba dang/ bskul ba dang/ gsol ba 'debs pa gang lags pa dang/
phyag 'tshal ba dang/ 'chags ba dang/ rjes su yi rang ba drang/ bskul ba dang/ gsol ba 'debs pa de yang ma mchisab/ len pa ma mchis pa/ 'dus ma gyis 'go/ de
ltar phyag 'tshal ba dung/ 'chags pa dang/ rjes su yi rang ba dang/ bskul ba dang/ gsol ba 'debs pa gang lags pa de yang ma mchis pa/ len ba ma mchis pa//
'dus ma bgyis pa ste/ de bzhin du/ byang chub kyang len pa ma mchis pa// 'dusam gyis pa so/ chos nyid de dang/ ma chadapa dang/ ma lhag pa dang/ ma smad pa dang/
mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang/ mi slobab dang/ mi dma' ba'iyongs su bsngo bas/ bla namadu langadragu bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub la chos phra rab tsam yang mi dmigs par yongs su
bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o// mig gzugs rnams la mi 'jug ste/ gzugs kyang mig lam yanamod kyi/ 'on kyang dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/
rnam pa'i shes pa de yang mi ga las ma byung/ gzugs las kyi ngo ma yin te/ byung nas kyang zhag cing ma da de mi gnas so// de bzhin du rna ba lam lan/ sgra lam yani/ sna lam
lan/ dri lam yin/ la lam yin/ rol ma yin/ lus la ma yin/ rego bya lam yin te/ yid chos rnams la mi 'jug/ chos rnams kyang yid lam 'jug 'od kyi/
'onakyang dmigs pa 'i rgyu rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa 'byung// de yang yade las kyang ma byung/ chos las kyang ma yin te/ denibyun gnas zhag cademad demi gnas so// de
bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chug lam 'jug/ byang chub kyang dog ba'i rtsa ba la mi 'jugamod kyi/ 'on kyang byang chub kyi rkyenagyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa'i sams skyed pa rnams
skya'o/ de mi yang mi gnas pa sta/ skyes nas zhig cing mad do// de la sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa dang/ sams gang gis byang chub tu yongs su
bskos pa'i sams bskyed pa de dag phan tshun du 'brel ba ma byid de/ 'di lta ste dper na/ ma ni gang nus kyang ma 'ongs te/ byung nus kyang zhig cidamad do// de bzhin du byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi ma yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ 'ongs ba kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la rten nas 'khor te/ byungonas zhig cing mad do/ ye shes/
snang ba rab tu thob pa chos rnam par byed pa de lta bu dag la blo rnam par mi spyod pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rdo ba'o// skyon med par 'jug/
ba dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ bzod ba snang ba'i ye shes thob pa rnam par 'byed pa rnams kyi blo rnam par ma dpyod pa gang yin pa des/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon sum
dubyas te/ yongs su bsko bar bya'o// ji ltar debrazhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis/ byang chub
sams dpa' rnams kyi yongs su sngo bar bshad pa de bzhin du/ thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi des yongs su sngolo/ 'ges kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi
rgyu bsngo ba kha nam tho ba med pa'o// 'jam dpal bzhon nur gyur pas phung po gsum pa'i bsngo ba 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sams dpa' lnga brgya mi skye ba'i chos la bzed pa slob
par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la dma' 'char bar gnas pa yang mgulo// lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bshad pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa phung po gsum pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
tha gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas bstan la phab pa/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pra ti b+hU na ma ti pa ri prade tsanA ma mahA yA na sU tra//
bod skad du/ 'phags pa sobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dad/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshol
la/ 'di skad bdag gis sbos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal ma gonamed zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong
gnyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' khri dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang pos yongs su
bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos bstan to// de'i tsho tshong dbon stobs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgya tsam so so'i g.yog 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgyas
yongs su bskor cing mdunadu bdar ba dang/ lhan cig tu mnyan du yodapa'i grong khyer nas byung ste/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyits+tshal mgonamad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskorakhabyas nas/ g.yog
mthad// 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug ga/ de nas sa sa rgyas kyi mthus tshong dbon sob sa pa' blo gros stan las la ngas de/ bla gos phrug
pa ba gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs sto/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/
te/ bcom ldan 'das ni blama'i mchog/ khams gsum pa'i dam pa/ byang chub kyi bsod nams kyi lha bag pa'i gzhi/ sems can thams cad nges par sgrol bar mdzad pa/ kun tu
khyab pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i phyogs su thug pa ma mchis pa nges par thob drar mdzad pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa'i dus snyigs ma'i snyogs pa lnga dang ldan pa la
ny+nyo dug gsum 'bar zhing/ rab tu 'bar la/ gcig la gcig gdung bar bgyid pa'i sems can rnams kyin ngan/ gang shes par bsam pa sems pa'i dus na/ gtso bo ma mchis
shing de gang gi yang ma lags pa dang rgyal po dang/ blonapo chen bo rnams yul la sred pas zil gyis gnon te/ phan tshun mi mthun zhing gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa dang/ de dag
gcig la gcig g.yul 'gyed pa na/ gzhan gyi dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang/ de las bzhan pa yul gyi mi lus chab 'tshol ba rnams kyi ming yang mi gda' ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
nas bsod nams kyis mthus/ sangs rgyas kyi slob ma gang zag bzhi po mang po de dag kyang bstan pa 'di la 'jug cing rab tu byung ba'i tshul thob pa dang/ de dag kyang phyi rol gyis gos ngur smig
dang kho ba'i nang gi 'dun pa dang/ zhe sdang dang/ shin tu ma gus shing phan tshun mi mthun pal/ gcig la gcig skur ba 'debs par brgyud pa dang/ skyon sgrog pa khagyid pa dang//
yon tan nges par spyod par bgyid pa dang/ nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang/ dregs pas non cing/ dar 'dzin pa dang/ nga yar 'dzan par bgyid pa dang/ de dag gi phos na yang ngan song
gsum du skya zhing yud tsam zhig rnyed pa'i dpal yang ma 'tshol ba dang/ tshar bas gzhan dag tu bskal pa mang bor sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i bzad ng/ rtsub pa/ tshab/ yid du mi mchi
ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang ma thong lags so// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du 1 sems can 'di dag yongs su snyan par bgyid pa dang/ ngan 'gro'i lam nas rnam pakhazlog nas
bsod nams kyi gzhal med khang thob par bgyi ba'i chos rnams gangalags/ daskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dbon sobs ba'i blo gros la bde/
skad ces bka' stsal to// spobs pa'i blo gros de lta khyedasangaga' sgra bsgrags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu zhing/ de ltar sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa
la chos zhu bar spro ba skyid pa legs so legs so// srobs pa'i blo gros sems can rnams gang thob nas/ legs par rab tu dang la dang ldan ng ra 'gyur zhing//
nag po'i phyogs sgrub pa spangs nas/ dkar po'i phyogs la zhugs shing/ don thams cad 'grub pa gyur pa'i chos de dag khyod zhus shug/ zhus nas kyang the tsomamadu par nyon cig dang
bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ spobs pa'i blo gros kyi zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das las ga nga dgags ni/ lha rnams kyi ris su skye bar 'gyur/
'tsho gang dag gisani mi rnams kyi ris suslu bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni sems can dam lab rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni dud 'gro rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag
gis ni yi dgas rnams su skyo bar 'gyur/ gang dag gson rigs 'thon po rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ gang dag gis ni bran dang bran mo rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
'das las gang dag gis nam rnams kyin ng du sam sa can skyes pa rnams skal bzang bor 'gyur zhing/ khyim khol dang ldan pa dang/ kha dri bda' ba dang/ kha dog dang ldan pa dang/
mthong na dga' ba dang/ gnod pa ma mchis pa dang/ lus dang sems shin tu tha mal du gnas pa dang/ skya bo mang bos bsngags kha rnams su 'gyur/ larbagang dag gsanisams
bas can rnams ma'i dal ba thob nas rtag tu skur ba 'debs pa thob par 'gyur zhing/ skya bo mang po mi dga' kha dang/ ma rtog mi sbugs pa dang/ kha dri mi bda' ba dang/ gnod mang ba dang/ rgyu
sams mi dga' ba dang/ lus shin tu sbyangs ba ma lags pa dang/ nyes byas kyi las thams cad bgyid bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das las gang dag gas ni legs par gsung pa'i
chos 'dul ba 'a dil rab tu byung ba// dag sbyong dang/ rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu mo zhe bar zhi ba gtso bor 'dzin pa rnams/ gang dang gang du skya ba'i skye ba thams cad du/ rgyun tu sangs
rgyus dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dkona mchog rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong nas kyang/ de dag las chos thos nas yid dga' zhing
ci bsam pa bzhin du donAyang 'grub par 'gyur/ bdag gis zhu ba bcu po de dag zhus pa lags na/ 'byung po grangs mamachis pa thams cad la sman pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das gsol/
bam btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyana mdzad ba/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// dbang dang ldan pa// chos thams cad la lkog tu ma 'gyur ba'isan dang ldan pas/ rnam par pa ste
rgyas par lan su du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa// sobs pa'i blo gros khyod kyis ji ltar zhub zhus pa rnams rgyas par rnam
(@#// dpar la lta bshad kyis nyon gcig/ tshong dpon sobs pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang/
[A ]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' sul to// spobs pa'i blo gros bums can las lda dang ldan pa rnams kyisani/ lha nyid thob par 'gyur te/ lngagang zhe na/ dang po byams pa dad
ldan ba'i srams kyis gnod pa med par sems can rnams yongs su skyob byed cing/ bzang po dang ldan pa rnams yin1/ gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs par mibyadacing/ bkren pa'i sems dad
ldan pa ma yin pas yongs su gtong bar khyad yin/ gzhan gyi chung ma la sprad pa rnams kyang yongs su dag pa yin te/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang srung bar byed pa yin3/ gso sbyong labartson
zhing bden pa sa ba yin/ rang bzhin du 'dul cirang gi skyonatshademadapa song bar byed la/ myos par 'gyukha'i gtungab sbrangs pa yin te/ las lta po de dag dang ldan pa rnams lha'i lus thob
bar 'gyur ro/ sa de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshatshigs su'acad pa 'di dag bka'asalate/ srog chags gsolas ldog par byas pas lha dngamadang lha mi rnams/
'jig rtenadu ni mi thub lus can ring nad med 'gyur ba yin// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i lus can shas ldan dri med rdzogs pa'i lus// lhan ngarab mchogad mi long spyod sna tshogs dpal
can rtag tu 'byung// bar ma khag tu lha nang rtag tu lha'i dbang phyug rnams su 'gyur// bsam mdab la pa 'brogasapa rnam log ya chen longs sod rnams dang ldan// rtag tu dga' zhing/
rab tu ya de dga' dpal ldan gazhalam du khang gnas shing/ rtsazhing dge ba dpag bsams shing yul nags nam tog gtor lus ldan// mkhas shing 'dod pa mi ban yongs sangs mchog
dam pa 'a lus dang ldan// tshe rabs kun tu dab mad gser mchog lus dang ldan zhing rab tu mdzes// rtag tu lha yi nang du bskal ba bzung thog lus las 'od 'byung gyur// lhamo sna tshogs
tshogs kyis bskor cing 'dod pa'i dpal la sod par byed// ston chadatshog bzhin dug skyon bzhi sbyangs ba ni dri zhim ldan// gas la zhing 'thogs ma dam 'jigs tshig mchog lha rnams
'dir ni nges par 'byung// yang dag gi lan 'debs rnam bsgrags snyan cing skya bos shin tu tshig bzung 'os/ gi wangarol mo'i sgra'abyoranesgra skadasnyan po branga'akhod skad ldan/
ma rmongs sams kyis myos 'gyuram legs brjod byed slangs pa sa lhar 'gyur zhing/ grags med dge ba'i lha yis mchodab lha yi gnas nagenasopar 'gyur/ blo dang ldan zhingalus
brtan yadebazang bag yod kun dang ldan par 'gyur// de dag rtag tu bde 'gyur dbang rnams de dag phan pa brjod par byed// gal tetshozad lha yul nas lhung ba yi lha rnams de tshosmad//
sdig med khargya keshu 'gron lha yi gnas su 'grobar 'gyur// bsod nams lnga mngon gyur pas de nidam pa dpal ldan lus 'od can/ lha rnams lam sel byed
cing lha rnams bye bas mchod de bstan par 'gro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang spobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa// spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga dang
ldan pa rnams/ mi rnams kyin ng du skye bar 'gyur te/ lta gang zhan/ dang po byas pa bzo bas byin pa dang bkren pa dang/ dbul po dang/ stag bsngal bas las kun byed pa dang//
dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ma nyams par bsten pa dang 2/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyis sems can le lo can rnams dge ba'i chos
au la spro bar byed cing/ nges pa'i sems kyis gus pa dang bcas pa// mthun par 'dzin pa ste/ srobs pa'i blo grosasems can las lnga po de dag dang ldan pa rnams mi nyid thob par 'gyur
zhang longs sod kyang chen por gyur ba dang/ tshe ring ba dang/ mdzes pa dang/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi rje dbon du 'gyur ro/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka'asul to// sbyin pa byin bas mi yi rgyal po dam par 'gyur// rtag tu longs stod 'byor dang ldan pa rab tu 'gyur// lus ngan po dang mtshungs par
'a sban dang sod par byed// rigs dang dran pa thob pas rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur// tshul khrims ma nyams de ni rakena mchog mchod par byed// zhes byas yongs su sangs pas shanitungs/
pas/ (tshe ring dam pa thob pas 'chi 'bomad pa yin// bde ba thob pas skyonamadu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// nges pa'i ma ni pha rol sams 'khrugs ma byas shing// gzhan dag rnams
kyis gnod byas pa'i naganod byed// de bzhin tshig ngan brjod kyang gag bar ma byed pas// dge ba'i mchog gi tshul thob nas nims par 'gyur// brtson 'grus bzang la lhag
pa'i bsam pas sems dkar zhing// stobs dang gzi brjid chen po drag ba rnams dang ldan// dmag dpon nyid kyi dam pa thob par 'gyur bas na// longs sod 'byor pa'i sod
yul ldan pas lhang nger 'gyug/ 'phrogs sams ldan makhas shing shin tum thunang ste/ byas pa gzo 'de las 'a'adod par ba tu byad// dkon mchog gsum dang ma la sogasal
mchoda mdzad pa// nam yang kun la thartsom byed par ma 'gyur ro// mgang khyad par 'phags pa dgeb lnga po rnams// byed pa de ni sa yi bdagapor rab tu 'gyur// stobs la sogs dang gzugs
dang longs sod mazad ldan// grags ldan shani tu gtso bo rnams kyi rim gro byas/ donas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang slobs pa'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa// sbobasala'i blo/
sa ga/ gros sems can las ldadang ldan pa rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur zhing/ rgyas nas kyang de dag tu bskal pa bye ba mang por gnas par gyur te/
lta gang zhen/ 'di lta sta/ sangasargyus dang chos dang/ dge 'dun dkena mchog la dad po ma byed l/ kun tu bsngags bam yin ba brjod pas skur ba 'debs par byed cing//
blo 'phags pa'i lam la brnyas pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i mchod rten 'jig pa dang/ bar gyi dusanayang dag slong dang dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyan ma gangasbagazhi bo
mang por mi lus pa// mthun par mi 'dzin par 'jig rten gyi sa ba lhur lenang// dkon tshog gasum gyi dkor 'phrogs pa/ gcig la gcig nyes rtsom gyis/ gcig la gcig
skur 'debs pa'i tshig gas/ rgyal bo dang rje dbonadang/ blon po dang/ pha dang bu rnams kha cig la gcig mi mthun pas ma gus pa rnams dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge
slong rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston pa la bstan nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
bdag nyid dag slob yin par khas 'che zhing/ dgala'i chos yang dag par sgrub pa 'am gnasal/ mkhan po dang/ slob dpon rnams mgu ba ba byed cing/ dka blo mi bde
la mthunabang 'dzanicing yang dag par rjes subastan kyang rjes su bstan pa la/ sgrub par mibyed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub song bar byed la/ bdag la bstod par byed/
gzhan la sod pa khyadang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyag pa dang/ drags pa'i shas che la/ bla ma rnams la banas par byed/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti la lhag par zhen cung/ skurapa
gang 'debs bar byed pa lta/ spobs pa'i blo gros sems can las lnga bo de dag dang ldan ba rnams ni/ sems can dmyal ba rnams su skya ba 'gyu zhing/ skyes nas kyang ji srid du stong
gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'du'i 'jig snga ma byung ba de srid du gnas par gyur zhing/ 'jig pa byung nas kyang 'pheg rtan gyi khams gzhan nasems can dmyal bgang dag yod
ba de dag tu 'phen ba'agyur ro// gang gatsho der yang 'jig pa byung bar na/ de'i tsho'ajig rtenagyi khams gzhonanasamasacan dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'phan gyu 'o/
de bzhin du sbyar te/ kun tu 'jig rtenagyi khams grangs mdab degan/ sems can dmyal ba gang dag yod pa de dag tu khyam zhing/ sdug bsngal nyams su myongal byung ba'i mtha' med de/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ rmongs bas thog med nas 'jig pa'i sdug bsngal byang gyur pa'i// 'jig rten sangs
rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho bas lanami byed// de ni kun ge ma yin rnal 'byor rgyal bo ma yin zhes// padag nyidi chung bzed skya bgazhana rnams la yang sku bar byed/ bde bar/
gshegs ba'i tshod rten 'gro ba sdug pa'i chog byas na// dge ba chud dur 'gyur zhing 'jil par byed pa richar 'gyur zhing// mi dag 'di mngon sum dge ba mdunan yod bzhin du/ [！]
zlo 'on kyang sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu spyod par byed/ khar ma rtsod pa'i dus 'dir bzhi go bkres pas nyamathug po// phan tshun 'khon du 'dzin pas bkrugs shis blum sod par byed//
