pa yanamed kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ rnam par rig pa sna tshogs dag las de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'byung bar kun
0tu shes par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper nas la brten cing sal gnas nas/ rtswa dang shing gel ba dang rtsi dang nags tshal thams cad 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur yod
'jam dpal san rtog par ma byed/ rnam par rtog par ma byed do// thams cad dumanyam zhing rnam par ma rtog la/ bye brag ma byed cing sems par ma byed de/ sems dang yade dang/ rnam
par shes pa dang bral ba yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhan gshegs pa la brten de de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas nas/ sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
kyi thog pa 'am/ theg pa chen po pa thams cad kyadage ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyural/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brten cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas
nas/ sbed pa pa dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ gcer bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas gzhan thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang/ tha nalog par nyid du nges pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
gzhan gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang/ 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang yangs par 'gyur med kyi 'jam dpal 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nirtog par ma byed/ rnam par rtog par med de/
'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang dmigs pa dang yade la byed pa thams cad rgyun chad pa/
sems dang yid dang/ rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ rtog ge ma yin/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin/ mi snang ba/ ma mthong ba bsamadumedal/ bsam
[M ]par bya ba ma yin pa yade la byed pa med pa/ sems pa med pa/ sems dang yad dang/ rnam par shes pa dang bral kha ]thamasacad dumanyam zhingebatang snyoms lo/ rnamakhar
sbyortogatsang bye brag m byed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper nanam mkha'an then sa cad dumanyam zhing rnam par ma rtogal bye brag mkhyadad/ ma skyes bya/ ma 'gags ba/ 'das
pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin/ mtshan gzhi med pa// spros pa med pa/ gzugs med pa/ brtan dumadapa/ rnam par rig pa med pa/ reg ba med pa/
gnas med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ gzhal b.las yang dag par 'das pa/ dpe med pa// dpe las yang dag par 'das pa/ mi gnas pa// gzung ba med pa/ mag ga lam las yang
dag par 'das pa/ sems dang yad dang/ rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ mtshan nyid med pa// yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa// yade la byed pa med pa/ blangs pa med pa/ dor ba med pa
pa gdag pa med po// gzhug pamed pa// tshig gi lamalasayang dag par 'das pa/ thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing rjes su zhugs pa yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang sems na rnams
[j]kyi dbyibs chung dudang/ 'bring dang/ chen po dag gsanam mkha' yang chung du dang 'bring dang chen po kun tu shes par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom/
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang/ thams cad du mnyam zhang+ge rnam par mi rtog pa la bye brag m 'byed de/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ 'das pa ma yani/ ma 'ongs pam yin/
da ltar byung ba ma yin/ mtshan gzhi med pa/ sbresapa med pa gzugs med pa/ bstan dumed pa/ rnam par rig ba med pa/ reg pa med pa/ gnas med pa/ gzhal med pa/ gzhal
ba las yong dag par 'das pa// dpe med pa/ dpe las yang dag par 'das pa/ gnas la/ gzung ba med pa/ mgag lam las yang dag par 'das la/ sems dang yid dang/ rnam par
shes pa dang/ bral ba mtshan nyid med pa/ ya gi med pa// sgra med ba/ yid la byed pa med pa/ blang ba med pa dor ba med pa/ gdegs pa med pa/ gzhag pa med pa/ tshig galam
las yang dag par 'das pa/ thams cad kyi rjes su sengazhing rjes su zhugs pa yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang sems can dman pa dwang 'bring dang mchog gang dag yin pa dedagags/
de bzhin gshegs pa yang dman pa dang 'bring dang mchog tu mthong ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni'i dasnyam du/ sems can 'adanabasam pa dang mos pa dman pa yin gyis sems
can 'di la gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su 'grub pa dman pa bstan par bya'o// sems can 'di ni bsam pa dang mes pa 'bridi yin gyis/ sems can 'di nagazug
kyi sku'i kha dog yangs su 'grub pa 'bring bstanapar bya'o// sems can 'di ni bsam pa dang tshes pa rgyatshob yon gyis/ sems can 'di la gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog yangs su 'grub pa rgya chen pabastan
par bya'o snyam du mi sems so// 'jam dbal chos ston pa yang de bzhin du rtog par bya ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'odi snyam du/ sems can bad ni duman pa la mos pa yin gyis
'tsha sems can 'di lan nyenathos kyi thig 'gatam dman pa brjod par bya'o// sems can 'don bar ma la mos pa yan gyis/ sems can ' da lan rengasangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gatam par m brjod par
bya'o// sems can 'ad nargya chen pol mas pa yin gyis/ sems can 'ad lan thegal chen po'agatam rgya chen pe brjod par bya'o snyam dum sems so// 'jam dpal de bzhinagshegs ba nib da
snyam du sems can ' din sbyin pa lames pa yin gyis/ sems can 'ad lan sbyin pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o// sems can 'di notshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang//
bsam gtan lams pa yin gyis/ sems can 'di lan bsam gtan gyi gtam brjod par bya'o snyam du ma sems so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhani gshegs pa ni 'disnyam du/ sems
can 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mes pa yin gyi/ sems can 'di la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam brjod par bya'o snyam du yang ma sems te/ 'jam dpal de bzhin
gshegs pa la ni rnam par rtog pa de lta bu dag med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku yin pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu
ma skyes pa dang/ ma 'gags pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni/ mang dang gzugs dang nges pa'i tshig ga rjes su'abrang zhing 'byung ba ma yin te/ 'jam
dpal de bzhin gshegs pan rtog par mi byed/ rnam par rtog par ma byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa na skad cig pa ste/ mazad pa'i mtshan nyid dang// ma zad pa'i/
mtha' dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' nges par yan no// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid kyi
mtha' dang/ gnyis su med pa'i mtha' dang/ shin tu 'byung ba med pa'i mtha' yin te/ thams cad du mnyam zhing rnam par mi rtog labye brag ma khyed de/ dman pa ma yin/ bar mam
yone/ mchog ma yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mnyam zhang rnam par mi rtog la bye brag ma byed de/ dman pa ma yin/ bar m ma yin/ mchog ma yin no//
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad na demags su med pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi dmags su med pa gang yin pa de na mnyam pa nyid//
[+ ]yan no// mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de na gnas pa nyid yin no// gnas pa de gang yin pa de nam g.yob nyade yin no// mgayab nyidagang yin pa de nam rtonapa nyid yin no// chos thams cad
sbyol ma rten pa'i sems kyi gnas med do// sems ma gnas pa na skye med par gyur te/ de ltar mthong ba'asems dang sems las byung ba rnams na phyon tsam lag par 'jug par 'gyur ro// gang gi

sems phyin cim leg par des na lta khang zhane thob par 'gyur ro// calta ba bzhin thob pana'i phro bar ma byed do// spros pa med pa lan spyod pa yang med do// gang gi tsho spyod par m byed pa de 'tshem 'khor
ro[0f10 ]gang ga tsho ma 'khor ba de'i tsho rnam par mi'aphoste rnam par 'gro ba med pa nachos nyid dang 'gal bar ma byed do// chos nyid dang ma 'gal ba thams cad dang rjes sumathun par 'gyur// thams

d+ha cad dang rjes sumathun pan chos kyi rang bzhinalasam g.ye'o// chos kyi rang bzhin lasam g.yo bas na chos kyi rang bzhin thob par 'gyur ro// chos kyirang bzhin thob pan cung zad kyang 'phro bar m byed do

a/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir te/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni shin tum skyes pa yin no// shin tum skyes pa gang yin pa des n nges ba thob bo// nges pa

[y]thob pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad yade la byed pa dang ldan cig mi gnas te/ gang gi tshe chos thams cad yade labyed pa dang lhan cig ma gnas pa de'atshog gnas par bya ba med pa yin no// gang

ga tshe gnas par bya ba med pa de'i tshem 'byungam 'jig go/ gang gi tshe mi 'byungam 'jig pa de'i tshe gnas shangechos thob par 'gyur ro// gangag tshe gnas shing chos thob pa de'i tshe tshul bzhan gyi chos
la zhugs par 'gyur ro// tshul bzhin gyi chos la zhugs pa la ni gangasangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin pa'i chos de yang bas/'a yamed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs
pa'i phyir te/ stong pa nyidi rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de na byang chub bo// des de ltar stongapa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon bar ' dubya ba med pa dang/ gnas med
pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa dang/ gzung ba med ba dang/ gzhi med pa rjes su rtog pa'i phyir byang chub ste/ byang chub nitshul bzhin la sbyor ba'o// tshul bzhin la sbyor bzhes bya ba ni/ gdeg pa med/
pa dang/ gzhog pa med pa dang/ bya bamed pa dang/ rnam par bya ba med pa la sbyor ba dang/ chags pa med pa dang/ grol ba med pa la sbyor ba dang/ gcig pa nyid ma yin pa dang/ tha dad pa
nyid ma yin pa la sbyor ba dang/ 'ongs pa ma yin pa la sbyor ba dang/ tshul bzhin la sbyor ba yin no// tshul bzhin gangayan pa la sbyorab de lan/ sbyor ba yang med/ sbang ba yang med/ 'brasabu mngon
gsum dung ba yang med do// deci'aphure zhan/ 'jam dpal sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal khaphyir te/ dan khur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs ba rnams kyis nye bar nyon mongs par/
zad kyirang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs panAm yanano// rang bzhin gyis kun nas 'od gsal ba nyid gang yin pa de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa nyid yin no// kun nas nyonames pa med pa
T+Thigang yin pa de ni/ gnyen po gang gis nyon mongs pa spyong bar 'gyur ba'i gnyen po med do// de ci'i phyir zhenA/ 'jam dpal don rig pa nyid gang yin pas/ ga pa na dag pa ma 'gyur ba phyir
te dwag pa gang yanib de ni skye ba med pa'o// skye bamedab gang yin pa danam smad ba'o// ma smad pa gang yin pa de ba'i dod pa spras pa'o// 'dod pa spangs pa gang yin pa don srid ba thams cad
'gag go/ gang la sred pa thams cad 'gags pa donam skye ba'o// ma skye ba gang yanapadan byingachubo/ byang chub gang yanib de mnyam pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa den dibazhinanyade
do// de bzhin nyid lani'i dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad gnas so// de bzhin nyid gang yin de ni'i dus byas kyang med/ 'dus ma byas kyang med/ gnyis su gdags pa yang
med do// gangal 'dus byas kyang med/ 'dusamabyas kyang med/ gnyis su gdagasalamangamed pa de'adabazhinanyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa don gzhan s yin pa de bzhin nyid do/ gzhan

[z]ma yane pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin nyid do// 'gyur bamed pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'os bamed pa de bzhin nyid do// 'ong ba med pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni 'gro
ba med pa de bzhin nyid do// 'gro ba med pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ci lta ba bzhin de bzhin 'di do// ji lta ba bzhin de bzhin nyid gad mnar nanams yang de bzhin de ma yin pa ma yin no//
nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs par ma 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar ma 'gyur ro// gang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar ma 'gyur
ba de niskye bar mi 'gyur/ 'gag par mi 'gyur ro// gang skye bar 'gyur/ 'gag par ma 'gyur ba dezhimya ngan las 'das pa dadamanyamatsho// gangamya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa de 'khor
bar m 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las 'dus par ma 'gyura'o// gang 'khor bar mi 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ma 'gyur ba de na'odras pam yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar
'byung ba ma nano// gang 'dus pa ma yin ma 'ongs pa ma yani/ daltar byung ba ma yin pa de nA dman pa ma yin bar mam yin/ mchog ma yin no// gang dman pa ma yin/ bar ma ma ya

mchog ma yin pa de na de bzhin nyid de/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de na de kho na'i don gyi tshig bla dbags yin no// de kho na zhes bya ban de bzhin nyid kho na'o// de bzhin nyid kho nanadi bzhin nyid do// de bzhin
[sf]@#// nyidi dang ba dag don gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// gnyis su med pa'i don gang yin pa de na byed chub ste/ byang chub na don rtogs pa'o// don ces bya ba/chos
bstan pa thams cad la rnam bar thar pa'i sgogasum du 'jug kha shes pa'o// shes pa zhes bya ba'achos thams cad la dus gsum manyam pa nyid du'ajug pa'o// chos thams cad kyi dbyer med
pa'i don ces bya ste/ donan sgra med// brjod du med pa tha snyad med pa/ tha snyad yang dag pa'i chad pa yin no// shes bya zhes bya ban don rjes su rtogs pa gas pa dang/ rnam par shes
brjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa gang yAn pa ste/ danashes pa zhes bya'o/ don ces bya ban/ de bzhi'i don shes pa dang/ rnam par shes brdzus su rtogs pa'i shes pas nges par rtogs pa
gang yin pa ste/ da 'di chos nyid yin no// chos nyid gangayin pa de nadon yin no// don rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang/ rnam par shes pa rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa dang nges pa'i don
rjes su rtogs pa'i Tishes pas rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de chos nyid de// chos nyidegang yin pa de donayino// don gang yanipa de chos nyid dang/ chos gnas pa nyid dang chos nges pa nyid
dang [0f10 ]chos nges pa'i chos nyid de/ de ni chos la 'jug par ma 'gyur ro// chos lam zhugs pa gang yin pa dang/ don dang tshigs 'khrumanya mkhanyid gang yin pa den gnyis su med pa'i
den gyis mnyam pa nyid yin te/ mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni don yin no// don shes pa dang rnam par shes pa lamanyam pa nyid gang yin pa ni/ gnyis su med pa'i sge'ajug pas ni/
gas pa yin no// nges pa'i don dang/ drang ba'i don mnyam pa nyid kyis don ma mapa de na srid pa nyid do// stong pa nyid du donamanyam bsagang zagamanyam panyidimanyamam// gang zagamanyam/
pa ltad kyis chos mnyam pa nyid mnyam me// chos mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par grol ba mnyam pa nyad mnyam ste/ rnam par grol ba mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtog pan byang chub bo// 'jam dpal gzugs
la chags par gyur pa rnams kyis mig nachig sa pa yin no// gzugs dang mig gi rang bzhin shes pa na chags pa med pa yin no// lta ba la chags pasachags par gyur pa rnams kyirang gi lus ni
chags pa yin no// ltabar gyur pa thams cad kyi rang ga lus kyi rang bzhinastong pa nyid du shes panachegs pamed pa yin no// tshul bzhanem yin pa yid la byed pa la chags pas chags par gyur pa

rnams kyi chos kyi snang ba na chegs pa yin no// tshul bzhin yod la byed pa'i chos la so sor rtog cing ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin steng pa nyid du shes pa ni chags pamed pa yin no// the tshom gyi dram la chag
pas chags par gyur pa rnams kyis thar pan chags pa yin no// mas pa dang/ rnam par grol ba yang dag paji lta ba bzhin du shes pa na chags pa med pa yin na// le'i dris la chags pas chags
par gyur pa rnams kyi rtogs par bya ba la brtson 'grus brtan pa nyidin chags pa yanino// chos ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i chegs pamed pa yin no// sgrub pa'i chags/
bas chags par gyur pa rnams kyis byang chub yan laga rnams zhachags pa yin no// sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa shes pa nachegs pamed ba yin no// rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i

chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las byung pa ste/ de la byang chub sems pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang/ rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yongs su shes par bya zhing/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
rgyu rnam par dag pa dang rnam par byang ba'i rgyu rnam par dag pas kyang gnas par ma bya'o// bdagakun nas slongab dang lta ba kun nas rtenamengos pa'i rgyu yin no// chos bdag med pa la 'jugapa'i

'dod pa dang gnodasems dang rnam par 'tshob dang rtog pa dragan kun nas nyonamengs pa'i rgyu yin no// ma sdug pa dang byams pa dang snyade rjedang dga' ba dang btang snyems dang brtan pa'i chos l
'jug pa'i bzod pa ni rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no// phyin tsaleg bzhinakun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no// yang dag pa'i dran pa nyakhar gzhag pa bzhi ni rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no/

ba0/sgrib pa ldan kun nas nyonamedas pa'i rgyu yin no// dbang po la nanem par byang ba'i rgyu yin no// skye mched drugan kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no// rjes su dran pa drug ni rnam par byed pa'i rgyu/
yanino// dam pa ma yin pa'i chos kho dunani kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun na rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no// leg pa nyid nga rgyadanakun nas nyon mongs pa

pa dguna rnam par byang ba'i rgyu yin no// ma dag ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni kun nas niyon mongs pa'i rgyu yin no// dge ba bcu las kyi lam ni rnam par byang ba'i rgyuyanano// mdor nam dag ba yod/

par shes pa ma demags pa namtshan ma med pa nyid yin no// reg bya reg par byamed pa ni dmigs pamed pa nyid yanino// yod kyi rnam par shes pa ma dmags panamtshan ma med pa nyid yin no//

ni/ 'das pa yid la ma byed/ ma 'ongs pa rlom sems sumakhyed/ da ltar byung ba la 'phro khar ma byed do// 'jam dpa la bya chub lus me dpa nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas/

dbyer med pa'o// chos dbyings nagazhi'o// tha dad pa nyidi med panadabyer med pa'o// yang dag pa'i matha'anagazhi'i// dmigs pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o// g.yo ba med pa nyid gzhi'i//

sems can kyango bo nyidemed panadabyer medaba'o// nam mkha'anagazhi'o// dmags su med pan debyer med pa'o// skye bamed pa nagazhi'o// 'gag pa med pazhadabyer med pa'o// 'dusam byas
gzhi'o// spyod pa med pa dbyer med pa'o// byang chub ni gzhi'o// tabar sha bon dbyeramed pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa na gzhi'o// mngon par 'grub pamed pan dbu med ba'o// skyebamed pan/
gzhi'o// 'jam dpal byang chub nalus kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ma 'gyur te/ sems kyis kyang m yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'jam dpalalus nadims la// g.yo ba med pa/

byang chub na lus dang sems dang/ chos dang chos ma yin pa dang/ yang dag pa dang/ yang dag pam yin pa dang/ bden pa dang/ brdzunapas brjod pas bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal byang chub

babur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste// dper na/ nam mkhan gnas med pa/ 'dus ma byas pa/ ma skyes kha/ ma 'gags pa/ brjod par bya ba yin pa'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du
byang chub kyang gnas med pa// 'dus ma byas pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma'agags pa/ brjod par byakham yin pa'o// 'jam dpal 'daltaste/ dben/ yang dag pa yongs su tshel khan/ chos thams
cad kyis brjod bar bya bam yin pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal yang dag par byang chub yongs su 'tsholakhan yang/ chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir na/ 'jam dpal
yang dag par na tshags nam skyes pa dang/ ma 'gags pa yin pas/ yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal byang chub nagazung ba med pa nyid dang/ gnasamed pa nyid yanete/ 'jam dpal de

pas don ltar chos thams cad mnyam pamed pa dang/ mamanyam pamed par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ ngaltar chos rab tsan yadamanyam par m byas mamanyam pa'i m byas pa de
ltar/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing yang dag pa'i shes pas/ chos de dag ji lta ba dalta bu kho nar shes sa// 'jam dpal yang dag parishes pa yang gang zhin/ 'jam dpalatshos khamA
cad rtsa ba med pa dang ma skyes pa dang/ ma 'gags pa dang/ ma byung pa las 'byung ba dang/ byung nas kyang 'jig par 'gyurata/ 'jam dbal de dag kyang bdag med pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin
pamed khar 'byung zhinge/ bdag po med pa dang/ yangs su 'dzan pa med bar 'dzago par shes pa'o// 'jam dpal de ltar 'byung ba dang 'jig pa la brten nas/ chos rnams 'jug par 'gyur/
yang/ 'di lo 'jug par 'gyur ba la gang yang medade/ dalamagyi rgyun bcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpa' byang chub ces bya ba de nangolta ba bzhin gnas
yan te/ 'jam dpal de la ji lta ba bzhinagyi gnas gang zhe na/ 'jam dpa la ji lta ba bzhan gyi gnas shes bya ba na byang chub ste/ byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du gzugs kyang de bzhin nyid las/
'da'o// byang chub nga lta ba de bzhin tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'dubyed nams dwang/ rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin nyidelas ma 'da'o// byang chub dzalta ba de bzhinadasnya' khams/
kyang de bzhan nyido lasama'i da'o// byang chub lta ba de bzhin du chu 'khams dang/ me'i khams dang rlung gakhamasakyang de bzhin nyid lasam 'da'o// 'jam dpal byang chub ji lta ba de bzhin du
mag la khoms dang/ gzugs khams dang/ ma ga rnam par shes pakhams kyang de bzhina'odi lasam 'da'o/ khyung chub ji lta ba de bzhin du naba'akhems dwang/ sgra'i khams dang/
rnaba rnam par shes ba'i khams dang/ snakhams dang dri'i khams dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ lce'akhams dang/ lo khams dang/ lca' rnamakhar shes ba khams
dang/ lus kyakhams dang/ rigakhyakhams dang/ lus rnam par shes pa'i khams dang/ yad kyi khams dang/ chos kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes bakhams kyang de bzhin
nyidi pasama'i da'o// chos gdags pa de'i di tsam duThadadi/ 'di lta ste/ phung bo dang/ khams dang/ skye mched drugagadags pa'o// de bzhinagshegs bsan dag yang dag ji
0 @#/ lta ba bo ni duman par rdzogs khar sangs rgyas shing/ natsamalogakhara mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de d gnas minadzalta ba bzhin du phyi ser de bzhi/ ban
mang de bzhinate sngon mtha'amaskyes pa dang/ phyim 'amathur ma'i pho ba dang/ dbus su bden pa ma yin no// deltar de dag ji lta ba gzhan gyi gnas lanate/ gcig ji lta ba bzhin dums cad de bzhin/
la/ thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du/ gcig kyang de bzhinate/ 'jam dpal 'a dil nag cag pa nyid dag/ mang ponyid dmigs sumedAdo// 'jam dpal byang chub ni rnam pa'i 'jug pas rnam pa
med par bzhugs pa yin te/ 'jam dpa la de la rnam pa na gang/ rnamakha med pa na gang zhan/ 'jam dpal rnam pa zhes bya ban de ba chos thams cad la rtsom pa'o// rnam pamed pa zhes bya bzhachos
thamasacad dmags su med pa'o// rnam pa zhes bya banasems m gnas pa'i gnas skabs so// rnam pa med pa zhes bya bana rnam par thar pa'i sgomtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// rnam pa zhes
bya na chos thams cad l sems pa dang/ 'jalab dang/ bgrang ba dang/ sasor rtog pa'o// rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba gzhalab las yang dag par 'das pa ste (gzhalalas yang/
dag par 'das pa gang zhen gang la rnam par shes pa'isamed pa'o// rnam pa zhes bya bzhi'i dus byas laso sor rtog pa'o// rnam bamed pa zhes bya ba'i dus ma byas lase ser rtog pa'o//
tsa/ 'jam dpal byang chub 'breg pa med pa nyid dang/ len pa med pa de yanato/ 'jam dpal de la zag pa med pa nyid gang/ len med pa nyid gang zhen/ 'jam dpa 'khrug pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ni/
khrag ba med pa bzhi de nga bral ba ste/ bzhi po de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/'dod pa'i zag pa dang/ srid ba'azag pa dang/ mag pa'i zig pa dang/ lta'akhrig pa ste/ zag pa bzhi po de dag dang
bral ba'o// len pa med pa nyidicas bya ban/ len pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/ bzhi po de dag kyang gang zhen 'dalta ste/'dod pa'i inapa dang/ ltaba'ilen pa dang/ tshul khrims dang brtul bzhugs
mchog tu 'dzani ra' lanab dang/ bdag tulta ba'alinab ste/ len pa bzhapo dodal dang bral ba'o// 'jam dpal dalasems can m rig pa'i ldongs par byas pa/ sred pas/ dgrugs par gyur
ba de dag ni phan tshuna mngon par zhan bar gyur nas len par byed kyi de bzhi nagshegs pana'i dag tu smra b.lenar rtsa ba yin khar yongasazhushe gnas / bdag rnam par dag pas/ sems can thams
cad rnam par dag par rjes su rtogs par gyur te/ bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa dang/ sems can thems nadanam par dag pa gang yin pa don/ gnyis sumed dganyis su khyaramedal/ gnyis su
med pa'i don gang yin pa na skyo ba med pa dang 'gags med pa yin no// 'jam dbalaskye bamed pa dang 'gags pa med pa'i ni/ sems dang yid dang rnam bshos pa 'jug par ma'agyur te/
'jam dbal gang la sems dad yade dang/ rnam par shes pa ma 'jug pa de lan/ yongs su rtogs pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yatIlabyed bar 'gyur ba'i yongs su//
rtogs pa gang yang med de/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la rab tu brtson ba danam rag pa kun nas slong bar mkhyed do// ma rig ba'i kun nas ldang bamed bgang yin pa dan srid pa'i yan lag bcu

gnyis de dag ga kun nas slong ba med pa yin no// srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa dag la kun nas ldang ba med pa gang yin pa de skye ba med pa yin no// skye ba med pa gang yin ba dan skyonamed ba yanano//
skyon med pa gang yAn pa dananges pa'i don yin no// nges pa'i don gang yin pa den don dam pa yano// don dam pa gang yin pa don gang zag med pa'i don yin no// gang zag med pa'i donagang yan
pa de brjod du me dpa 'an yacheno// brjod du med pa 'don gang yin pa denirtan cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'din yazhino// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don gang yin pa denachos kyi don yin no// chos
rgyun gang yin ba de ni de bzhin gshegs kha'i don yin te/ de'i phyir gang gis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mathed do// gang gis chos ma thong ba des dubazhinagshegs bamathadang
zhes gsungs te/ ji ltar yongs su tshol btsayeng ma mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo/ 'jam dpal dbacayabazhes khyab gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ sems der dmags pa ste/ des gang gi/
[2 ]/sems dang dmags pa yang dag par rjes su ma'i khong ba de'i tshon yang dag par mthong ba yin bas/ de bzhin gshegs pasazhachos de dag de ltamam pa de semanyam par mnabar/
rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// 'jam dpal byang chub n deg pa dang/ drama med pa dang nyonamengs pa med pa yin te/ 'jam dpal dal dag pa'i ching/ drama med pa na gang/ namangasal
med pa na gang zhen 'jam dpal steng pa nyadenadeg pa'o// mtshan ma med panAdrima med pa'o// smon pa med pa ninyin mengs pa med pa'o// skyebamed panu dag pa'o// mngon par 'dubyed/
bamed pan drame med pa'o// 'byung yid pan rtenamengs pa med pa'o// rang bzhin dag pa'o// yongs su dag pa ni droma med pa'o// 'od gsal ban rtenamongs pamed pa'o// smyos pa med pa
na deg pa'o// skyes pa dang khral banadram med pa'o/spros pa nye bar zhunganan mongs pa med pa'o// de bzhin nyidan dag pa'o// chos kyi dbyang sanadra mched pa'o// yang dag pa mtha'ananyon
mes pamed pa'o// nam mkha' dag pa'o// bar snanganarimemed pa'o// nam mkha'ananangs pamed pa'o// nang yongs su shes padag pa 'o// phyi rol tu rgyu bamed panasemed
pa'o/ phyi nang dmagos sumed panyon mongs pa med pa'o// phung po yongs su shes pan dig kha'o// khamasarang bzhinamed pan imed pa'o// skye mched rnams spyod pa'i nyon mongs bamed pa'o//
'das pa la bzod par shes pa na deg pa'o// ma 'ongs lam skye bar shes pan drei med pa'o// daltar byung ba la chos gnas par shes pa ni nyin mengs pa med pa'o//
'jam dpalade ltar dag pa dang drimed pa dang rton mangs pamed pana'i gnas gcig tu yang dag par 'dulci/ 'di lta ste// zhi ba'a gnas su'o// zhib gang yanang do narab tu zhi ba yin no// rab
wA tu zhib gang yin dananye bar zhi ba yazhino// nye bar zhabagangayan ba dan bar 'bar gyur pa yanano// tri bar zha bar gyur pa gang yin pa donobrub pa zhes bya'o// 'jam dpal deltar nam mkha'

'khaM dolte bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no// byang chub ji lte bar chos rnams kyang de bzhinano// chos rnams ji lta bar sems can rnams kyang de bzhinano// sems can rnams ji lta bar 'anga rnams kyang de
ba zhan no// bde rnams ji lte khar mya ngan las 'dus ba yang de bzhin no// 'jam dpal de'i phyir chos thams cad mya nga' sa 'dus ba dngamanyam pa zhes bya ste/ mthar thug par gyur pa'i phyir
gnyan pomadapa yane la/ gnyen pamed pa' phyir gabodamanas dgab dang/ gzodamanas drama med pa dang/ gzodamanas nyon mongs bamed pa yanano// 'jam dpal dal d bzhi n
gshags pa chos thams cad daltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa sems can rnams kyi khams rnam par gzigs panasems can rnams la dag pa ma med pa/ nyon mongs pa med/
ba[7]khas/ rnam par l pa zhes bya ba'i thugs rjechen poskye bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal ltar nabyang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod ba yin zhen/ bajam dpal gang
tshabyang chub sems dpa' zad pa'i phyir rlom sems sum byed tsong/ mazad pa'i phyir yang ma yin/ skyo ba'i phyir yang ma yin/ma ba'aphyir yang yin/ gtanazad pazad par bya ba'i phyir
yang m yin/ gtanam skye ba rnamapar 'khrug bar yang m byed pa de ltar spyodan/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la sbyod pa yanAno// 'jam dpalagazhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' das pa'i sems lazad pa zhes bya bar m spyod/ ma 'ongs pa'i sems lam thob pa zhes bya bar m spyod/ da ltar byung bo'i sems la yod ces bya bar m spyod cing/ 'das pa/
dang / ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar byung ba'i sems l chags par ma'i gyur ba de ltar spyodan/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// 'jam dpal
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyon pa dang byang chub dang/ sems can rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gnyis su med dogat+taMs su dbyer med pa de ltar spyodan byang chub sems
dba' spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang/ byang chub dang/ sems can rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gnyis sumed de
gnyis su dbyer med pa de ltar spyodan/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyod pa yazhin// 'jam dpal de bzhin dubyang chub sems dbang bzod pa dang/ byang chub dang/
sems can rnams dang/ d bzhi ni gshegs pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ byang chub dang/ sems can rnams dang/ dbade gshegs ba dang/ bsam gtan dang/ byang chub dang/
wA sems can rnams dang/ dengazhanagshegs pa dang/ de bzhin dushes rab dang byang chub dang/ sems can rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gnyis su med/ gnyis su dbyer med

tsha pa de ltar spyodan/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyod pa yin no// 'jam dpalagal te byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs stong zhes bya bar n spyod/ masteng zhes bya bar ma spyod pa de ltar spyod na/
tshu 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la skyed pa yin no// deci'i phyir zhan/ 'jam dpal gzugs nagazugasakyangob 'di byas steng pa'i phyo ro// 'jam dpal de
yi khazhin dul te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshor ba dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'dubyed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa steng zhes bya bar ma spyodo/ masnying zhes bya bar mi spyod pa de ltar spyodan/ byang chub
sems dpa' byang chub soms dpa'i spyod pa la skyed pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'jam dpal sems dang yidi dang/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gang yengs ku shos
pa khag/ sbyong ba 'am/ bsgom pa'i m/ mngon sum du bya ba'i chos de gang yang med ba ma yAn pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal zad pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na gtan zad pa khonayin no//
gtanathod pa gang yan pa nazid par bya bam yin no// zad par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ma zad pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'jam dpal na ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa yin la/ lta ba bzhin du

khrid pa gang yin pa de la ni/ zad pa cung zad kyang medal/ gang la zad pa cung zad kyang med pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de lan skye ba yang med 'gag pa yang med pa'i phyir/
ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung mkhyung yang rung/ chos nyid dang/ chos gnas pa nyid dang/ chos dbyi nges 'don gnas pa bon zhes bya ste/ ji ltar chos kyi dbud+ha
gnas pa de bzhin du shes pa de yang 'jug par mkhyid/ ldog pa ram byed do// jaltar shes ba de 'jug par mid/ ldog par mabyed pa de lta bu 'achos kyi tshul la 'jug las/ zag paskye bar mi
byed 'gags par ma byed do// 'jam dpal zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba de ni tha sA dadang/ sgra dang/ yagi dang/ brda gdags pa yin te/ 'di na skyob ma/ 'gags bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang
yang med do// de nas 'dzam dbal bzhon nur gyur ba stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mgayas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga lab
[r]@#// de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan badas la tshabs su bcad pa 'a di dgags mngon par bstod do// kha gog rtags dang dbyibs mamanga'// rtsa mimanga'
gnas mami 'a// ma 'gag 'byung ba mnga' ba// mkhas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ ma gnas gnas pa'i meng 'a ba// blang ba'ame ba'i dod mtshung// skye mched drug la sa rnam grol ba/ mi rtan/
khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rnams kun la mkha nas shing// dngos dang dngos med rnam par sbyangs// 'du byed manyam pa nyid bar s pa/ marten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khams khagasum dag
las rnam par grol// ma kha 'altar manyamanyadizugs su chud// 'dod rnams kyisam gis ba/ mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gshegs dang bzhugs dang gzams pa yagi/ spyod lama rnam
ba thams cad du// rtag tumanyam par bzhaga mdzad pa// ma rten khyed la phyag 'tshalal// mnyam par byonarimanyam par gshegs/ dmanyam panyidi la gnas pa po// mnyomanyid/
nyal khrugs par mdzad pa// mnyan byod la phyag 'tshal la// mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs gyur cing// chos rnams kun lamanyam par bzhag/ mtshan ma med la bzhugs gyur ba/ nyin
khyod la phyag tshal lo// m gnas dmags pamamanga' ba// shes rab bacags shamanyam par gzhag/ chos lam 'a dbang bsnyes gyurakha// martan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems
tsa tsakun gyi sgra skad dang// de bzhin gzugs dang spyod lam dag/ skad cig gcig gas gakhrigs mdzad pa// marten khyod la phyag 'tshal le// mde dang gzugs las rnam par grol// rgyudang phung
pathams cad bcad// rnam pa med la 'jug mdzad pa// ma rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan ma dag dang rnamakhral zhang// mtshan ma'i rnam pa rnam par sbyangs// mtshan ma med la 'jug/
mdzad/ ma rten khyod la phyag 'tshal go yang dag rtog pas rnamam brtags// thugs yidi rab tu ma gnas shing// yadi mdzad g ma'am dgongs la// brten khyed la phyag 'tshal ga
nam mkha' 'dra bar gnas tshul ngag/ thogs pa ma mnga' sdes mam pa'o// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba// ma rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i dbung mtha' mamachis
pa/ sangs rgyas tshes nyidi de dang 'dra// dus gsum yang dag 'das gyur pa// ma rten khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'amachanadi sangs rgyas te// nam ma kha'ang mtshan nyidiman+ti/
ma lags// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam grol ba// ma rten khyod la phyag 'tshalaM le// ngar 'dzin mamanga' sgra ma mnga'// gzung ba ma mchis chuzla 'dra// chos rnams kun dang ma khe nas pa/
marten khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// phung po rnams dang skye mched dang// khams rnams dag lami gnas la// phyin tsalig las rnam grol ba// mi rtenakhyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha' gnyis
tsa @#/ dag las rnam grol zhing// bdag tu lta ba yang dag bcad// chos dbyings mnyam pa nyid bar sa la/ ma rton byed la phyag 'tshala'ago gzugs kyi klangs las rnam/
grol zhing// dam chos ma lags rnamakhar sdug/ lenadang stong pa mamanga' ba/ mirten khyod la phyag 'tshol la// bdud kyi zhing las ra 'dus shing// chos kun rtog par thugs su
tshud/ sgrub pa mami 'a chos gyur ga/ ma rten khyod la phyag 'tshal go/ don 'tshol rnams kyis mtshas ma brjed/ ma mchis zhes kyang brjod ma bgyi// lanam da tshigi lamams pa// ma
don khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gnyis kyi chos la ma rten par// theg pa'i rgyal mtshan kun tu btsugs// gnyis dang gsemed rnam grol ba/ mi rten khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// khyed kyis yidi
kyanyis pa dang// lus kun da bzhi pham par mdzad// bsam yas dpe dang rnam bral ba// ma rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lhun gyis grub par 'jug mdzad cing// nyes pa thams cad rnam par spang/
spyod ba mkhyen pas thog drangs pa// ma rtam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod dgongs zhib cing khrag mchog/ 'byung min 'byung la de ba dag nyidi// gnas dang rtog pa mchab 'ag// ma ldan khyod la
phyag 'tshal la// dmags pa ma mnga' thugs kyis su// kun gyi sems rab tumkhyen// bdag gzhan 'dushis ma mnga' khag/ marten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dmag sa dang dmags pa
rnams kyis ni// kun gyi sems ni rmongs par bgyid// sgrub pa med pa'i chos gyur pa// mi rta khyed la phyag 'tshal le// dmags pa dag dang sems rnams/ ngo nyid kyis mchasama'ag
mtha' yas mnyam pa nyid b.reg pa// mi rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas pa'i m nga 'amkhyen pa yis// zhing rnams kun dang de bzhin du// sems can kun gyi spyod gzags la// ma rten khyed
la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas rnams kyi lan 'ga' yang// sems dang chos kun gtan ma dAmabs// chos rnams thams cad kun mkhyen mirtan byed l phyag 'tshal lo// tshes kun
sgyum lta bu ste// sgyu ma nyidi tshang mchas ma lags// sgyu ma 'tshos las rnam grol ba// marten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs sangasa'ajig rtenada mdzad kyang// 'big rten chos la rtan ma mdzad//

'jag rtena rnam rtogamamang 'a khag/ martan khyed la phyag 'tshal la// steng phyi'i steng la spyod mdzad cing// khyod nyid steng zhing spyod yul stod// stengopa steng par len mdzad b/ martanodal phyag 'tshal
la sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzan dang/ rdzu 'phrul chen pa rnam 'phrul zhang/ tha dadamamachis snyems zhugs pa/ ma rtan khyed la phyag tshal go/ dumam las gom lags/ rang dang nyi lam
'jugatsango// gdeg dang gzhag pa mam dbag ma rta khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// jo ji lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// skad cig gcig la mngon sangs rgyas// dngos mchis pa ramam gzhag la/
martan khyod la phyag 'tshal 'go/ 'dren pa dus rnams thams cad du// mag yicu na 'das pa rtogs snatshegs thabs dang ldan pa de// martan khyod la phyaga'atshal go/
sems can rnams kyi brgyud pa 'thibs/ ma khyen pas ma khas bdagyur pa la bas// de phyirem g.yomya ngan 'das/ ma rtan khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mtshim pa' lhun gyi grub// spros pa
zlumam par skyon mina'/ snang med bdag gam 'ab// ma rten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam rtogs ma mang ba skyenamamanga'// bdag gis bdag nyid ji bzhin// kun tu mkhyen pa thams
cad m khyen// marten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// steng sa bcu chu bo brgal pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs bral ma 'jigs sprul ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ma 'dres chos rnams nges par thugs su

sbyo chud gyur pa// 'grob kun 'dren ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun sbyor 'ching ba bcad pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha la byon te thangal bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo// skye bo nga' ba'i rnam 'dren khyod
la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor bar gshegs shang mkhenas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba thams cad dag na sems can rnams dang ni/ thabs tsag ga zhugs kyang thugs yadiradatu dben gyur ba/ blta
bod+machab kyis gos par ma 'gyur bzhin// sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid shin tu brtan// mtshan ma thams cad rnam pa kun tu rnam par bshag/ khyod la gar yang smonobar mdzad pomachasam
03 logs// stenaba'ago 'phang bla med dbenab nyid 'gags te// dmags med chubo brgal ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mthu chen bsam gyis khyab pa ma lags te// mi gnas/
lam kha'amanyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal le/ yon tan kun gyi mchog mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal 'phags snyan po 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas khacom
ldan 'das kyi 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba nate// 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jamaM dpalakhyodakyis legs par sbas so// 'jam dpal de de bzhinate//
'jam dpal sangs rgyas rnams ni gzugs la blta bar ma bya ste// chos las ma yin// mtshan ma las ma yani// chos kyi dbyangs las kyang ma yin no// sangs rgyas rnams ni nyag gcige bzhug
ba ma man/ skye bamang pa'i zhing na bzhugs pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas rnams ni sa sus kyang mthong ba ma yin/ thos ba ma yin/ mchod pa ma yin te/ mchod par byed ba langam mnano/ sangs
rgyas rnams ni chos 'ga' yang gacig pa nyidi dam mang pa nyid du ma mdzad pa yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni byang chub bar s pa med do// sangs rgyas rnams tshes gang gis kyang rab tu 'byed bar/
byed do// sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'tshos 'ga' yang ma gzigs ma gsan/ ma dgongs/ rnam par m mkhyen/ kun tu mamkhyen to// sangs rgyas rnams kyis namagasungs ma brjod do//

dgama'adras pa'i rnam par thar bar mdzad pa'i yeshes thor zhib/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa// rnam
mkha' khams kyi mtha' gtugs la/ lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas kyi[“]mdzad pa thams cad rgyun mchid pa// phyi ma'i mtha' mu bskal pa grangs med pa thams cad du phyir ma ldog/
pa' chos 'khor lo bskor ba byin gyis rlob pa/ chags pa med pa'i bkod pa'i snying la nga dag par ba ston pa/ ma chags pa'i ye shes mnga' ba/ rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan
pa'i shes bya dbyer med cing tsha gnas pa/ dus gcig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog na bzhugs pa dang/ 'chi 'pho ba dang/
skye ba dang/ mngon par 'byung ba dang/ dka' ba spyod pa 'i sbyor ba dang/ byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang/ bdud bcom pa dang/ mno bar rdzogs par byang chub pa dang/ chos
kyise la khor lor ba tu bskor ba dang/ yongs su mya ngonalas 'da' ba dang/ chos gnas pa dang/ chos nub pa ston pa la mkhas pa bzhugs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yid
brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang da pa' bar 'gro ba ba ting nga 'di
gyis rnam par rtsenapa/ lus kyi kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa/ songs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston ba lam/
kha/ kun nas nyon mongs pa can gya'ajig rten gyi khams yongs su spyod ba sha sdug dang/ lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ wa dang ]lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi
'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ brgya byani dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ mi dang mi ma yazhibagrangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang yang thabs cig go/

ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur la 'a di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal
dbugs 'byin b.redapa lnga 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang pa yongs su spyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na 'di lta ste// bdag ni bsam pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag

phyir zhen/ dbyer med ngan de bye ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir/ dbye ba'i rang bzhinalas dbyer med pa gzhan med pas/ dbye ba'arang bzhin nyid dbyeramed pa ste/
dbyibab rarab zhanargyus dbyer med pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad dbyaramed pa'o/ bdag na yo ga dang dbyer med bayagamed pa shes pa la gnas akyis/ gzhan dgakyang yago
dang dbyer med yi ge med pa shes pa la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'agyur te/ da layig dang dbyer med ba ya med pan yig ring bzhan gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
ya ge med pa ni yi ge'arang bzhan las ga zhanam yin pa 'phyir te/ ma 'are nga bzhin las yagi med pa gzhan med pas/ yi ge 'deng ba zhin nyid yag med pa'o// ya gi'ing ba zhanegyi
yali med pa shes pa des/ chos thams cad ya gi med pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te lnga po de dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang yongs su skyeng/
bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin rud par lnga dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ snulngagang zhen/ 'di lta ste ba dag ni

lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang dbyer med pa'i lhag pa'i nga rgyalamed pa shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sdug pa'i nga rgyal dang dbyer med pa ltag pa'i nga rgyal med shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin
pa red par 'gyur te/ de phyugapa 'di rgyal dang dbyeramed palhag pa'i nga rgyalamed pan/ lhag pa'i nga rgyalagyi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhagag pa'i ngargyal med pa ni

lhag pa 'a ngargyalagyurang bzhan las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyirate/ lhag pa'i dergyal gyi rang bzhan las lhag pa'i da rgyalamed pa gzhan med pas lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyi ring bzhinanyidi ltag pa'i ngargyalamed pa ste/

lhag pa'i de rgyal gyi rang bzhin gyi lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa shes pa des chos thams cad lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa'o// bdag ni bdag bstod pa dang dbyer med pa bdag bstod pa me dang shes pa la gnasakyis
gzhan bdag kyang bdag bstod pa dang/ dbyeramed pa dag bdag bstod pamed pa shes pa la dgod dro zhis dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la bdag bstod pa dang/
dbyer med pa dag bdag bstod pa med pa nib dgabastod par ngabazhin gdaman pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag bstod pamed panabadag ba stod pa rang bzhin las gzhan yin pa'i phyir te/

des cho sa thams cad bdagabastod pa med pa'o/ bdagan drang ba'i don dang dbyeramed pa nges pa'i donashes pa la kha/nas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang drang ba'i don dang dbyer med pa nges pa'i
donashes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par gyur te/ de la drang ba'i don dang dbyer med pa nges ba'i donan drang ba'i don gyirang bzhin gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas pa'i
don ni drang ba'i don gyi rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir/ drang ba'i don gyi rang bzhin las nges pa'i don gzhan med pas/ drang bden gyirang bzhin nyid nges pa'i don te/ drang
ba' don gyi'i nga bzhin nges pa'i don shes pa des chos thams cad nges pa'i don to// bdagan gang zag dang dbyeramed pa'i chos nyid shesapa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dab/ kyang gang zag dang dbyeramed pa

yang dag pa'i lta ngan leg par lta kha'arang bzhin las gzhan ma yin ba'i te/ log par ltakha'arang bzhin las yang dag pa'i lte ba gzhan med pas/ log par lta ba'i rang bzhin nyid yang
dag pa'i lta ba'o// legakharaltabarang bzhin yang dag pa'i lta ba shes pa des chos thamasacad yang dag pa'i lta ba ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa red par lnga ro dganabyang chub sems

dang dbyer med pa shes pa ni/ shes bya'i rang bzhin gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ shas banashes bya'i nga bzhin las gzhan m yin pa'i phyirati/ shes byarang bzhin las
rgyu shes pa gzhan med pas shes bya'i rang bzhin nyid shes pa ste/ shes bya'arang bzhin gyi shes par/ chos thams cad shes pa'o// bdag 'dzin ra dang dbyer med pa'i dzin bamed pa'i
shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang 'dzin pa dang dbyer med pa'i dzin ba med pa'i shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byanipa red dar 'gyur te/ de la 'dzin pa dang dbyer med pa 'dzin pa med

ba ni pa sgom pa'i 'i nga bzhin las bzhunam yin pa'i phyir te/ bsgom pa'i rang bzhin las bsgom pa med pa gzhan med bas/ bsgom pa'id bzhin nyid/
bsgom pa med pa'o// bsgom pa 'od bzhin bsgom pa med pa'i ngegs pa des/ chos tham cad ba sgom pa med pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin brnyed par lnga po de dag na byed chub/

yan pa'i r nga bzhin nyid nam mkha' ste/ nam mkha' na yan par ng bzhinagyi nam mkha'ashes pa des/ chos thams cad nam mkha'o// bdag namagashamagyi bu ma yin pa dang dbyer
med pa'i mag shamakhya bu shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang mo gsham gyi bu ma yin pa dang dbyer med pa'i magasham gyi bu shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pared par 'gyur te/
da la mgasham gyi bu ma yin pa dang dbyeramed pa'i mgashamagyi bu namo gsham gyi bu mayin pa'i rang bzhanagang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mgashamagyi bum yin pa'i rang bzhinalaname/
gshamagyobug zhanam yin pa phyir te/ megashamagyi bu bar nga bzhun las tshog sham gyi bum yin pa gzhan med bas/ migamagyi bu'adi bzhin nyid ma gshamagyi bum yanate/ mo gsham
gyi bum yin pa'i rang bzhan gyi mi gshamagyi bu shes pa des// chos thams cad mo gsham gyi bu dang mtshungs pa'o// bdag ni smig rgyu ma yin pa dang dbyer med pa'i smag rgyu shes pa la gnas
ni gzhan dag kyang sgrib rgyum yin pa dang dbyer med pa'i smag rgyu ma shes pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la smig rgyun yin pa dang dbyer med pa'i

smig rgyu ma yin pa gzhan med bas/ stsag rgyu la rang bzhin nyid smig rgyu ma yin pa ste// smig rgyu ma yin pa'i rang bzhin smag rgyu'i shes pa des/ chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bu 'o// bdag

par gyur te/ de la leg par lta ba dang dbyemed pa yang dag blta banalag par lta ba'arang bzhin gang yin pa'o// deci phyir zhen/ log par lta ba'i rang bzhin las yang dag pa'i lto ba gzhan

rig pa shes pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang ma rig pa dang dbyer med pa'i rig pa shes pa la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byin parud par 'gyur te/ de la ma rig pa dang dbyemed pa' gi

'dod chagasamed pa'o// bdag nazhe sdang dang dbyer med pa zhe sdang med pa shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang zhe sdang dang dbyeramed pa zhe sdang med pa shes pa la dgod/

khrims lhod pa med pa// cho ga dang tshul khrims dang lta ba nyams pa rnams las yang dag par 'da' ba gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dbal dbugs 'byin pa red pa lnga pa do/
dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
sa dang po yangs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhan 'di lta ste/ bdaganelce dngam lam slu bar gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang lha dngamale maslu bar dgod de zha dbugs

'byin parnyed par 'gyur to// de la lta dang ma lamaslu bar na byang chub kyi sems yongos su mi gtong ba gang yin ba'o// bdagan sbyor ba la gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang sbyor ba kha dgon de zhes dbug 'azhi ba rin
par 'gyur te/ de la sbyor ba na sems can thams cad la phan pa'i de ngos de sngon du 'gro ba'i rjes su bstan pa gang yin pa'o// bda gnas ems can dmu rgod ma yin pa la
gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang sems can damu rgod ma yin pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rinapar 'gyur/ de la sems dmu rgod mayani ba na dul ba dang cad shes kyis sems
gang yin pa'o// bdu gnas ems can thams cad kyi slob mar khas len ba la gnas akyis/ gzhan dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi slob mar khas len pa la dgod do zhes dbugs
'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te de la sems can thams cad kyi slob mar khas len pa ni bya ba cayod pa la bdag nyid byed pa gang yin pa'o// bdag gnasbyin gnas rnams la 'dud pa dang phyagakhyab la
gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang sbyin gnas rnams la 'dud pa dang phyag bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin parnyed par 'gyurato/ de la sbyin gnas rnams la 'dud pa dngaphyagabya banasems
can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa gang yan pa ste 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pared pa lnga po de dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kya ste dad po yongs su sbyadabar 'gyur ba'o/ 'jam dpal
gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pared blta dag byang chung sems dpa' rnams kyis dang pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyurati/ lnga gangazhan/ 'di lta ste/ bdaganodim pa'o tshos yongs sutshol ba la gnas
kyis/ gzhan dag kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dam pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba na sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la skye ba
med pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong pa dang tshul khrims dang thos pa 'tshogs gsog pa dang/ chos yongs su tshol ba la brtson zhing/ spyan pa malen/ ser snamagatod/
tshul khrims m len/ 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi tshul khrims m gtong/ bzod pa ma len/ gnod sems m gtong/ brtson 'grus ma len/le lo mgatong/ bsam gtan
ma len/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa mgatong/ shes rab malen/ 'chal pa'i nge shes rab ma gtod de dge ba ma len cing/ mdegamagatong ba gang yin pa'o//
bdag chos la gus pa dang bcas pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang chos la gus pa dang bcas pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de lachos la gus po dang bcas pa ni
chos rnams la nan tan byed pa gang yin pa'o// bdaganachos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas par gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos smra ba la gus pa dang bcas pa la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byin pa/
rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos sgrub la gus pa dang bcas par ni chos smra ba la sten par 'du shes pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni tshig rtsub pomid pa la gnas kyi// gzhan dgakyang tshig rtsa ba
de med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur to/ de la tshig rtsa ba po med ba na phan 'dogs pa pa'i tshig gang yan pa'o// ba dag na gnod sems med pa//
[+ ]la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang gnod sems med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pared par 'gyur te/ de la gnod sems med pa na las bya ba la 'jugs pa gang yan pa ste//
pa/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa lnga pod dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga gang gis byang
chub sems dapa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ bdagan sbyin pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang spyanapa la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byin
ba rnyed par gyur te/ de la sbyin nams ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa gang yane pa'o// bdag na snyan par smra ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang snyan par snang la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin parnyed par
'gyur te/ de la snyan par smra ba ni thang thang med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni don spyod pa la gnas kyas gzhan dag kyade don sbyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa
rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la don spyod pa na gzhan la lung 'bog pa dang kha ton 'don du 'jugad skye ba med pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni rinamathun pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang don mthun pa la dgod/
0[j]do zhes dbugs 'byin pared par 'gyur te/ de la don 'thun pa ni spyan du byin nas theg pa chen pal dgod do zhes gang yan pa'o// bdagan byang chud kyi sen sa la gnas kyis// gzhan dag kyang
byang chub kyis sems la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par gyur tade labyang chub kyi sems na ngas rgyas kyi chos thamasacad chud ma za zhing gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dunapa skyepa dang/
'bad pa dang/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ sems rab tu 'dzin pa dang/ yang dag par 'jog pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i
rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lngadagags byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang de yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lha gang
na 'di lta ste// bdag ni don se se yang dag par rage ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang don so so yang dag par rig pa la dgod ronas dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la don/
so yang dag par rag pan chos kyi tshul yang dag par ci lta ba bzhin du [“]rtog pa gang yin pa'o// bdagan chos so so yang dag par rage pa la gnas gyis/ gzhan dgakyang chos so se yang
dag par rig pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin brnyed par 'gyur/ de la chos so so yang dgapar rag pa nas nigs rgyas kyi chos thamasacad la 'jug pa'i ye shes gang yanapa'o// bdag na
nges ba 'tshig soso yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dgakyang dres pa'i tshog se yang dag par rag pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pared par 'gyur te/ dal
sa ngan pa 'tshig so so lo ra dgag par dag pa naskad sgrogs pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes gang yin pa'o// bdagan spyod dus so yang dag par rag pa la gnas se/ gzhan dag kyang spobu
ba so so yang dgabararag ba la dgod donas dbugs 'byin paredapar 'gyur/ de la spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ni sangs rgyas chos thams cad la tshig rab tu dbyeb lamakhas pa'i
nas kha ba dang yan pa'o// bdagan sbyongs dang la gnas kyis/ gzhan dgakyang sbrebs pa la dragod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la slebs pan sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la
byin gyis rlob cing ston pa zhes pa gang yin pa ste/ danachog gcige gzung nas phyi mtha' mu'abaskal par byin gyis rlob cing ston kyang m ldong ba gangayan pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin paredapa/
lnga po de dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dgags byang chub sems dang 'a rnams kyis dang nga
yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ ldag zhan/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nisimasacan yongs su sman par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa bzod ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang
00sems can yongs su smin par bya pa'i phyir/ sems can gyi kun nas nyon mengs pa bzod pa la da god do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la kun nas nyon mengs pa nas 'ganod pa/
dung/ sems la gnod pa gang yin pa'o// badragan phongs pa med pa la gnas kyis// gzhan dag kyang phangs pa med nga la dgod dro zhis dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la po ngos ra
med pa ni dege ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba gang yin pa'o// bdag ni sems ma 'khrug pa la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang sems ma 'khrug pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur
[P：]de la sems ma 'khrug pa na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chud mkha ba gang yin pa'o/ bdag ni brtson 'grus la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang brtson 'grus la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red/
par 'gyur te/ de la brtson 'grus na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed r dang ma dag ba'achos thams cad sbyong ba gang yan da lo// bdag ni sems can la dmags pa'i
khyams pa lag gnas kyis gzhon dag kyang sems can ladamags pa'i byams pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin par d par 'gyur te/ de la sems can la dmags pa'i byams panasems
can la snyoms par gang yan pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa redapa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang
dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga pa de dganubyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi se dang longs su sbyang bar 'gyur tu/ lnga gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bdagan khong khro ba med pa'i
sems la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang khong khro ba med pa'i sems la dgod do zhus dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur do de la khong khro ba med dpa' sems na sems can thams cad srung pa gang yin
(pa'o// bdag ni sdeng ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sbyong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyuratra/ de la spong ba ni dus gsum gyi chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du 'jug
pa pa ngayan pa'o// bdagan tshos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ' gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos la dan bags po'i byin s pa la dgod dezhes dbugs 'byin nga rnyed par 'gyur te/ de'achos la
dmags pa'i byams pa na chos thams cad la ma dmags shang/ ma dmigs pa la yang rlom sems med pa 'o// bdag ni dang po'akhasod nams kyi tshogs ' gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang dang po'i
bdanams se tshogs la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dang po' bsod nams kyi tshogs na byang chub kyi sems ma gtod pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a skyed pa 'i rjes
su 'jug pa gang yin pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rdzas su 'jug pa ni sems can thams cad la snyems pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i byams pa dang/ ser sna'i sems tshor bcod pa dang
'chal pa 'tshul khrims sel ba dang/ gnod sems skyed pa dang/ la le sel ba dang/ rnam par g.yeng ba kun tu spyod pa med da dang/ 'chal pa'i nge shes rab sdong ba dang/ bsdu ba'i bangos po bzhi/
des sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang/ sems can thams cad la sems dang mtshungs pa dang/ theg pa dman pa la mes pa med pa dang/ sAng rje chen pos sems can thams cad
kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bya ba la brtson zhing/ sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brjod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyapha rol tu ngan pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
dang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin cing shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i bslab pa dang/ bsod nams tshogs dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs la mngon par brtson par gang yin pa'o// bdag
na ngon tshar gyi 'dushes la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang de mtshar gyi 'du shes la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes chos thams cad l/
gnyis su med pa' 'du shes dang/ skyed ba thams cad la bdag gi spyod pa 'du shes pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugasa'abyin pa rId pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sA dang
po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa red pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa 'a rnams kyi se dang se yengs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/
bdag ni bzod pa dang des pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dgakyang bzod pa dang des pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red da ra 'gyur te/ de la bzed pa dang des pa ni
[+ ]na tu brjod pa dang/ ngan du smras pa'i tshig ga lam la khong khro ba'i sems med pa gang yin pa'o// bdag na sems zhi ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sems zhu ba la dgod de
wA zhes dbugs 'byin parnyed par 'gyur te/ de la sems zhu ba na ltung ba la glang ba med pa'o// bdag ni chos thams cad dngos pa med pa la gnasakyas/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad dngos
btsape med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams cad dngos po med pa zhes bya ba de na dngos pa'i tshig go/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ dngos po'arang bzhin las
dngos po med pa gzhan m yin te/ dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid dngos po med pa ste/ dngos de ring bzhin dngos po med pa shes pa des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'o// bdagan chos
gnas pa nyid la gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos gnas pa 'di la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos gnas pa nyidi nachos thamasacad g.yebamed pa gang yin pa 'o//
@# bdag chos la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa snyad par 'gyur/ de la chos ni tho ma dad tsangam gnas pa gang yan pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs
0 ]'byin pa red pa lnga po de dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yengs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa red palnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams/
kyi so dang pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lngagang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdagan yoshesakyis nyon mongs pa rnams gzhom pa yang ma yin/ ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa rnams m gzhom pa
yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la zhugs kyis/ gzhan dag kyang yengashas kyis nyon mongs pa rnams gzhom pa yang ma yin/ ye shes kyi nyin mengs pa rnams m gzhom pa yang m yin no zhes bya
ba la bzung ngo zhes dbugs 'byin pared par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin las ye shes gzhan ma yin pa'i phyire te/ nyonamengs pa'i rang bzhin las ye shes
gzhayodapas/ nyon mengs pa'i rang bzhin nyid ye shes yin te/ yeshes des ye shes de nyid bsal bar ma bya'o// dper namadzub mo'i rtse me ril nyidakyis mdzub mo'i rtse me de nyade la
reg par ma rung ba de ltar ye shes de nyid kyis de nyid gsal bar ma bya'o// bdag na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma rtag pam yan no zhes bya ba la
zhugs kyis/ gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa ma rtag pa yang m yan no zhes bya ba la gzud do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te//
[r]@#// del de bzhinagshegs par rtag pa yang m yanemartag pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba narlom sems ngo bo nyid med pa 'byararo// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bsamagyu
ma khyab pa'ozhasabya ba yi shes 'dal zhugs kyis/ gzhan dag kyang bzhin gshegs pa bsamagyis ma khyab pa'o zhes bya ba'ayeshes 'dal dgod do zhus dbugs 'byin pa red dar 'gyur te/
dal derazhanagshegs pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa nasems can g dul ba lta ba dang/ bsam pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par bzhagapa lasama'ada' ba gang yin pa'o// bdaganagazugasamtshan nyid
medwado zhes bya ba la zhugs kyis/ gzhan dag kyang gazugasamtshan nyid med do zhes bya ba lagazud do zhes dbugs 'byin parod par 'gyur te/ dpa' phyir zhen gzugs na mtshan nyid med pa'i rang
bzhinalas gzhan m yan pa'i phyirata/ gzugs kyirang bzhinalas mtshamanyid med pagazhanamod pas/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin nyidamtshan nyidamed pa ste/ gzugasakyi rang bzhan mtshan nyid med
pa shes pa des chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'o// bdag thabs makhas pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang thobasamakhas pa la dgodad zhas dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ del
thabs mkhas pa chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin par dapa lnga pa do dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'i// 'jam
[j]dbal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdagabasedanams kyatshog salazed pa la gnas/
kyis/ gzhan dag kyang bsadanams kyis tshogs mi zad pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la bsadanams tshog samizad banadig ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tubasdus pa gangayan
pa'o// bdag naye shes kyi tshogs la gnas kyis/ gzhan dgakyang ye shes kyi tshogs la dgod dezhis dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la ye shes kyi tshogs na stong pa nyid la mes pa
gang yin pa'o// bdag ni shes rab kya rtsa ba las 'byung ba'i las la gnas kyis/ gzhan dgakyang shasar bkyi rtsa ba las byung ba'i las la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin parod par 'gyur te//
dal shes rab kyi rtsa ba las byung ba'alasan bdag nyid ches dkar po la gnas pa gang yin pa'o// ye shes rab kyi rtsa ba lasaMkhyung ba'alasan gzhan shes rab la dgod pa gang yin pa'o// bdag
nating nge 'dzin la bo nas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ting nge 'dzin la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la tadange 'dzanan srims med pa'i snyems par 'jug par gang yin pa 'o// bdag
naso so yang dag par rtog pa la gnasakyis// gzhan dag kyang so so yang dag par rtog pa la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byin ba red par 'gyur te/ de la se se yang dag par rtog ban las dang bya ba la 'jug
pagadaman pa ste// 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin ted pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongasasu sbyong bar 'gyur 'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang/
dbugs 'byin pared par lnga dgabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang de yongs su sbyong bar 'gyurato/ lngagangazhan/ 'dilta ste// bdaganadabuma'ilamashesad la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang
dbu ma'i lam shes pa la dgod dozhas dbugs 'byin pa med par 'gyur te/ de la dbu ma'i lamanAmAtha'a rnam par dag pa shes pa gang yin pa'o// decaphyare zhan/ mtha'aring bzhin las dbumalam
gzhan m yin pa'i phyir te/ mtha'i rang bzhanalas dbu ma'alam gzhonamed pas/ mtha'i rang bzhin nyid dbu ma'i lamamo// bdag nichos thams cad rtag pa'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag
klu kyang chos thams cad rtag pa lozhes bya ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams cad rtag pa mtha' dang dbung med pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad mtha' dang dbud
med pa nu'i dus byas kyi rang bzhinam yan pa'i phyirate/ 'dus byas kyaerang bzhin las mtha'adwang dbung med pa gzhan med pas/ 'dus byas rang bzhin nyidamatha' dang dbung med pa'o// mtha' dad
dbung med pa gang yanepa de ni rtog pa brtan ther zugs pa'o// bdag na sangs rgyas lamachod pa bye brag tu mngon par 'phags pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas l mchod pa bye brag tu
mngon par 'phags pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin paredapar 'gyur/ de la sangs rgyas la mchodapa bye brag tu mngon par 'phags pa nitheg pa chen po las pa 'byang chub sems dang la la/
bsnyenatsang bsten pa dang/ bsnyen bkur byed tsang stod ba dang/ bkur lta byas te/ ces nus kyis thug pa chen po yang dag par skyed cing sbyin pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni chos thams cad 'dus ma byas so
zhag bya ba la gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad 'dus ma byas sa dra ba la dgod rogs dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur to/ de lachos thams cad 'dusum byas zhan bya ba dan 'dus ma
byas kyi tshig go/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'dus byas kya rab zhin las 'dus macas gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhanelas 'a dus macas gzhan med pas/ 'dus ma byas kyi red
bzhinanyid 'dus ma byas te/ 'dus ma byas kyi re ngu bzhin 'dus ma byas shes pa des chos thams cad 'dusum byas pa'o// bdag nAtshos thams cad stong zhes byang la zhugs kyis/ gzhan dag
kyang chos thams cad ste ngozhes bya ba la gzud de zhes dbugs 'byin pard par 'gyur te/ de la stong pa nyiden lto bar gyur pa gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stedapa nyade ni lta bar gyur pa'i
rang bzhinalas gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ lta bar gyur nga 'irang bzhin las stong pa nyid gzhan med pas/ ltabor gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do// lta bar gyur pa'i rang bzhinanyid shes pa
des chos thamasacad sted pa ste/ 'jam dpa la dbugs 'a byin pa red pa lnga padagan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam/
dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pared pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur taM/ lta gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag ni chos thams cad mthong bar dka' bal
zla gnas kyis/ gzhan dgakyang chos thams cad mthong bar dka' ba la dwagod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa redapar 'gyur te/ de la chos thams cad mthong bar dka' ba ni rgyu dang rkyenagyi rang bzhin yin
pa' phyiraro// bdag chos thams cad rtogs par dka' ba lagunas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thums cad rtog par dka' ba la dgodado zhes dbugs 'byin ba red par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams
cad rtogs par dka' ba ni dmigs pa med pa dang/ yid la byed pa'i rang bzhanam yane pa'i phyidaro// bdagan chos thams cad reg/ par dka'akha la gnasakyis/ gzhan dgakyang chos
lha thams cad ragar ra dka'abul dgodad zhas dbugs 'byin parnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams cad r ga par dka' ba nangegs pa dang shes bya mnyam pa nyid durtog pa' phyirer// bdag
na chos thams cad rtog pa med pa ' gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad rog pa med pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa redapar 'gyur te/ de'achos thams cad rtog pamed pa ni shin tu
rnam par dag par ro// bdag ni chos thamasacad mkhrid pa ' gnas akyis/ gzhan dagakyang chos thamasacad mawadang la dgod ro zhes dbugs 'byin r redad ra 'gyur te/ de la chos thams
cad mazad pan dpe dang dper khya ba'angob nyid ma yin pa'i phyirate/ 'jamadapaladabugs 'byin paredapa lnga po dod na byang chub sems dapa'i rnams kyis dadape yongs su sbyobar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam
dang la gzhan yang dbugs 'an da rud pa lda dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur tu/ lcagazhan/ 'daltaste/ bdag nachos thams cad m phyed po 'a gnas kyis/
gzhan dgakyang chos thamasacad m phyedab la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red bar 'gyur te/ dal chos m phyadapanachos thams cad chos kyi dbyangs dang dbyer med pa' ra/ dusagasum mnyam pa
nyid du 'jug pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ma phyed pa la gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhim phyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par
'gyur/ de la 'phags pa'ibaden pa bzha mo phyed pa ni nang rnam par dag pa gangayan pa'o// bdag ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed m phyin pa shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang m rig pa dang 'du
byed phyed ngashes pa la dgod ngo zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ marag pa 'du byed kyi rang bzhinalas gzhan m yanapa phyir ro// gal te 'du byed rnams lam
rige ba gzhan ma yin du nen 'du bye rnams rgyu med pa can du 'gyur ro// skye marag pa las 'du byed rnams gzhan m yin/ da ltan nitu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyu rang
'bras bu 'grogs par 'gyur ro// bdagan chos thams cad mi rtog pa'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad m rteg pa'o zhes khyab la dgod do zhes dbugs khyade nyid
par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhi na/ ma rtag pa nyid rtag pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyirate/ rtag pa'i rang bzhin las martag pa gzhan med pas/ rtag pa'i rang bzhin nyid ma rtagapa'o/
bdag ni de bzhin gshags du ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o zhes bya ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang de bzhineg yogs pa na skyes ma 'gags pa'o zhes khyabadagod de zhes dbugs 'byin
parnyed par gyur te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas skyes ma 'gags pa ste gnyis pa med pa'i phyiraro// 'di lta ste dper nam mkha' nAm skyes pa ma'agags pa mtha' dang dbungamed rayin med
kyi 'on kyang dmags pa'i dbang gas 'dis ni khab kya bu gu'o/ 'ad nangum pa'i nang ngo// 'dinanam mkha' tshad mod pa'ozhes rab 'bring dang tha marasnangayang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'i phyir/
nam mkha' la rab 'bring dang tha ma med do// nam mkha' mi rtog rnam bar m rtog med kyis/ 'onakyang m 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir te/ de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu
'di byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes ma 'gags pa mtha' dang dbung med pa yin med kyis/ 'on/
kyang de sems can gyi bsam pa'i dbang gas/ sems can gyi bsan par ba 'bring tha ma rnams la 'dane nyen thos kyi theg pa'o// 'di nirang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o// 'dunasems can thams
cad kyi go skabs yodapa theg pa chen pozhes bya ba tha dad pa 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtog rnam par m rtog med byas/ 'onakyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ dam rtog cing lhun gyis
grub par bya ba 'di 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste// dper na 'uma'adan gnas dang/ dmigs pa'i dbang gis grib ma sna tshogs su 'gyur yang nyi ma'i 'od nam 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i
phyir mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kya/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang ngamags pa'i
dbang gisayengashes tha dad pa sna tshogs su 'gyur te/ de bzhinagshegs pa na mo rtoga rnam par mi rtog med kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldand 'i phyir/ ma rtog cing snyan gyis grub
par ba 'di lta bu 'di 'byung ngo// 'dini thag pa'i matheg pa ma yin pa ni gang yang medade/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dganakhyadachub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po
yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin par d pa ldadag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te//
lcagang zhen/ 'dalta ste/ bdog na sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pasel ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag ngasems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa gsel ba padagod do zhes dadug
'byon par dad ra 'gyurato/ dalakun nas nyon mongs pa na lus 'a gnod pa dang/ sems la gnod pa'o// bdag nachos snang ba'i sge'ashis rab 'a gnasAkyas/ gzhan dgakyang ches sna
ba'i sge'aja shes rab la dgodado zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal de la chos snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab nitshes bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhang zhan/ 'di[Q]
ste dad pa dang/ bag yod pa dang/ bsam pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa ste/ 'jam dpal chos bzhi po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa chos snang ba'i sge'i shes rab
'byung bar 'gyur taM/ chos snang ba'i sge'i shes rab kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung bo thams cad g gcod par 'gyur ro// bdaganAyi shes snang ba'i
sgo'i shes rab l gnasakyis/ gzhan dgakyang ye shes snang ba'i sgo'o shes rab la dgodado zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal de la ye shes snang ba'i sgo'i shes rab ni
chos bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhagang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dud/ ye shes kyi tshogs dung stengang nyid la mes pa dang sems can rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems/
lagazhog pa ste/ 'jam dpal chos bzhi po dedag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yishas snang ba'i sge'a shes rab 'byung bar 'gyur te/ yegs snang ba' sbyoreshes rab kyis/ bdud kyi
zhags dang/ bdud kyis las thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// bdagan sbyin pa'i bsam pa ma zad par sbyor ba'i shes lob la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang snyan pabasam pa ma bzad par
sbyor ba shes rab la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ 'jam dang la de la sbyin pa'i bsam pam bzad par sbyor ba'ashos rang na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems
can ser sna can yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ba'o// bdag tshul khrims bsam pamazad par sbyor ba'i shes rab lags kyis/ gzhan drag kyang tshul khrims kyi bsam pam zad par sbyor
ba ngeshes rab la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te 'jam dpal de la tshul khrims kyi bsam pa ma zed par sbyor ba'i shes rab na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems
catshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa red pa lnga po dadaganabyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o//
@#// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gangazhan/ 'dalta ste/ bdagand du
yang dag 'jogs la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang nang du yang dag 'jogs la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ dil nang duyang dag 'jog lus dang sems
dbenazhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsanas pa thams cad la zhum pa me dang gang yin pa'o// bdag ni 'dus byas kya chos nyid 'a gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang 'dus byas kyi chos nyid la dgod do zhes
dbugs 'byin pa nadapar 'gyur te/ de la 'dus byas kyi chos nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa ma yin/ ma sbyang pa ma yin/ sgro ga tags pa ma yani/ sgrom gtags pa ma yin/ lhag par byed
nga ma yin/ lcag ri ran byed pa yin/ dngos po ma yin/ dngos pamar pa mayan/ 'dus byas ma yin/ 'dus ma byas ma yanA/ mtshan nyid ma yin/ mtshan nyid med pa ma yin/
gnas ni yin/ gnas med pa ma yin/ gsam yanA/ gnyas su ni dpa mAyan/ 'dag pa ma yan/ gzhogs pa ma yin/ lenapam yane ]gtong ba ma yin pa ste/ de ltar 'jug ba
gang yAn pa de na 'dus byas kyi chos nyid cas bya'o// bdagan 'dus ma byas kyi chos de la gnas kyis gzhan dag kyang 'dus mkhyas kyis chos nyid la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa redapar 'gyur te/
de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos nyid ces bya ba na tshes de dag 'de la dbyer med pa// rlom sems med pa// sbem 'degs pa ma rtoga rnam par rtog pa gang yand ste/ de ni 'dus byas kyi chos nyid ces//
bya'o bdag naye da dgu par mthong ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang yang dag par mthong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pared par 'gyur te/ de la yang dag par mthong ba na ga2sa dang gnyis
su med pa la mtshan 'di med par 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gnyis kyi rang bzhinalas gnyis sumed da gzhan m yan pa'i phyir te/ gnyis kyi rang bzhanalas gnyis su med pa
gzhan med pas/ gnyis kyi re nga bzhan 'di gnyis su med pa ste// de ltar 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par mthong ba zhes bya'o// bdag ni'i sdang med pa la gnas kyae/ gzhan dag kyang zhe
sdang med pa la dgod dro zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la zhe sdang med pa ni sems can thams cad la ldan pa'i dngos po dang/ las kyis bya ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam
dbal dbugs 'byin parnyed pa lnga de de dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpagazhan yang dbugs 'byon pa rnyed palnga dag byang chub
sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bdag na pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa la gnasakyas/ gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu
@#// phyin pa' lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa la dgod dro zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed da ra 'gyur te/ dal rol tu phyin pa'i ma gya tshul la 'jug pa na thebs mkhas pas yang
dag par zin pa'i shes rab gang yin pa'o// bdwa gnas engs rgyas rigs su skyes ba yun gyis/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas rigs su skyes pa la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byin pard par
'gyur te/ de la sangs rgyas rigs su skyes pa na bsed nams kyi tshigs dang/ yingashesakyi tshogs gang yand 'o// nga da gne chub kyi srims la gnasakyas/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub
kyisems la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin parudabar 'gyur te/ de la byang chub kyi sems nabyams pa chen po dang/ snyade rje chen po gang yanipa ste/ datsa'i phyizhin/ chos thams cad kyi
rjes su sengaba'i phyir ro// bdag ni chos le sa yang dag par rags pa la gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos so solang dag par rigs pa la dgod de zhig dbugs 'byin parnyed par 'gyur te/
ts+tsa dal chos so so yang dag par rag pa na chos thams cad kyi chos rab tu dbye babastan pagang yan pa'o// bdag na don so so yad dag par rig ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang donas si yang
tshadag par rig pa la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byin parnyed par 'gyur te/ de la don so so yang dag par rag pa na chos thamasacad kyi rab tu dbye babastan pagangayin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs/
'khyen pa rnyed pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi se dang de yongs su spyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang da dug 'byin pa ni da ba lnga dag byang chub sems da pa la/
rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lngag pazhan/'di lta ste/ bdag ni sa pa'i tshigs yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dgakyang ngos patshig so so yang
dag par rig pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la ngas pa'i tshig sos yang dag par rig pa ni/ chos rnams kun rdzob shes pa dang/ dbyer med pa gang yanar 'o//
ba dgan spebs pa se sa yang dag par rig pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang lcebs pa se sa yang dag par rage pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la s+yebs paso/
sa yang dag bar ragapa la ni chos thams ca da kyi drin dam pa la mkhas pa 'a yi shes gang yin pa'o// ba dganadren pa la gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang dran pa la dgodu dozhis dbugs
'byan pa red par 'gyur te/ de la dran pa ma rjod pa'i chos nyid do// bdagan blo gros la gnas sa/ gzhan dag kyang blo gros la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te//
da la blo gros shin tu rnam par nges pa'i yi shes ba/dman pa'o// bdagan brtan pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang brtan pa la dgo dpozhis dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ dol
brtan pa na sdom pa la spyod pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga po de dgan du dachub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs lusdeng bar 'gyur ba'o//
'jam dpal gzhan yang dngugs 'byin pa red pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang pe yongs su sbyang bar 'gyur te/ lcagang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdagan rtog po la gnas kyis/ gzhan
dag kyang rtog pa la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byin par da nga ra'agyurato/ der rtogs panamed las 'byung 'degongs pa khod duchudapagang yin pa'o// kha dragan shing rab la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag
kye shes rab la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur/ de la shes rab n de dus ma byas kyis chos rnan sa la dbyer med par makhas bag ngayin ba'o// bdag tshigs lu gnas kyis/
gzhan dag kyang tshogs la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rin par 'gyur te/ del tshog san pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'o// bdag yongs sugacod b.la gnas nyakyis/ gzhan dgakyang yongs su
gcod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pared par 'gyur tsa/ de la yongs nyagacodapa nishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bdagan thebasamakhas pa la gnadakyis/ gzhan dag kyang
thabs mkhas pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ del thabs mkhas panachos thams cad sa nga dag par sdud pa gang yanapa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa redapar
lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang pe yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa rAd pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis/
dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhen/ 'ad lta ste/ bdag ni 'du 'dzir spyod pa 'a la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang 'du 'dzir spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red/
par 'gyur te/ dol 'du 'dzir spyod pa nipha rol tu phuneng lnga gang yin pa'o// bdagan 'du 'dzi med pa ra spyod pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang 'du 'dzamed par spyod pa la dgod dozhis dbug
'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la 'du 'dzamed par spyod pa ni shes rab kyis pha ro pa tu phyin pa gang yin pa'o// bdag na zag pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa la gnas kyase/ gzhan dag kyang bag
pa dang bcas pa spyodong la dgod de zhes dbugs 'dun red par 'gyur te/ de la zag pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa ni/ gang la rlom sems 'jugapa'o// kha drag na zug pa med pa'i spyod pa la
gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang zag pa med pa 'byed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la rtag pa med pa'i spyod pa ni/ gang la rlom sems kyi rgyu ba med pa'o// bdag
natshod med par byas pa'i spyod pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dgakyang tshad yod par byas pa'i spyod nga la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byan pa rnyed por 'gyur te/ de la tshad yod pa byas pa'i spyod pa ni//
mtshan/gnas pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa lnga po de dag na byang chub sems dadu 'a rnams kyi sa dang bo yongs su sbyong bur 'gyur ba'o 'jam
dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa redapa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te lnga gang zhan/ 'di lta ste bdag nitshod med da ribyas ra'i spyod
