pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang tshadamed par byas pa'i spyod pa la dgod do zhes dabugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de latshad med par byas pa'i spyod pa ni/ mtshan ma med pa'i gnas
gang yin pa'o// bdag chod yod par byas pa shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang tshad yod pa rabyas pa shes pa la dragod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te de la tshad med par
byas pa shes pa ni phung pa dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang/ gnas dang/ gnas ma yin pa rnam par dpyad pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa'o (bdaganamer
med par byas pa shes pa la gnasakyas/ gzhand kyang tshad med par byas pa nas da ladagod dozhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te da tshadamed par byas pa shes pa ni gang la rlom
sems kyi rgyu ba med pa'o// bdagan yongs su chad pa la gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang yongs su chad pa la dgodado nas dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la yongs su chad pa na pha rol
tu phyin pa lnga'o// bdagan yings sum chad pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang yongs su ma chad pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin nAd par 'gyur te/ de la yengs su mchad pa na shes rab kyi
parol tu phyin pa gangayin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa red par lnga ped dgan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dad pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dang lagazhan yang
dbugs 'duneparedapar lda dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lcagang zhen 'dalta ste/ bdagaring bzhin gyi sems 'dul ba la gnas kyis/
gzhan dagakyang rang ga sems kya'adur pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red pa/ra'agyur te/ dol rangagasems 'dul banab dgamadang 'tshos lagaso rtog pa gangayan nga'o// bdagan lus
dang sems 'dul ba la gnas kyis gzhan dgakyang lus dang sems 'dul ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa dpar 'gyur te/ de la lus dang sems 'du ba ban/ sems can thams cad
sman par bya ba la yengs sum skye ba gang yin nga 'o// bdag na bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par
'gyur te/ de la bsam pa rnam par sbyong ba na/ sems can thams cad l rnam par dpyadang gang yin pa'o// bda gnas ems can thams cad la rnam par dpyad pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag
kyang sems can thams cad la rnam par dpyad pa la dgodra do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par gyur te/ dal sems can thams cad la rnam par dpyad pa na/ sems can thamu/
cad l sems mnyam pa nyid gang yanang 'o// bdag ni tshogs dag la gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang tshogs dag la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par gyur te/ de la tshogs pa rel tu phyin
pa lnga gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dang la dbugs 'byin pa rad pa ltar de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi se dang po yongs su ngabar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa red
pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ bdagan lus 'dul ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang lus 'dul ba la dgod do zhes
dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ dul lus 'du'abanalus kyis nyes pa rnam pa gsum yongs su spyongs pa gangayon pa'o// bdagan ngag 'dul ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ngag 'dul
ba la dgod do zhes dbugasa'abyin parnyed par 'gyurati/ de la drag 'dul ban ngag gnyis ba rnam pa bzhi yings su sbyong ba gang yan pa'o// bdagan yodre 'dul ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang yadi
'dul ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la yade 'dul ba na yodakyilas kyi nyes pa rnam pa gsum yengs su spangs pa gang yin pa'o// bda gnas irasnab sems 'dul ba
[q]/ la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ser sna'i sems 'dul ba la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur tu/ de laser sna' sems 'dul na/ bdog pa thams cad yodas su
gtong ba gang yin pa'o// bdagan g.yabadra pa gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang g.yo ba med pa la dgodAdo nas dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de'agayabamed pa na sems
can thams cad lasems mnyam pa nyid gang yanang 'o/ de lasems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyidan/ chos kyidabyanges da byer med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad tha dad pa med
pagang yanipa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin parnyed pa lnga po de dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang pa yongs su sbyong bar gyur ba'o////bam pa bzhir
'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa redapa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// bdag ni la le'i
sems 'dul ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang le le'i sims 'dul ba la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byin parnyed par 'gyur te/ de la le le'i sims 'dul ba ni dag ba rtsom pa thams cad la zhum pa
med pa'o// bda gnas nigs rgyas mchod pa ' gnas kyis gzhan dgakyas ngas rgya sa mchod pa la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byanar rnyed par gyur te/ de las dag rgyas mchod pa ni gang byan gyis rlod
byas nas/ sangs rgyas 'byang bar 'gyur ba'i chos ston pa gang yin pa de dag la mchod pa gang yan pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'o// bdagan ye shes
spyod pa/ sa gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ye shes spyod pa la ragod do zhes dbugs 'byin r redapar 'gyur tu/ de la ye shes spyod pa nasems can thams cad phyiram ldog pa' rab tu
'god pa gang yin pa 'o// bdagan rig gi spyod pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ngagag spyod pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa yod par 'gyur te/ dwang dag ga spyi dad nasems can
thams cad kyi ngag ga nyes ra yongs su sbyong bar gangayan nga 'o// bdagun sems kyi spyod pa dogs gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sems kyi spyod pa la dge dadre zhes dbugs 'byin pa red
par 'gyur te/ de la sems kyi spyod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyis nyes pa yongs su sbyong ba gangayan pa ste/ 'jam dpa la dbugs 'byin pa red pa lnga po de dag ni byang
chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o/ 'jam dpal gzhan dgakyang dbugs 'byin pa nod pa lda dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang pe yongs su sbyong
bar 'gyur te/ lta gang zhen 'di lta ste/ bdag ni bdud kyi lus sgro btags pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin las la gnas kyiso/ gzhan dag kyang bdud bya las sgro btags pa med pa sangs rgyas
kyi phrin las la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pared par 'gyur te/ de la bdud kyi las sgro btags pa med pa sangs rgyas kyi phrin lasan/ bdudakya'is sgro btags pas sems can yongs su sman
par byed pa gang yin pa'o// bdaganadabazhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o// zhes bya bar mas pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'o// zhes bya bar mos dal dgod do
zhes dbugs 'byin pared par 'gyur te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa ni de byer med pa 'i phyiraro// bdagun du bzhanagshegs pa ther zug go zhes bya bar mos pa ba gnas kyis/ gzhan/
dag kyang dwabazhin gshegs pa ther zug go zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byan pa red par 'gyur te/ dral de bzhinagshegs pa ther zugan sangs rgyas mdzad pa thams cad rgyunamaM
gcod pa'i phyir ro// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs shes pa zhes bya bar mas par gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa zhes bya bar mos pa la dgodadozhes dbugs 'byin
rnyed par 'gyur te/ del de bzhin gshegs pa shes pa zhes bya bar n mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ dran pa rnams don yod pa'i phyir// bdaganadi bzhin gshegs pa g.yung drung ngo zhes bya bar
mas pa la gnas kyae/ gzhan dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa g.yung drung ngo zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod rozhes dbugs 'byin paredapar 'gyurato/ de la de bzhazhigshegs pa g.yung drung ngo zhes bya ban
sku'i mtha' med pa'i phyir ro// sku'amatha' med pa rnam par zhag pa las 'das pa'i phyir ta 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pa lnga pedi dgan byang chub sems dpa'
rnams kyi sa dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa red pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga
gang zhe na/ 'a da lta ste/ bdag ni phan pa'i dngos po gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang ldan pa'i dngos po la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la pan pa'i dngos po nasems can
la thams cad kyi lus dang sems kyi ma de de ba yongs su skyabs pa'i phyir/ da sdug bsngal gyayabyad gang ci la ngam len pa medade/ bde ba'i yo byad gang ci yang yongs su ma gtong ba med pa gang yin
pa'o// bdag nachos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dogakyang chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byin par d par 'gyur te/ de la mtshan ma med
panamtshan ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rlom sems na ngo bo nyid med pa 'i phyir ro// bdag ni sangs rgyas la skyabs su songab yin gyis/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas
la skyabs su 'gro ba la dgod ro zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ del sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba na sdigs pa thams cad mi byed pa gang yan pa'o// bdag na chos la skyabs su song ba
yan gyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos la skyabs su 'gro ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin paredapar 'gyur te/ de la chos lu skyabs su 'gro nartan tsang 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa gang yin
ba'o ba dag na dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin gyis// gzhan dag kyang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba la dgod dozhas dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te dade la dge 'dun la skyabs su
'gro ba ni rjes su chags pa dang/ khong khro ba spangs pa gang yan pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin parnyed pa lnga po de dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur
ba'o 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa red pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sa dang pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhan/ 'di lta ste// bdag ni lus
ma phyed pa la gnasakyis/ gzhan dag kyang lus maphyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par gyur te/ de la lus mi byed pa ni pa rol tu phyin pa'i gnod pa thams cad dang bra la ba gang yin
pa'o bdagan ded pa mkhyed pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dgakyang dad pa ma byed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la dad pa ma byed ngan las kyis rnam par smin
ba la ya de chos pa gang yin pa// bdag na snyoms par 'jug pa shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang snyems par 'jug par ngashog pa la dgod dozhes dbugs 'byin lded par 'gyurato/
de la snyoms par 'jug pa nademags pa'i drobo nyid la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni chos ma phyed pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos ma phyed pa la dgod
do zhes dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ de la chos m phyid panachos sgrub pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyin m phyid pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang dge
ba'i bshes gnyen ma phyed pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ da la dag ba'abashes gnyenam phyed pa na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyenam snyu ba gang yin pa'o// 'jam dpal
dbugs 'byin parwadapar lnga podi dgan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi se dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa radang lnga dgar+yang chub sems
dang 'a rnams kyis dang po yengs su sbyong bar 'gyur/ lngagang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bdaganachos dang rjes su mthund 'a chos la gnasAkyas/ gzhan dag kyang chos dang rjesasum thun pa 'chos la
dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyurato/ de la chos dang rjes sumathunapa 'chos n chos la yang dag pani 'di dusgyub pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni ngo tsha shes pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan
dag kyang ngo tsha shas ba la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byin pa rAd par 'gyur te/ dal ngo tsha shes pa nalus dang ngag gse legs par spyod pa gang yin pa'o// bdagan khrel yod pa la gnasakyis//
gzhan dag kyang khrel med pa la dgod dezhis dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par 'gyur tra/ de la khrel yod pa ni yo de kyi legs par spyod pa gang yin pa'o// bdag ni yang dag par mthong pa la gnas/
kyis gzhan dag kyang yang dag par mthong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa redad ra 'gyur te/ de la yang dag par mthong ba ni/ chos thams cad lamatha'u dngadapung med par 'jug
pa gang yani'o// bdag nu rjes su chags pa spong ba la gnas kyas/ gzhan dag kyang rjes su chags pa spong ba la dgod do zhes dbug sa 'a byan pa ra dang ru 'gyur/ de'i rjes su chags
pa sbyong ba nam 'ongs pa'i m de ga pa'i las ma skyid pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa red pa lnga po de dag ni byed chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dad po yongs su sbyong bar
'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang dbugs 'byin pa redapa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kya se dang de yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
bdag khong khro basprod ba la gnasakyas/ gzhan dag kyang khong khro ba sbyong ba la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin parnyed par gyur te/ de la khong khro ban drag ba'i las skyes pa rnams
chud ma bzon pa gang yin pa'o// bdag na chog la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang cho ga la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin parnyed par gyur te/ de lacho ga lan ngo shes pa da nga khril yodang gang yin
byabya// pa'o/ bdag ni rang gi dge ba 'artsa ba la ngadag par srung ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang rang gdage ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par srung ba la dgod de zhis dbugs 'byin pa red par
'gyur te/ de la rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par srang ban las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa gang yin pa'o// bdag nagazhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chud mi bzon pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang gzhan gyi

dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ma bzon pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red bar 'gyur te/ de la gzhan gyi dge ba rtsa pachud ma gzin pa na byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la gnas pa gang yin pa 'o//
bdag na stong pa nyid la mos pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dagakyang stong pa nyid la mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la stong pa nyid lta bar 'gyur bar rang bzhin las
stong pa tedi gzhan m zhe pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs 'byin pa radabar lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang
dbugs 'byin pa red lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang yin/ 'di lta ste/ bdagan sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sgra'i pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i shes la dgid de zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur tu( de la sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shesani/
gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i rnam par dag pa gang yan kha'o// bdaganatshos rnams rten cing 'byung ngo zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang chos rnams rten cang ma 'byung
zhig bya bar mos pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa redapar 'gyur// de la chos rnams rten cing 'byung ba nakyin nams ma skyo ba'i dri ba nyid yin pa 'i phyir ro// bda gnas thams cad
gnas dad zhes bya bar mos pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang tshos thams cad gnasamed dozhes bya pa chos pa la dgodado zhes dbugs 'bazhi pa red par 'gyur te/ de la chos thams
cad gnas med do zhes bya bar ni phyogs tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro// bdag sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang mtshungs so zhes mos pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang/
mtshungs so zhes bya bar mos pa la dgod dezhis dbugs 'byin pa red bar 'gyur te/ de la sangs rgyas ma mkha' dang mtshungs so zhes bya ban/ tha dad pa med pa dang/ na pa med pa'i phyir ro/
bdagan sangs rgyas sems dang 'di dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i shesakhyi ba la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas dang yude dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba la dgod
do zhes dbugs 'byin pa da bar 'gyur te/ de la sangs rgyas sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o zhes bya ba ni lhun gyis grub pa' shes kyi bdes pa'i phyir te/ 'jam
gdab la dbugs 'byin pa red pa lnga po de dag na byang chub sems dpa' ms kyis dang po longs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// 'jum dpalagazhan yang dbugs 'byin/
bstod pa lnga dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po longs su sbyong par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag nasbyin pa las byung ba'i bsdur 'dengs po la gnas kyis/
gzhan dag kyang sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po la dgod de zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la sbyin pa las phyung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po ni bsam pa dang sbyor ba'o// bdag
ni tshul khrims las byung ba'ibasna ba'adas po la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po la dgodado zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la
tshul khrims las byung ba 'di snga po'i dngos pon byams pa dang sAng rje'o// bdag ni bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang bsams pa las byung ba'i
bsdu ba'i dngos po la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos bon thabs kyis yang dag par zan pa ba shes rab gyi'o// bdagani
bsam pa la gnas kyis/ gzhan dgakyang bsam pa la dgod do zhes dbugs 'byin pa red par gyur te/ de la bsam pa na dege ba'i chos rnams la dad pa dang 'dun pa'o/ bodagazhi sbyor
[ol]la la gnas kyis/ gzhan dag kyang sbyor ba la dgod dezhas dbugs 'byin pa red par 'gyur te/ de la sbyor ba na dge ba'itshos thams cad sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ 'jam dpal dbugs
byin pa red pa lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dang po longs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'o// de nas 'am dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan
'das kyis brjod pa mthar phyin par ' gnas / byang chub sems dba'asems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces skyasaso// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
mas kyis ston pa thegs bamed ba gang yin sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su
smin pa mdzad pa khyu mchog tu gyur pa gang mAn/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kun nas mngano tu gyur pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhing longs
su sbyong ba la mi 'jigs pa gang yani/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams kyi skumatha' yas pa gang lane/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yulagang yazhi/ sas
rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i shes gang yani/ sangs rgyas tshem ldan 'das rnams kyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yani/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi kun tu gzigs pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi grags pa gang lan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan pa ras mas kyi dbyer medatsang
ma gnas la gang lan/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku thogs pa med pa gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyi gtsug blta ma mthong ba gang yin//
zhi nga rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i spyod pa'i gnas rnams gang yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems/
can yongs su smin par mdzad pa 'a jigs pa rnams gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang/// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos//
'jam dpal gzhonanur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grags 'din mthong bar dka' rig par dka' ba ste/ brtag par bya bam yin zhing rtog ge
ba' sprod pa ma yin la/ mos par dka' ba ste/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la gnyen bkur byas pa'i sems can de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'du thos par 'gyur
zhang thos nas kyang chos par 'gyur/ 'dzamadapal gyis sa pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dmus long la mar a mi gzugs kyi/ mig dang ldan pa rnams la mar
gzugs te/ klu rgyal ba'i sras des bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa de dag ga phyis/
kho bo 'dra// gang dag bskal pa grangs med par soms can dmyal pa dang/ bdud 'gro dang la dgasangashin rje'i 'jig rten du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las tshe 'di nyid la myong bar
'gyur pa de dag gi phyir kho bo 'dra// gang dug mthong ba dang thos pa dang/ bsnyen bkur byas pa don yod pa de dag gis phyir kho bo 'dres ston cig/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos
kyi rnam grangs 'di la mamos pa la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a byang chub m smas/ kye rgyal ba'i sras skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skya ba mang po la bde
bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying rtsa ba dang/ skya po phal po tshe dang/ lha dang ma rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir ston cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang
byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos 2 'jam dbal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces sas so// 'jam dpal
de la ston pa thogs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams so so gling de'i lang gser gyi bo dag gis 'dus pa'i lha dang mi rnams dang/ byang
chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu ni bo che'i rgyal po skar 'od kyi kha dog gi 'du la/
ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po skar 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po klog gi sgron ma'i kha dog gis 'dul ba
rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal bo glog gi sgon ma'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bun po tsho'i rgyal po nyi zla mar ma'i kha dog gis 'dus pa
rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po glegs nyi zla mar ma'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med de// nor bu bzhi bo che'i rgyal po snang ba thams cad bsdus
pa'i 'a dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'argyal po snang ba thams cad bsdus pa'i kha deg tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i
dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa no pa ni po che dbang gi rgyal po 'i kho deg tu ston pa la thogs ba med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal
bo ze ba can gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal bo ze ba can gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che rgyal po
bsang ge ral pa can gyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po cha'argyal po sang gi ral pa can gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med de// nor
bu rin po che'i rgyal po sang ge'argyal mtshan gyi rtsa ma' la dog gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal posangaga'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu
ston pa la thogs pa med de// nor bu ran po che'i rgyal po'i brgya byin thogs pa'i kha degagis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhinagshegs pa nor bu ni po che'argyal po brgya byin la/
thogs pa'i kha dog tuston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi la dag gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i
rgyal po lha thams cad kyi 'od kyi kha dog tuston pa la thogs pa mdado// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chu dang bar khyed pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
nor bu ni bo che'i rgyal po chu dang bar byed pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pamed do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdodzi'i 'od kyi kha dog gi 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor
bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'irgyal po pad+ma ral gyi'i kha deg gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de nga zhin gshegs pa nor
na po che'i rgyal bo pa da ngal gyi 'a de kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med de/ der na tsha'i sprul ba bo cha rma bdag gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin
gshegs pa nor buran po che'i rgyal de yi zhama' ba dog tuson pa la thogs pa med de/ nor bus de re'argyal po in+d+ra til gyi la dag gis 'dul ba rnams la de bzhin
zla gshegs pa nor bu'an po che'i rgyal po in nyol gyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa mad do/ skor ba rje tshe'i rgyal bo mthon ka chen po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin
gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po then ka chen po'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa medad// nor bu rinapo che'argyal po rda'i snying po'i kha dog gis 'du ba rnams la/ de bzhin
gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po rdo'i snying po'akha dag tu ston pa la thogs pa me da da// nor purin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyasnying po la ba dag gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin
gshegs pa nor bu'an po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'di la dog tu ston pa la thogs pa me de// nor ba yin po tsho'i rgyal bo dge ba bkod pa'i kha dog gas 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin
gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal bo dag ba bkod pa'i kha dag tu ston pa la thogs pa tshad do// ner ba na po che'i rgyal ba ma chags pa bkod pa'i snying po'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams
zhi/ la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu na kho tsha'i rgyal po ma chags pa bkod pa'i snying po 'di kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu ni po che'i rgyal po mu tig dkar po'i kha dog
gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal pomu tig dkar bo'i kha dag tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu na po che'i rgyal po u tig mthen
ka'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal pomu tigamathazhaka'i kha dog cu son pa la thogs bamod do// nor bu rin pomi'i rgyal po
mu tig gser lta bu'i khadegags 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal bo mu tig gsor lta bu'i kha rdeg tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu
rin po che'argyal po mu tig nam mkha'i 'od kyi kha dog gas 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mu gnam mkha' 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la
thogs pa med de// nor bu 'an po che'i rgyal po bsod nams gyi tshog sargya mtshegrangasamed par rjes su sgrog ba 'a 'od kyi kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gsheg
pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med par rjes su sgrogs pa'i 'od kyi kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po la
shes kyi tshogs rgya mtshegs med pa rjes su slog pa'i bdeg gis 'dul ba rnams la// de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu ni bo che'i rgyal po de ngashes kyi tshog
rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtshograngs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog
gsi 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po phal tu phyin pa rgya mtshograngasamadapa rjes su skyog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do//
nor bu rin pocha'argyal po rgya mtshospungs med pa rjes su sgrogs pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal bo rgya mtsho grangs med
pa'i rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med de/ ra bu rin po che'i rgyal po bzungs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha deg gse 'dul ba rnams la/
de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po gzungs rgya mtshograngs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po tangang
'dzin rgya mtshograngs med pa rjesasu sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la ( de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'irgyal po ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i
kha dag tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'argyal po rnam par thar ba'i rgyaatshograngs med pa rjes su sgrog pa 'a la de gas 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa nor bu rin po che rnam par thar ba'argya mtsho grangs mod pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu ni po che'irgyal po so so yang dag par rig pa
rgya mtshe grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa/
rjes su sgrog pa'i kha deg tu ston ba la thogs pa med de// nor bu rin po che'irgyal po mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangasamed pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la
de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mngon par shes pa rgyaatshograngs med brjes su sgrog pa'i kha dogatu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mi smon lam
rgya mtshogras med pa rjes su skyog pa 'i kha dogags 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po son lamargyu mtshograngs med pa'i rjes su sgrog pa'i
bdag taston pa la thogs pa mdado/[·]nor bu rin po che'i rgyal bo brtson 'grus rtsom pa med rgya mtsho grangasamed pa rjes su sgrog pa 'a kha deg gse 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin/
dgshegs pa nor bu ni po che'i rgyal po brtson 'grus rjes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa 'phegs ba med de/ nor bu ni/
botshe'i rgyal po dbugs 'dun pa 'ad ba rgya mtshograngs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams/ de bzhin gshags ror pa'i na po che'i rgyal po dbags
b+hU 'byin ba red brgyu mtshigrangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha deg tu son tre la thogs pa mod de/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs
med pa rjes su sgrog pa 'a kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor burani po che'irgyal po byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su
sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa mod de// na bun patshe'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i ba dag gis 'dul
b rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs par bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med dgagu slog ba'i kha dogatuston pa la thogs dmod de
nor rin po che'i rgyal po sems can gyi bsam pa dang/ spyod pa la 'jug brgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gas 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs
sa/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal bo sums can gyi bsam ba dang/ rtsod bal 'jug pa rgya mtshogrusaed pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med de// nor bu rin
cha'i rgyal ba 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtshograngasaed po rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po
'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtshograngs
med pa rjes su skyog pa 'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhinagshegs pa nor bu rin poche'i rgyal bo bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtshegrangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston
la thogs pa med do/ nor bu rin po che'irgyal bo dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtshograngasaed pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu
zhi po che'argyal bo dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtshograngasam da ba rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa med do// nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtshe grang
med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dogagis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum bstan brgya mtsho grangasamed pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la
bya@#// thogs pa med de/ nor bu rin po'i rgyal po ma skyo bar sams baspyod pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog gis 'dul ba rnams la// dengazhin/
gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'i rgyal pom skye bar sems bskyod pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog pa 'a la ngag tu ston pa la thogs pa med de/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dbyer
med pa 'a ye shes rgya mtshograngs med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i ba dag gis 'dul ba rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che'irgyal po dbyer mad pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho gling
med pa rjes su sgrog pa'i kha dog tu ston pa la thogs pa medad// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa 'i tshes dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ 'dzam ngang las 'di lta ste// dper na/ nor
bu rin po che'i pi'amyi'i dngos po 'i dbang gis bya ba rnamA la snatshogs maN+Da' yas pa 'byung pa ste/ nor bu zhi po che'i be chung la rnam rtog pa rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'od kyang ma
'dres pa'i tshes dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de ma rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo/ 'dzem dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas kyang/ soms can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dbang gis kha dog rnamo par tha dad pa'i mdzad pa 'byung pa sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam
par mi rtog med kyis/ 'an kyang m 'dres pa'i tshos dang ldan pa'i phyi'i mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ste/ 'jam dpal 'dran s nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyi ston pa thogs pa med pa'o// 'jam dpal del de bzhinugshegs pa'i mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'abyams thams cad
kyi 'jig rtenagyi khams re re dang/ gling re re dang/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul rer dung/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul snyad kyi 'dzagi rten gyi khams rgya mtshor 'jug pa rnams la
mkhyen pa thogs pa med de// 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang/ gling de'i dang/ rdul phra rab kyi rdulare'i dang/ skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi bsod
kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med de// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi bar
tshogs rgya mtshograngs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cag skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyadakyi pha rol tu
phyin pa rgya mtshegrangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhinadaskatsag skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgya mtsho
grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi gzus
rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med de// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho
zla gas med du 'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cage la zhing thams cad kyi rdul sAd kyi rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs
ma da pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med de// de bzhin du skad cig skadacig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grang
mad pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa me dad// de bzhin du sku datsag skad cag la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa rgya mtsho
med pa'i bye bag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dagamkhyen pa la thogs pa med de// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi smon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyis brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgyam tsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan
ba gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyis rdul snyad kyi dbugs 'bya'i bsod ba rgya mtshogras med pa'i bye brag bstan pa/
gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub la 'jug pa rgya mtshograngs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang
gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med de// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhung thams cad kyi rdul snyad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa
gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi yul stod kyi zhing thams cad la 'jug ba rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa
gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyijulaAdakyisems can gyi bsam pa dang/ spyod pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho d+ma
med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa la thogs pa med da do// de bzhin du skad cig skad cig la zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug ba rgya mtsho
grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dagamkhyen pa la thogs pa modado// de bzhin du skad cig skad cage la shong thams cad kyajul red gyi bskal pa la 'jug ba rgya mtsho gling
mad nga 'khyi phrug bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mkhyen pa thogs pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ lhun gyis grub pa'i zhengashes bar s pa 'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal
'di lta ste/ dper na/ brag phug gi nang nas/ brag chasems can gyi sku rnam pa mang po 'jug pas/ sgra skad gzhan dang gzhan mtha' yas pa 'byung/ brag cha na mi rtog rnam par
mi gsod kyis 'on kyang/ ma 'dres pa 'a chos dang ldan pa'i phyir de mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo// 'jam dpa la de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
pa la yang/ sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang/ 'dul ba tsal ba de dag gis de lta bu'i skadadu ston pa 'byung bar shes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma rtog po ra rnam par mi rtog
mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa 'i tshes dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de ma rtog cing lcan gyis grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i
mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa// mngon bstan pa yin te/ rgyas pa na phyi ma'amatha' bsal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan pa ma nusaso/ 'jamadang de la de bzhin
gshegs pa 'asems can yongasasu smin par mdzad pa// khya mchog tu gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du
'jig rten gyi khams re'i dang/ gling re re yang thogs pa med pa// sa'i ba med pa/ dbyer med kha/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs te/ sems can yongs su ston par mdzad pa khyu
mchog tu gyur pas bum mthabasu'i bskal par byin gyis brlob pa'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod sku phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du
'jig rten gyi khams re re dang/ gling rer na nga gang zhed ba/sgrib pa me dang// dbyemed pa/nus mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can longs su smin par mdzad pa tsa mchog tu gyur nga/ phyi
ma'i mtha'i mu bskal par byin gyis rlobs pa'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshon re re yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du
'jig rten gyi kham sa'i ri dang/ gling re'i lang thogs bam da pa// sgrib pa med pa// dbyar chod pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can longs su smin par mdzad pa/ khya
mchog du gyur pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mu 'baskal par byin gyis brlobs pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'dape byad bzang po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams rab 'byams thams cad
du'adzi gyi khams re re dang/ gling rir yang thogs pa med pa// sgrib pa med pa/ dbye med pa/ nam mkha' khyab par 'ges la/ sems can yongs su snyan par mdzad pa mchog
du gyur pas/ ma'amatha' mu'i bskal pa bun gyis brlobs pa'o// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i khung bu re re yang thogs pa med pa/ sgrib pa med//
ba/ dbyer med pa// nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa sems can longs su smin pa mdzad pa khyaachog tu gyur pas/ phyi ma'amathe chu'i bsag par byin gyis brlob pa'o// de
bzhin du de bzhinagshegs pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang/ phyogs bcu'a'ajig rtenagyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams de'i dang/ glang re rer yang thogs pa
med la/ sgrib pa med pa/ dbyer med pa// nam mkha' khyab par 'gengs pa/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa khyu mchog tu 'gyur pas/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal
par byin gyis paslob pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i tshes dang ldan pa'i phyirate/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan panasmon lam gyistobs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'i phyir ro//
'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par ma dzad ra khyu mchog tu gyur pa mngon bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'ama'i bskal bar byin gyis b+hAmagu
kyang bstan par ma nus so/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun nas ma yin tu 'gyur ban phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams rer
dang/ gling re re dang/ rdul phra rab re re la ste/ rdul phra rab kyirnal stod kyi phyogs re'i la byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'akhod panar ba du'ang gas/ 'jig rten gyi khams la bcu'i
rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re rgya mtsho grangs med pa dag gis rdul phra rab zhatshes nyung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag na sems can dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams
dang/ glung dang/ rab dang/ rab chen bo dang/ khor yug dang/ khor yug chon po dang/ grong dang grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang// ljongs dang/ yul 'khor dang/ rgyal
po'i khrang 'khor dang/ 'bab chudang/ 'tshe'u dang/ 'tsho branadag gang la yang gnod pa dang/ sgrib pa med de/ sngon rdza lta bar lus kyang de bzhin du bya ba dag 'jug ste/
de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// bsam pa ci lta ba dang/ 'dul ba dza lta pa'i lhadang/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ rnams la
lding dang/ gi'am cad ng/ lta 'tsho chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' di dag gis kyang 'di ltar
kun nas de bzhin gshegs pa ga ta shing gang tsaman zhugs par mngon du mthong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/
[p/ ]@#// dperan/ zla ba yar ngo tshes bco lnga'i nam byed kyi dusan/ 'dzam bu'i gling ga skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang bu mo thams cad kyis zla
ba'i dkyil 'khor mdunan 'dug par 'athong yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa 'a tshos dang ldan pa'i phyi'i mi rtog cing/ lhun
gyis grub par bya ba 'dil bu 'di dag 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin dudabazhin gshegs pa gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyisams
can bsam pa ca lta ba dang/ 'dul ba ci lta ba de dug gas/ de bzhin gshegs pamadunan bzhugs par mthong la nga/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam rtog mod kyi/ 'on
kyang ma 'dres pa'i sa dang ldan pa'i phyir/ mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub bar mdzad pa 'ad lta bu 'di dag 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'a kun nas mngon du gyur pa
mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par noma'amatha'i mu'i bosal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan pa ra minus so// 'jam dpa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing yongs su slong
kha la ma 'dzags pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi 'gi rta gyi khams re re dang/ rdul phra rab kya rdul phra re re la 'jig rten
gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i 'jugage/ de la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'khye brag bstan pa'i/
bshes kyis rnams bar sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhig shes kyatshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsholan parol tu phyin pa rgya mtshogs med ba'i bye brag bastan pa'i yi shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho' lanis rgya mtshograngs med pa'i bye brag
bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho la lanagazungs rgya mtshograngs med pa'i brag bstan pa'i yid shes kyis rnam par sbyong ng// 'jig rten gyi
khams rgya mtsho la lanating nge 'dzin rgya mtshogrongs yod pa 'phyi brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo// 'jig rtenagyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med
pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la nasoso yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i yid shes kyis rnam par
sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la namen par shes pa rgya mtshograngasaed pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i langashes kyis ma par sbyong ngo/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshol lani/
skyon 'am atshograngasamed pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong nga// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i la na brtson 'grus brtson pa rgya mtsho grangs
shA med pa 'khyi brag bstan pa'i shos kyis rnam par sbyong ngo/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la nadabugs med pa rgya mtshograngs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par
sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'ilan byang chub sems dang la 'jug pa rgyam tshograngasamed pa 'phyi brag bstan pa'i shesakyis rnam par sbyong de 'jig rtenagyi khams rgya mtsho
la la ni/ dede bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i ye shes bye brag bstan pa'i shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams mtsho la ni sems can gyi bsam pa
dang/ spyod pa la 'jug pa mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ya shes kyis rnam par sbyong// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i la na'ag rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtshograngs
med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lan bskal pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'a ye shes bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam
par sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshol la dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa ni yi shes kyis rnam par sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la la ni
dus gsum 'jug ba rgyaatshograngasamed pa'i bye brag bstan 'a yi shes kyis rnam par sbyong de// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshel lan skyobs sems bskyed brgyaatshograngs med pa 'phyi
brag bstan pa'i lo shos kyis rnam par sbyong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho la lan dbyer med pa rgya mtshograngs med pa 'phyi brag bstan pa'i ya shes kyis rnam par sbyong nga// de
bzhin gshegs pa na nus gang nas kyang m g.yo/ de ci'i phyir zhenA mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyi'i ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sas rgyas kyi zhing
yongs su sbyong ba la 'gis ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'au' ba skal bar byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan par ma nus so// 'jam dpal de bzhin
gshegs pa'i skye mtha' yas pan phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi 'garten gyi khams re re dang/ gling re re la so 'jig rten gyi khams lta
bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul sod kyi 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtshorgya stong glangasamed pa 'ardul phra rab kyi rdul snyed rnams kun rab tu nyung gas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub
sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho nisamang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga b.ru'ajul sId kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rdul rnams zha'i po tu
zhung// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang/
[@]gzhan dag gis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dgachisanang go/ 'jig rten gyi khams lnga da ru'i rdul phra rab snyad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho'i rdul phra
rab kyi tshul rnams na rab tu chung gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho zhing shes kyis tshogs rgya mtshograngs med pa gzhan dang
gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas la ltakha mngon du gyur la thob pa dgan[@]samang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i
rdul snyad rab kyi rdul rnams narib tu nyung gas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang nubasams dpa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtshograngs med pa gzhan dang
gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag na tshesamangang// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'i rdul phra
rab kyi rdul rnams narib tu chung gi/ byang chub soms dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rira'i byang chub sems dpa'i mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas
la lta baman du gyur pa thub pa dag naches mang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshograngs med pa 'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams na'e ba
du zhug/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'ba' re'i byang chub sems da pa'i rgya mtshog zungasargya mtshograngs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis sangs rgyas la lta ba
man du gyur pa thob pa dag tshesamang ngo/ 'jig rten gyi khams lta ba'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams nirab tu chung gi/
byang chub soms dpa'i 'khor gyis dkyil 'kher re re'i byang chub sems dpe 'argya mtshoting de 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dngagazhan gyis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur/
pa thob pa dag nasamang ngo/ 'jig rten gyis khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyis khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i tshul phra rab kyi rdul rnams na rab tu zhung gi/ byang
chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ri 'byang chub sems da pa'i rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba
narab tu nyung gu/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khoragyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dapa' rgya mtsho so so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtshogs
mad pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis sangs rgyas la lta baman du 'gyur pa thob pa dganatshes mang ngo// 'jig rten gyis khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
mtshegs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams narib tu nyungag/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khorar re'abyang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon rab shes pa rgya mtshe
grangs med pa gzhan dngagazhanagyis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa dag niches mang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams na reb tu chung gi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag
rgya mtshograngs med pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mngon du gyur pa thob pa dag nachos mang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi
khamasargya mtshe grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams na'i pa tu nyung// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re ri'i byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho bsod nams
ka kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhanudang gzhan thob pa de dag bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa 'byin brlab kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
pa gzhan dangagazhanA mthong bdwagan chasamangang// 'ag rtenagyis khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyad kyi 'gartenagyi khams rgya mtsho grangs yod pa 'jul phra rab kyi tshul rnams na
rab tu chung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dapa' rgya mtsho yi shes kyatshogs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa dedag ye shes kyi
tshogs kyi bye brag gazhan dang gzhan thob ba'i stobs bskyod pa 'i phyon brlabs kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dngagazhan mthong ba d gnas mang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga
bcu'ajul snod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams rab tu tungag/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khoragyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems
dang 'argya mtsho pha rol tu phyin pa'i brag gazhanadangagazhan thob pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyod pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ dngazhin
gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan thob pa dganachisamang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams
'i/// nirab chung gi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dba'achi mtshos 'byi brag gzhan dang gzhan thog pa de dag sa'i
bye brag gazhan dngagazhan thob pa'i stobs bskyod pa'i byin brlabasakyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dganaches mang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga
zla bcu'i rdul sAd kyi 'jig rtenagyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyajul rnams 'ibatultung ga/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub
sems dpa'i mtshog zungs kyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan theb pa de bzhinagazungs kyis bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa 'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin
gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dgan chos mang/ 'gyig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'a rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams
ni rab tu nyung// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa brgya mtsho dang de 'dzin gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag/ ting nga 'dzin
gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhinagshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dga'i ches mngang// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga
bdu'ajul snyad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyis rdul rnams na reb tu zung gi/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub/
sams dpa' rgya mtsho rnam par thar pa'i bye brag gazhanadangagazhan thib pa dedagan rnam par thar pa'i phyi brag gzhan dngagazhan thob pa'i stobs bskyod pa'i bon gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin
gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni ches mang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi ga rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams
gi rang du nyung gi/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyahatshes sor nga dag par rig pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag so so yang
dag par roge pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyod pa 'a byon gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dga' chos mang ngo// 'jig rten
gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyad kyi 'jigarten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni rab tu nyung ga/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub
sems dpa' rgya mtsho mngon par shes pa'i bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa dedag mnopar shes pa'i phyi brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyod pa 'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhi/
dgshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan mthong ba dag ni chesamang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i jul
phra rab kyi rdul rnams n rab tu chung gi/ byang chub sems dang 'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor re re'i byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho smon lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa de dag smon
lam gyi bye brag gzhan dang gzhan thob pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i bon gyi rlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan dang gzhan thob pa dganaches mang ngo// 'jam dang 'a de bzhin du
sgyur te/ can pa rnams dang/ ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes rnams dang/ spyod pa rnams dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang/ brtson 'grus brtsom pa rnams dang//
dbugs 'byin pa rid pa rnams dang/ soms can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnams dang/ tshul khrims rnams dang/ lung bstan pa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
rgyudag la 'jug pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rnams dang/ sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa
rnams dang/ bskal pa la 'jug pa rnams dang/ dus gsum bstan pa rnams dang/ dus gsum la 'jug pa rnams dang/ ma skyo ba'i sems bskyod pa rnams dang/ yabashes
dbyer med pa rnams dang/ gzungs rnams dang/ sangs rgyas ston pa rnams dang/ kun tu bzang bo'ams bskyod pa rnams dang/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'tshes rnams/
dang [0f10 ]snying rje chen po thob pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyisams kyi rkyen rnams dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gus par bya ba'i sems bskyod pa rnams dang yongs su dag pa
rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ rigs shes rjes su rtogs pa rnams dang/ so sor rtog pa rnams dang/ stobs bskyod po rnams dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul
gyi lam rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ches ma chad pa rnams dang/ kun tu bzang bo rnams dang/ stongs ba rnams dang/ yang shis kyi dbang rnams dang/ gnas med pa rnams dang
sems mnyam pa nyid dang/ sengashes mngon pa ra bsgrub pa rnams dang/ sbal pa rnams dang/ byin gyi rlabs pa rnams dang/ dbugs 'byin pas po rid pa rnams dang/ thabazho
la 'jug pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshon la brten pa rnams dang/ somos bskyod pa rnams brtan pa rnams dang/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa rnams dang/ sems bsub rnamA
dang / bsam gyisami khyab pa rnams dang/ ldem po ngag la mkhas pa rnams dang/ yongashes rnam par byed pa la mkhas pa rnams dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ zad por
gyi skye mched rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ rig pa rnams dang/ rnam da ra grel ba rnams dang//
bskyodamos tshal rnams dang/ rin po che bkod pa rnams dang mi bskyod pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pamagatong ba la gnas pa rnams dang/ rgyu
mtsholta bu'i ye shes la 'jug pa rnams dang/ rin po che lta bu'i byang chub sems da pa ' gnas rnams dang/ rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa rnams dang/ theg pa chen po'ig
cha rnams dang/ rtsom pa med chen pa rnams dang/ rtsom pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa rnams dang/ mi phyed pa 'od d pa rnams dang/ lung bstan pa rnams dang/ dge
ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba rnams dang/ yashes kheng du chud pa rnams dang/ sems bskyed pa rgya che ba mtha' dang/ dbung med pa rnams dang/ gter rnams dang//
sdom pa rnams dang/ dbang rnam pa sprul pa rnams dang/ zhing rnam par sprul pa rnams dang/ chos rnam pa/ngasngal pa rnams dang/ smonalam rnam par stsal pa rnams dang/
! spyod yul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang/ mi shes rnam par sprul pa rnams dang/ mongon par shes pa rnam par sprul parnatshudang/ rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa rnams dang/ stobs
rnam par sprad pa rnams dang/ rnam par rol ba rnams dang/ lula rnams dang/ stobasa rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ byang chub sanas dang chos ma 'dres pa/
rnams dang/ lus rnams dang/ lus kyi lasa rnams dang/ gzugasa rnams dang/ ngag gis las rnams rung/ somasa rnams dang da sems bskyed pa rnams dang/ sams
rgyas par byed pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ bsam pa rnams dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams dang/ sbyor ba rnams dang/ mos pa rnams dang/ 'jig rten gyis khams
su mos pa la 'jug pa rnams dang/ bag chags rnams dang/ len pa rnams dang/ nanatan rnams dang/ 'grub pa rnamAdang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos nges pa rnams dang/ theg pa
rnams dang mi 'gyur ba rnamA dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i nges pa 'i chos rnams dang/ nges par 'byung ba'i las rnams dang/ skyes bu dam pa'i ming thob pa rnams dang lam rnams dang/
lam gyi tshod rnams dang/ lam gyi tshogs rnams dang/ lam bsgomA pa rnams dang/ lam bkod pa thams cad la'ang de bzhin du brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nam rtog rnam
par mi rtog go/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ lcan gyis grub pa'i zhingashes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu gling gi snod chus
@#// gang zhing sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thams cad du snang ste/ tam 'dakyil 'khor ni ma tshig rnam par ma rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos
dang ldan pa'i phyir/ rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub da ra bya ba 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang byungang// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamA
b+hU rab 'byams thams cad na 'jig rten gyi khams rara'i klongara'i sems can bsam pa ci lta ba dong/ 'dul ba ci lta ba de dag gis/ cig char thong ste de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtog
rnam par mi rtog med kyis/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan zhing/ sku thogs pa med pa'i phyi'i rnam par mi rtog cing lhunagyis grub dag mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang byang po/
'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyematha' yas pa mdor bstan pa yaniti/ rgyas par n phyoma'amatha'amu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan pa mi nus so//
bam po lnga po skye thamago na/ 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i yu la nadipe ba bstan par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ skyes
bumakhas pa gang dag dpa bshad pas don shes par 'gyur ba yod pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dperan mtshodapagatshad 'bum phrag lnga pa bya rog gis btung du rung bar ma/
ka dngal tha chad du gyur pa pad+ma'i 'dab mas g.yogs pa zhig yod la/ de la skyes bu la la zhig gros lcags kyi shing rta pa nga la rtsib ma stong yod pa/ nam mkha' ldingegs mgyog/
babs kyang lhag pa 'chedi lta bu mgyogs pas shing rta drangs te/ de ltar magyogs pa'i shing rta drangs nas/ pang la la yang chusamo reg/ rta'amogi pas kyang barma'i 'dabam
rol pa de lta bu'i shing rdades drangs pa las/ mtsho chen po des sbrul dug pa steng du byung ste/ skad cig gang la shang rta bsgyur ba'i skad cig de la/ sbrul dug pa des/ shing
rtade lan bcu'i bskor te/ 'jam dpa la skadatsag gang gis sprul dug posangashing rta de lanacig paskor ba'i skad cig de la/ doge slong kun dga' bos tshesi rnam pa bcu bstan pa
bshad don yang rig par byed do// dge slong kun dga' bos skyod cig gang la chos gcig bstan pa nga shad pa 'i skad cig de la// dge slongashA ri'i bu'achos rnam pa bcu bstan pa
bshad nas den kyang rig par byed de// dge slong ba'i bus skad cig gang la chos gtsagi bstan pa bshad pa'i skad cig de la/ gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams
brgyad khri 'da'o// gnas brtan mo'u 'gal gyi bus skad cigagang la/ 'jig rten gyi kham gcig 'das pa'i skad cig de la/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad kyi gling re re na/ dga' ldan gyis gnaa na gnas pa las 'pho ba dang/ skye ba dang/ mngon par 'byung ba dang//
la dka' spyod pa dang/ sbyor ba dang/ byang chub kyi stong bar bzhud pa dang/ bdud 'dul ba dang/ man par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo khoskor ba dang/
mya ngan las 'das pa chen pa dang/ chos gnas pa dang/ chos nub pa dus gcig ga duston to// mu stegs can gyi gnas kyi spyod pa dang/ skyes pa'i rabs thams cad du yang dus
gcig tusngonano/ decu'i phyi'i zhig/ mkhyen pa thogs pa med pa dang/ gzigs pa thogs pa med pa dbyer med pa dngo/ ma brten cing dbyer med pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal
'di lta ste/ dper na 'an pa tshad lhur las dngos po'i dbang gis gzhal du med pa'i bya ba dag 'byung ste/ be rmani ma rtog rnam par martog med kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos
sku daraldan pa'i phyir martog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba gzhal du med pa dag 'byung ngo// 'jam dpa lo de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
las kyang sems can yodas su sman bar mdzad pa'idabang gas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du dus cig du skad cig skad cig la/ mdzad pa gzhal du med
[rs./]pa dag 'byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ mi rtog cing lhun gyi grub par mdzad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byad ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang/
pa'i phyi no/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni 'dzam bu'i gling du snod chus bkang ba sgrub po med pa rnam par dag pa thams cad
cig/chan du snang yang gnas nas mi g.yogo/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab
'byams thams cad du sems can sgrub pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa de dag bsam pa ci lta ba dang ci ltar 'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
dga' ldan gnas nas g.yos ba yang med mod kyi/ 'on kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du mdzad pa rtsom pa thoms cad kyang snang go/ de ci'a'i
zhen/ mi g.yo ba'i ye shes brnyes pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na las kyi 'bras bu rnam par sman pa rab 'bring dang tha ma'i dbang gi/ sems can rnams/
kyi 'du byed rab 'bring dang tha ma dag 'byung ste/ 'dubyed na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ zhakyang 'du byed de dag ma 'dres ba'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ de ma rtog cing lhun gyis
[r]@#/// grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag 'byung ngo// de bzhin du rnam par smin pa thams cad 'bring dang rab kyi dbang gis sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa tha/
dang 'khring dang rab tu mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nAm rtog rnam par ma rtog med kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ma rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de lta bu
de dag kyang 'byung ngo/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste// dper na sngon las ro gcig pa'i char 'bab ste/ babasanas snod kyi bye brag gas kha dog snatshogs dang/ dra sna tshogs su gyur te/ sngonan
ma rtog rnam pa'i sa rtog med kyi/ 'on kyad ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par ma rtog cing lhun gyis grub par bya ba de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du de
bde gshegs pa chos kyi dbyangs kyi rogacig ste/ de sems can yongs su sman par byed pa'idabang gso ches kyi dbyangs tha dad par snang yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma rtog rnam
par mi rtog med kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par ma rtog cing lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa de ltabu de dag 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal 'ad lta ste/ dper
nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der/ lcags dang lcags kyi yo byad rnams ma 'byung ngo// de ci'i phyir zhen/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyi'i 'o// 'jam
dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gang du 'byung ba der/ me'i 'od rnams dang glog gi 'od rnams ma 'byung ngo// der ma'i 'od rnams la 'byung ngo// der nor bu'i 'od nams
mi 'byung ngo// der lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'tshonapo dang/ brgya zhi dang/
tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od rnams mi 'byung ngo// der rgyal po rnams kyi bka' la 'byung ngo// der rigs bzhi so nams mi 'byung ngo// der ma khom par skye ba rnams
'byung ngo// der sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ dgas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba rnams ma 'byung ngo// der mi dge bcu'i las kyi lama rnams
mi 'byung ngo// der rtonames pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo// de'i 'khrug pa thams cad ma 'byung ngo// der mu stegs can spyod pa ba dang/ kun tu rgyu dang/ gcer bu ba dang//
'tsho ba rnams ni mo 'byungang// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma rtog rnam par ma rtog 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir/ yul chags bo med pa'i 'i rnam par mi rtog
cing lhun gyis grub pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de dag kyang 'byung ngo// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal ba'i byin

bcu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyatsho'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams rab tu nyung gi/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'idang klang re'i skad cig skad cig la de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis kha dog dang rnam par gnas pa dang/ 'jug pa dus gcig tu 'byung ba gzhi ches mang ngo/ de'i phyi'i zhe na/ tsha 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir red/
'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga'acu'i rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams rab tu nyung// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes/
lhun gyis grub pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang gleng re 'i ra sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan dang gzhan dag rtsom par sbyor ba dang/ las dang bzo'i gnas thams
cad la sbyor ba das 'byung ba ni ches mang ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma rtog rnam par ma rtog med kyi/ 'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir rnam par ma rtog cing lhun

gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa khyim 'dan tha dad la/ khyim gzhan du gnas pa gzhan ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa lha 'os 'dan thadad la/ lha'i/
ris gzhan du gnas pa ma yanAno// de bzhin gshegs pa dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su skye ba 'din tha dad la/ dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su skye ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de
bzhin gshegs pa yadags kyi 'gro ba 'dazhetha dad la/ yid gs kyi 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba 'danatha dad la/

dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i thogs pa ni/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams dgan/ sangs rgyas kyi zhingagang dag yod pa de dag gnam mkha'
ci'adra ba'i mtha' na yod srid kyi/ dus gsum gyi phyogs mtha' yas ba dgan rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'byung ba dang/ 'jigarten par snang ba rgyal ba'i gtsug ter gyimatha'

khyad bzang po re re dang/ de bzhin du spu'i khung bu re re'i mtha' ni phyogs rnams na mi skyed do// lhadang cha dang bya chub sems dpa' gang dag chos kyi tshul bstan pa ji lta bu s
'dul ba de dag gi chos kyi tshul bstan pa de 'dra ba dag 'byung bar shes te/ de lalhadang ma dang byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gis ni gtsug tor la bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya
mtshograngs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ye shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho gras med pa'i khye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// khatsag
ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho grangasam da pa 'bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung ba shes so// cig gis ni'i shes kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'i bye brag bstan
pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni gzungs mtsho sa med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung pa shes so// gcig gis na ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye/
brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gsana rnam par thar pa rgya mtshograngs med pa 'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis naso so yang dag par rig
pa rgya mtshograngs med pa 'di bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gsanam bon pa/ngashes pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'byi brag bstan pa dag 'byung ba shes so// kha cig gi/
nasmon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gsani brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgya mtsho grangs med nga 'i bye brag bstan po dag 'byung bar shes so
kha tsag gisanadabugs 'byin pa rgya mtshograngs mad pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung ba shes so// kha tsag gsan byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag
bstan pa dag 'byung ba shes so// kha cig gsan de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gsan sems can
