brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shosaso// kha cig gsan bskal pa la 'jug pa rgyaAtshograngasamed pa phyi brag bstan pa dag 'byung ba shes so// kha cig gis nidus gsum la
'jug pa rgya mtshograngasam da da 'bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung ba'ashes so// kha cig gis ni dus gsum bstan pa rgya mtshograngs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so/
kha cig gis nam skyo ba'i sems bskyod pa rgya mtsho grangs mod pa'i bye brag bastan pa dag 'byung bar shesaso// lha dang mi dung byang chub sems dpa' kha tsag gis ni gtsug tor nas
dbyar med pa'i ye shes rgya mtshograngs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa dag 'byung bar shes so da bzhin du lha dang ma dang byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa ji lta ba dang/ 'dul ba ji lta
ba zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag gas/ sems kyi skad cig samasakyi skad cig la/ de bzhin dumadzod sa dang/ de bzhin du mtshan ma re re dang/ de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po ra re dang/
snga'i khung bu re rer nas chos tha dad pa rgya mtsho'abyi brag bstan pa dag 'byung ba shes so// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thogs pa med pa mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas pa ni phyi
ma mtha'amu'i bskal par byan gyis brlab kyang bstan par mi nus so// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi gtsug bltar me mthong ba ni/ 'jam
mi dpal 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i rdul snyad kyi 'jigarten gyi khams rgya mtshodagan rdul phra rab kyi rdul yod pa dag ni rab tu nyung gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor rgya mtshodag ni chesanang ngo// de la byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi thunan dpagatshad tsasamo// byang chub sems dang 'a kha cig ga khrunanadapag tshad bcu dang/ nyi shu dang
sum cu dang/ bzhi bcu'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi khrunan debagatshad brgya'o// byang chub sems dad 'a kha cig gi khun nad ga tshad brgya phrag bcu dang/ nyashudang/ sum nu dang
bzhi bcu'o// 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' gcig gan depag tshad stongang// 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' bcagagi khrun ni dpagatshad stong phrag bcu dang/ tadeshudang/
sum cudang/ bzhi bcu dang/ lnga bcu'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig ga khrunani dpag tshad bye ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' khacig gis khrunan dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcudang/ nyidishu
mdang sum rudang/ bzhi bcudang/ lnga bcu'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cig gi thunanadapagatshad bye ba phrag brgya'o// byang chub sems dpa' kha cigagi khunan dpag tshad bye ba phrag stong/
byang chub sems dpa' kha cagag thun ni dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag bcudang/ nyi shu dang/ sum cu dang/ bzhacu dang/ lnga bcu yod de/ dedag thams cad kyis/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
khams rab 'byams thams cad dang/ gling thams cad na dus gcig tu de bzhanagshegs das gyur du mthong ang// 'jam dpa lagal te byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa bsam
gyis ma khyab pa la gnas pa gang 'a' zhig/ sems kyiskad cig skad cig la/ 'jig rten gyi lams lta banu'artel snyad kyi gom pa der bas/ stongagi phyogs legs su song ste/
gom pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams lnga bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyedakyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshor song la/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'a spyi gtsug tshol zhing de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams
lnga bcu'i rdul snyad kyi bskal pa rgya mtshor song yang/ der yang de bzhin gshegs pa rtas du mthong ang// de ci'i phyir zhin ma 'dres pa'i tshis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro//
'jam dang la do bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug bltami mthong ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par na phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs kyang bstanapar ma nus so/
'jam dang 'del de bzhin gshegs pa'i soms can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa gnas rnams na/ 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byamasaMthamA
[s/ ]@#// cad kyi rdul phrarab kyi rdul rnams reb tu nyung gi/ 'jig rten gyi khams re'i dang/ gling re re dang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la// de bzhin gshegs pa sems
can de ngas su smin pa mdzad pa spyod pa ' gnas rnams na ches mang ngo// 'jam dpal 'jig rten gyi khams re re dang/ gling re re dang/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul re la/ de bzhin
gshigs pa soms can yongs susmin par mdzad pa spyod pa'i gnas canyid pa de bsanaM/ de bzhinagshegs pa'i sku las 'od gser gyi rgya mtsho'abyung zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
pa rjes su sgrogs pa dag ches mang ngo// sems kyi skadacig sems kyi skadatsug la/ de bzhin du gtsug tor dang/ mdzod spu dang/ mtshan re re dang/ dpe byad bzang po re re dang/
pa'i khung bu re re nas/ zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho dag 'byung ste/ de la 'od zer rgya mtsho la cig na bso danams kyatshegs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su skyog go/ 'od

zer rgya mtsho kha cigan yingashos kyi tshogs rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog gi/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtshograngs med pa rjes su slegago/ 'od zer rgya mtshe kha
cin se rgya mtshograngs med pa rjes su sgrog gi/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha ciganiting nge 'dzin rgyalatshograngasaedar rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig na rnam par thar pa rgyaatsho grangs
med pa rjes su sgogag/ 'od zer rgyaatsho kha ca gnas o so yang dag par rig pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho ba tsa naangon par shes pa rgya mtsho grangs med
pa rjes su sgog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha ca gnas mon lam rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su slog go/ 'od zer rgya mtshe kha caginabartson 'grus rtsom rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/
'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig na dbugs 'byin pa snyad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho bcig na byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa rgya mtshogras med pa rjes su skyog
go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig na de bzhin gshags pa la 'jug pa rgya mtshograngs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig nasems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa
rgya mtshograngs med pa rjes su sgrog ge/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cigan 'jig rten gyi khams la 'jug pa rgya mtshograngs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig ni bskal pa 'a
'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cig na dus gsum la 'jug pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa rjes su sgrog go/ 'od zer rgyayatsho ba cigan dus gsum
bstan pa rgya mtshograngs med pa rjes su sgog go/ 'od zer rgya mtsho ba cig mi skyo ba'isoms bskyod pa rgya mtshograngs pa rjes su sgrog gi/ 'od zer rgya mtsho kha cigani' shas tha dad
pa rgya mtshograngasamed pa rjes su sgrog go/ thogs pa med pa// sgrib pa med pa// dbyayod pa/ nam mkha'i khams rgyas par 'gengs pa/ phyi ma'i
mtha'i mu'i bskal par phyin gyis brlob bo// 'jam dang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa spyod pa ' gnas a rnams mder bstan pa yin te/ rgyas
bar ni phyoma'amathamu 'baskal bar byin gyis brlabs kyang bstan pa mi nus so// 'jam dpal de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa la ma 'ag
pana'ajam dpal de bzhin gshegs paskad cig skad cig la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad na zhing thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rgya
mAtsho dag dus cig tu rdul gcig la yongs su smin par mdzad de// de la sems can rgya mtsho kha cig na bsod nams kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan kha 'i yid
kyi yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems na rgya mtsho kha cig na yang shas kyi tshogs tha dad pa rgyu mtshogrisamed pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i yi shes kyis longs su smin pa mdzad// de
sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa tha dad pa rgya mtshograngs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i yang shes kyis lo sa su smin pa mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig na se tha dad pa
rgya mtshogra sa med pa'i ye shes bye brag bstan pa'i yi shes kyis longs su smin par mdzad de// somasacan mtsho kha cig na gzungs tha dad pa rgya mtshograngasamed pa'i bye brag bstan/
ba 'deshesakyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems can mtsho kha cig ni dzi dad pa ting nge 'dzin tha dad pa rgyu mtshograngasamed pa'i byi brag bstan pa 'i 'bashes kyis longasasusmon/
ba mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha tsagani rnam par thar pa tha dad pa rgya mtshograngasamad pa'i phyi brag bstan pa 'a yi shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho la
ca gnas so yang dag par rig pa thadad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig na mngon par shes pa thadad
ga rgya mtshograsamed ba'i bye brag bstan pa'i shes kyis longs su smin par mdzad// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig nin lam tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'i bye brag bstan pa'i/
yengashes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig na brtson 'grus rtsom pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i ni nga yis bye brag bastan pa'i le'ashes kyis yongs su smin
par mdzad do// sems can mtsho kha cig ni dbugs 'byin pa red pa tha dad pa rgya mtshogrongasam da pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i langashes kyis yongs su snyan bar mdzad do// sems can rgya
mtshob cig na byang chub sems dpa' la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtshograngs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i yid shes kyis ye ngas su smin par mdzad do// sems
can rgya mtsho ba cag na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'i bye brag bstan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad do// sems can rgyam tsho bcu ni
sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa 'i bye brag bstan pa 'i yi dashes kyis yo/ngas su smin par mdzad do// sems can rgya mtsho kha cig ni 'jig rten
gyi khams 'a'ajug pa tha dad pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa 'a yi shes kyis yongs su smin pa mdzad do// soms can rgya mtsho kha cigen pa skal par 'jug pa tha dad pa rgya
mtsho grangs med pa'i bye brag bstan pa'i yid shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad de// de bzhin du dus gsum la 'jug pa dang/ dus gsum bstan pa dang/ mi skyo ba'i sems
can bskyod pa dbyer med pa'i yi shes kyis yongs su smin par mdzad de// de bzhin dusems can rnam par sprul pa dang/ shing rnam par sal pa dang/ chos rnam par sprul pa dang/
lus rnam par sprul pa dang/ smon lam rnam par sprul pa dang/ spyod yul rnam par sprul pa dang/ ye shes rnam par sprul pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnam par sprulo pa dang/
[Boo/]rdzu 'phrul ma dalasal pa dang/ stobs rnam par sal pa dang/ rnam par rol ba'i'i ngashes rgya mtsho grangs med ba'i bye brag bstan pa 'a yi shes kyis/ de bzhin du skud cig skad
cig la sems can rgya mtshozhing thams cad kyis rdulasAd dug rdul gcig la longasasu san pa mdzad de/ 'jam dpal bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par
mdzad pa la mi 'jig pa mngon bstan pa yin te/ rgyas par phyi ma'i mtha' ma'i bskal par byin gyis brlobs kyang bstan par minus so// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'ama'ag
kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gas/ bskal pa rgya mtshokang+gA'i klung gi ma snyad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rdul snyed kyi sems can dag la nyan cig bzhin lha'i zas re brgya
dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'agros rnams sbyin papas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigasakyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi ston pa/ dge ba bcu'i
las kyi lam dang ldanub cig la/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa pa pa la bslabs pa'ogam du bsams/ nyin cig zanatsag khyon 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grang
med pa skyed do// 'jam dbal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gis/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gakhyim snyad dudag bstan ston pa gzhan lam ston pa dge ba bcu'i lA
dkyi lam dang ldan pa// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyedadag la/ nyin cig gzhin lha' bas brgya dang ldan pa byon pa dang/ de bzhin du lcags
rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge slong cag la nyan tsage zan cig byanan/ 'din dibs ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyodado
'dzum dang la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gi bskal pa rgya mtshog ng+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dge slong dag la/ nyin
cig bzhin du lha'i phas ro brgya dang ldan pa phyin pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'ages rnams spyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dad bas rjes su
'brang bcig lanan cig zan cig byin pa na/ 'dinadings ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do// 'jamadabal rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gas/ bskal
pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyadang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyad kyi dad pas rjes su 'brang bdag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhazhi
du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis chos kyis rjes su 'brang ba gcig 'a nyan cig zan cig byazhin/ 'di ni de bas
tshes bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpa wa rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyis bu mo gang la la zhag gis/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lta'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phyin pa dang/ de bzhin du snya'agasa rnams sbyin pa phyin kha bas/ 'jam
dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhigags brgyad pa cig latan cig zan tsag bden/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams grangasamed par bskyodade/ 'jam dpa la rigs
kyi bu 'am rags kyi bumo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gis bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis rdul snyed kyi brgyad pa dag la nyon cig bzhin du lta'i
zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin du lta'igs rnams sbyin btsun pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ rgyun du zhug
pa gcig la nyin cig zan tsagabyonan[） ]'di'adebasaches bsod ms glangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dbal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bum gang la la zhig gso/
bsal pa gang+ga'i klung gakhyim snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rgyun tu zhugs pa dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i dzes ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin/
da lta'i ges rnams sbyin pa khyon pa bas/ 'jam dang la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gas/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin/
cig zan cag byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyodad// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'amarigs kyi bumo gang la la zhag gis/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung
gi byis sIdadu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi lan cig phyir 'ong ba dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lca'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byon pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnamA
sbyin pa byin pa bas// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gas/ phyir mi 'ong ba gcig la nyan cig zan cig byanan/ 'din de bas ches bsod nams
grasamed par bskyod de// 'jam dpa la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bum gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed
kyi phyi ma 'ong ba dag la/ nyan cig bzhin du lha'i thas re brgya dang ldan pa khyon dpa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'dzam dpa la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gas/ dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin cig zan cig byonan/ 'di ni de bsatshos bsod nams grangs med par bskyod do// 'jam dpal ragisakyi bu 'am
mas thams cad kyis rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa dag la/ nyan cig bzhin du lha'izas ro
brgya dang ldan pa byon pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byipa bas/ 'jam da b.larigasakyi bu'am rigasakyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gas/ rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyan cig
zan cig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhag gas/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma/
sad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyad kyi rangs rgyas dag/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa/
bas rta gas kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gas sangs rgyas mo bris pa 'am gzugs su byas pa mthong na/ 'din de bas ches bsod nams gsamed par bskyod do/
thal mo sbyar ba 'am/ matog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ sngos sam/ lame 'bul ba tsasmos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyod de// 'jam dbal
rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bumo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyadad/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
cha bzhi brgya rtag sum
[s// sAd dag la/ nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa phul ba dang/ de bzhin du lha'i na bza' rnams phul dbas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ than phyugs kyi shing rta lta bur 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa cig la// sangs rgyas la skyed ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ru yang
rung bas yongs su 'dzan te/ thananyin cig zan cig byin pa na yang 'danadebs ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyod do// 'jam dpa la rags kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
la zhig gas/ bsal bar gapa'i klung gi byem snyad du/ phyugs kyi shing rta lta bu s 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyadadag la/ nyin cig
bzhin du lca'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams byin pa byin pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ glang po che'iteshang rta lta
bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' cige la/sangs rgyas l skyodaba'adege ba'i rtsa ba ci yang rung bas yongs su 'dzin te/ than tan cig zan cig byanyen lang/ 'dinadi bas ches bsod
ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/ nyan cag gzhan dustsa' zas ro brgya dang ldan pa khyan ba dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin/
ba bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bumo gzhan gang zhig gis/ zla ba dang nyis shing rta lta bu s 'gro ba' nga chub sems dpa' cig la/ sangs rgyas la bskyod/
pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bci yang rung bas longs su 'dzin te/ thanan cig zan cig phyin na yang/ 'din de bas chos bsod nams gras med par bskyodado// 'jam dpa la 'gasakyi
bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gces skad du/ zla ba dang zhima'i shing rta lta bu s 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ajig rten gyi khams
thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/ rten cagabazhin du lha'adzasaro brgya dang ldan pa khyon pa dang/ de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu
'am rigs kyi ba mogazhanagang zhigagos/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dang 'gacig latanatsag than tsag byonan/ 'dazhade bsaches bsod nams/
grangs med par bskyod do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhigags/ bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyadadu/ nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'khe
ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag lan cig bzhin du lta'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byan pa dang/ de bzhin
du lu'igs rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'jam dpal gas kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'ge ba'i byang chub
sems dpa' gcig la nyan tsage zan cag bzhin/ 'dano de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang 'ga' zhig
gras bskal pa gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'abyang chub mas dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/
nyin cig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang/ de bzhin dulca'i ges rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/ 'di ni rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ger 'dra ba dang/ yi ger 'dir 'jug pa dang/ klog pa 'din de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyod do// bzlog ste bsdu stangam
byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// phyugs kyi shing rta lta bu s 'gro ba dang/ ra'i shing rta lta bu s 'gro ba dang/ glang po che'i shing rta lta bu s 'gro
ba dang/ zla ba dang nya' shing lta lta bu s 'gro ba dang// nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang/ de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
zhig gas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi nyenanges kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'artsa ba rnams kyi bar chad byas pa bas/ ]
'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhag gras/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig la/ than dud
'gro'i skyes gnas su rtogs pa'i dage ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed cing khro ba dang bas nga'i sems bskye dan/ 'dinadi bas ches bsod nams ma yin pa grangs med par bskyed
do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gris/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyisams cad rnams kyi mig
phyung nas bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gzigs/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar s pa'i sems bskyad de/ gshe
ba dang ma snyan par sa bdang rog par byed na/ de bas ches sdig pa mang ngaskyodado// 'jam dpal rig gyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' larkyen
(bya// tshu yang rung bas bar s pa bskyed de spyod pan/ dem dge ba'i las des semacan dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen po'i lus dpag tshad lnga brgyar skye bar 'gyur te/ de la
mgolnga brgya yod par 'gyur// de'agagarar la yang lo lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/ de gis re re la yang lu lnga brgya yod par 'gyur/ lce'i re la yang gshol rtsi lnga brgyas bar 'gyur
ro// 'jam dpa larigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i'ajig rten gyi khamA rnams su skyes pa'isims can tham cad la dbyug pa dang
mtshonacha yis bsnun te bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas ga sa kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gse/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar s pa'i semA bskyodanas/ khro ba dpa
gnadasems dang tho ba dang khros pa'i sams bskyedazha/ 'dani de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par bskyod do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sdang
ba'isrims kyis sems can rnams la gnod par 'dod cing/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byam snyad dgan/ 'jig rta gyi khams re re dang gling re ren/ dgra bcom pa gA'i
klung gi khyim snyed dag gi srog bcad pa dang/ rin po che'i mchod rten rin po che'i sogs lus yongs su bskor cing/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i ba danagatsugs pa
0 gang+ga'i bye ma snyed dag bshags pa bas/ 'jam dpalarigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bumo gang zhig gas/ theg pa chen po 'tshos ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen/
po nyidi la sgro btags te bar s pa'i sams bskyed nas/ rkyen cis kyang rung khro ba dang gshe ba dang/ mi snyan pa zer ba dang/ khyod dus gsod par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches
sdig pa grangs med par bskyed de// de ci'i phyirozhin/ byang chub sems dpa' las de zhanagshegs pa nges par 'byung ba'i phyire te/ de nas sa rgyas kyi rigs mi gcod pa 'a
phyir zhugs pa yin no// gangabyang chub sems dpa' la skur pa des chos spangs pa yin no// chos kyang gzhan la tshos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang
gzhan m yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' tade tshos so// 'jam dpal rages kyi bu 'amarigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams/
cad kyi sems can thams btson ra mun nag dag tu bcug pa bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig khros te/ byang chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyis phyogs shing
'dug nas// ma rungs pa 'di mi blta'o// zhes zeran/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangasamed par bskyod do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig ga/
[fe]/ 'dzam bu'i grong gsems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrog pa bas/ gzhan gang zhig gis byang chub saA dpa'i tsa lta bu yang rung ba la snang na//
'din de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par bskyed do// 'jamadung la 'di lta ste/ dperan ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyis 'dalta ste/ mtho pa dang/ las pa dang che bas/ thams cad
thol gyi mnan nas lham me lcan ne lhang nge'o/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pas kyang/ 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang ra ngas pa dang che
bas/ phyogs bcu'adegan byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rnam gras 'di la mamos pa// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed yod pa de dag gdeg ba'i rtsa ba la rol tu phyin pa la/
las byung ba/ bskal pa grangs med par bsags pa jil gyis mnan nas/ lcam me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'jam dpa la rigs kyi bu 'am ragis kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gas/ phyog
bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa bas/ 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ phung
po yod pa'i gzhi la mosan/ 'danodi bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyodado// 'jam dpal gal te sems can phung po med pa'i gzhi la mos par 'gyur pa bas/ 'jam
dab la 'gas kyi bu 'am 'ag kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig ches kyi rnam grangs 'dal mos la/ mos nas kyang yi ger 'dri ba dang/ yiger 'drar 'jug pa dang/ klog pa dang/ glog du/
'jug pa dang/ tha na glegs bam du bris pa la mos nas 'dzin par byed cing/ maram dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sos dang/ phrang ba dang/ rgyug pa rnams kyis mchod/
pa byed na/ 'drani de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyod do// 'jam dpal rages kyi bu 'am kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ phyogs bcu'a'ajagi rten gyi khams
thams cad du gteg pa'i sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dug/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa re re'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhal dumad pa gra dAmed pa/
rnamAdang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang lha'i 'jig rten du skyo ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud gzon pa bas gzhan gang zhig gis/ byang chub sems
dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa bgacig chud thos par byas// 'din dbasaches sdig pa grangs med par skyod nas/ gshe ba dang mi snyan par smra ba lta ci smos/ 'jam dpa la rags kyi bu 'am
rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ mchod rten gang+ga'i klungag bye ma snyed dag bshig pa dang bsregs la bas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis/ theg pa chen po la/
ka@#// mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang tha ba dang khro ba'i sems bskyod de/ gshe bam snyan par sasan/ 'danade bas ches sdig pa grangs med par
bskyed de// de ci'i phyir zhin/ byang chub sems dpa' 'os sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nges par byung la/ sangs rgyas las mchod rten rnams byung zhing/ sangs rgyas las
sh+tsa 'dzag rten thams cad dung lha ris thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad byung la// sangs rgyas kyang byang chub sems dpa ba las byung bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' la bsu
stangs byas pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang ma byas pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang byas pan sangs rgyas thams cad la bsta stang byas pa mAn no//
sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa blun med pas mchod ba byed 'ded pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpa la gal te grong khyer la la zhig na/ byang
zla chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya 'am/ byab stong ngam/ bye ba brgya stong ma/ gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag lo da la chos kyis rnam grangs 'di la ma mes na/ de dag gis lasazhi/
rgyal po 'khrug par 'gyur ba 'am/ chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i rtswa sam/ chom rkun gyis 'khrug pa ra 'gyur ba'i las sam/ mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur pa'i lAsam/ ches 'khrug par/
'gyur ba'i las sam/ kla klos 'khrug par 'gyur pa'i las su 'gyur ro// grong khyer chen po de na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mes pa 'byang chub ses dpa' yod na/ de'i lasan bas 'kha
grongs med pa ra mtshams med pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur/ grong khyer der 'khrug par ma 'gyur// gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag galas rgyal po 'khrug par 'gyur ba mi 'byung
chus 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las ma 'byung/ chem rkun gyis 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las mi 'byung/ mu ges 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i las ma 'byung/ mos 'khrug par 'gyur ba'i lA mi/
'byung/ kla klos 'khrug pa'i las ma 'byung la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byung chub sems dpa' las bsal pa rgya mtsho grangs med pa de sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro
dang yi dgas su skyo bar 'gyur ba yod ni/ der 'khrug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhan/ de'i las bskal pa grangs med pa brjod du med par mtshams med par skyo bar 'gyur ba
dang/ de'i las bskal pa bcu dang/ ldi shu dang/ sum cur ngan song myong bar 'gyur ba lang tshe 'di la myong ste 'khrug pas byang bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ bsod nams chen
po'i tshogs bsags pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal 'di ltaste/ dpe ban brgyar dpag tshad brgya pa'i rdzong lan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang la dug srang stong langam gdug
par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ chu'i phung po chen pos rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bskyal pa grangs med par sa
can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dkyis nang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rab tu mang pa yang rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ chu'i phung
chen ngos rab tu bya ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das kyidisnyad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang byang chub semA/
dpa' phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa dpag tu med pa grangs med pa rnams dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lcam yin dung/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa laangan bar bstod de// 'phags bdad pa'i stobs bskyodang la'ajug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba thegapa chen po'amado rdzogs so//
rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra btsudang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ringashes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
